āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamākhyā pañjikā /
[the first 100 sentences of the SKT and the first 2200 sentences of the Tibetan had to be skipped...] /
yato 'syāṃ bodhipakṣyaiḥ saṃkleśendhanadahanaṃ tasmādarciṣmatī 		'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel [dd] snying po mchog ces bya ba /
[the first 100 sentences of the SKT and the first 2200 sentences of the Tibetan had to be skipped...] / gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs kyis nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg pa de bas na 'od 'phro ba'o /
yato 'syāṃ laukikalokottarayorvidyāsatyajñānayoranyonyavirodhādduṣkaraḥ parijayastasmātsudurjayā gang gi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma rig pa dang bden pa'i shes pa phan tshun 'gal ba dka' bas sbyong bar byed pa de bas na sbyang dka' ba'o /
yato 'syāṃ pratītyasamutpādapravicayādabhimukho bhavatyasaṅgamukhākhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārastasmādabhimukhī gang gi phyir 'di la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du 'gyur zhing gnas pa de bas na mngon du gyur pa'o /
gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs dang /
yato 'syāṃ bodhipakṣyasatya[pratītya] samutpādālambano nirnimittavihāra ābhogavāhī tasmāddūraṃgamā bden pa dang /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs nas mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa de bas na ring du song ba'o /
yato 'syāṃ sa eva svarasavāhitvādacalaḥ tasmādacalā gang gi phyir 'di la de nyid rang gi ngang gi 'byung ba'i phyir mi gyo pa'o /
yato 'syāṃ pratisaṃvibhdirdhārmakathikatvādbodhisattvaḥ sādhustasmāt sādhumatī /
yato 'syāṃ bodhisattvo 'bhiṣicyate yau[va]rājyāya tasmāddharmameghā 		gang gi phyir 'di la so so yang dag par rig pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' legs par ston pas legs pa'i blo gros so /
gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba de bas na chos kyi sprin no /
..........etāḥ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ yathākramam 'di dag re re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yang dag par bsdus pa yin no /
etāsu daśa pāramitā atiricyate /
katamā daśa? /
(RSt_5) 		de la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcur yang bya ba yin te bcu gang zhe na /
"dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīrya dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānametāḥ pāramitā daśa 		sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang thabs dang smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes te 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o /
tatra yatpāramitopacitasya kuśalamūlasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau samyakpariṇāmanamupādāya pāramitā tenopāyena tasyākṣayīkaraṇāt de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgo nas nye bar bsags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
thabs des de mi zad par byed pa'i phyir ro /
āha ca /
"ābodhe kṣayamiti svalpamapi na bodhipariṇataṃ kuśalam /
āsamantātpatitaḥ payonidhau salilabidnuriva" iti /
bhadracaryādikaṃ praṇidhānapāramitā yayā pratijanma yatpāramitāścarati /
bhāvanābalaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabalaṃ ca balapāramitā 		de yang /
byang chub bsngos pa'i dge ba ni /
byang chub bar du zad pa med /
rgya mtshor chu thigs gtor ba yang /
'jig pa'i bskal bar gnas pa bzhin /
zhes smos so /
bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam la sogs pa dang gang gi skye ba thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
sgom pa'i stobs dang so sor brtags pa'i stobs dang gang yang nyin re 'am /
yayā pratyahaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ tāścarati skad cig re re la de dag spyod pa ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
yathābhiprāyamayathārutaṃ mahāyānasya parijñānaṃ jñānapāramitā dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin nam sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par theg pa chen po yongs su shes pa ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
bhūmīnāṃ vistara āryadaśabhūmakādau /
parikarmāṇi punarāsāṃ mahatyorbhagavatyoruddiṣṭāni nirdiṣṭāni ca bhūmīnāṃ parikarmāṇyadhikṛtya śāstre trayoviṃśatiḥ ślokāḥ /
tāni yathābhūmi pṛthakkṛtya vakṣyāmaḥ /
[5] labhyate daśamā (prathamā) bhūmidarśadhā parikarmaṇā 		sa rnams ni sa bcu pa la sogs pa las rgyas par bstan to /
sa sbyong ba ni yang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag la brtags pa dang rjes su bstan pa yin no /
sa rnams sbyong ba'i dbang du byas nas /
bstan bcos las tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu gsungs te /
de dag kyang sa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor bshad par bya ste /
yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis /
sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te /
āśayo hitavastutvaṃ sattveṣu samacittatā bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid /
[6] tyāgaḥ sevā ca mitrāṇāṃ saddharmālambanaiṣaṇā gtong dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang /
dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang /
sadā naiṣkramyacittatvaṃ buddhakāyagatā spṛhā rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang /
sangs rgyas bkur bstod dga' ba dang /
[7] dharmasya deśanā satyaṃ daśamaṃ vākyamiṣyate chos bstan pa dang bden pa yi /
tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod /
jñeyaṃ ca parikarmaiṣāṃ svabhāvānupalambhataḥ /
'daśadhā' iti daśavidhena /
taccāśayādi 		'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas /
yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya /
zhes bya ba la rnam pa bcu ni rnam pa bcu ste /
de yang bsam pa la sogs pa ste /
'āśayaḥ' śraddhāchandau /
'hitavastutvaṃ' sarvasattvahitaiṣitā /
heturasyāḥ 'sattveṣu praśamacittatā' /
'tyāgo ' dānapāramitā 		bsam pa ni dad pa dang 'dun pa'o /
phan pa'i dngos po ni thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o rgyu nyid ni 'di la sems can rnams la sems mnyam pa nyid do /
gtong ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
'eṣaṇā' paryeṣaṇā /
sā ca 'saddharmālambanā' dharmaparyeṣṭirityarthaḥ 		tshol ba ni yongs su tshol ba'o /
de yang dam pa'i chos rnams la dmigs pa ste /
chos yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
gṛhavāsānniṣkramaṇaṃ niṣkramaḥ /
svārthe ṣyañ 'naiṣkramyaṃ' taccittatā /
'spṛhā' ityatra sadeti vartate 		nges par 'byung ba ni khyim gyi gnas nas nges par 'byung ba'o /
nges par 'byung ba de la sems pa nyid de 'dod pa nyid do /
dga' ba zhes bya ba la yang 'dir rtag tu zhes bya ba rjes su sbyor ro /
'satyaṃ' coktamiti satyavacanaṃ taddaśamam /
'eṣāṃ' ityāśayādīnām 		bden pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni bden pa'i ngag ste de dag ni bcu'o /
'di dag ces bya ba ni bsam pa la sogs pa'o /
[8] śīlaṃ kṛtajñatā kṣāntiḥ prāmodyaṃ mahatī kṛpā tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod /
rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che /
gauravaṃ guruśuśrūṣā vīryaṃ dānādike 'ṣṭamam bkur sti gus par nyan pa dang /
brgyad pa sbyin la sogs la brtson /
(RSt_6) 'śīlaṃ' śīlapariśuddhiḥ /
'kṣāntiḥ' kṣāntibalam /
pramoda eva 'prāmodyam' 'mahatī' sarvasattvāparityāgitayā 		zhes bya ba la tshul khrims ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o /
bzod pa ni bzod pa'i stobs so /
rab tu dga' ba nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'o /
sems can thams cad yongs so ma btang ba ni snying brtse ba chen po'o /
'gauravaṃ' gauravārheṣu /
'gurūśuśrūṣā' kalyāṇamitreṣa śāstṛsaṃjñā 		bkur sti ni bkur bar bya bar 'os pa'o /
gus par nyan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten pa'i 'du shes so /
'dānādike ' iti pāramitāsu sbyin pa la sogs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa dag la'o /
'aṣṭama' grahaṇādaṣṭāveva parikarmāṇi dvitīyāyām /
[9] atṛptatā śrute dānaṃ dharmasya ca nirāmiṣam 		brgyad pa smos pa de ni yongs su sbyangs pa gnyis pa nyid brgyad yin no /
thos pas mi ngoms nyid dang ni /
zang zing med par chos sbyin dang /
buddhakṣetrasya saṃśuddhiḥ saṃsāroparikheditā sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang /
'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang /
[10] hrīrapatrāpyamityetat pañcadhāmananātmakam /
'śrutaṃ' bāhuśrutyam /
'saṃśuddhiḥ' pariśuddhiḥ /
sā tasyāmeva puṇyapariṇāmanāt /
'amananātmakaṃ' tenāmananāt /
'pañcadhā' iti vacanāt pañcaiva parikarmāṇi tṛtīyāyām /
vanāśālpecchatā tuṣṭirdhutasaṃlekhasevanam /
[11] śikṣāya aparityāgaḥ kāmānāṃ vijugupsanam /
nirvitsarvāstisaṃtyāgā[vana]valīna[tvān]pekṣate /
vanasya ('vānāśā) araṇyavāsastatkāryatvāt /
'tuṣṭiḥ' santuṣṭiḥ /
'dhuta' guṇa 'saṃlekhasya' 'sevanaṃ' anutsargaḥ /
'nirvitsarvāstisaṃtyāgau' iti nirvedaḥ sarvasatāṃ tyāgaśca /
'anavalīnatvānapekṣate ' iti /
anavalīnacittatā sarvavastunirapekṣatā ca 		ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba /
rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga /
zhes bya ba la thos pas zhes bya ba ni mang du thos pas so /
zhing kun sbyong zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag par ro /
de la de dag nyid bsod nams yongs su bsngo bas rlom sems med pa'i bdag nyid de des rlom pa med pas de rnam lnga zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so /
yongs su sbyong ba lnga pa ni gsum pa yin no /
nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang /
sbyang pa yang dag sdom bsten dang /
bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang /
'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang /
mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong /
mi zhum pa dang lta ba med /
ces bya ba la /
nags gnas ni dgon pa na gnas pa 'am yang na de byed pa'o /
chog shes pa ni yang dag par dga' ba'o /
sbyangs pa yang sdom bsten dang /
zhes bya ba ni mi gtong ba'o /
smod pa zhes bya ba ni skyo ba'o /
bdog kun gtong zhes bya ba ni bdog pa thams cad gtong ba'o /
mi zhum pa dang lta ba med /
ces bya ba ni ma zhum pa'i sems nyid dang dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med ste /
anavalīnatvaṃ asaṃkucutatvam /
daśeti vakṣyamāna(ṇa)manuvartate 		zhum pa med pa dang bag 'khums pa med pa'i phyir /
rnam pa bcu po 'og nas bshad pa dag kyang 'dis rjes su 'brang ste /
tato daśaiva parikarmāṇi caturthyām des na yongs su sbyong ba bcu po nyid ni bzhi pa yin no /
[12] saṃstavaṃ kulamātsarya sthānaṃ saṅgaṇikāvaham 'dris dang khyim la 'khren pa dang /
'du 'dzin gyur pa'i gnas dang ni /
ātmotkarṣaparāvajñe karmamārgān daśāśubhān bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang /
mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang /
[13] mānaṃ stambhaṃ viparyāsaṃ vimatiṃ kleśamarṣaṇam rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log /
yid gnyis dang ni nyon mongs bzod /
vivarja[ya]n samāpnoti daśaitān pañcamīṃ bhuvam /
'saṃstavo ' gṛhipravrajitaiḥ /
'kuleṣu' upasaṃ[kra]maṇīyāgṛheṣu 'mātsaryam' /
'saṅgaṇikā' apratirūpakathā 		bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs na /
sa lnga pa ni yang dag thob /
ces bya ba la /
'dris pa ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag dang khyim la 'khren pa ni khyim du song nas ser na byed pa'o /
'du 'dzir gyur pa ni gtam mi 'dra ba sna tshogs so /
'utkarṣaṇam' /
'avajñā' (RSt_7) paṃsanam /
'karmamārgāḥ' 'karmapathāḥ' /
'mānaḥ' cittonnatiḥ /
'stambho ' gurūṣvapraṇatakāyatā /
'viparyāso ' viparātārthagrāhaḥ /
'vimatiḥ' vicikitsā /
'kleśamarṣaṇaṃ' rāgadveṣamohādhivāsanam /
'etān' iti saṃstavādīn 		bstod pa stod par byed pa'o /
brnyas pa ni smod pa'o /
las kyi lam ni las lam mo /
rlom pa ni mtho bar sems pa'o /
khengs pa ni bla ma rnams la lus kyis mi 'dud pa'o /
phyin ci log ni phyin ci log gi don 'dzin pa'o /
yid gnyis ni the tshom mo /
nyon mongs pa bzod pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi bag chags lhag par bsgo ba ste /
de dag ni 'dris pa la sogs pa'o /
[14] dānaśīlakṣamāvīryadhyānaprajñā prapūrakaḥ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod btson 'grus /
bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas /
śiṣyakhaḍgaspṛhātrāsacetasāṃ parivarjakaḥ slob ma dang ni bse ru la /
dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs pa /
[15] yācito 'navalīnaśca sarvatyāgepyadurmanāḥ bslangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun /
btang yang mi dga' med pa dang /
kṛśo 'pi nārthināṃ kṣeptā ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ samaśnute dbul yang slong ba mi spong las /
sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob /
ces bya ba la /
ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pratyekaṃ pūraka iti ṣaḍdharmāḥ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re res rab tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni drug go /
śrāvakaspṛhāyāḥ pratyekabuddhaspṛhāyāḥ parita(tra)sanacittasya ca parivarjaka iti trayaḥ nyan thos la dga' ba dang rang sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang skrag pa'i sems yongs su spangs ba de dag ni gsum mo /
yācitasyānabalīnacittatā, sarvasvatyāge 'pyadaurmanasya, daurbalyepi na yācakānāṃ kṣepa iti trayaḥ /
ebhirdvādaśabhirdharmaiḥ ṣaṣṭhiṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnoti 		bslangs nas mi zhum pa'i sems nyid dang bdog pa kun btang yang mi dga' ba nyid dang dbul yang slong ba mi spong ba de ni gsum ste chos bcu gnyis po de dag gis ni sa drug pa thob pa yin no /
[16] ātmasattvagraho jīvapudgalocchedaśāśvate bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang /
srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang /
nimittahetvoḥ skandheṣu dhātuṣvāyataneṣu ca mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang /
khams dang skye mched dag dang ni /
[17] traidhātuke pratiṣṭhānaṃ saktirālīnacittatā khams gsum pa dang chags gnas dang /
sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang /
ratnatritayaśīleṣu taddṛṣṭyabhiniveśitā dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims dang /
der lta ba la mngon zhen dang /
[18] śūnyatayāṃ viśā(ṣā)daśca tadvirodhaśca viṃśatiḥ /
kalaṅkā yasya vicchinnāḥ saptamīmetyasau bhuvam 		stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang /
de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni /
nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa /
de yis sa ni bdun pa 'thob /
[19] trivimokṣamukhajñānaṃ trimaṇḍalaviśuddhitā rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang /
'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang /
karuṇā mananā dharmasamataikanayajñatā snying rje dang ni rlom sems med /
chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes /
[20] anutpādakṣamājñānaṃ dharmāṇāmekadheraṇā mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang /
chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston /
kalpanāyāḥ samudghātaḥ saṃjñādṛkleśavarjanam rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang /
'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong /
[21] śamathasya ca nidhyaptiḥ kauśalaṃ ca vidarśane /
cittasya dāntatā jñānaṃ sarvatrāpratighāti ca /
(RSt_8) 		zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang /
lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang /
sems dul ba dang thams cad la /
thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang chags pa'i sa min gang 'dod par /
[22] śa(sa)kterabhūmiryatrecchaṃ kṣetrāntaragatiḥ samam zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang /
kun tu bdag gi ngo bo ni /
sarvatra svātmabhāvasya darśanaṃ ceti [viṃśatiḥ] /
dvitīyāt 'viṃśati' śabdādūrdhvaṃ guṇāḥ......ātmagrahādayo 'viṃśatiḥ' /
'kalaṅkāḥ' doṣāḥ /
yasya 'vicchinnāḥ' prahīṇāḥ 		ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o /
gnyis pa nyi shu'i sgra la ni yon tan nyi shus lhag pa yin te /
yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa nyes pa nyi shu'o /
nyes pa ni dri ma'o /
gang la rnam par chad pa ni rab tu nyams pa'o /
trivimokṣamukhajñānādayaśca viṃśatiḥ gunāḥ (ṇāḥ) paripūrṇāḥ sa saptamīṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnotīti samāsato 'rthaḥ rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang yon tan nyi shu yongs su rdzogs pas ni sa bdun pa thob pa yin no zhes mdor bsdus pa'i don to /
' graho ''bhiniveṣaḥ(śaḥ) /
tasya viśeṣaṇamātmādirāyatanaparyantaḥ 		'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa'o /
de'i khyad par ni bdag la sogs pa nas skye mched kyi bar du'o /
śāśvatoccheda..........................ratnādi (?) dṛṣṭiḥ /
tasyāṃ 'abhiniveṣi (śi)tā' niśrayaḥ /
'viṣādaḥ' khedaḥ /
'tadvirodhaḥ' śūnyatāyā bādhanam /
'samaṃ' iti sahetyarthaḥ /
tatra kalaṅkanirdeśānāmā(ma)rthaḥ /
ātmagrāhaḥ /
sattvagrāhaḥ /
jīvagrāhaḥ /
pudgalagrāhaḥ /
ucchedagrāhaḥ /
śāśvatagrāhaḥ /
nimittagrāhaḥ /
hetugrāhaḥ /
skandhagrāhaḥ /
[dhātugrāhaḥ /
āyatanagrāhaḥ /
] traidhātuke adhyavasānam /
traidhātuke ālayaḥ /
buddhidṛṣṭiniśrayaḥ /
dharmadṛṣṭiniśrayaḥ /
saṅghadṛṣṭiniśrayaḥ /
śīladṛṣṭiniśrayaḥ /
śūnyā dharmā iti viṣāḍhaḥ /
śanyatāvirodhaśceti /
guṇānirdeśānāmarthaḥ /
śūnyatāparipūrtiḥ /
ānimittasākṣātkriyā /
apraṇihitajñānam /
[trimaṇḍalaviśuddhitā /
karuṇā /
mananā] /
sarvadharmasamatādarśanam /
bhūtanayaprativedhaḥ /
anutpādakṣāntijñānam /
ekanayanirdeśaḥ /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ kalpanāsamuddhātaḥ /
saṃjñādṛṣṭivivartaḥ /
kleśavivartaḥ /
śamathanidhyaptiḥ /
vipaśyanākauśalyam /
dātucittatā /
anunayasyābhūmiḥ /
yathecchakṣetragamanam /
tatra cabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍe[svātmabhāva]darśanamiti /
[23] [sarvasattvamanojñāna] mabhijñākrīḍanaṃ śubhā /
buddhakṣetrasya niṣpattirbuddhasevāparīkṣaṇe /
[24] akṣajñānaṃ jinakṣetraśuddhirmāyopamā sthitiḥ /
sañcintya ca bhavādānamidaṃ karmāṣṭadhoditam /
iti /
'śubhā niṣpattiḥ' iti sambandhaḥ /
pariśuddhetyarthaḥ /
'aṣṭādhā' iti vacanāt āṣṭaveva parikarmāṇyaṣṭamyām /
tadyathā /
sarvasattvacittānupraveśaḥ /
abhijñācittā [nukriḍanam /
buddhakṣetraniṣpādanam /
buddhānāṃ sevā ca parīkṣaṇaṃ cetyekīkriyate /
indriyaparāparajñānam /
buddhakṣetrapariśodhanam /
(RSt_9) māyopamasya samādherabhīkṣṇaṃ samāpattiḥ sañcitya bhavo[pa]pattiśca /
dvividhaṃ buddhakṣetram /
ādau bhājanalokaḥ paścāt sattvaloka iti /
[25] praṇidhānānyanantāni devādīnāṃ rutajñatā /
nadīva pratibhānānāṃ garbhāvakrāntiruttamā /
[26] kulajātyośca gotrasya parivārasya janmanaḥ /
naiṣkramyabodhivṛkṣāṇāṃ guṇapūreśca saṃpadaḥ /
aṣṭamānantaraṃ navamī /
tasyāḥ parikarmāṇi dvādaśa /
anantaṃ praṇidhānam /
devādirutajñānam /
paripūrṇaṃ pratibhānam /
garbhāvakrāntisampat /
kulasaṃpat /
jātisaṃpat /
gotrasaṃpat /
parivārasaṃpat /
janmasaṃpat /
naiṣkramyasaṃpat /
bodhivṛkṣasaṃpat /
guṇapūrisampacca /
[27] navabhūmīratikramya buddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhate /
yena jñānena sā jñeyā daśamī bodhisattvabhūḥ /
'navabhūmīḥ' iti gotrādibhūmiḥ /
tatra gotrabhūmiḥ nirvāṇagotrakāṇam /
aṣṭamakabhūmiḥ śrotaāpattiphalapratipannakasya /
darśanabhūmiḥ śrotaāpannasya /
tanubhūmiḥ sakṛdāgaminaḥ /
vītarāgabhūmiranāgāminaḥ /
"kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ" iti jñānāt kṛtāvī arhan /
tasya bhūmiḥ kṛtāvibhūmiḥ 		rtag pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i dbye ba yin te /
rnam par dbye ba bdun par byas so /
dkon mchog gsum dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas dkon mchog la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas dkon mchog la sogs pa la lta ba'i bar du'o /
de la mngon par zhen pa ni nges pa'o /
yid 'byung ba ni skyo ba'o /
de dang 'gal ba ni stong pa nyid la gnod pa'o /
mnyam pa ni lhan cig pa'i don to /
de la nyes pa bstan pa'i don ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang sems can du 'dzin pa dang srog tu 'dzin pa dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang chad par 'dzin pa dang rtag par 'dzin pa dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang rgyur 'dzin pa dang phung por 'dzin pa dang khams su 'dzin pa dang skye mchid du 'dzin pa dang khams gsum pa la rnam par gnas pa dang khams gsum la chags pa dang; sangs rgyas la lta ba la gnas pa dang chos la lta ba la gnas pa dang dge 'dun la lta ba la gnas pa dang tshul khrims la lta ba la gnas pa dang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yid 'byung ba dang stong pa nyid la 'gal ba dag go /
yon tan rjes su ston pa'i don ni ston pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byed pa dang smon pa med pa shes pa dang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang snying rje ni sems can thams cad la brtse ba'o /
de dag la yang rlom sems med pa'o /
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang theg pa yang dag par rab tu rtogs pa dang mi skye ba la bzod pa'i shes pa dang theg pa gcig tu ston pa dang chos thams cad kyi rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang 'du shes dang lta ba spong ba dang nyon mongs pa spong ba dang zhi gnas la nges par sems pa dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang sems dul ba dangthams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang chags pa med pa'i sa ma yin pa dang ji ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der yang bdag gi ngo bo yang dag par ston pa'o /
sems can kun yid shes pa dang /
mngon par shes pas brtse pa dang /
sangs rgyas zhing bzang sgrub pa dang /
yongs su brtag phyir sangs rgyas brten /
dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi /
zhing sbyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang /
bsam bzhin srid pa len pa dang /
las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad /
bzang sgrub ces bya bar sbyar te yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
rnam brgyad ces bya ba'i tshig gis ni rnam pa brgyad nyid de yongs su sbyangs pa brgyad pa'o /
'di lta ste /
sems can thams cad kyi sems shes ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgrub pa dang sangs rgyas rnams la brten pa dang yongs su brtag pa gcig tu byas pa dang dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dangsgyu ma lta bu'i ring nge 'dzin la yang dang yang du snyoms par 'jug pa dang srid par bsams bzhin du skye ba'o /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa gnyis te /
dang po ni snod kyi 'jig rten phyi ma ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no /
smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang /
lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang; /
spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang /
mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni /
rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang /
'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni /
nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams kyi /
yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin /
brgyad kyi 'og tu dgu ba yin te /
de'i yongs su sbyong ba ni bcu gnyis te /
smon lam mtha' yas pa dang lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang /
spobs pa chi bo lta bu dang mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang rus phun sum tshogs pa dang cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang nges par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa dang yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'o /
sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni /
gang gi sangs rgyas sar gnas pa /
de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa /
bcu ba yin par shes par bya /
sa dgu ni rigs la sogs pa'i sa'o /
de la rigs kyi sa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rigs can no /
brgyad pa'i sa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o /
mthong ba'i sa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o /
bsrabs pa'i sa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o /
bya ba byas so zhes khong du chud pa'i phyir de'i sa ni byas rtogs pa can gyi sa'o /
śrāvakabhūmiḥ śrāvakasya /
saiva ṣaḍvidhā pratyekabuddhasya /
bodhisattvabhūmiḥ bodhisattvasya /
pūrvoktā navabhūmayaḥ /
etā navabhūmīratikramya yena jñānena bodhisattvo buddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bhavati sā daśami bodhisattvabhūmiḥ /
iti bhūmisambharaḥ /
prati[pakṣa]madhikṛtya śāstram- 		nyan thos kyi sa ni nyan thos kho na rnam pa drug pa'o /
rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o; /
byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni sngar bshad pa'i sa rnams so /
sa dgu po 'di dag 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes gang gis sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu ba'o /
de dag ni sa'i tshogs so /
gnyen po'i tshogs kyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[28] pratipakṣo 'ṣṭadhā jñeyo darśanābhyāsamārgayoḥ mthong dang goms pa'i lam dag la /
gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnams /
grāhyagrāhavikalpānāmaṣṭānāmupaśāntaye /
'abhyāso ' bhāvanā /
grāhyo, grāhakaḥ /
darśanamārge dvau grāhyavikalpau /
vastumātrādhiṣṭhānaḥ pratipakṣadhiṣṭhānaśca 		nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
goms pa ni sgom pa'o /
gzung ba ni mthong ba'i lam la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
dngos po tsam la gnas pa dang gnyen po la gnas pa'o /
dvau grāhakavikalpau 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
pudgaladravyādhiṣṭhānaḥ pudgalaprajñaptyadhiṣṭhānaśca gang zag rdzas la brten pa dang /
gang zag rdzas la btags pa'i gzhi la brten pa'o /
[evaṃ bhāvanāmārge vikalpa]prahāṇāya aṣṭau pratipakṣāḥ /
pratipakṣasambhāraḥ 		de dag ni bsgom pa'i lam la yang ngo /
brgyad po 'di dag spang ba'i phyir gnyen po brgyad ni gnyen po'i tshogs so /
(RSt_10) /
tatra darśanamārge tathatādīnāṃ rūpādīnāṃ svapnādīnāṃ ca grāhyavastūnāmupalambho vikalpaḥ 		de la mthong ba'i lam ni de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i dngos po yang dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
taddharmatopalambhalakṣaṇo 'nupalambhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
dānādīnāṃ buddhadharmaparyantānāṃ pratipakṣavastūnāmupalambho vikalpaḥ 		de'i chos nyid la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa ni de'i gnyen po'o /
sbyin pa la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi gnyen po'i dngos bo la dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o /
anupalambhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
a................anupalambhapratipakṣaḥ /
nāmasaṃketavyavahārāderupalambho vikalpaḥ /
anupalambhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
bhāvanāmārge tu na sthitā nāsthitāḥ sarvadharmā asthānayogena /
dharmadhātuyogenetyarthaḥ 		mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o /
dgra bcom pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa dang gang zag gi rdzas rnams la dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o /
mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o /
ming dang brda dang tha snyad la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o /
mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o /
bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa med pa ma yin pa ni chos thams cad gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis te chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to /
iti grāhyavastūnāmanupalambhaḥ /
dānādīnāṃ pratipakṣavastūnāmanupalambhaḥ 		de dag ni gzung ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa'o /
sbyin pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i dngos po ni mi dmigs pa'o /
śrota āpanna.......pudgalaprajñaptyāśrayāṇāṃ śrotaāpattiphalādīnāmanupalambhaḥ rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa gang zag gi rdzas mi dmigs pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gang zag btags pa'i gzhi rnams la dmigs pa ste /
iti pratipakṣasaṃbhāraḥ /
samāptā ca saṃbhārapratipattiḥ /
niryāsyatītyetena niryāṇapratipattiḥ prastāvitā 		de dag mi gnyen po'i tshogs so /
tshogs kyi sgrub pa rdzogs so /
'dir nges bar 'byung bas na nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i skabs so /
tāmadhikṛtya śāstram- de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[29] uddeśe samatāyāṃ ca sattvārthe yatnavarjane ched du byas dang mnyam nyid dang; /
sems can don dang 'bad med dang /
atyantāya ca niryāṇaṃ niryāṇaṃ prāptilakṣaṇam /
[30] sarvākārajñātāyāṃ ca niryāṇaṃ mārgagocaram /
niryāṇapratipajjñeyā seyamaṣṭavidhātmikā /
etadāha /
evamukte ityādinā subhūtiravocaditi /
kimavocata? mahāyānamityādi /
yasmādanena sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhūya bodhisattvo niryāsyati 		shin tu nges bar 'byung ba dang /
thob pa'i mtshan nyid nges 'byung dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang /
nges 'byung lam gyi spyod yul can /
rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid 'dir /
nges 'byung sgrub pa yin zhes bya /
zhes bya ba gsungs so; /
'di nyid de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes bya ba ni ci zhig gsol ba yin zhe /
theg pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so /
gang gi phyir 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas byang chub sems dpa' nges bar 'byung bar gyur to /
tasmādidaṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate de'i phyir theg pa 'di theg pa chen po zhes brjod do /
abhibhūya niryāsyatīti samānakāle ktvāpratyayaḥ /
saṃmīlya hasatītyādivat /
kasmādasau sarvalokamabhibhavati? tadalabhyasya māhātmyasya lābhāt /
kiṃ punastat? sattvarāśeragratāsaṃpādanam /
sattvarāśimahattayā prahāṇamahattayā adhigamamahattayā ca mahat /
itīdamuddeśaniryāṇam /
ākāśamahattayā tanmahāyānamiti /
tad yānaṃ mahaducyata iti sambandhaḥ /
ākāśasamatayeti 		de ci'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhe na /
des bdag nyid chen po mi thob pa thob pa'i phyir ro /
de yang gang yin zhe na /
sems can gyi tshogs kyi mchog nyid du sgrub pa yin te /
sems chen po nyid dang spong ba chen po nyid dang rtogs pa chen po nyid kyi chen po yin te de ltar 'di ni ched du bya ba'i nges par 'byung ba'o /
nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis de theg pa chen po yin te /
de bas na theg pa de ni theb pa chen po zhes brjod do zhes sbyor ro /
kathaṃ samatā? yathākāśaṃ na digbhirbhidyate /
avarṇasaṃsthānamapratighamanirdarśanamanantamamadhyanna hīyate na vardhate notpadyate na nirudhyate na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ nārūpyadhatuparyāpannam /
tathaiva mahāyānam /
tasmādyathākāśasamatayā mahattadyānam /
iti samatāniryāṇam /
(RSt_11) /
yathā ākāśe ityādi /
ākāśa avakāśo 'ntarbhāvāt /
mahāyāne avakāśaḥ /
tena teṣāmarthakaraṇāt /
lokadhātubhiḥ saṃkhyābhirdigbhiścāparicchinnatvāt /
aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā aparimāṇāḥ /
paryāyeṇeti prakāreṇa /
kathaṃ ca tāvatāmavakāśaḥ yataḥ sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā 		nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la ji ltar mnyam pa nyid yin zhe na /
ji ltar nam mkha' la phyogs kyi bye brag med de kha dog ma yin /
dbyibs ma yin /
thogs pa med pa /
bstan du med pa /
mtha' med pa /
dbus med pa /
bri ba med pa /
'phel ba med pa /
skye ba med pa /
'gag pa med pa /
'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin /
gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin /
gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no /
theg pa chen po yang de bzhin te /
de bas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis de ni theg pa chen po yin te; de'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyis nges bar 'byung ba yin no /
ji ltar nam mkha' la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nam mkha' ni go skabs 'byed pa yin te /
theg pa chen po la go skabs yod pa des na de dag 'byed pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams dang gyang sa dang phyogs su yongs su chad pa med pas tshad med grangs med dpag med pa ste /
rnam grangs 'dis zhes bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis so /
'di lta sems can 'di snyed kyi go skabs 'byed pa yin zhe na /
gang gi phyir sems can med pas nam mkha' med do /
ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā nam mkha' med pas theg pa chen po med do /
mahāyānāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā /
iti hi sattvāścākāśaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ ca sarvadharmāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ 		theg pa chen po med pas chos thams cad med do /
de bas na sems can dang nam mkha' dang theg pa chen po dang chos thams cad kyi gzugs su med pa /
bstan du med pa /
thogs pa med pa /
mtshan nyid gcig pas 'di lta ste /
mtshan nyid med pa'o /
evamiyatā sattvānāṃ mahāyāne avakāśaḥ de ltar de snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi go 'byed pa na theg pa chen po yin te /
iti sattvārthaniryāṇam /
naivāsyetyādi /
āgamaḥ āgamanam /
nirgamaḥ nirgamanam /
sthānaṃ gatinivṛttiḥ 		de bas de ni sems can nges par 'byong ba'o /
'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
'ong bas na 'ong ba'o /
nges par 'gro bas na nges par 'gro ba'o /
gnas pa ni 'gro ba las ldog pa'o /
trayaṃ mahāyānasya nāsti theg pa chen po la gsum po de dag med pa'o /
acalā hi sarvadharmāḥ /
yatasteṣāṃ prakṛtirna kvacidgacchati na kutaścidāgacchati na kvacittiṣṭhati 		gang gi phyir chos thams cad ni gyo ba med pa ste /
gang gi phyir de dag rang bzhin gyis gang du yang 'gro ba med cing gang nas kyang 'ong 'ong ba med gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
pariṣyandaścābhogaḥ /
iti anābhoganiryāṇam 		gyo ba dang 'gul ba des 'bad pa med pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o /
evamasyetyādi /
evamityākāśasyaiva /
asyeti mahāyānasya 		bcom ldan 'das zhes bya la sogs pa la /
'di ltar zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' nyid do /
'di la zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po la'o /
pūrvānta ityatīto 'rthaḥ sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i dus so /
aparānta ityanāgato 'rthaḥ phyi ma'i mthar zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su'o /
madhyaḥ pratyutpannaḥ dbus zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba'o /
trayamapyetanmahāyānasya nopalabhyate gsum po 'di yang theg pa chen po la mi dmigs te /
trayadhvasamaṃ tadyānaṃ tasmānmahāyānam de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste de bas na theg pa chen po'o /
kathaṃ tryadhvasamam? yato 'tīto 'rthotītārthenā (na) śūnyaḥ /
anāgato 'rtho 'nāgatārthenā(na) śūnyaḥ /
anāgato 'rtho 'nāgatārthenā(na) śūnyaḥ /
pratyutpannaḥ pratyutpannena /
tryadhvasamatā tryadhvasamatayā /
mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena /
bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ /
na ca śūnyatā atītā va anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
na tasyāṃ saṃkleśa upalabhyate na vyavadānam /
na saṃsāro na nirvāṇam /
tasmāt trayadhvasamaṃ tadyānam /
ityantābhāvādatyantaniryāṇam /
atha khalu bhagavān ityādi /
atra bhagavānāha /
yānaśabdārthanirdeśe subhūteḥ sādhukāraṃ datvā atra śikṣitvetyādinā prāptiniryāṇaṃ praratauti /
atra sarvajñateti sarvākārajñatā /
atha khalvityādinā pūrṇasya praśnaḥ /
prajñāpāramitādhikāre mahāyānasya pareṣāmaprastutatvāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaḥ /
buddhānubhāvād bhagavan ityetatparyantena parihāraḥ /
anulomaṃ nirdiśasi iti tvaṃ hi arvadharmān mahāyānaniḥsvabhāvān nirdiśasi /
niḥsvabhāvatājñānaṃ ca teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva /
tasmādanulomaṃ nirdiśasīti bhāvaḥ 		ji ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid yin zhe na /
gang gi phyir 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong /
ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /
da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ste /
dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis so /
theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong /
byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong /
stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'am /
da ltar byung ba med do /
kun nas nyon mongs pa med do /
rnam par byang ba med do /
'khor ba med do /
mya ngan las 'das pa med do /
de bas na theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de /
de ni bstan du med pas shin tu nges par 'byung ba'o /
de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
'dir rab 'byor gyis theg pa chen po'i sgra'i don bstan pa la /
bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
'di la bslabs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba'i skabs ston to /
'dir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen nyid do /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas nas theg pa chen po'i ston pa ni skabs ma yin pa nyid kyis gzhan dag gis dogs pa spang ba'i phyir /
gang pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan no /
rjes su mthun par ston to zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir khyod kyis chos thams cad dang theg pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid ston pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes te /
de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de /
de bas na rjes su mthun par ston to zhes bya bar dgongs so /
api tu khalu punarityādinā prakṛtameva prāptiniryāṇamadhikṛtya tasyāṃ pāptau dvādaśaviśeṣān dvādaśabhirvākyairāha gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skabs nyid kyis ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas /
de la thob pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi bye brag gis tshig bcu gnyis smras so /
ata eva viśeṣadyotanārtho 'pituśabdaḥ /
tatra api tu khalvityādi prathamam /
tatkasyetyādi dvitīyam /
rūpaṃ bodhisattva ityādi tṛtīyam /
evaṃ bhagavannityādi caturtham 		de nas de gnyis kyi khyad par bstan pa'i don du ni yang gi sgra'o /
de la gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dang po'i tshig bstan to /
de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa'o /
gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa'o /
bcom ldan 'das de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa'o /
buddha (RSt_12) ityādi pañcamam /
yathā ātmetyādi ṣaṣṭham /
evamabhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti saptamam 		bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga pa'o /
ji ltar bdag ces bgyi ba la sogs pas ni drug pa'o /
chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa zhes bya bas ni bdun pa'o /
katamattadityādyaṣṭamam /
evameteṣāmityādi navamam 		gang gzung du ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brgyad pa'o /
de ltar chos de dag zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dgu pa'o /
tatkimityādi daśamam /
na cetyādyekādaśam /
sa cetyādi dvādaśam /
kalpiteṣu anabhiniveśābhyāsaniṣṭhāyāṃ tadabhiniveśajanmanaḥ parantatrasya sarvathā nivṛttau sarvākarajñatā bodhisattvena prāpyata iti samudāyārthaḥ /
avayavārthastūcyate 		de ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcu pa'o /
bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcu gcig pa'o /
gal te de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcu gnyis pa'o /
brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa'i goms pa mthar thug pa ni mngon par zhen pa skye ba ni gzhan gyi dbang ste /
de rnam pa thams cad du ldog pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thob pa yin te /
de ni spyi'i don to /
yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
uktaṃ bhagavatā "atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattva mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatāmanuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ceti 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi theg pa chen po 'di la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslabs nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo /
rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro /
rjes su thob bo zhes gsungs so /
tatra na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānto na madhyaḥ /
tato na sattvā na sarvadharmā na bodhisattvaḥ" iti /
sattvāśca sarvadharmāśca bodhisattvaśca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni ca sarvametadadvaidhīkāram /
tasmātpūrvāntādiṣu bodhisattvo nopaitīti prathamasyārthaḥ 		de la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs pa ste /
de bas na sems can med pa dang chos thams cad med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' med pa yin te /
de ltar sems can med pa dang chos thams cad med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' med pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus 'di dag thams cad gnyis su byar med de de bas na sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' nye bar ma mchis zhes bya ba 'di ni dang po'i don to /
tatkasya hetoriti /
tatpūrvāntādīnāmasattvaṃ kutaḥ? hetumāha 		de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba la sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de gang las she na /
rūpāparyantatayetyādi /
rūpādaya ākāśa(śa)samāḥ 		gtan tshigs ni gzugs su ma mchis zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
gzugs la sogs pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te /
rūpādiśūnyatāmupādāya /
ata ete 'paryantāḥ 		gang gi phyir gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brten pa des na 'di dag ni mu ma mchis pa ste /
pūrvāntāparāntamadhyarahitāḥ /
evaṃ bodhisattva iti dvitīyasyarthaḥ /
rūpādikaṃ bodhisattva iti nopaiti nāvagacchati 		sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus kyi mtha' dang bral ba nyid do /
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i don to /
gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
nye bar mi mchi zhes bya ba ni nye bar mi 'gro ba ste /
yasmāt idamapi na vidyate nopalabhyate rūpādi śūnyatāmupādāya /
na hi śūnyatāyā rūpādikamasti nāpi bodhisattva iti tṛtīyasyārthaḥ 		gang gi phyir 'di dag kyang med cing mi dmigs te /
gzugs la sogs pa stong pa nyid la brten pa gang gi phyir stong pa nyid dang gzugs la sogs pa spang ba yod pa ma yin zhing byang chub sems dpa' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'i don to /
evamiti pratibhāsamānena rūpeṇa /
bodhisattvadharmamiti /
bodhisattvākhyarūpādi 		de ltar zhes bya ba ni gzugs su snang ba na'o /
byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'o /
sarveṇeti skandhadhātvādivargabhedena thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi bye brag gis thams cad do /
sarveṇa sarvamiti sarvayathā bhavati pūrṇāvayavatvād vargāṇām thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin thams cad de yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde tshan no /
punaḥ sarvamiti teṣu vargeṣvekaikam yang thams cad ces bya ba ni sde tshan de thams cad la re re zhing yang thams cad do /
sarvaṃ sarvatheti svena svena itaretaraiśca sarvairanupalabhamānaḥ /
taiḥ śūnyatvāt /
sarvajñatāmapīti sarvākārabhūtāmapi /
so 'ham ityādi /
taṃ dharmamiti bodhisattvākhyam /
prakaraṇādgamyate prajñāpāramitāmapi sarvākārajñatāmapīti 		rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rang rang gi phan tshun thams cad mi dmigs pa ste de dag stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo /
bcom ldan 'das de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos de zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi byang chub sems dpa' zhes rtogs par byed pa yin no /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo /
dharmamiti bodhisattvākhyam chos gang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o /
dharmeṇeti prajñāpāramitākhyena chos gang gis zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bas so /
dharme iti sarvākārajñatākhye prāptasya chos gang la zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba thob par bya ba'o /
avavadiṣyāmi prāptaye /
naiva kaścitkenacitkvacidityarthaḥ 		gdams par bgyi zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
gang zhig gang gis gang du zhes bya ba'i don to /
evameva vādābhāva anuṣṭhānābhāvānna kascinna kenacinna kvacitprāpnotīti caturthasyārthaḥ de bzhin du gdams pa med pas rjes su sgrub pa med pa'i phyir /
gang zhig gang la gang du thob pa med /
ces bya ba ni bzhi pa'i don to /
buddha iti buddhatvaṃ sarvākārajñatetyarthaḥ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
nāmadheyamātramiti /
arthaśūnyaṃ nāma 		ming tsam zhes bya ba ni don gyis stong pa ni ming ste /
tathāhi nārthasya svabhāvo nāma prāksaṅketārthamātradarśanāt de'i phyir don med pa'i ngo bo ni ming yin te /
brda'i snga rol du don tsam du mthong ba'i phyir ro /
(RSt_13) nāpi nāmnaḥ svabhāvoārthaḥ /
aviditārthasya nāmnaḥ kevalasyaiva pratīteḥ 		ming la yang don gyi rang gi ngo bo med de don mi shes pa yang ming tsam shes pa yod do /
don med kyang sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ming don med do /
asatyepi cārthe śabdaprayogāt /
nirarthakaṃ nāma /
ata eva tacca nāmadheyamanabhinivṛttaṃ nāmadheyatvenāsiddham /
ato 'nabhinivṛttena bodhisattvanāmnā anabhinirvṛttaṃ sarvākārajñatā nāma na prāpyata iti pañcamasyārthaḥ /
evaṃ tāvatpañcabhirvākyairdharmanairātmyamukhena nāmadheyamukhena ca kalpitasya prāptiḥ pratiṣiddhā /
pugalanairātmyamukhenāpi tatpratiṣedhāya ṣaṣṭhaṃ coktam /
yathā ātmā ātmeti ca bhagavannucyate ātyantatayā ca bhagavannanabhinirvṛtta ātmeti /
atyantatayetyekāntena /
anabhinirvṛtta ityasadbhūtaḥ /
yathālakṣaṇamasattvāt /
yathāśabdāt prakaraṇācca gamyate tatha sarvadharmā bodhisattvaśceti /
paratantrasvabhāvamadhikṛtya saptamaṃ coktam /
evamabhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmaḥ iti /
kutaḥ etat? yato mahatyorbhagavatyordvādaśabhirebhirvākyairuddeśaḥ subhūtinā kṛte tata eṣāṃ dvādaśānāmabhidhānakāraṇapraśneṣu śariputreṇa kṛteṣu thavirasubhūtiḥ kāraṇāni krameṇa bruvāṇaḥ saptamasthānakena kāraṇena 'abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti' praśnamanudyābhāvasvabhāvatāyāṃ kāraṇamuktvā 'anena paryāyeṇa, śāriputra, abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ' ityupasaṃhāraṃ kṛtavān /
tata eṣa pāṭhaḥ pratīyate /
subhūteḥ praśnānuvādakāraṇākhyānatadupasaṃhārā iha jñāpakā na tūddeśaḥ /
uddeśe 'pi saptamavākyasya prāyeṇa pāṭhabhraṃsā(śā)t 		de nyid kyi phyir ming de yang mngon par ma grub ste /
ming nyid mngon par ma grub po /
des na byang chub sems dpa'i ming mngon par ma grub pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming mngon par ma grub pas thob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don to /
de ltar re zhig tshig lngas ni chos bdag med pa'i sgo dang ming tsam gyi sgo nas btags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa dgag pa yin no /
gang zag la bdag med pa'i sgo nas de dgag pa'i phyir ni tshig drug pa yin te /
ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag bdag la zhes gsungs pa dang bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya ba la /
shin tu zhes bya ba ni tshig tu mngon par ma grub pa yin te de ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin te /
mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa de bzhin du sgra dang skabs kyis rtogs pa yin no /
de bzhin du chos thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' yang med pa yin no /
gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo med dpa'i dbang du byas nas /
tshig bdun pa smras te /
de bzhin du chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la zhes bya ba la 'di gang las shes she na /
gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag las rab 'byor gyi tshig bcu gnyis kyis bstan te /
des na bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi ming dang rgyu thob pa la /
sh'a ri'i bus dri ba byas pa la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gtan tshigs kyi rim pas bshad pa ni tshig bdun pa la /
rgyu gang gis tshig rnams ngo bo nyid med pa 'dri ba la rjes su dris pa ni ngo bo nyid med pas gtan tshigs bstan nas /
sh'a ri'i bus rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa yin no zhes mjug bsdu bar byas so /
de nas 'dir yang shes par bya ba ni 'dri ba dang rjes su dris pa dang gtan tshigs brjod pa dang de'i mjug bsdu ba'o /
de ni don gyis shes bar bya ba yin gyi ched du bstan pa ni ma yin no /
ched du bstan na ni bdun pa'i tshig phal cher nyams par 'gyur te /
yataḥ saptamavākye trayo viplavāḥ kālena jātāḥ gang gi phyir tshig bdun pa nyams pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
uttareṇa granthena sahaikavākyatā prathamo viplavaḥ dus kyis byung ba ni tshig 'og ma dang tshig gcig tu 'gyur ba ni nyams pa dang po'o /
ekavākyatārthe prathamāṃ vibhaktimapanīya ṣaṣṭhivibhaktiḥ kṛteti dvitīyo viplavaḥ tshig tu byas pa'i don la rnam par dbye ba dang po bsal nas drug pa'i rnam par dbye ba byas pa ni nyams pa gnyis pa'o /
abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ cāpanīya asvabhāvata paṭhiteti tṛtīyo viplavaḥ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba bsal nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa zhes brjod pa ni nyams pa gsum pa'o /
arthaṃ brūmaḥ /
evamiti paratantreṇa svabhāvena abhāvasvabhāva eṣāmiti abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
yadāha /
nāsti samyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvāditi /
kāraṇasaṃnidhiḥ saṃyogastasmin satyeva bhavatīti saṃyogikaḥ /
saṃyogiko yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ kāraṇaviyoge satyabhāvāt /
api ca /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ so 'nityatvāt paścādabhāvaḥ 		don bshad par bya ste /
de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gzhan dbang gi ngo bos so /
'di dag la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yin pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de chos thams cad do /
gang yang gsungs pa /
'dus pa las byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo ni med de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
rgyud nye bar gnas pa ni 'dus pa'o /
de la gang yang yod pa de ni 'dus pa las byung ba'o /
'dus pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi ngo bo med de rgyu dang bral ba yod na med pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa'i phyir ro /
na ca vidyamānasya paścādabhāvo ghaṭate virodhāt /
tasmādekakṣaṇa eva yo bhāvaḥ sa ekakṣaṇāntareṣvabhāvaḥ 		phyi nas med de yod pa dag ni phyi nas med par mi rigs te 'gal ba de bas na skad cig gcig nyid la dngos po gang yin pa de ni skad cig las gzhan du rang gi ngo bo med de /
tasmādabhāva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ de bas na dngos po med pa de dag gi rang gi ngo bo yin no /
kiṃ ca, yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca prahātavyam /
tato 'pyabhāvasvabhāva eṣām 		gzhan yang gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin la /
sdug bsngal ba la yang spang bar bya ba yin no /
de na yang 'di dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yin te /
tasmātparatantreṇāpi svabhāvena bodhisattvo na prāpnotīti saptamasyārthaḥ de'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang gis rang gi ngo bos kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni bdun pa'i don yin no /
(RSt_14) /
nanviyamabhāvasvabhāvatā kalpitasyāpi rūpādeḥ prāpnoti 		dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid brtags pa 'dis kyang gzugs la sogs pa thob pa ma yin nam /
yataḥ kulālāda ghaṭaḥ kuvindātpaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate gang gi phyir rdza mkhan gyis bum pa dang tha ga pas ras la sogs pa bskyod par snang ngo zhe na /
ata āha /
katamattadityādi /
katamattatkalpitam /
rūpādi yat a[na]bhinirdhūttam 		des na gzugs de gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
brtags pa'i gzugs la sogs pa gang mngon par grub pa de gang lags zhes bya ba ni /
naiva kiñcit sarvaṃ kalpitamasaṃskṛtamityarthaḥ ci yang med pa nyid de /
brtag pa thams cad ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'i don to /
ata eva nirdeśavākye subhūtinā yuktiruktā- asaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskarturabhāvāditi de nyid kyi phyir rjes su bstan pa'i tshig ni rab 'byor gyis rigs pa smas pa yin te /
chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas yin te 'di ni 'du byed med pa'i phyir ro /
kulālakuvindāderapi kalpitasyāsatvādityarthaḥ rdza mkhan dang tha ga pa la sogs pa yang brtags pa yin pas med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to; /
tasmātkalpitasyotpādanirodhādipratiṣedho 'ṣṭamasyārthaḥ de bas na brtags pa la skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa'i don to /
asyāṃ tu bhagavatyāṃ grāhyatāpi kalpitasya pratiṣiddhā bcom ldan 'das ma 'di las ni brtags pa'i gzung ba yang bkag pa yin te /
bālagrāhyatvāt tasya de ni byis pas gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
aṣṭamādūrdhvaṃ trīṇī vākyāni pariniṣpannaṃ svabhāvamadhikṛtya evamityādi brgyad pa'i 'og tu tshig gsum gyis yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo'i dbang du byas nas de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
evamiti kalpitena svabhāvena eteṣāmiti paratnatrarūpāṇāṃ yā asvabhāvatā śūnyatā sānabhinirvṛttiriti /
sa pariniṣpannasvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
yadyevaṃ tadā dharmatāyā dharmādavyatirekād bhrāntikṣaye śūnyatāpi kṣīyeta /
atha śūnyatā śāśvatī tadā tadavyatirekād bhrāntikṣaye śūnyatāpi kṣīyeta 		de ltar zhes bya ba 'di ltar brtags pa'i rang gi ngo bos so /
de dag gi zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bos so /
gang rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa'o /
de ni yongs su ma grub pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
gal te de lta na de'i tshe chos nyid las chos can tha dad pa med pa'i 'khrul par zad na stong pa nyid kyang zad pa yin la /
atha śūnyatā śāśvatī tadā tadavyatirekād bhrāntirapi śāsva(śva)tī bhavedityata āha ci ste stong pa nyid ni brtag pa yin na de'i tshe de dang tha mi dad pas 'khrul pa 'khrul par yang brtag par 'gyur ro zhe na /
yā cetyādi /
yatpariniṣpannaṃ rūpaṃ na te bhrāntisvabhāvāḥ paratantrā dharmā ityarthaḥ /
tadevaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ paratantrādavyatirekapratiṣedho navamasyārthaḥ 		gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
gang yang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo de ni 'khrul pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid dang gzhan dbang tha mi dad pa bkag pa ni dgu pa'i don to /
tatkimityādi /
avyatireke niṣiddhe vyatirekaḥ syāt /
tatkimiti tadā katham /
anabhinirvṛttimiti śūnyatāmātraṃ bodhisattvam 		de ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas tha mi dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir te ci zhes smos te /
de'i tshe ji ltar mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid tsam gyi byang chub sems dpas so /
anabhinirvṛttyāmiti śūnyatāmātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi /
na kathaṃcit 		mngon par ma grub pa la zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid tsam gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing gang gis kyang ma yin pa'o /
nahi jāta śakyo 'vavaditum /
nāpi jāto 'rthaḥ prajñāpāramiteti vyatirekapratiṣedho daśamasyārthaḥ 		gang gi phyir skye ba med pa la gdams par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tha dad pa bkag pa ni bcu pa'i don to /
gzhan dbang gi ngo bo ni 'khrul ba nyid de'i 'khrul pa ldog pa de'i tshe stong pa nyid kyi gzhi ci zhig yin /
nanu paratantrarūpaṃ bhrāntireva /
nirvṛttāyāṃ ca bhrāntau prāptistadā ka āśrayaḥ śūnyatāyāḥ? atha nirāśrayā na tarhi kasyacit dharmatā /
ko vā tasyāḥ śaśaviṣāṇādviśeṣa? śaśaviṣāṇakalpasya ca bodhisattvasya kutaḥ prāptirityāha /
na cetyādi /
sarvadharmā iti jñeyāḥ skandhādayaḥ /
buddhadharmā iti prāptavyā daśabalavaiśāradyādayaḥ 		ci ste gzhi med na de ltar na gang zhig chos nyid yin /
ri bong gi rva dang 'di khyad par ci zhig yod /
ri bong gi rva dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
chos thams cad dam zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa shes par bya ba rnams so; /
sangs rgyas kyi chos sam zhes bya ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob pa'o /
bodhisattvadharmā iti pūrvalabdhā guṇāḥ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam zhes bya ba ni sngar thob pa'i yon tan rnams so /
yo vā bodhāya carediti bodhisattvaḥ gang yang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa yang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'o /
sarva ete prāptikāle 'nabhinrivṛtito 'nyatreti śūnyatāvyatirekeṇa nopalabhyante 'di dag thams cad ni thob pa'i dus na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na stong pa nyid tha dad par mi dmigs te /
suviśuddhajñānāvyatirekiṇī sarvaśūnyataiva tadānīṃ khyātītyarthaḥ /
idamapyanena sūcitam 		shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pa las tha mi dad cing thams cad stong pa nyid bzhin du de'i tshe snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to /
'di yang 'dis ston pa yin te /
ya eṣa buddhabodhisattvapṛthagjanāvasthānagāmitvāddharmadhātuvadeva śāsva(śva)taprakāśastasyāsau dharmatā gang 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang sems can dang so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs dang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings bzhin du rtag par snang ba yin te /
yāvatparatantrastāvatparatantradharmatā ucyate de'i chos nyid de ni ji srid gzhan gyi dbang yod pa de srid du chos nyid ces brjod do /
parato buddhadharmatā /
svābhāvikaśca kāyo buddhānāmucyata ityamekadaśasyārthaḥ /
(RSt_15) 		phyi nas gzhan na sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi sku sangs rgyas brjod do /
de ni 'dir bcu gcig pa'i don to /
dvādaśaṃ vyaktam /
sa cedityata ārabhya tatkasya hetorityataḥ prāk /
atra cittaṃ nāvalīyata ityādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ padaiḥ śamathasya pañcākārā ucyante /
na bhagnapṛṣṭhī bhavatīti 		bcu gnyis pa'i tshig ni gal te zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan te /
'dir sems mi zhum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig lngas ni zhi gnas rnam pa lnga bstan to /
ci'i phyir bcom par mi bgyid ces bya ba'i tshig gcig gis rnam pa bzhi brjod de zhi bar byed /
ekapadena catvāra ākārāḥ /
śamayati vyupaśamayati ekotīkaroti cittaṃ samādadhātīti /
eṣāmabhāve samādhaye cittasya paścābhdaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
atastaireva caturbhiḥ pṛṣṭhabhaṅgapratiṣedhāt na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam /
evaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ padairnavākāraḥ śamatha uktaḥ 		nye bar zhi bar byed /
rgyun gcig tu byed sems mnyam par 'jog par byed pa'o /
ting nge 'dzin gyi sems la 'di dag med na yan lag lngar thal bar 'gyur bas des na bzhi po de nyid kyi phyir bcom pa bkag pas yid phyir bcom par mi bgyid ces bya ba yin te /
de ltar tshig drug gis zhi gnas rnam pa dgu bstan to /
bhūtapratyavekṣaṇālokaḥ udyotaḥ yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa'i snang ba ni gsal ba'o /
udyotāt trāsastadakaraṇam /
akaraṇe[na] pratiṣedhakaraṇāt /
tato nottasyatītyekena padena vipaśyanā 		gsal ba de la skrag par mi byed pa ni mi skrag pa ste /
de 'gog par byed pa'o /
des ni mi skrag ces bya ba'i tshig gcig gis ni lhag mthong bstan to /
na santrasyati na santrāsamāpadyata iti padadvayena yuganaddho mārgaḥ mi dngang shin tu dngang bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis ni zung du 'brel ba'i lam bstan to /
tathā hi na saṃtrasyatīti na samādhestrasyati tadatyāgāditi śamathāṅgaḥ de'i phyir mi dngang ba zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin las mi dngang ba yin te /
de med pa'i phyir de ni zhi gnas kyi yan lag go /
saṃprajñānāt trāsaḥ saṃtrāsaḥ /
tannāpadyata iti vipaśyanāṅgaḥ 		yang dag pa'i ye shes las dngangs pa ni shin tu dngangs pa'o /
de mi skye ba ni lhag mthong gi yan lag go /
carati prajñāpāramitāyāmiti uddeśaḥ /
śeṣeṇa nirdeśaḥ 		'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
bhāvayatīti śamathena /
upaparīkṣata iti vipaśyanayā 		lhag ma ni rjes su brtag pa'o /
bsgom pa'o zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyis so /
upanidhyāyatītyupanirīkṣamāṇo nipuṇaṃ dhyāyati yuganaddhena mārgeṇeti /
dvādaśasyārthaḥ 		nye bar dmigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni nye bar rtog pa ni nges par sems pa yin te /
zung du 'brel pa'i lam gyis so /
asyopapattaye trayodaśaṃ coktam /
tatkasya hetorityata ārabhya prāk sarvākārajñatāniryāṇā(ṇā)t /
tatkasya hetoriti praśnaḥ /
uttaraṃ yasminhītyādi /
imān dharmāniti sarvadharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃmukhībhūtāyām 		de ni bcu gnyis pa'i don to /
'di'i 'thad par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bcu gsum pas bstan pa ni /
de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni bris pa'o /
lan ni bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la chos 'di dag ces bya ba ni chos thams cad do /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du gyur pa'o /
rūpaṃ kalpitaṃ yāvadvijñānaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmān nopaitīti nopalabhate, tadapratibhāsāt gzugs brtags pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar dang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni nye bar mi dmigs pa ste /
nopagacchati na vikalpayati nirvikalpatvāt prajñāpāramitāyaḥ /
iti svabhāvavikalpau pratiṣiddhau /
viśeṣavikalpau pratiṣeddhumāhaḥ /
na rūpāderutpādanirodhau /
pūrvvamutpanno rūpādiridānīṃ niruddha iti na paśyati /
kalpitasya hi yathālakṣaṇamasatvādutpādanirodhau na staḥ /
tasmādubhau na paśyati /
nanu paratantrasyānivṛttau duṣpariharaḥ kalpitasya pratibhāsaḥ /
tatkutastannopeti? atha ṣaḍbhirvākyaiḥ kalpiteṣvanabhiniveśābhyāsāttadabhiniveśajanmanaḥ paratantrasya tadānīṃ nirvṛtiriṣyate /
apūrvasyānutpadātpūrvasya ca svarasena vyayāt /
tau tarhyanutpādavyayau tasya svabhāvau abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti paratantraṃ svabhāvamadhikṛtya vacanāt /
sarvametaccetasi nidhāya pṛcchati tatkasya hetoriti 		des snang ba med pa'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro ba'o /
nye bar mi rig ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ste /
rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa bkag pa yin no /
khyad par gyis rnam par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa skye ba dang 'gag pa med de gzugs la sogs pa sngar ni skyes pa dang da ltar ni 'gag pa yin no zhes mi mthong ste /
gang gi phyir brtag pa ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'gag pa med de de bas na gnyis ka yang mi mthong ngo /
gzhan dbang ldog pa med par lan btab pa bkag pa yin nam; brtags par rab tu snang bas ni de nye bar mi 'gro ba gang las yin zhe na /
de nas tshig drug gis ni brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa na skye ba yin la /
mi rten pa dang mngon par zhen pa med pa de'i tshe ni ldog par 'dod do /
sngon skye ba med pa'i phyir dang snga ma ni rang gi ngang gis 'jig pa'i phyir de ltar na de dag ni skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa de'i ngo bo nyid do /
chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas pa yin no snyam pa 'di /
thams cad sems la bzhag nas dri ba ni /
de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba smos so /
uttaraṃ tathā hityādi lan ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
yau hi rūpāderanutpādavyayau tau tasyābhāvau /
abhāvau ca na bhāvau virodhāt /
yatpunaruktamabhāvasvabhāvāḥ paratantrā iti /
abhāvadvayavyabhicārastatra svabhāvārtho na punastādātmyaṃ virodhāt /
evamabhedaṃ pratiṣidhya bhedapratiṣedhāyāha 		gang gzugs la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa de dag ni de'i dngos po med pa dag ste /
dngos po med pa yang skye ba dang 'jig pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin te /
'gal ba'i phyir ro /
gang yang dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo gzhan dbang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni dngos po med pa gnyis med na ni 'byung ba'i don gyis te /
de las gcig tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
de ltar na tha mi dad pa bkag nas tha dad pa yang dag par smras pa /
ityanutpādavyayau ca rūpādiśca advayametad advaidhīkāramiti de ni skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa dang gzugs la sogs pas 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis pa'o /
nanu tadānīṃ rūpāderabhāvādadvayībhāvo na yukta ityata (RSt_16) āha gzugs la sogs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe gnyis su bgyir ma mchis zhes bya ba mi rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
yatpunarityādi /
naṭra paratantraṃ rūpādi gṛhyate /
kiṃ tarhi? yadadvayamutpādavyayavirahāt pariniṣpannamityarthaḥ /
pariniṣpanno hi svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ /
anutpādavyayāvapi dharmāṇāmabhāvalakṣaṇau /
tata ekarasatvādeṣāṃ trayāṇāmadvayībhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
iti prāptiniryāṇam 		'dir de'i phyir gang yang 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di smras so /
gzhan gyi dbang ni gzugs la sogs pa mi bzung ste /
ji ltar zhe na /
gang gnyis su med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba yongs su grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to /
gang gi phyir yongs su grub pa ni chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo brtags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de /
skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo med pa'i mtshan nyid do /
des na gsum po 'di dag ni gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo yin zhes bsams te de ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba'o /
sarvākārajñātāniryāṇamidānīṃ vaktavyam /
tatrādau catvāro dharmā upaparīkṣaṇīyāḥ /
katamo bodhisattvaḥ katamā sarvākārajñatā katamā prajñāpāramitā katamā upaparīkṣaṇeti /
tatra bodhireva sattvastenocyate bodhisattvaḥ 		da ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas brjod par bya ste /
de la dang po chos bzhi nye bar dri bar bya ste byang chub sems dpa' gang yin /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin /
nye bar yongs su rtog pa gang yin zhe na /
de la byang chub nyid sems dpa' ste des na byang chub sems dpa'o; /
tayā bodhyā yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākārajñānaṃ nirabhiniveśaṃ sā tatra sarvākārajñatā /
āratā āramitā /
grasitaskabhitādivacchāndasa ihāgamaḥ /
vikalpādyaḥ (dye)pāntīti pāḥ /
vikalpapratipakṣā dharmāḥ /
tebhyo 'pyāratā viratā yā prajñā seha prajñāpāramitā /
yatsarvadharmānnityasukhātmaśāntaśūnyanimittapraṇihitaviviktānāṃ pratyekaṃ tadviparītānāṃ ca ṣoḍaṣānāmārāṇāṃ pratiṣedhena vyupaparīkṣate /
tadatropaparīkṣaṇaṃ mahatyorbhagavatyoruktam /
tatrordhvamadharamupaparīkṣaṇaṃ tayoruktam /
tadevāsyāṃ darśayitumāha /
evaṃ bhagavannityataḥ prabhṛti atha khalvāyuṣmān ityataḥ prāk /
arthaḥ pūrvavat 		des chos thams cad rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad kyi ye shes te mngon par zhen pa med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do /
rnam par rtog pa las srung bar byed pas nad pa ste /
rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i chos rnams so /
rnam par rtog pa dag las chags pa med pa ni aa par mi ta ste /
chags pa dang bral ba'o /
de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don te /
'dir shes rab kyang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
gang chos thams cad rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag dang spong ma ma yin pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa dang mi dben ba dang so sor yang de las bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bzlog cing bkag pas nye bar rtog pa'o /
de la 'dir nye bar brtag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag las gsungs te /
de'i 'og tu nye bar brtag pa gzhan yang de dag las gsungs so /
de nyid 'di las bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
don ni snga ma bzhin no /
atha khalvāyuṣmānityadi de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
tena hīti yenādvayasyaiṣā gaṇānā kṛtā de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'di gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa ste /
advayaśca dharmadhātuḥ /
tena kāraṇena bodhisattvopyanutpādaḥ /
utpādavirahāddharmadhāturityarthaḥ 		gnyis su med pa yang chos kyi dbyings yin te /
rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin te /
skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i don to /
paratantrastu svabhāvo neha gaṇyate /
tasya paramārthatvāt /
paramārthasya nehādhikārāt /
kotra doṣa iti cedāha /
yadi cet ityādi /
duṣkarasya karmaṇaścārikā caraṇam /
tāṃ kiṃ kasmāccarati? prayogavīryeṇa 		gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo ni 'dir ma grub ste /
de ni don dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
'di ni don dam pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro /
gal te 'dir nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
dka' ba'i las la spyod pa ni spyod pa'o /
de ci'i phyir spyod ce na sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyis so /
āsṭāṃ prayogavīryam sbyor ba'i btson 'grus lta zhog /
yāni duḥkhāni karacaraṇaśiraḥ śarīradānāni satvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvānāmarthāya tāni vā pratyanubhavituṃ kasmādutsaheta sems can rnams kyi phyir lag pa dang rkang pa dang mgo dang lus sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro /
de dag so sor myong bar bya ba'i phyir du ci'i phyir spro bar byed ce na /
saṃnāhavīryeṇāpi tadā duṣkaracārikāṃ na carenna vādyavaset go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis sbyor bar byed pa yin te des na dka' ba'i spyod pa mi byed pa ste /
de la brtson pa ma yin no /
tathā hi kāraṇaparatantratvenāparamārthatvāt /
aparamārthasya cānabhyasanīyatvāt /
viśeṣato duṣkarasyeti codyam 		de'i rgyu gzhan dbang nyid kyis don dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
don dam pa ma yin pa la ni goms par mi byed cing khyad par du yang dka' ba spyod par mi byed ces rgol ba la /
evamukta ityādinā subhūteḥpariṣkārāḥ /
tatrānabhyupagamena prathamo nāhamityādinā 		de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rab 'byor gyi lan no /
de la dang po'i tshig gis ni khas mi len pa dang tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
yo hi duṣkaracārikāmicchati tasya sā na syādityaniṣṭāpādanaṃ doṣaḥ syāt gang dka' ba spyod par 'dod pa de ni de la mi 'dod pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur na /
na hīti /
kuto necchasīti cet /
duṣkarasaṃjñayā duṣkaraṃ carato vipratisāriṇaḥ samyaksambodhervyāvṛttiprasaṅgāt 		bdag mi 'dod de gang las mi 'dod par byed ce na /
dka' ba'i 'du shes kyi dka' ba spyod na ni yid la gcags par 'gyur te /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
nāpītyādinā dvitīyaḥ parihāraḥ /
na bhavatīti na niṣpadyata ityarthaḥ /
api tu ityādinā tṛtīyaḥ 		byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa'i lan yin te /
mi spyod ces bya ba ni spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang zin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to /
'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis pa'i lan no /
(RSt_17) punaraparamityādinā caturthaḥ tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa'i lan no /
yathā ātmetyādi /
sarvaduḥkhāni sarvasāśravāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ 		ci nas kyang bdag thams cad kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal thams cad las zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po thams cad las so /
tebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ /
sarveṇeti dhātugatiyonyādibhedena /
sarveṇa sarvamiti sarva yathā bhavati tisṛbhirduḥkhātābhiḥ 		de dag thams cad la yongs su thar par bya'o; /
thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas kyi bye brag thams cad nas so /
thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad ji lta ba'i sdug bsngal gsum las so /
sarvatheti sarvavyavasāyaiḥ sarvamiti niravaśeṣaṃ mocayitavyāḥ /
duḥkhaskandhāditi duḥkharāśeḥ 		rnam pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rtsol ba thams cad las so /
thams cad du zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa mtha' dag las thar par bya ba'o /
sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs so /
cittapradoṣaḥ pratighaḥ /
yathā ātmā na vidyate sarveṇeti ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣādibhedena 		gnod sems ni khong khro ba'o /
ji ltar bdag med ce na thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gso ba dang skyes bu la sogs pa'i dbye ba thams cad nas so /
sarveṇa sarva yathā bhavati dṛśyādṛśyabhedāt /
sarvatheti skandhadhātvādibhyo bhedena /
abhedena ca /
kathamabhedena sarvaṃ yathā bhavati? prativargaṃ samastebhyo vyastebhyaśca yathā ātmā tathā sarvadharmā na vidyante /
sarveṇeti skandhadhātvādivargabhedena sarveṇa sarva yathā bhavati /
vargāṇāṃ paripūrṇāvayavatvāt /
punaḥsarva yathā bhavati prativarga te sarva ityarthaḥ 		yang thams cad ces bya ba ni ji ltar mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i bye brag gis yod pa'o /
rnam pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i dbye ba'am dbye ba ma yin bas so /
ji ltar dbye ba ma yin zhe na /
thams cad du zhes bya ba ni /
ji ltar yod pa'i sde tshan bsdus pa'am /
tha dad pa ste /
ji ltar bdag de ltar chos thams cad med pa yin no /
yang thams cad zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi dbye ba thams cad do /
thams cad ni ji ltar yod pa'i sde tshan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i yan lag gi phyir ro /
rnam pa thams cad ji ltar yod pa'i sde tshan so so de dag thams cad ces bya ba'i don to /
sarvatheti /
sarveṣu prabhedeṣu ātmani pareṣu ca samastavyasteṣvityarthaḥ 		thams cad du zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi bye brag gis bdag dang gzhan dag la bsdus pa'am tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
tadevaṃ duṣkaracārikācaraṇā bhāvaprasaṅga(ṅgāḥ) catvāra uktāḥ de bas na de ltar dka' ba spyod pa med par thal bar 'gyur la lan bzhi smras pa yin no /
caturthena parihāreṇaitadapi sūcitam lan bzhi pa la 'di ltar yang bstan pa yin te /
duṣkaracārikāyā apyanutpāda eva tattvaṃ tadeva tattvaṃ paśyatā sā caritavyā yatāsau śaktā ca bhavenmahāphalā ca /
anutpāde sarvaduḥkhānāmapratibhāsanāt tattvadarśanācca /
sarvākārasarvadharmavikalpaprabiṣedhāya hetuḥ sthaviro yadapyāyuṣmān ityetadārabhya sannihitādevamuktaḥśabdāt prāk /
atra sarvajñatāpīti sarvākārajñatāpi buddhopītyarthaḥ /
tataḥ prāptivikalpapratiṣedhārthamāha /
evamukta ityata ārabhya atyaṃtaṃ pratibhātīti yāvat 		dka' ba spyod pa yang skye ba med pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mthong nas /
de spyod par bya ste /
gang gi phyir de nus pa dang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
skye ba med pa la ni sdug bsngal thams cad snang ba med pa dang de nyid mthong ba dang rnam pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa bkag pas so /
tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus gang yang zhes bya ba nas btsams nas /
de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan to /
'dir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas dang zhes bya ba'i don to /
de nas thob pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du so sor snang ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du smras so /
sarvajñateti sarvākārajñatā anuprāptaiva bhavatītyādita eva sarveṣāṃ dharmadhātumātratvāt dharmadhātośca prakṛtyaiva sarvathā viśuddhatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
evamukta ityādinā subhūteruttaram /
anutpannasya dharmasyeti bodhisattvākhyasya dharmadhātoḥ 		thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo /
rjes su thob pa nyid ces bya ba ni dang po nyid nas chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi phyir te /
chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams so /
de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rab 'byor gyi lan ni /
skye ba med pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings so /
prāptimiti prāptatvaṃ /
nāhamicchāmi nāpyabhisamayamiti nāpi prāptābhisamayam /
yadihīccheyaṃ tadānutpādamicchato me prāptiḥ prasajyeta 		thob par byed ces bya ba ni thob par ro /
kho bo me 'dod do zhes bya ba ni rtog ba med pa'o /
gal te thob bar 'dod na ni de'i tshe kho bo skye bar 'dod pa yin te thob par 'gyur na de ni mi 'dod de /
naiva tvicchāmīti na yuktaḥ prāptiprasaṅgaḥ /
yuktimapyāha nāpītyādinā /
sarva eva dharmo 'nutpāda ityasmin pakṣe hyeṣaḥ prasaṅgaḥ 		rigs pa med pas thob par thal bar 'gyur ro /
rigs pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
chos thams cad nyid la skye ba med pa dang zhes bya ba phyogs la ni thal ba 'di yin te /
tatra anutpannena bodhisattvena anutpannā sarvākārajñatā nāpi prāpyate /
ayuktatvāditi bhāvaḥ 		de la skye ba med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o /
ubhayoraṇā[nā]dimattvena prāptyayogāt /
āheti śāriputra āha /
kiṃ punarityādi /
yastūbhayoranutpannatve prāptirayuktā 		gnyis ka yang thog ma med pa nas thob ba med pa'i phyir ro /
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gnyis ka yang skye ba med pa nyid yin pas mi rigs pa'o /
tatkimanyatarotpattau yuktetyarthaḥ de ci gnyis po gang yang rung ba las skye na ni rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to /
āheti subhūtiranyatarotpattipakṣaṃ vimocayitumāha kiṃ punarityādi rab 'byor gyi gnyis po gang yang rung ba las skyes pa'i phyogs bsal ba'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yang ci zhes bya pa la sogs pa smras so /
evakāro bhinnakramatvādantaṃ netavyaḥ nyid ni rim pa gzhan du gang gi mthar yang sbyar bar bya'o /
anutpanno dharmaḥ (RSt_18) paścādutpanno vā syāt paścādanutpanna eva vā skye ba med pa'i chos phyis skye bar 'gyur ba'am phyis ma skyes pa nyid de bzhin du 'gyur ba'o /
tatra dvītīyavikalpe kathamanyatarotpatiḥ? ādye tu vikalpe dharmadhātorutpattivirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
tasmādubhayoranutpādāt sādhūktaṃ nāpyanutpannena dharmeṇānutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyata iti yuktaḥ prāptivikalpapratiṣedhaḥ /
tasmātsarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārtho dharmadhātuḥ 		de la rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa la ji ltar gzhan du skye bar 'gyur ba dang rnam par rtog pa dang po la ni chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba 'gal ba yin no zhes bya bar bsams te /
de bas na gnyis ka yang skye ba med pa yin pa'i phyir legs par smras pa yin no /
skye ba med ni chos kyi skye ba med pa'i chos thob par yang mi rigs te /
de ni thob pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgag pa ste /
de bas na chos thams cad don dam par chos kyi dbyings so /
sa ca prakṛtiprabhāsvaratvādanādinidhanatvācca na prāpyate nāpi prāpnoti, kevalaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
yattasya darśanaṃ saiva kalpitānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalabdhiḥ /
saiva niratiśayā prajñāpāramitā /
tayā parikalpitadharmābhiniveśakṣayāttadabhiniveśahetukāḥ sarvāvaraṇasaṃgrāhiṇaḥ sarvābhūtaparikalpāḥ paratantrākhyāḥ kriyante 		de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir thob pa yang med pa la /
thob par bya ba yang med par blta bar bya ba kho na'o /
gang de nyid ni kun brtags kyi chos rnams mi dmigs pa nyid de /
de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhag pa'o /
des kun brtags pa'i mngon par zhes pa zad pa de ni mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu zad pa /
sgrib pa thams cad bsdus pa dang ldan pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa thams cad kyi gzhan dbang zhes bya ba zad par 'gyur te /
pūrveṣāṃ svarasanirodhāt /
kāraṇābhāvena pareṣāmanutpādāt 		snga ma dag rang gis 'gag la rgyu med pas gzhan skye ba med pa'i phyir ro /
tataḥ prakṛtiprabhāsvaropi bodhisattvākhyo dharmadhāturāgantukairāvaraṇamalairmalinīkṛtaḥ /
tena teṣāṃ kṣaye sati tatra kṣayalakṣaṇā viśuddhirapūrvatvāt prāpyate /
tadyathā prakṛtyā viśuddhamākāśamāgantukaistuhinarajastamo 'bhradhūmādibhirāvaraṇairmalinīkriyate /
paścāttadapāye [kṣaya?]lakṣaṇā viśuddhistena prāpyate /
sarvavibhramanivṛttau ca suviśuddhasarvadharmadharmatājñānalakṣaṇā sarvākārajñatā yāpūrvatvāvdodhisattvena labhyate /
saiva tasyā viśuddherātmabhūtāyāḥ saṃvedanāprāptyabhisamayaḥ saṃpadyata iti siddhāntaḥ /
tatredānīmāgantukāvaraṇaviśuddhiḥ sthavirābhyāṃ vaktavyā /
tāṃ śāriputra ārabhate /
āheti śāriputra āha /
kiṃ punarityādi /
utpadyata ityutpādaḥ /
para[ta]ntraḥ svabhāvaḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ paścādanutpādaḥ? kāraṇābhāvādanutpatterityeka pakṣaḥ /
utāho 'nutpādaḥ? sarvākārajñatā teṣāṃ dharmaḥ /
pūrvamanutpannatvādyaḥ paścādutpadyata iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ 		des na rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings la /
glo bur gyi sgrib pa'i dri mas dri ma can du byas pa la des de dag zad pa yod na /
de zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ni snga na med pa thob par 'gyur te /
dper na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' la glo bur gyis gtse ba dang rdul dang mun pa dang sprin dang du ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa'i dri mas dri ma cad du byas pa bzhin te; phyi nas de'i thob kyi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa des thob par 'gyur te /
'khrul pa thams cad ldog pa na shin tu rnam par dag chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snga na med pa byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur te /
de nyid de'i rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid do /
yang dag par rigs pa'i phyir thob pa'i mngon par rtogs pa grub pa yin te /
de ni grub mtha'o /
de la de ni glo bur gyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir gnas brtan gnyis kyis brjod bar bya bar ni de la sh'a ri'i bu las btsams nas sh'a ri'i bus smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
skyes pas na skye ba yin te /
gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'o /
yang de ci phyi nas ma skyes par 'gyur ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i phyogs gcig go /
'on te ma skyes pa la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos sngar ma skyes pa yin pa phyis skye bar 'gyur ram zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i phyir ro /
tatrādye pakṣe anutpannāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ kutaḥ prāptiḥ? dvitīyapakṣe sarvākārajñatāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam de la dang po ni skye ba med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni thob pa ga la yod /
gnyis pa'i phyogs la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu brjod par bya ste /
abhūtaparikalpaśca śāśvato bhavet kṣayābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa yang rtag pa yin pas zad pa med do zhes bya bar bsams so /
subhūtirāheti parihāramāha /
utpāda utpattiḥ dharmaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ 		rab 'byor gyis smras pa zhes bya ba ni lan smras pa'o /
skye ba ni skyes pa'i chos te rnam pa thams cad pa nyid kyi'o /
anutpādo 'nutpattiḥ dharmo 'bhūtaparikalpasyeti ya eṣa bhedaḥ mi skye ba ni skye ba'i chos te /
yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa yin te /
'di gnyis kyi dbye ba yin no /
nāsau pratibhāti jalpituṃ na rocate vaktum /
sarvadharmaśūnyatālambane cittasantāne yaiva sarvabhrāntīnāṃ nivṛttiḥ saiva sarvākārajñatāyā utpattiḥ 		de ni mi spobs so zhes bya ba ni smra bar te brjod par mi 'dod pa'o /
chos thams cad kyi stong ba nyid kyi sems kyi rgyud la dmigs pa na 'khrul pa thams cad ldog par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba'o /
ato 'syā na kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam de na 'di la rgyu med par brjod par bya bar ma yin no /
nāpyabhūtaparikalpaḥ śāśvato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ 'di la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pas rtog pa yang med do zhes bya bar bsams pa'o /
śāriputra āheti /
jalpavikalpapratiṣedhāyāha 		sh'a ri'i bus smras pa zhes bya ni smra ba'i rnam par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir smras pa'o /
anutpādopītyādi /
anutpādaḥ pramāna(ṇā)siddhatvātpratibhātyeva rocata eva vaktum /
kuto na pratibhātīti kāṅkṣā praśnaḥ /
āheti subhūtiruttaramāha /
anutpāda evetyādi /
jalpa iti mānasaḥ śabdaḥ 		skye ba med pa'i chos la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skye ba med pa ni tshad mas grub pa yin pa'i phyir spobs par 'dod pa nyid de /
smra bar nus pa yin pas de yang smra nus so /
gang gi phyir spobs par mi nus zhes bya ba ni zur gyis dris pa'o /
smras so zhes bya ba ni rab 'byor gyis lan smras so /
skye ba med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la zhes bya ba ni yid kyi sgra'o /
pratibhātīti jalpābhidheyaṃ vastu spobs pa zhes bya ba ni smra ba'i brjod pa'i dngos pa'o /
pratibhānamiti sajalpā buddhiḥ yang spobs pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par smra ba'i blo'o /
trayametadanutpāda eva sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dharmatāśarīreṇaiva (RSt_19) sarvadharmāṇāṃ tasyāṃ pratibhāsāditi bhāvaḥ /
evameva atyantaṃ pratibhātītyupasaṃhāraḥ /
iti sarvākārajñatāniryāṇam /
evamukta ityādinā śāriputraḥ prakṛtameva subhūtervacanaṃ praśaṃsanmārganiryāṇaprastāvanāṃ karoti 		rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni gsum po 'di dag kyang skye ba med pa nyid de /
chos kyi ngo bo nyid kho na chos thams cad de la so sor snang ngo zhes bsams so /
de bzhin du so sor snang ngo zhes bya bas ni 'jug sdud pa yin no /
de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba'o /
de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
sh'a ri'i bu skabs nyid kyi rab 'byor gyi chig la bstod nas lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'i skabs ston par byed de /
gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni the tsom med par bgrang bar bya'o /
gang dag gang nyid la zhes bya ba ni /
sthāpayitavyo niḥsaṃśayaṃ gaṇayitavyaḥ /
yato yata eveti yatra yatraiva sthāne niḥsarati uttarati na calati na bhraśyati na vi[ro]dhayati na vyākulayati /
evamukta iti /
evaṃ prastāvanāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ etad iti mārganiryāṇe /
aniśritā anabhiniviṣṭā dharmā yaistathoktāḥ 		gang de'i gnas las nges par 'byung pa dang /
rgal ba dang mi gyo ba dang mi nyams pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang 'khrug par mi byed pa'o /
de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ni de ltar skabs 'byed pa yin no /
'di skad ces bya ba ni lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'o /
me gnas pa ni gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'i chos de la de skad ces bshad do /
na vyativartanta iti na bhrasya(śya)nti /
evamukta iti sarvadharmāniśritatāyāmuktayām 		mi 'da'o zhes bya ba ni mi nyams pa'o /
de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa ni grol ba'o /
'di zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu bstan pa'o /
atreti anantaroktā sarvadharmāniśritā cāsau paramatvātpāramitā ca /
katameti ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ madhye katamā 		chos thams cad mi gnas pa yang yin /
pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
gang yin zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang nas gang yin zhes pa'o /
sārvayānikī yānatrayasādhāraṇī /
yaścaiṣā prajñāpāramitaiva /
na taharyasyetyata āha /
sarvadharmetyādi sugamam /
iti hīti yata evaṃ tasmāt /
avalīnatvaṃ viṣādaḥ kāṃkṣāyitatvaṃ saṃśayālutā 		theg pa thams cad la zhes bya ba ni theg pa gsum gyi thun mong ngo /
gal te 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid nyin no /
de lta na gzhan ni ma yin no /
chos thams cad gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla'o /
de ltar na zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de bas na zhum par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni sems zhum par 'gyur ba'o /
nem nur du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni the tshom du 'gyur ba'o /
dandhāyitatvamapratipattiḥ /
anyathātvaṃ parāṅmukhībhāvaḥ manasikāreṇeti nirvikalpena manasā 		rmongs par 'gyur ba ni rtog pa med pa'o /
gzhan du 'gyur ba ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o /
yin la byed pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid kyis so /
kathamāyuṣmannityādi vikalpakaṃ manasikāraṃ matvā śāriputrasyāyaṃ praśno manasikāreṇa viharantīti yāvat tshe dang ldan pa ji ltar yid la byed ba dang ma bral bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
sh'a ri'i bus yid la byed pa rnam par rtog pa yin par shes nas dris pa 'di ni yid la byed pa la gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
tata ūrdhvaṃ evamukta ityādinā subhūteḥ sādhukārapūrvakaṃ vacanam /
tatra vistareṇa codyakaraṇāt sādhukāraḥ /
api tvityādinā parihāraḥ /
artha eveti /
asmadiṣṭameva /
icchālakṣaṇatvādarthasya 		de'i 'og tu de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
rab 'byor gyis legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig sngon du 'gro ba ste de ni rgyas par dro ba yin pa'i phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin pa yin no /
'on kyang zhes bya ba sogs pa ni lan no /
don de nyid ces bya ba ni 'di 'dod pa nyid de 'dod pa nyid mtshan nyid kyi phyir lan no /
bhūtapadābhidhāneneti vikalpamanasikārasya viparyayo bhūtapadaṃ bhūtaṃ vastu yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa'i mi mthun pa yang dag pa'i tshig ste yang dag pa'i dngos po'o /
tasyābhidhānena savistareṇa de'i brjod pa ni rgyas ba dang bcas pa'o /
aniṣṭāpādanaṃ hi /
codyam /
neṣṭābhidhānamityupālambhaḥ /
yuktitaśceyamicchati darśayituṃ svayameva pṛcchati 		nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin pa la ni rgol ba'o /
nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba ni dris pa'o /
de ni rigs pa ston par 'dod pa yin te /
rang nyid 'dri ba ste /
tatkasyetyādi /
