de ni chung ngu'i chen po'i bstod pa'o /
ita ūrdhva pañcānāṃ stutīnāṃ tiṣṭhantvādiḥ pratiṣṭhāpayedantaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ /
tata ūrdhva tatkiṃ manyasa ityādi punaparāt prāk paścimo bhāgaḥ 		de'i 'og tu bstod pa lnga ni koo shi ka rnam grangs 'dis gling bzhi pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
yang dag par btsud cing bkod pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dang po'i cha dang de'i 'og tu koo shi ka de ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba nas /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gnyis pa'i cha bstan to /
āsu ca sūtrokte puṇyātirekaiḥ śraddhādikaṃ sāmarthyagamyaśca mātrātirekaścaryātirekaḥ mdo 'di dag las gsungs pa ni bsod nams lhag pas ni dad pa la sogs pa skye ba yin te /
shugs kyis rtogs pa ni bsod nams kyi cha lhag pas spyod pa lhag pa yin no /
etena paryāyeṇeti prakāreṇa vastutrayādhimokṣe sthitvetyarthaḥ rnam grangs 'dis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa ste /
dngos po gsum la mos pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
iti yathākramaṃ madhyamṛddhī madhyamadhyā madhyādhimātrā adhimātramṛdvī adhimātramadhyā ca stutiḥ 'di ni rim pa bzhin 'bring gi chung ngu dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi chen po dang chen po'i chung ngu dang chen po'i 'bring gi bstod pa'o /
punaraparādi punaraparātprāk pañca tiṣṭhantukā navamī /
ekasyā eva navamyāḥ krameṇābhidhānāt /
tathāpyaṣṭamīto mahadantaramiti cet /
nāyaṃ doṣaḥ 		gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na zhes bya ba'i bar ni lta zhog ces bya ba lnga yod pas bstod pa lnga pa bstan to /
gcig po de nyid dgu pa'i rim pas 'chad pa'i phyir te /
de lta mod kyi brgyad pa las khyad par chen po med pa yin nam zhe na /
'di la ni nyes pa med de /
ekalokadhātukāto gaṃgāvālukopamāt lokadhātuvat 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma nyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bzhin no /
sūtroktapuṇyātirekaiḥ śraddhādikaṃ caryātirekaḥ mdo las gsungs pa'i bsod nams lhag pa ni dad pa la sogs pa lhag pa'o /
ūnapāṭhāḥ pūrvāparaiḥ pūraṇiyāḥ /
(RSt_50) /
caturṣu dhyāneṣviti /
atra sūtram- 'viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakaraikuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
sa vitarkavicāraṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāccetasa ekotībhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
sa prīte virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate /
yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati 		de las ni spyod pa lhag pa yin no /
tshig nyams pas phyi la bskang bar bya'o /
bsam gtan bzhi la zhes bya ba la /
'dir mdo las 'dod pa dag las dben pa /
sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
de rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa /
dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las gyur pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
sa sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca pūrvameva prahāṇāt saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati" iti /
viviktaṃ kāmairiti /
kleśakāmasyāsaṃprayogāt /
vastukāmānāmanālambanāt /
viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdhamairiti /
kleśakāmahetukaiḥ kāmavāṅmanoduścaritaiḥ 		de bde ba yang spangs yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas /
bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag ba bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
'dod pa dag las dben pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dang dngos po'i 'dod pa dag la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyu las byung pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'o /
savitarka savicāramiti /
kāmapratipakṣābhyāṃ vitakavicārābhyāṃ saṃprayogāt 		rnam par rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i gnyen po rnam par rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
vivekajamiti /
kāmavivekājjātam /
prītisukhamiti /
īpsitārthasiddhitaḥ kāyacittapraśrabdhitaśca prītisukhasahagatam 		dben pa las skyes pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa las dben pa las skyes pa'o /
dga' ba dang bde ba ni 'dod pa'i don grub pa ste gnas so zhes bya ba lus dang ngag dang yid gsum shin tu sbyangs pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan ba'o /
prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadyeti samāpadya /
viharatīti pratyanubhavati /
sa iti /
sa eva yogī /
vitarkavicāreṣu cittakṣobhakaratvadoṣadarśanāttebhyaścittaṃ vyāvartya samādadhānaḥ 		bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te zhes bya ba ni bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste /
nye bar bsgrubs pa ni yang dag par bsgrubs pa'o /
gnas so zhes bya ba ni rjes su myong ba'o /
de zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa de nyid rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas sems 'khrul pa nyid kyi skyon mthong ba ste /
vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāditi samādhibalena /
cetasa ekotībhāvāditi vitarkavicārāṇāṃ nirantaramapravṛtteḥ /
avitarkamavicāramiti teṣāṃ sarveṇa sarva prahāṇāt 		de las bzlog nas ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o; /
rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi zhing zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sems gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir te /
de ni rnam par rtog pa dang dpyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa med pa'o /
rnam par rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du 'dzin pa med pas so /
prītervirāgāditi /
audārikāttasyāḥ 		dga' ba'i 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni rigs pa nyid kyi phyir de btang snyoms yin te /
upekṣaka iti /
vitarkavicāraprītināmupekṣaṇāt /
smṛtimān saṃprajānanniti /
prīteranakavakāśadānāya prajñābahulīkārāt 		rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa la dga' ba la yang btang snyoms pa'i phyir ro /
dran pa dang shes bzhin can zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i go skabs mi sbyin zhing shes rab lan mang du byed pa'i phyir ro /
sukhamiti /
veditasukhaṃ praśrabdhisukhaṃ ca 		bde ba ni myong ba'i bde ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba'o /
kāyeneti /
rūpakāyena manaḥkāyena ca /
āryā iti /
śrāvakā buddhāśca /
yāvatsukhavihārīti /
eṣa evāsau dhyāyīti śeṣaḥ /
tatra sukhasya prahāṇaṃ caturthena dhyānena 		lus kyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi lus dang yid kyi lus so /
'phags pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas so /
bde ba la gnas pa ni bsam gtan pa 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o /
de la bde ba spong bar byed pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o /
duḥkhasya prathamena sdug bsngal dang pos so /
ata evāha /
pūrvameveti /
saumanasyasya tṛtīyena 		des na 'di nyid snga nas zhes bya ba smras so /
yid bde ba ni gsum pas so /
daurmanasyasya dvitīyena yid mi bde ba ni gnyis pas so /
pūrvamevetyanuvṛtteḥ /
upekṣaivātra vedanā 		snga nas shes pa ni 'dir yang sbyar ro /
btang snyoms ni 'dir tshor ba ste /
tata āha /
aduḥkhāsukhamiti /
tayorihātyantaṃ viśuddhilābhāt /
tatra prathamasya dhyānasya pañcāṅgāni 		de bas na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa zhes smras so /
btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis 'dir gtan du rnam par dag pa thob pas so /
de la bsam gtan dang po la ni yan lag lnga ste /
vitarkavicārau pratipakṣāṅgaḥ(ṅgam) rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa ni gnyen po'i yan lag go /
prītisukhe anuśaṃsāṅgaḥ(ṅgam) /
citaikāgratā tadubhayasanniśrayāṅgaḥ(ṅgam) 		dga' ba dang bde ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go /
sems rtse gcig pa ni de gnyis ka'i yan lag go /
dvitīyasya catvāryaṅgāni /
adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādaḥ pratipakṣāṅgam 		gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi ste /
nang yongs su dang ba ni gnyen po'i yan lag go /
śeṣe aṅgepūrvavat /
tṛtīyasya pañcāṅgāni /
upekṣāsmṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ ca pratipakṣāṅgam 		yan lag lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no /
gsum pa'i yan lag ni lnga ste /
btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin ni gnyen po'i yan lag go /
(RSt_51) sakhamanuśaṃsāṅgam /
niśrayāṅgaḥ(ṅgaṃ) pūrvavat 		bde ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go /
gnas kyi yan lag ni snga ma bzhin no /
caturthasya catvāryaṅgāni bzhi pa'i yan lag ni bzhi ste /
upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ pratipakṣāṅgaḥ(ṅgam) btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa ni gnyen po'i yan lag go /
aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā anuśaṃsāṅgaḥ(ṅgam) /
niśrayāṅgaḥ(ṅgaṃ) pūrvavat 		bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go /
gnas kyi yan lag ni snga ma bzhin no /
eteṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet bsam gtan bzhi po 'di dag la bkod pa'o /
śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
ityadhimātrādhimātrā stutiḥ 		lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
de ni chen po'i chen po'i bstod pa'o /
punaraparādiḥ prabhavanatāntaḥ prathamaḥ stobhaḥ /
ūnapūraṇaṃ pūrvavat /
caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣvapramāṇeṣu caturṣvārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasvabhijñāsu yāvatsamastāsu dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpatyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayediti /
uktāni dhyānāni /
maitryādayaḥ kāmāvacarāḥ sattvālambanāścatvāro brahmavihārāḥ 		gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byed pa la 'bul bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bkur ba dang po bstan to /
ma tshang ba bskang ba ni snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi bar la bkod na zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan rnams ni bstan zin to /
byams pa la sogs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yin te /
apramāṇasattvālambanāścatvāryapramāṇāni /
maitrī karūṇā muditā upekṣā ca 		sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pas na tshad med pa yin te /
byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms so /
aho vata sarvasattvāḥ sukhena yujyeran duḥkhena viyujyeran sukhena mā viyujyeran saṃkleśānmuñcerannityebhirākāraiḥ sukhasaṃyogāśayo duḥkhaviyogāśayaḥ sukhāviyogāśayo 'saṃkleśāśayaśca /
adhimukticaryābhūmau catastropi sattvālambanāḥ /
pramuditāsu saptasu tathatālambanāḥ /
acalādiṣvanālambanāḥ /
apramāṇeṣu sūtram- "maitrīsahagatena cittena vipulena mahadgatenādvayenāpramāṇenāvaireṇāsampannenānāvaraṇenāvyābādhena sarvatrānugatena subhāvitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvāvantaṃ lokamekaṃ diśaṃ spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati /
yāvaddaśadiśaḥ spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati /
evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena /
evaṃ muditāsahagatena /
evamupekṣasahagatena" iti /
tatra maitrīsahagatena citteneti guṇino nirdeśaḥ 		kye ma'o sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan par smon pa dang sdug bsngal dang bral bar smon pa dang bde ba dang mi 'bral bar smon pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa las grol bar smon pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa ste /
bde ba dang ldan pa'i bsam pa dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i bsam pa dang bde ba dang mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsam pa'o /
mos pas spyod pa'i sa la ni bzhi char yang sems can la dmigs pa'o /
rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa bdun pa ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'o /
mi gyo ba la sogs pa la ni dmigs pa med pa'o /
tshad med pa rnams la mdo las byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
rgya che ba /
mi gnyis pa /
tshad med pa /
gcugs pa med pa /
lhod pa med pa /
sgrib pa med pa /
gnod pa med pa /
thams cad du 'gro ba /
shin tu bsgoms pa 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten phyogs gcig khyab par byas te /
yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gnas te /
phyogs bcu khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang de bzhin du dga' ba dang ldan pa dang de bzhin du btang snyoms dang ldan pa la yang sbyar ro /
de la byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni yon tan can bstan to /
śeṣeṇa guṇānām lhag mas ni yon tan bstan to /
vipulenetyāśayato mahattvam yangs pa zhes bya bas ni bsam pa rgya che ba bstan to /
mahadgateneti vardhanataḥ rgya che ba zhes bya ba ni 'phel bas so /
apramāṇenetyālambanataḥ tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa las so /
advayeneti ekātmakena nirvikalpatvāt gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig gi bdag nyid kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro /
avaireṇeti vipakṣaprahāṇāt gcugs pa med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i phyir ro /
tatra maitryādīnāṃ vipakṣo yathākramaṃ /
vyāpādo vihiṃsā aratiḥ, anunayapratighau ca 		de la byams pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni rim pa bzhin du gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba'o /
asaṃpanneneti styānamiddhopaśamāt lhod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gnyid dang rmugs pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro /
anāvaraṇenetyauddhatyakaukṛtyopaśamāt sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pa nye bar zhi bas so /
avyābādhenetyebhireva tribhiścetaso akāluṣyāt gnod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gsum po 'di dag nyid kyis sems dri mar ma byas pas so /
sarvatrānugateneti mitrodāsīnaśatruṣu triṣvapi pravṛttatvāt thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni mdza' bo dang bar ma dang dgra bo gsum la yang rab tu 'jug pa'o /
subhāviteneti triṣvapi samapravṛttatvāt shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ni dus gsum la yang mnyam por 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
uktena prakāreṇa spharitveti vyāpya de ltar bstan pa'i rnam pas khyab pa ni rgyas par ro /
lokamiti sattvalokam /
sarvāvantamiti devanāgayakṣādibhedaiḥ sarvairyuktam 		'jig rten ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no /
thams cad dang ldan pa ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i dbye bas thams cad dang ldan pas so /
ekaṃ diśamiti ekadiggatam /
kvetyāha /
loka iti bhājanaloke dharmadhātuparama iti /
dharmadhātuvadanante (RSt_52) ākāśadhātoriva paryavasānamasyeti tathokte 		phyogs gcig ni phyogs kyi cha'o /
gang du zhe na /
'jig rten zhes smos te snod kyi 'jig rten no /
chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa zhes bya ba ni chos ni dbyings dang 'dra ba'i mtha'o /
'di la nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mtha' yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
upasaṃpadya viharatīti cittaṃ samādhāya viharatyāryavihāreṇa nyi bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba ni sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ste /
'phags pa'i gnas pas so /
daśadiśa iti daśadiggatān /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
ārūpyasamāpattayaścatvāra ārūpyāḥ /
teṣu sūtram "sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramātpratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanasikārāt anantamākāśamiti ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ upasampadya viharati /
sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasaṃjñāsamatikramādanantaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānānantyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati /
sa sarvaśa vijñānānantyāyatanasaṃjñāsamtikramāt nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati /
sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanasaṃjñāsamatikramāt naivasaṃjñā nāsaṃjñāyatanamupasampadya viharati" iti 		phyogs bcu zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i rnam pa ste /
lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni gzugs med pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
de dag kyang mdo las de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
ci yang med do zhes ci yang med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so /
rūpasaṃjñā nīlapītādisaṃjñāḥ gzugs kyi 'du shes ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i 'du shes te /
tāsu viraktasya sarvatrākāśasaṃjñā bhāvanāt de la ma chags pa ni thams cad du nam mkha'i 'du shes pas so /
tāsāmatikramāt apratibhāsāt /
pratighasaṃjñānāmiti bhittiprākārādyāvaraṇasaṃjñānām 		de las yang dag par 'das pa ni so sor snang ba med pas so /
thogs pa'i 'du shes ni rtsig pa dang ra ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'du shes so /
nānātvasaṃjñānāmiti prāsādodyānagirisariccandrasūryādisaṃjñānām sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes ni khang bzangs dang skyed mos tshal dang ri dang mtsho dang zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i 'du shes so /
anantamākāśamityevamākāśānantyāyatanamālamvanamasyeti tathoktam nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes de ltar 'di la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du dmigs pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
kathamākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramaḥ? sa yena jñānenākāśānantyāyatanamadhimuktavāṃstadevānantamadhimucya sarvatrākāśasaṃjñāvyāvartanāt /
vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramāditi /
sa tasmāduccalito na kiñcidālambanaṃ paśyati nārthaṃ na vijñānam /
so 'kiñcanatāmevālambanīkṛtya samāpadyate /
ākiñcanyāyatanasamatikramāditi /
sa ākiñcanyasaṃjñāyāmapi viraktastāmapi vyāvartayati /
kiñcanasaṃjñā tu prāgeva nivṛttā /
tato naiva saṃjñā /
sūkṣmā tu saṃjñā pravartata eva tato nāsaṃjñā /
naiva saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā yasminnāyatane samādhāne tattathoktam /
pañcābhijñāḥ /
ṛddhividhijñānam /
divyaśrotram /
paracittajñānam /
pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānam /
divyacakṣuśceti /
atra sūtram- "so 'nekavidhamṛddhividhaṃ pratyanubhavati /
pṛthivīmapi kampayati /
eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati 		ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'da' bar bya zhe na /
de shes pa gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mos pa dang ldan pa mtha' yas pa de nyid la mos par byas nas /
thams cad du nam mkha'i 'du shes las bzlog pa'i phyir ro /
rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas zhes bya ba ni /
de de las bskyod nas cung zad kyang dmigs par mi mthong ste /
don med pa dang rnam par shes pa med de cung zad tsam nyid du dmigs par byas nas thob pa'o /
cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi 'du shes las kyang 'dod chags dang bral nas de yang bzlog pa yin te /
cung zad med pa'i skye mched ni sngar log pa de nas 'du shes med pa yang ma yin te /
'du shes ni rab tu phra bar 'jug pa kho na ste /
des na 'du shes med pa ni 'du shes med pa nyid ma yin te /
gang du 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'i skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o /
mngon par shes pa lnga la rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang lha'i rna ba dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang lha'i mig go /
'dir mdo las de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyid du myong bar byed de sa yang gyo bar byed /
bahudhāpi bhūtvā eko bhavati /
āvirbhātraṃ tirobhāvamapi pratyanubhavati /
tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ prākāraṃ tiraḥparvatamapyasakto gacchati /
ākāśamapi krāmati 		gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ba dang mang por yang gyur nas gcig tu gyur ba dang steng du 'byung ba dang nub pa yang nyams su myong bar byed do /
thad kar rtsig pa dang thad kar ra ba dang thad kar ri la yang thogs pa med par 'gro'o /
nam mkha' la yang 'gro'o /
pṛthivyāmapi unmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti /
udakepi pṛthivyāmiva gacchati 		sa la yang 'byung ba dang byi zul byed do /
chu la yang sa bzhin du 'gro'o /
du ba 'thul bar byed /
dhūmāyatyapi prajvalatyapi" iti vistāraḥ 'bar bar yang byed do zhes rgyas par yang brjod do /
"sa divyena śrotradhātunā atikrāntamānuṣyakena śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣakāṃśca /
sa parasattvānāmapi parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti 		de lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis mi las 'das pa'i sgra yang thos te lha dang mi dag go /
de sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
de 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so /
evaṃ [sarāgaṃ] vigatarāgaṃ sadoṣaṃ vītadoṣaṃ samohaṃ vītamohaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ (RSt_53) prajānāti yāvadanuttaraṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
sa ekāṃ jātimanu smarati /
dve tiśro (sro) yāvajjātikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyapyanusmarati /
ekaṃ divasaṃ dve trīṇi yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyapyanusmarati 		de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba dang zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i ye shes so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan to /
de skye ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas gnyis dang gsum nas bye ba brag bcu dang brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dran no /
nyi ma gcig nas gnyis dang gsum nas bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu dang brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dran no /
bdag ni che ge mo zhig na gnas /
amutrāha māsamevaṃ nāmā evaṃ gotra evaṃ jātirevamāhāra evaṃ cirasthitika evamāyuṣyaparyantaḥ ming ni 'di zhes bya /
de bzhin du rus dang de bzhin du rigs dang de bzhin du zas dang de bzhin du gnas pa'i yun ring thung dang de bzhin du tshe'i mtha'o /
sohaṃ tataścyutaḥ sannamutropapanno yāvattataścyuta ihopapanna iti yāvat sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ sanimittamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati /
sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena sattvān paśyati /
cyavamānānupapannānapi suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatau durgatau yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti /
amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena vāksucaritena manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇāmanapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ 		de nas bdag shi 'phos nas che ge mor skyes so zhes bya ba nas de nas 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar dang rnam pa dang bcas /
yul phyogs dang bcas /
dan rtags dang bcas pa rnam pa du ma shes pa'i bar du ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'o /
de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba dang skye ba dang skyes pa dang kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang dman pa dang gya nom pa dang bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang sems can las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba mthong zhing rab tu shes pa yin te /
sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa dag ste /
tena kāyavāṅmanaḥsucaritahetunā kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
ime punarbhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena vāgduścaritena manoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇāmapavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayaśca mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃmaraṇādapāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante /
iuti hi divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣyakena daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmadhātuparame ākāśadhātuparyavasāne ṣaṅgatikānāṃ satvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti" iti /
etāsu dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu vyastasamastāsu pratiṣṭhāpayediti sambandhaḥ 		lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro /
yang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa log par lta ba dag ste /
de dag la log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas kyang gang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro /
de ltar lha'i mig mi las 'das pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang; 'chi ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa yin te /
bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pa so so dang tha dad pa 'di dag la rab tu bkod pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
śeṣaṃ subodhamiti prathamaḥ stobhaḥ lhag ma ni rtogs par sla ste 'di ni bkur ba dang po'o; /
ita ūrdhaṃ tiṣṭhatvādayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpayedantāḥ pratyekaṃ pareṇa tatkiṃ manyasa ityādinā prabhāvanatāntena sahitā yathākramaṃ dvitīyatṛtīyacaturtha pañcamaṣaṣṭhaḥ stobhaḥ /
iti mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātraḥ madhyamṛdu madhyamadhyo madhyādhimātraśca stobhaḥ /
punaraparādi punaraparāt prāk saptamaḥ /
bhagavatyoḥ parebhyo dānaṃ pūrvakeṣvapyasti /
iha tu svayaṃ ca vācanaṃ parebhyaśca likhitvā dānaṃ caryātireka ityadhimātramṛdustobhaḥ /
punaraparādi punaraparāt prāgaṣṭamaḥ /
arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāditi yatpūrvamuktaṃ tatpāramitādīnāmaudārikaṃ rūpaṃ pratihatānāṃ prasādakaramabhipretya /
iha tu koṭitrayānupālambhādikaṃ paramārthamabhipretyāha /
arthakuśalādityādi /
tatrārthakuśalasya vācanaṃ tamevārthaṃ manasikṛtya vācanāt /
sārthāmiti tenaivārthena (RSt_54) sahitām /
savyañjanāmiti tasyaivārthasya vācakā vyañjanā /
upadiśet tasyārthasya sūtreṇa saṃsyandanāt /
paridīnīpayed yuktibhiḥ /
ayamaṣṭame caryātirekaḥ /
ayaṃ ityaṣṭame vartamānaḥ /
tata iti saptame vṛttāt /
iyamapyupadeṣṭavyeti kākvā śiraḥkāyena vā praśnaḥ /
naivopadeṣṭavyā parisphuṭāditi bhāvaḥ /
abudhyamānasyeti jaḍadhiyaḥ /
tasya yuktyāgamābhyāṃ samyaggrāhitasya paravācā calanāt /
kaḥ punarenaṃ cālayiṣyatīti /
etadāha tatkasya hetoriti /
atrottaram /
utpatsyate hityādi /
bhagavatīdeśakenaiva yā tasyā viparītārthavarṇanā sā tasyāḥ prativarṇikā /
tayaiva jaḍasya śraddhālorvañcanāt /
utpattau ṇvuc paryāyārharṇotpattiṣu ṇvujiti vacanāt /
tatreti tathā sati /
mā praṇaṃkṣīditi saṃbodhimārgāt praṇaṣṭo bhraṣṭo mā bhūdityarthaḥ /
ṇasa (śa) adarśane radhādiḥ /
puṣādiśca /
tasmā [ta].......ayaṃ prayogaḥ /
tathāpyaṅvṛddhī na bhavataḥ /
parasmaipadeṣu tayorvidhānāt /
saṃjñāpūrvakasya ca vidheranityatvāt /
yathā cāsyāḥ prativarṇikā bhavati yathā ca na bhavati tadubhayaṃ mahatyorbhagavatyorvistareṇoktaṃ- "yo rūpaṃ vedanāṃ yāvatsarvākārajñatāmanityaduḥkhanātmaśūnyāśubhākārairnimittayogena upalambhayogena bhāvayati sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati /
sa prathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ yāvaddaśamīṃ yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimadhigamiṣyatīti /
ya evamupadekṣyati sa prativarṇikāmupadekṣyati 		de'i 'og tu koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rnam grangs 'di lta bur bkod pa lta zhog ces bya ba nas bsam gtan bzhi ba la bkod na zhes bya ba'i bar dang so so'i mthar yang de ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'byed pa la 'dul bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang bcas pa'i go rims bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga ba dang drug pa'i bkur ba'o /
de ni chung ngu'i 'bring dang chung ngu'i chen po dang 'bring gi chung ngu dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi chen po'i bkur ba'o /
gzhan yang koo shi ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bdun pa bstan to /
bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan dag la byin pa ni snga ma dag la yang yod de 'dir ni rang nyid klog pa dang gzhan dag la byin nas kyang lhag pa yin te /
de ni chen po'i chung ngu'i bkur ba'o /
gzhan yang koo shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo don la mkhas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas gzhan yang koo shi ka zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni brgyad pa bstan to /
'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang zhes gang sngar gsungs pa dang don la mkhas pa zhes bya ba de gnyis las snga ma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa las sems nyams pa rags pa'i ngo bor 'dzin pa dag la dang ba bskyed par bsams pa yin la /
'dir ni mtha' gsum du mi dmigs pa la sogs pa don dam par bsams pa yin te /
de la don la mkhas pa'i tshig ni don yid la byed pa'i tshig gis so /
don dang bcas pa pa ni de nyid kyi don dang ldan pa'o /
tshig 'bru dang bcas pa ni de nyid kyi don gyi tshig 'bru dang ldan pa'o /
bstan pa ni de'i don mdor yang dag par ston pas so /
yongs su gsal bar byed pa ni rigs pa dag gis so /
'di zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa'i spyod pa lhag pa ste /
'di ni brgyad pa'i skabs yin pas so /
de bas zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i spyod pa las so /
'di yang bstan par bgyi ba lags so zhes bya ba ni zur gyes sam /
lus kyi brdas dris pa ste /
bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bsams so /
khong du ma chud pa dag la zhes bya ba ni shes pa blun pa ste /
de ni rigs pa dang lung dag gis yang dag par ma zin pa gzhan gyi tshig gi gyo bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
'di gang gis gyo bar byed ce na /
de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba smras so /
'dir lan ni koo shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zhes bya ba gsungs so /
bcom ldan 'das ma nyid phyin ci log pa'i don ston pa gang yin pa de ni de'i gzugs brnyan yin te /
de nyid kyis na blun pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gis so /
de la zhes bya ba ni de ltar thos nas chud zos par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes smos pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam las rab tu nyams pa dang zhig par mi 'gyur ba'i don du'o /
ji ltar yang 'di las gzugs brnyan du 'gyur ba dang ji ltar yang mi 'gyur ba de gnyis ka bcom ldan 'das ma chen po dag las rgya cher gsungs te gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang mi gtsang ba ni rnam pa dang mtshan ma dang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de /
des na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas sa bcu pa'i bar dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro zhes gang de ltar ston pa de ni gzugs brnyan du ston pa yin no /
kathaṃ nopadekṣyati? rūpaṃ svabhāvena śūnyam /
yaśca rūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ /
yaścābhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā /
tasyāṃ rūpameva nāsti kuto nityamanityaṃ vā bhaviṣyatītyevamādi 		ji ltar mi rtog pa yin zhe na /
gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
gang yang gzugs kyi rang bzhin de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na de la gzugs nyid med na de la rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa ga la yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
ya evamupadekṣyati nāsau prativarṇikāmupadekṣyati" iti /
ata ihāpi kathaṃ bhagavannityādinā prativarṇikāparijñānāya śakrasya praśnaḥ /
bhaviṣyanti kauśiketyādinā bhagavata uttaram /
rūpīṇī pañcendriyāṇi kāyasaṃgṛhītatvāt paramāṇusañcayatvādvā kāyāḥ 		gang la de ltar ston pa de ni gzugs brnyan ston pa ma yin no /
de nas bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzugs brnyan yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brgya byin gyis zhus pa'o /
koo shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan bka' stsal to /
gzugs can gyi dbang po lnga ni lus kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i phyir ro /
yang na rdul phra rab bsags pa'i lus so /
te abhāvitā anabhyastasaṃvaratvādyeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
asaṃvṛtendriyatvāt abhāvitaśilāḥ /
tato 'bhāvitacittā anabhyastasamādhayaḥ /
tato abhāvitaprajñāḥ samāhitacittasyaiva yathābhūtaprajñānāt 		de dag ma bsgoms pa ni gang dag la ma goms pa dang ma bsdams pa yod pa de dag la de skad ces brjod do /
dbang po ma bsdams pa'i phyir tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa'o /
des na sems ma bsgoms pa ni ting nge 'dzin ma goms pa'o /
des na shes rab ma bsgoms pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kho nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa'o /
tato duṣprajñā viparītadṛṣṭayaḥ des na shes rab 'chal pa ni phyin ci log tu mthong ba'o /
tata eḍamūkāḥ sūktīnāmaśravaṇāt /
......prajñāparihīṇāḥ samyagdṛṣṭibhaṅgāt rūpānityatetyupalakṣaṇam /
duḥkhatādayopi draṣṭavyāḥ 		des na lug ltar lkugs pa ni gzhan las legs par gsungs pa mi nyan pa'i phyir dang rang nyid legs par gsungs pa mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro /
des na shes rab nyams pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba nyams pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs mi rtag pa ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
sdug bsngal la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o /
nityaṃ na bhavatītyanityatā mahāyāne /
tadvyavacchedārtha vināśagrahaṇam 		theg pa chen po'i rtag pa med pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes gsungs so /
de rnam par bcad pa'i don du 'jig pa zhes smos la /
vināśalakṣaṇā anityatetyarthaḥ /
na hi satāṃ vināśo nāpyanupa(tpa)nnānām /
tasmādvināśadarśī tānvastudharmānupalabheta 		'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa'i don de gang gi phyir med pa 'am ma skyes pa la ni 'jig pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
de bas na 'jig pa ston par byed pa ni dngos po gsum mi dmigs pa yin te /
sattā(tā)mutpādavināśau ca /
tadevaṃ (RSt_55) nityatādicaturviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa hinayānasaṃgṛhītāyāḥ samyagdṛṣṭeḥ prajñāpāramitātvena yā deśanā sā tasyāḥ prativarṇiketyuktaṃ bhavati 		yod pa dang skye ba dang 'gag pa'o /
de bas na de ltar rtag pa la sogs pa phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen por theg pa dman par bsdus pa'i yang dag pa'i lta bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du gang stong pa de la gzugs brnyan du ston pa ma yin no /
athaiṣāṃ rūpādīnāmanityatāduḥkhādibhāvanā bodhisattvena bhāvayitavyā na cetyata āha ci ste gzugs la sogs pa 'di mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal la sogs par byang chub sems dpas bsgoms pa ma yin nam zhe na bsgoms pa ma yin te /
na khalu punarityādi /
draṣṭavyeti bhāvayitavyetyarthaḥ 		yang koo shi ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
blta'o zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
yadi bhāvayetko doṣaḥ syādata āha /
sa cedityādi 		gal te bsgoms pas skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
de'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
prativarṇikāyāmiti hīnayāna ityarthaḥ gzugs brnyan la zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
evamasyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ samāsataḥ prativarṇikāṃ darśayitvā tasyā caryā pratiṣiddhā /
yathā tu prativarṇikā na bhavati tatprathamata eva sūcitaṃ arthakuśalo vācayedityādinā 		de ltar bcom ldan 'das ma'i gzugs brnyan mdor bsdus pa bstan nas /
de'i spyod pa ni rab tu grags pa yin no /
ji ltar gzugs brnyan ma yin pa de ni gong nyid du don la mkhas pas bklag par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to /
yaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāniḥsvabhāvatādipadeṣu māhāyānikammanyānāṃ viparyāsastatpratipakṣeṇa dharmakāyakāritraprakaraṇe 'viparyāsakāritraṃ mahatyorbhagavatyoruktam /
asyāmapi bhagavatyā madhye 'viparyāsaḥ prāptinirvāṇe sarvākārajñatāniryāṇe 'ṣṭavidhe ca gāmbhīrye parisphuṭamuktaḥ /
tasmāttata evāvadhāraṇīyaḥ /
ityadhimātramadhyastobhaḥ /
punaraparādiḥ punaraparātprāk pañcatiṣṭhaturnavamaḥ /
strotaāpattiphala evaṃ prabhāvyata iti tāvatsattveṣu niṣpādyate /
ityadhimātrastobhaḥ /
punaraparādiḥ punaraparāt prāk pañcatiṣṭhatuḥ prathamā /
sakṛdāgāminaḥ phalam /
iti mṛdumṛdvī praśaṃsā /
punaraparādiḥ punaraparāt prāk pañcatiṣṭhatudvitīyā /
anāgāminaḥ phalama /
iti mṛdumadhyā praśaṃsā /
punaraparādiḥ punaraparāt prāk pañcatiṣṭhatustṛtīyā /
arhatvamarhato bhāvaḥ /
iti mṛddhadhimātrā praśaṃsā /
punaraparādistiṣṭhatoḥ prāk caturthī /
svayamabhisaṃbodhābduddhaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ pratibuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ /
itimadhyamṛdvī praśaṃsā /
tiṣṭhatvādipañcakena pañcamī /
iti madhyamadhyā praśaṃsā /
punaraparādistiṣṭhatoḥ prāk ṣaṣṭhī /
kaścideveti prathamaḥ /
yaśceti dvitīyaḥ /
yo veti tṛtīyaḥ /
upanāmayediti dadyāt /
kenāśayanetyāha /
atraivetyādi /
vṛddhyādikaṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ /
ayamiti tṛtīyaḥ /
tasmāditi prathamād dvitīyācca /
iti madhyādhimātrā praśaṃsā /
(RSt_56) /
tiṣṭhatvādipañcamena saptamī /
ityadhimātramṛddhī praśaṃsā /
punaraparādistiṣṭhato prāgaṣṭamī /
saṃkhyāpi bhagavannityādi /
tatra saṃkhyā pūrvakātpuṇyāduttaraṃ puṇyaṃ śataguṇaṃ sahasraguṇaṃ ityādi /
gaṇanā daśaguṇitaśataguṇamityādi 		gang yang rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshig rnams la gnas pa med pa de ni theg pa chen po la goms pa dag gi gnyen po ste; chos kyi sku'i mdzad pa'i rab tu byed pa la phyin ci ma log pa'i mdzad par bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag las gsungs so /
bcom ldan 'das ma 'di las ni phyin ci ma log pa'i mtha' dag nges par 'byung ba brgyad las thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba nyid du zab pa dang yongs su gsal bar bstan te de bas na de la nges par gzung bar bya'o /
de ni bkur ba chen po'i 'bring ngo /
gzhan yang koo shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas lta zhog ces bya ba lnga po'i 'og gi gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bkur ba dgu pa bstan to /
rgyun du zhugs pa nyid ni 'bras bu yin no /
rab tu 'byed do zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa grub pa de'i bar du zhes bya ba ni bkur ba chen po'i chen po'o /
gzhan yang koo shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis zhes bya ba nas /
gzhan yang koo shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsngags pa dang po bstan to /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya bas ni bsngags pa chung ngu'i chung ngu 'bring bstan to /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
gzhan nas; gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na zhes bya ba'i bar gyis lta zhog ces bya ba lnga ba ni bsngags pa gnyis pa bstan to /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya bas ni bsngags pa chung ngu'i 'bring bstan to /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi zhes bya ba'i bar gyis lta zhog ces bya ba lngas ni bsngags pa gsum pa bstan to /
dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi dngos po'o /
de ni bsngags pa chung ngu'i chen po'o /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas 'du byed pa lta zhog /
ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsngags pa bzhi ba bstan to /
rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas so /
bdag nyid gcig pu sangs rgyas pas na rang sangs rgyas so /
de ni bsngags pa 'bring gi chung ngu'o /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa nas lta zhog ces bya ba lngas ni bsngags pa lnga pa bstan te /
de ni bsngags pa 'bring gi 'bring ngo /
gzhan yang koo shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can zhes bya ba nas 'du byed pa lta zhog ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsngags pa drug pa bstan te /
gang la la zhig ces bya bas ni dang po bstan to /
gzhan gang zhig ces bya bas ni gnyis pa bstan to /
gang gi zhes bya bas ni gsum pa bstan to /
nye bar gtad de zhes bya bas ni byin pa'o /
bsam pa gang gis she na /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'phel ba la sogs par gyur pa ni thob pa'o /
'di zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o /
de bas ni zhes bya ba ni dang po dang gnyis pa ste de ni bsngags pa 'bring gi chen po'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lngas ni bsngags pa bdun pa bstan te /
de ni bsngags pa chen po'i chung ngu'o /
gzhan yang koo shi ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bsod nams mang du bskyed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsngags pa /
brgyad pa bstan te /
bcom ldan 'das grangs bzung bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
de la grangs ni snga ma las phyi ma'i bsod nams lnga dang bcu dang brgyad dang stong lnga ba la sogs pa'o /
bgrang bar mang zhes bya ba ni /
bcu dang brgya lnga ba la sogs pa'o /
upamā gaṅgānadīvālukāguṇamityādi dpe ni gang g'a'i bye ma lnga ba la sogs pa'o /
aupamyaṃ daśagaṅgānadīvālukāguṇamityādi /
upaniśā daśaguṇitaśatagaṅgānadīvālukāguṇamityādi 		zla ni gang g'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma lnga ba la sogs pa'o /
rgyu ni bcu ldab brgya'i gang g'a'i klung gi bya ma lnga ba la sogs pa'o /
parimāṇasyātyantamasambhavāttadartha yā upaniṣat samīpe niṣadanam /
sāpi na sukarā kartum /
ityadhimātramadhyā praśaṃsā 		shin tu tshad med pa ma yin pa'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro ba ste /
nye ba na yod pa nye ba'i rgyu'o /
de yang gzung sla bar ma yin no /
'di ni bsngags pa chen po'i 'bring ngo /
tiṣṭhatvādipañcakena navamī lta zhog ces bya ba la sogs pa lngas ni bsngags pa dgu ba bstan to /
yathāyathetyādinā kauśikaḥ puṇyātirekopapattimāha ji lta ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni koo shi kas bsod nams lhag pa'i rigs pa smras pa yin no /
sādhu sādhvityādinā taṃ subhūtiḥ sopapattikaṃ protsāhayati legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni rab 'byor gyis rigs pa dang bcas pa spro ba skyed pa yin te /
ityadhimātrādhimātrā praśaṃsā de ni bsngags pa chen po'i chen po'o /
puṇyasya paryāyā bhedāstad dyotakaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ bsod nams kyi rnam grangs ni 'di rab tu dbye ba ste /
de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ni de'i le'u'o /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ pañcamaḥ parivartaḥ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel snying po mchog ces bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas sbyar ba las le'u lnga pa'o /
6. anumodanāparimāṇamanāparivarto nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
uktāḥ stutistobhapraśaṃsāḥ /
pariṇāmanāmanaskāro vaktavyaḥ /
tamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[51] viśeṣapariṇāmastu tasya kāritramuttamam 		bstod pa dang bkur ba dang bsngags pa bstan pa /
yongs su bsngo ba yid la byed pa bshad par bya ste /
de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can /
de yi byed pa mchog yin no /
de ni dmigs med rnam pa can /
nopalambhākṛtiścāsāvaviparyāsalakṣaṇaḥ /
[52] vivikto buddhapuṇyaughasvabhāvasmṛtigocaraḥ 		phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid de /
dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs /
rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can /
sopāyaścānimittaśca buddhairabhyanumoditaḥ thabs mkhas mtshan ma med pa dang /
sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang /
[53] traidhātukāprapannaśca pariṇāmo 'parastridhā /
mṛdumadhyo 'dhimātraśca mahāpuṇyodayātmakaḥ 		khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin dang /
chung dang 'bring dang chen po yi /
bsngo ba gzhan ni rnam gsum dang /
bsod nams che 'byung bdag nyid do /
sarvasattvānāṃ dānaśīlabhāvanāmayāt puṇyaugho viśiṣyate prakṛṣyate 'neneti 'viśeṣaḥ' zhes bya ba gsungs te /
sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams de las 'di mchog tu byed pas na khyad par can no /
sa punarasyāḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyai samyaksaṃbodhikaraṇatā /
(RSt_57) "sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati taccānupalambhayogena" iti mahatyoḥ pāṭhāt /
tena viśeṣeṇa 'pariṇāmaḥ' 		de yang 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid kyi don yin te yum chen mo dag las sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
khyad par des yongs su bsngo ba ni yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can no /
tamāha /
atha khalu maitreya ityādinā /
bodhisattvasyeti 		de yang de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
utpāditabodhisacittasya /
yathoktaviśeṣaviśiṣṭatvānmahāsattvaḥ, pariṇāmanā vyavasāyo 'syeti mahāsattvasya 		byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa ste /
ji skad du bshad pas so /
khyad par gyis khyad par can du gyur pa ni sems dpa' chen po ste /
'di la yongs su bsngo ba'i 'bad pa lhag pa yod pa ni sems dpa' chen po'o /
anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalaṃ anumodanā /
sā cānupalambhapariṇāmasyādau vistareṇa vakṣyate 		rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni rjes su yi rang ba yin no /
de yang dang por 'di la mi dmigs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba bstan te /
tasyāḥ pariṇāmanā /
tayā sahagatam /
idameva ityasya pareṇa puṇyakriyāvastuśabdena sambandhaḥ 		rgya cher 'og nas 'chad de de dang ldan pa ni de'i yongs su bsngo ba'o /
'di nyid ces bya ba ni bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang sbyar ro /
tata iti sarvasattvānāṃ dānādimayāt puṇyāt sakāśāt de dag las zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi bdag nyid las so /
agramākhyāyate yāvad asamasamamākhyāyate /
tasmādagrādi /
agrādiphalahetutvāt 		dam pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba la ci'i phyir dam pa zhes bya zhe na 'bras bu mchog la sogs pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro /
de yang gang las shes she na /
tadapi kutaḥ? yathākramaṃ pramuditādyekādaśabhūmisaṃgṛhītasvaparārthasaṃpattihetutvāt de yang rim pa bzhin du bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir /
rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa bcu gcig pa yang dag par bsdus pa yin no /
paryāyatvepi sarveṣāmupādānasāmarthyāt /
asamābuddhāsteṣāṃ sādhāraṇo viśeṣo 'samasamaḥ 		rnam grangs yin yang thams cad gzung ba'i shugs kyis mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang thun mong du gyur pa'i khyad par gyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
samantaprabhāsāyāṃ bhūmau /
kathaṃ dharmameghāyāmasamaḥ? asamasādharmyāt 		'di ni kun tu 'od kyi sa'o /
ji ltar chos kyi sprin mi mnyam pa zhes bya zhe na /
mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang chos mthun pa ste /
"daśabhūmīśvarastu bodhisattvo buddha eva draṣṭavyo na tu samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ" iti vacanāt sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas su blta bar bya ste /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so /
tadevamagrādipadebhyaḥ pūrveṇa granthena viśeṣapariṇāma uktaḥ de nyid dam pa la sogs pa'i tshig snga ma'i gzhung gis yongs su bsngo ba'i khyad par bstan nas /
agrādipadaistasyaiva 'kāritramuttamaṃ' iti viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ sakāritraḥ dam pa la sogs pa'i tshig de nyid ni byed pa mchog yin te de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i khyad par can byed pa dang bcas pa'o /
evamukta ityādinā anupalambhapariṇāmamāha de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mi dmigs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba gsungs te /
daśadiśo 'sminniti daśadiśi loke, ākāśaparimāṇe bhājanaloke 'di la phyogs bcu yod pas de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te /
nam mkha'i tshad kyi snod kyi 'jig rten no /
sarvata iti tāsu sarvāsu dikṣu /
sarvatragatayeti vyāpitayā ghanatayetyarthaḥ 		thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du'o /
thams cad gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni khyab pa ste /
bar med pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
aprameyādiṣu vīpsā digbhiḥ pratyekamabhisambandhārtham dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos pa ni phyogs re re dang 'brel pa'i don to /
anantāparyanteṣvityanantānanteṣu /
tadiyamarthato dviruktirna śabdataḥ 		mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas mu med pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
de dag ni 'dir don lhag pa las bzlas pa yin te sgra las ni ma yin no /
tatra digdeśyānāmaparicchedāt aprameyāḥ /
saṃkhyāyā aparicchedāt asaṃkhyeyāḥ 		de dag ni 'dir phyogs ring pas ma chags pa'i phyir tshad med cing grangs med pas grangs med pa'o /
digvaipulyenāparicchedāt aparimāṇāḥ phyogs yangs pas yongs su ma chad pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o /
pratyekaṃ cintayitumaśakyatvāt acintyāḥ so sor bsam par mi nus pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o /
tāsveva cintāsvantagamanāt anantāḥ bsam par bya ba de dag la bsam par mi nus pas na mtha' yas pa'o /
evaṃ sākalyena pratidiśamananteṣu trisāhasreṣu pratidiśaṃ ya ekaikastrisāhasraḥ de ltar phyogs ma lus par so sor stong gsum gyi mtha' yas pa dag la phyogs re rer yang stong gsum gang yin pa ste /
tasmin aprameyāprameyāṇāṃ yāvat anantāparyantānāṃ tathāgatānāmiti sambandhaḥ de la dpag tu med pa'i yang dpag tu med pa nas mtha' yas mu med pa'i bar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
ihāpyekaikena trisāhasreṇa sambandhārtha vīpsā /
nanvekasmiṃstrisāhasre eka eva tathāgato nāprameyādiriti cedāha /
atīte 'dhvani iti /
ekadā traikastathāgato na sarvadā /
atītaḥ punaradhvā anāditvāt aprameyaḥ tata ekasminnapi lokadhātāvatīte 'dhvani aprameyāstathāgatāḥ kāladairdhyeṇāparicchedāt 		'dir yang bzlas pa so sor stong gsum dang 'brel bar bya ba yin no /
stong gsum gcig nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa ma yin no zhe na /
'das pa'i dus na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
deng de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu thams cad ma yin yang 'das pa'i dus la thog ma med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o /
des na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig yin yang 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa ste /
dus ring bas yongs su ma chad pa'i phyir ro /
tāvantaśca te saṃkhyayā aparicchedāt asaṃkhyeyāḥ /
manasā tiryaksaṃniveśya vaipulyenāparicchedāt aparimāṇāḥ 		grangs kyang de tsam du yongs su ma chad pas grangs med pa'o /
yid kyis thad ka dang dbyibs yangs pa yongs su ma chad pas na gzhal du med pa'o /
ekaikacintayā acintyāḥ /
ekaikacintāyāmantāgamanāt anantāḥ 		re re nas bsam du med pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o /
re re nas bsam pa mtha' yas shing rtogs pa med pas na mtha' yas pa'o /
īdṛśānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ parinirvṛtānāmiti na tu tiṣṭhatām 'di lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni bzhugs pa ma yin pa'o /
arayaḥ kleśāstān hatavanta iti arhatām nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams des bcom pa dang ldan pas dgra bcom pa'o /
aviparītasarvadharmajñānāt samyaksambuddhānām /
anena padadvayena prahāṇajñānasampadāvukte 		phyin ci ma log par thams cad mkhyen pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so /
tshig gnyis po 'dis ni spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan to /
(RSt_58) /
bhavapathatvāddharme asmimāṇo(no) [vartmaniḥ] 		'khor ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir lam ste nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo /
vṛteranipratyayaḥ /
saraṇidharaṇivat /
muḍāgamaśca /
vartmanistṛṣṇā bhavapadavītvāt /
yathoktaṃ- "asmimānaḥ pitā ukto mātā tṛṣṇeti cocyate" iti /
tayorūnmūlanāt chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ ca /
prapañco dvayakalpanā, bhavaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
tayornetryau nāyike yathākramaṃ dharmadṛṣṭiḥ pudgaladṛṣṭiśca /
tayoḥ parikṣayāt chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkānāṃ paryāttabāṣpāṇāmiti /
punarbhavābhāve na punarbandhano na śoko nāśru /
tataḥ parikṣīṇabāṣpāṇām 		'khor ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa ni srid pa ste /
ji skad du /
pha ni nga snyam nga rgyal te /
ma ni srid par yin par brjod /
ces bstan to /
de dag rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir lam chad pa dang 'jug pa chad pa'o /
spros pa ni gnyis su rnam par rtog pa'o /
srid pa ni 'khor ba'o /
de dag lhag par 'dren pa ni chos la lta ba dang gang zag tu lta ba'o /
de dag yongs su zad pa'i phyir spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa'o /
mchi ma zad pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa med pas yang gnyen ni med cing mya ngan med de /
des na mchi ma yongs su zad pa'o /
kaṇṭakasādharmyāt kaṇṭakāḥ kudṛṣṭayaḥ tsher ma dang chos mthun pa'i phyir tsher ma ste lta ba ngan pa'o /
teṣāṃ kṣodanāt marditakaṇṭakāḥ de dag spangs pa ni tsher ma bcom pa'o /
śeṣaṃ nidāna eva vyākhyātam lhag ma ni gling gzhi nyid du bstan to /
prathamacittotpādo yaḥ pṛthivīsamaḥ dang po sems bskyed pa ni gangs dang 'dra ba'o /
tamupādāya tata ārabhya /
etasminnantara ityetāvatyavakāśe /
śīlādiskandhaḥ śīlādirāśiḥ 		de gzung ba ni de nas brtsams pa'o /
de'i bar zhes bya ba ni tsam gyi skabs su'o /
tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i tshogs so /
bodhisattvānāmapi balādayaḥ santi /
na tu te pāraṅgatāḥ 		byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang stobs la sogs pa yod mod kyi de dag pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin te /
tatastadvyavacchedāya pāramitāgrahaṇam /
anāśravo mārgaḥ parijñaḥ /
sarvajñajñānaṃ samyaksambodhiḥ /
pūrvaṃ buddhaguṇādibhiḥ saṃprayuktāni 		des na de rnam par bcad pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa smos so /
zag pa med pa'i lam yongs su shes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /
sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pas na ldan pa'o /
ye cetyādinā buddhaguṇādinapyāha /
samyaksambodhireva sukhamupaśamasukhatvāt 		gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la sogs pa yang gsungs so /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid bde ba ste nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
sarvadharmeṣu aiśvarya vaśitā chos thams cad la dbang phyug ni dbang bas so /
ṛddherabhisaṃskāra kriyā /
anāvaraṇaṃ śuddhatvāt 		rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa yang ngo /
dag pa nyid kyi phyir sgrib pa med pa'o /
asaṅgamanapekṣatvāt /
apratihataṃ sarvasmin sarvākārajñeyapravṛtteḥ 		ltos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ma chags pa'o /
thams cad du shes pa'i rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pas thogs pa med pa'o /
anupama tasyānumānāya viśeṣadṛṣṭāntabhāvāt /
parito 'vacchedaḥ parimāna(ṇam) 		rjes su dpag pa'i don du dpe'i khyad par med pa'i phyir dpe med pa'o /
yongs su rnam par bcad pa ni dpag pa'o /
aśeṣaviśeṣāntarāyāt rūpagrāhi pratyakṣam khyad par gyi bye brag ma lus pa'i ngo bo gsal bar 'dzin pa ni mngon sum mo /
tasya tasmin pareṣāmabhāvādaparimeyam /
tathāgatānāṃ yathābhūtajñānasamyagjñānam /
tadeva balaṃ sarvābhibhūtatvāt 		gzhan dag ni des de la dpag par bya ba ma yin te shi ba bzhin no /
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba'i ye shes ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so /
de nyid stobs yin te thams cad zil gyis gnon pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
yadbuddhajñānabalamiti /
buddhajñānasya balaṃ śaktirniravadhisarvākāraviśvārthakriyāyai 		gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs ni nus pa ste /
dus chad pa med par don sna tshogs rnam pa thams cad byed pa'i phyir ro /
balānāṃ yadbuddhaiḥ jñānadarśanaṃ prāptisākṣātkaraṇam stobs ni gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mthong zhing thob pa mngon sum du byed pa'o /
caturvaiśāradyena suparipūrṇo 'dhigamaḥ svadharmāṇāṃ yaśca dharmādhigama iti sambandhaḥ mi 'jigs pa bzhis legs par khong du chud pa ni rang gi chos dang gang yang chos rnams khong du chud par zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
sa katham? sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthasya samyagjñānasyābhinirhāreṇa niṣpādanena de ji ltar zhe na chos thams cad don dam par yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrub cing bsgrubs pa'o /
triparivarta dvādaśākāraṃ lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ dharmaḥ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi chos lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de nyid 'khor lo ste /
sa eva cakraṃ devamanuṣyeṣu caṃkramaṇāt /
tasya pravartanaṃ daśasu dikṣu /
ayamuddeśaḥ /
asya nirdeśo navabhiraṅgaiḥ /
tasyaiva dharmasya dyotanī vāg dharmoktā /
tasyāḥ pragrahaṇaṃ manasā vyavasthāpanam /
saiva vāg dharmabherī /
tasyāḥ saṃpratāḍanaṃ vineyajayaśrāvaṇam 		lha dang mi rnams la 'pho ba'i phyir ro /
de bskor ba ni phyogs bcu dag tu'o /
de ni bstan pa'o /
'di'i bshad pa ni lan dgu ste /
chos de nyid gsal por byed pa'i tshig ni chos kyi sgron ma'o /
de thogs pa ni yid la rnam par gzhag pa'o /
tshig de nyid ni chos kyi rnga bo che ste /
de yang dag par brdung ba ni gdul bya'i skye bos nyan pa'o /
saiva vā dharmaśaṅkhaḥ /
tasya pūraṇaṃ vineyaireva jñānam /
tasya dharmaśaṅkhasya pravyāharaṇam /
tamevālambya tadarthākāreṇa manasi kurvatāṃ cintābhāvanayoḥ pariniṣpattiḥ 		tshig de nyid ni chos kyi dung ste yid 'gengs pa'o /
de 'bud pa ni gdul bya nyid kyis shes pa'o /
de'i dung sgrogs pa ni de nyid la dmigs nas de'i don yid la byed cing yid la byed pa na bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro /
bhāvānābalādutpannaṃ tadeva lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ dharmakhaṅgaḥ /
tena praharaṇaṃ kleśānāṃ vidhvaṃsanam 		bsgoms pa'i stobs las byung ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes de nyid chos kyi ral gri ste de 'debs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par 'joms pa'o /
tasyaiva bhūyasi jane pravṛttiḥ dharmavṛṣṭiḥ /
tasyāḥ pravarṣaṇam 		de nyid sems can mang po la 'bebs pas na chos kyi char te de rab tu 'bebs pa'o /
sa eva yajño nirargaḍatvāt /
tasya yajanam 		de nyid gtan pa med pa'i phyir mchod sbyin te de la mchod pa'o /
tasya dharmasya dānena sarvasattvānāṃ santapaṇaṃ saṃpravāraṇaṃ ca pariveṣanaṃ(ṇam) de la chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad tshim pa'o /
yang dag par rtogs pa ni yongs su stobs pa'o /
vinītāḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ (RSt_59) satyeṣvavatāraṇāt btul ba ni bden pa dag la bkod pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o /
śikṣitāḥ samyakprahāṇarddhipādaiḥ /
adhimuktā indriyabalairekāntaniścayāt 		bslab pa ni yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag la'o /
mos pa ni dbang po dang stobs dag la'o /
niyatā avinivṛtteḥ /
buddhānāṃ pariṣadāmiti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhi 		gcig tu nges pa ni nges par gyur pa'o /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i drug pa'o /
parinirvā[pa]yatāmiti okhai śoṣaṇe /
buddhānāmasyeti kṣetrīkṛtya mānaso bhāvanaṃ rañjanam 		mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni skabs par byed pa'o /
sangs rgyas la sogs pa la brten pa ni zhing du byas pa'o /
yid kyis bsgoms pa ni bsgoms pa'o /
tasmai hitā manobhāvanīyāḥ prasādakarā ityarthaḥ de la phan pa ni yid la bsgoms te /
dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
niravaśeṣamabhisaṃkṣipya anavaśeṣamanumodeteti sambandhaḥ /
aikadhyamityaikarāśyena 		ma lus pa mngon par bsdus pa ni ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
gcig tu zhes bya ba ni phung po gcig gis so /
abhisaṃkṣipyetyasya vivaraṇaṃ piṇḍayitveti tulayitveti /
samāhiteneti manasā nirūpya 		mngon par bsdus zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa ni bsdoms pa'o /
gzhal nas zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis nges par brtags pa'o /
anumodeteti prītyālambanaṃ kuryāt rjes su yi rang ba zhes bya ba ni dga' bar dmigs par byas pas so /
anumodanayeti prītyotpādanayā rjes su yi rang zhes bya ba ni dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o /
agrayeti prakṛṣṭayā /
kathaṃ tarhi ekādaśapadāni? ekādaśavidhepyālambane tasyāḥ prakarṣāt 		mchog ni rab mchog go /
de ltar na ji ltar tshig bcu gcig gis yin zhe na /
dmigs pa rnam pa bcu gcig tu khyad par du gyur pa yin pas so /
tat kutaḥ? madhye daśasu ca dikṣu ye tathāgatāḥ teṣāṃ saparicchadena yāni kuśalamūlāni tadālambanatvāttasyāḥ de ga las shes she na /
dbus dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'khor dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de la de dmigs par byed pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ pariuṇāmayatītyata āha /
bodherāhārakaṃ ākarṣakaṃ bhavatviti /
tadevamukta ityādinā vistareṇa sthavirasubhūtiryathānumodya yathā bodhisattvaḥ pariṇāmayati taduktavān /
yathā tu tatrānupalambhayogaḥ kartavyastadupadarśanāyāryamaitreyaṃ tatretyādinā pṛcchati /
yairvastubhiriti daśadik tathāgatādibhiḥ 		ji ltar yongs su sngo bar byed ce na /
de'i phyir byang chub sdud par gyur cig ces smos te 'dren par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to /
de nyid gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar yi rang ba dang ji ltar yongs su sngo bar byed pa ni de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bstan to /
ji ltar yang de la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba bya ba de nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
byams pa de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris te dngos po gang dag gis zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis so /
yerālambanairiti tadīyaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ dmigs pa gang dag gis zhes bya ba ni de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis so /
yerākāreriti śīlasamādhiskandhādibhiḥ /
taccittamityanumodanācittam 		rnam pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sogs pa dag gis so /
sems de zhes bya ba ni rjes su yi rang ba'i sems so /
api tviti kintu /
upalabhyeranniti śaktau liṅga /
upalabdhuṃ śakyata iti praśnaḥ /
nimittīkarotīti vikalpayati /
anyathā anumodanāpariṇāmanayorayogāt /
āryamaitreya āha /
na tānītyādi sthavira āha /
evantarhi viparyāsāḥ syuriti 		mtshan mar byas pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs par byed pa ste /
gzhan du na rjes su yi rang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba'i 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro /
'on kyang dmigs par nus sam zhes bya ba ni dri ba'o /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas btsun pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
de ltar na phyin ci log tu 'gyur te /
asata eva nimittodgrahāt grahaṇāt santīraṇācca yathokramaṃ saṃjñāyāścittasya dṛṣṭeśca viparyāsaḥ med pa la mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang 'jig pa dang nges par rtogs pa dang go rims bzhin du 'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci ma log pa yin te /
eṣāṃ sādhanārtha rāgo dṛṣṭāntaḥ athāpīti paramatamāśaṅkate 'di dag bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi dpe bstan te /
'di ltar yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi gzhung 'dod pa la rtogs par byed de /
yādṛśo yakṣastādṛśo baliriti bhāvaḥ gnod sbyin ji lta ba bzhin du gtor ma yang de bzhin no zhes bya bar bsams so /
cittamiti pariṇāmanācittam sems zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems so /
sarvadharmā ityuddeśaḥ chos thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
sarvadhātava iti nirdeśaḥ khams thams cad ces bya ba ni bshad pa'o /
yadi cetyādinā doṣamāha /
katamairvastvādibhiriti 		gal te dngos po ji lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skyon bstan to /
anumodanācittasambandhibhiḥ /
cittamiti pariṇāmanācittam 		dngos po de gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o /
tasyāpi niḥsvabhāavatvāt /
kveti kasyām /
pariṇāmanaiva na syāditi bhāvaḥ 		sems zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems so /
de yang ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir gang zhig gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar bsams so /
ata evāryamaitreya āha /
nedamityādi 		de nyid kyi phir 'phags pa byams pas 'phags pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
yadapi hi syād bhavet /
kva? anumodanāpariṇāmanādau /
mātragrahaṇamanuṣṭhānavyavacchedārtham /
śraddhā saṃpratyayaḥ /
prema prītiḥ /
prasādo manasaḥ kāluṣyavigamaḥ /
gauravaṃ bhaktiḥ 		gang yang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa yongs su bsngo ba la sogs pa yod par gyur kyang ngo /
brtsam zhes smas pa ni bsgrub pa rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro /
dad pa'i ni yang dag par yid ches pa'o /
dga' ba ni mgu ba'o /
dang ba ni rnyog pa dang bral ba'o /
gus pa ni srid zhu'o /
(RSt_60) upastabdhaḥ sthirīkṛtaḥ /
avalayaścittasyāva[na]tiḥ /
saṃlayaḥ sannatiḥ /
viṣādaḥ khedaḥ /
vi[ṣā]dāpattiḥ khedapravāhaḥ /
trāsodyama uttrāsaḥ 		nye bar bstan pa ni bstan par byas pa'o /
sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni bag mi 'khums pa'o /
yang dag par zhum pa ni kun tu zhum pa'o /
yi gsod pa ni skyo ba'o /
yi gsod pa thob pa ni skyo ba'i rab tu gdung ba'o /
skrag par brtson pa ni skrag pa'o /
samagrastrāsaḥ saṃtrāsaḥ /
tatpravāhaḥ saṃtrāsāpattiḥ /
evaṃ ceti /
avalayādyabhāve 		kun nas skrag pa ni dngang ba'o /
de'i rgyu ni shin tu dngang ba yin no /
de ltar zhes bya ba ni zhum pa la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa'o /
yenetyādi /
yadityanumodakaṃ cittam 		gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhes bya ba ni rjes su yi rang ba'i sems so /
kṣīṇamityuddeśaḥ zad pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
niruddhaṃ vinaṣṭatvāt 'gag pa ni rnam par zhig pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
vigatamasthitatvāt /
vipariṇataṃ taditi na kiñcinniḥsvabhāvatvāt /
samavadhānaṃ tulyakālatā /
cittaṃ niruddhaṃ cittadharmatā śāśvatī cedāha /
na cetyādi /
tasyā asaṃskṛtatvena pariṇāmāyogāt 		bral ba ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
rnam par gyur zhes bya ba ni yang skye ba med pa'o /
gang yang zhes bya ba ni ci yang med de rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
'grogs pa ni dus mnyam pa nyid do /
sems 'gas kyang sems kyi chos nyid ther zug pa yin no zhe na /
sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
de ni 'dus ma byas pas yongs su bsngo ba dang bral ba'o /
sugṛhītavacanaṃ durguhītasya supariṇāmitatvāyogāt legs par gzung ba'i tshig ni nyes par gzung ba log par yongs su bsngos pa nyid dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
ārabhyetyadhikṛtya /
kathamityāha 		brtsams te zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'o /
ji ltar zhe na /
adhiṣṭhānaṃ praśnādhikaraṇaṃ kṛtveti gzhir bya ste zhes bya ba smos te dri ba'i gzhir byas pa'o /
tatkatham? iha maitreyeti vacanāt /
āmantrayate smeti brūte sma /
iha maitreyetyata ārabhya kathaṃ saṃjñādiviparyāso na bhavatīti yāvat 		ji ltar zhe na /
byams pa 'di las zhes bya ba ni gcod pa'i tshig ste /
byams pa la zhes bya ba nas brtsams te ji ltar lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan to /
evaṃ āryamaitreya uttaramāha /
sa cedityādi 		de ltar dris pa la 'phags pa byams pas lan du 'phags pa rab 'byor gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
yena cittena yatpariṇāmayatīti yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba ni /
sems gang gis gang yongs su sngo bar byed pa'o /
tasminnityubhyasmin /
evamiti sugṛhītatvāt /
pariṇāmitamiti supariṇāmitam 		de la zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka la'o /
ji ltar zhes bya ba ni legs par yongs su gzung ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba ni legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin no /
sphuṭīkarttumāha /
yathetyādi /
evamityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
kadā tarhi viparyāsaḥ syādityata āha /
athetyādi /
iyatā viparyāsaprasaṃge codyaṃ parihṛya prakṛtānupalambhakhyāpanāyāha /
sa cedityādi /
evaṃ sañjānīta ityuddeśaḥ 		de gnyis gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o /
de ltar na gang gi tshe phyin ci log tu gyur zhe na /
de'i phyir ji ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
de yan chad kyis ni phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur bar rgol ba la lan gdab par byas nas mi dmigs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'di ltar shes shing zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
evaṃ samanvāharatīti nirdeśaḥ 'di ltar sems te zhes bya ba ni bshad pa ste /
aviparyāsena manasikarotītyarthaḥ phyin ci log pa'i sems kyi yid la byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
tadityādi /
tat cittamevaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇamiti sambandhaḥ /
kṣoṇamityādibhiḥ paryāyairmanasi karoti /
na tacchakyamiti /
asattvācchaśaviṣāṇavat 		de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems de nyid bsams pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro /
'das pa nyid kyi phyir zad pa'o /
zad pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs kyis yid la byed pa'o /
de mi nus zhes bya ba ni ri bong gi r'a bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro /
sava dharmateti niḥsvabhāvataiva /
dharmeṣviti buddhadharmeṣu /
sa ce dityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
evamityanupalambhena /
sarvatra śūnyataikarasena manasikāreṇetyarthaḥ 		de nyid kyi chos nyid ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do /
chos gang dag gis zhes byas ba ni sems las byung ba bdag gis so /
chos gang dag la zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'o /
gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o /
de ltar zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa ste thams cad du stong pa nyid du ro gcig par yid la byed par zhes bya ba'i don to /
itīdamāryamaitreyo 'tītān buddhānadhikṛtyoktavān de ltar de ni 'phags pa byams pas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin no /
anāgatānadhikṛtyāha punaraparamityādi /
pratyutpannānadhikṛtyāha punaraparamityādibhiḥ /
anupalambhapariṇāmo dvitīyaḥ 		ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang du byas nas gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
da ltar byung ba'i dbang du byas nas gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
'di ni mi dmigs yongs su bsngo ba ste gnyis pa'o /
punaraparamityādi /
atra saṃkṣepeṇa tryaiyadhvikabuddhādīnāṃ puṇyānumodanā 		gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni 'dir mdor bsdus pa'o /
agrāditvaṃ purvavat /
atrāviparyāsaṃ darśayitumāha /
tasya kathamityādi /
evaṃ samanvāharatīti samanvāhāraḥ samyagmanasikāraḥ 		mchog la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no /
'dir phyin ci ma log par bstan par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba ni sems pa ste yang dag par yid la byed pa'o /
te dharmā iti ye pariṇāmayitavyāḥ /
sa ca dharmo 'kṣaya iti /
anuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ suviśuddhadharmatālakṣaṇā 		chos de dag ces bya ba ni gang yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dag go /
chos de yang mi zad pa'o zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni chos nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do /
evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatītyaviparyāsāditi bhāvaḥ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba yin no zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa yin no zhes dgongs so /
na dharmo dharma pariṇāmayatīti niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvadharmāṇām chos 'di ni chos las yongs su mi bsngo'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro /
ityapīti /
evamapi pūrvavat 		'di ltar zhes bya ba ni de ltar yang ste snga ma bzhin no /
ata evāha /
evaṃ bhadantetyādi /
sa cedityādinā prakārāntaramāha /
ayamityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
ityaviparyāsapariṇāmastṛtīyaḥ /
(RSt_61) 		de nyid kyi phyir btsun par rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam pa gsungs so /
'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o /
'di phyin ci ma log par yongs su bsngo ba ste gsum pa'o /
sa cedityādi /
puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ puṇyakarma 		gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ni bsod nams kyi las so /
saṃjñānamabhiniveśaḥ /
kathaṃ tarhi pariṇāmayatītyāha /
sa cedityādi /
viviktaḥ śāntaśca yathākramaṃ svaparaiḥ svaparalakṣaṇaiśca śūnyatvāt 		mngon par chag pa ni 'du shes pa'o /
'o na ji ltar yongs su sngo bar byed ce na /
gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
dben pa dang zhi ba ni go rims bzhin du rang dang gzhan dang rang dang gzhan gyi mtshan nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
punaḥ sa cedityādinaitadāha /
viviktaśāntatvajñānepi yadi tabhdāvābhiniveśaḥ syāt tadā na samyakpariṇāmayati 		sal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
dben pa dang zhi ba nyid du shes na yang gal te mngon par zhen pa yod par gyur na de'i tshe yang dag par yongs su sngo bar byed pa ma yin no /
evamityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
prajñāpāramiteti vacanam /
tayaiva samyakpariṇāmanāditi viviktapariṇāmaścaturthaḥ 		de ni zhes bya ba mjug bsdu ba'o /
de nyid yang dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig smos so /
'di ni dben pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ste bzhi ba'o /
yadapītyādinā smaraṇam /
yādṛśa evetyādinā nirūpaṇam /
yādṛśa eva sa pariṇāma ityanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirdharmadhatusvabhāvā tādṛśameva taditi labhyate nityābhisambandhāt /
dharmadhātusvabhāvameva tadityarthaḥ /
tādṛśameva tatkuśalamūlamiti yadanumodanāsahagatam 		gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dran par byed pa'o /
ji 'dra ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rtag pa ste /
gang 'dra ba nyid du yongs su bsngo ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor ro /
de 'dra ba nyid ces bya ba ni gang dang de gnyis rtag tu 'brel pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid de zhes bya ba'i don to /
de 'dra ba de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin te /
gang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'o /
yenāpīti pariṇāmanācittena /
tadapīti tadapyubhayam /
tajjātikamiti saiva jātiḥ sāmānyaṃ yasya /
tallakṣaṇamiti tadeva sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ yasya /
tannikāyamiti tadrāsi(śi)kam /
tatsvabhāvamiti tatprakṛtikam /
sa cedevaṃ saṃjānīta iti /
yadyanenāpi tādṛśatvādinā tattvenābhiniviśate tadā na samyakpariṇāmayati /
yaccātītamityādinā aparaṃ tattvavikalpamāha 		gang gis kyang zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems kyis so /
de'i rigs can zhes bya ba ni de nyid rigs te gang gis spyi'o /
de'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba ni gang ci de nyid mtshan nyid do /
de'i rigs zhes bya ba ni de'i tshogs so /
de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid can no /
gal te de ltar shes na zhes bya ba ni gal te 'dis kyang de 'dra ba nyid la sogs par de kho na nyid du mngon par zhe na /
de'i tshe yang dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no /
gang 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de kho na'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan du gsungs te /
asaṃprāptamanutpannam /
sthitirnāstīti prakṛtyaiva naśvaratvāt 		ma phin pa ni ma skyes pa'o /
gnas pa ni yod pa ma yin te rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
tasmāt trayamapi nopalabhyate tato 'sat de'i phyir gsum tshar yang mi dmigs te de bas na yod pa ma yin no /
tato naiva nimittamakāraṇatvāt /
nākāraṇaṃ viṣayaḥ /
sa cedityādi /
evamiti kṣīṇatvādinā tattvena 		gang gi phyir zhe na mtshan ma yang ma yin te rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
rgyu med ni yul yang ma yin no /
gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar zhes bya ba ni zad pa nyid la sogs pa'o /
nimittīkarotītyupalabhate /
tadā na samanvāharati na samyagmanasikaroti /
tadā na samyak pariṇāmayati 		des na de mtshan mar byed cing nye bar dmigs na de'i tshe yang dag par sems pa ma yin /
yang dag par yid la byed pa ma yin pa ste de'i tshe yang dag par sngo bar byed pa ma yin no /
yadā tarhyanavabodhādasmaraṇādvā na nimittīkaroti tadā samyakpariṇāmaḥ syāditi cedāha /
athetyādi /
evamapīti /
evamanimittīkaraṇepi na pariṇāmayati /
pariṇāmanāmātrasyāpyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ 		de lta na gang gi tshe khong du ma chud pa 'am dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i tshe /
yang dag pa'i yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro zhe na de ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
de ltar na zhes bya ba ni de ltar mtshan mar mi byed pa yongs su sngo bar byed pa ma yin no /
yongs su bsngo ba tsam yang med do zhes bya bar dgongs so /
kadā tarhi samyakpariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyata āha 'o na gang gi tshe yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin zhe na de ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
athetyādi /
ya(a)thaśabdo yadyarthaḥ /
taditi tādṛśatvādikam /
animittaṃ saviṣayatvañca /
nimittamiti samyagjñānālambanam /
samanvāharatīti samyagmanasikaroti 		de ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gal te zhes bya ba'i don to /
de la zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba nyid la sogs pa ste /
mtshan ma med pa dang yul med pa'o /
mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni shes pa la yang dag par dmigs pa dang yang dag par sems pa yin te de ni yang dag par yid la byed pa'o /
na ca nimittīkarotīti na sañjānāti nābhiniviśate /
evamatretyādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
evaṃ bauddhapuṇyaughasya yaḥ svabhāvo dharmatā tayā anusmaraṇam /
anumodyādīnāmiti bauddhapuṇyaughasvabhāvānusmṛtipariṇāmaḥ pañcamaḥ 		mtshan mar mi 'dzin zhes bya ba ni yang dag par mi shes shing mngon par ma zhen pa'o /
de ltar na zhes bya la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o /
de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs rjes su yi rang ba la sogs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa rjes su dran pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi rang bzhin rjes su dran pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ste lnga ba'o /
idaṃ tadityādi /
ivamiti yadenadubha[yaṃ] tattvasya manasikāro na ca nimittīkaraṇam /
tacchabdaḥ prasiddhau 		'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di la zhes bya ba ni gang de gnyis ka ste de gnyis yid la byed cing mtshan mar mi byed pa'o /
de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rab tu grags pa ste /
upāyakauśalaṃ yatprasiddhamidaṃ tat thabs la mkhas pa gang yin pa de rab tu grags pa'o /
ya ityādinā anuśaṃsamāha gang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phan yon gsungs so /
athāsmin upāyakauśale ka upāya ityata (RSt_62) āha /
atra cetyādi /
iyameveti /
sūtrātmikaiva /
aśrutavateti imāmasyāṃ veti śeṣaḥ /
prajñāpāramitāyā yā pariṇāmanā saiva puṇyakriyā /
seyaṃ praveṣṭumavagāhituṃ na hi śakyeti sambandhaḥ 		ji ste 'dir thabs la mkhas pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
de'i phyir 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'di nyid ces bya ba ni mdo'i bdag nyid do /
thos pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ma thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba bsod nams bya ba de nyid de 'di la 'jug pa dang 'dzin par mi nus zhes bya bar sbyor te /
de la ni de ltar yin na yang de skad ma zer cig ces brjod par bya bar rigs so /
tatreti tathā sati /
sa maivaṃ vocaditi syādvacanīya /
kosāvityāha /
ya ityādi /
iti sopāyapariṇāmaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
tatkasyetyādi /
idaṃ taditi yaduktaṃ tatkuta ityarthaḥ /
ātmabhāvāḥ kāyāḥ /
saṃskāraḥ kuśalamūlāni 		gang la zhe na /
gang 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de ni thabs dang bcas pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ste drug pa'o /
ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
de 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa la /
de ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to /
lus ni bdag nyid kyi dngos po'o /
du byed ni dge ba'i tsa ba dag go /
ataśca te śāntā viviktāḥ niḥsvabhāvā ityarthaḥ de'i phyir de dag ni zhi ba dben pa ste ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
ataśca virahitā upalabdhyā nopalabhyanta ityarthaḥ /
api tviti /
yadyapi nopalabhyante tathāpi yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ niruddhatvādikam 		de'i phyir yang dmigs pa dang bral ba ni mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni gal te yang mi dmigs pa de lta na yang ngo /
yang dag pa ji lta ba ni phyin ci ma log pa dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'o /
nimittīkṛtyetyudgrahataḥ /
vikalpya cetyabhiniveśataḥ 		mtshan mar byas shing zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'o /
rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa'o /
ayathābhūte vikalpapratibhāse yathābhūtaniruddhādisaṃjñī yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba'o /
yang dag pa ji lta ba ni 'gags pa la sogs pa'o /
upalambhaṃ ātmīyaṃ anupalambhe samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet /
tataḥ kimityāha 		dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'du shes kyi mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na des cir 'gyur zhe na /
tasyetyādi /
parinirvāṇamapīti /
apiśabdo 'tiśayārthaḥ /
tasyātyantaṃ nimittīkaraṇādyayogāt 		de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la /
yang gi sgra ni lhag pa'i zhes bya ba'i don te de ni shin tu yang mtshan mar byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyur ro /
saviṣaḥ saśalyaśca tāddharmyāt /
ityanimittapariṇāmaḥ saptamaḥ 		dug dang bcas zug rngu dang bcas zhes bya ba ni de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro /
de ni mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ste bdun pa'o /
tadyathāpītyādi /
praṇītaṃ varṇādiprakarṣāt /
kiṃ cāpīti yadyapītyarthaḥ 		'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
bzang po ni kha dog la sogs pa khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir ro /
de yang zhes bya ba ni gal te yang zhes bya ba'i don to /
api tviti tathāpītyarthaḥ /
khalu punariti vākyālaṃkāro manyeteti varṇādilābhāt 		'on kyang zhes bya ba ni de lta mod kyi zhes bya ba'i don to /
sems te zhes bya ba ni kha dog la sogs pa la chags pa'i phyir ro /
svādanaṃ svādaḥ paribhogaḥ /
pariṇāme ceti avasāne ca /
vipākaphalam /
durgahīteneti mithyāśrutena 		myang ba ni myang ba ste yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro /
zhu ba'i tshe zhes bya ba ni tha mar gyur ba'o /
rnam par smin pa ni 'bras bu'o /
log par zin pa zhes bya ba ni log par thos pas so /
durupa [la]kṣiteneti durvitarkitena /
duḥsvādhyāteneti durabhyāsena /
subhāṣitam /
iti karaṇasamāptyarthaḥ /
evaṃ sa iti yoyamuktaḥ /
saviṣatvāditi /
anarthakaraṇaśaktiratra viṣam /
tasmād ityupasaṃhāraḥ /
kathamityādinā praśnāḥ 		log par rig pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma rtogs pa'o /
log par kha ton du ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni log par goms pas so /
legs par gsungs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o /
na zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du'o /
de de ltar zhes bya ba ni gang 'di gsungs pa'o /
spang bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'dir phung khrol byed pa ste dug go /
des na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o /
ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dri ba'o /
ihetyādikamuttaram /
abhyākhyānaṃ nindā /
abhūtavāditayā khyāpanāt /
parigrahītavyādipadeṣu parigraheṇānumodanā lakṣyate /
nāntarīyakatvāt /
buddhajñānena jñā(jā)nanti buddhacakṣuṣā paśyantīti sambandhaḥ 		'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no /
skur pa gdab pa ni smod pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'i smra bas brjod pa'i phyir /
yongs su gzung bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig smos pa ni rjes su yi rang ba mtshon te bar ma chad par byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
evaṃ cāsyetyupasaṃhāraḥ /
nirviṣatvādikaṃ sarva kuta ityāha adhyāśayenetyādi 		de lta na de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin te /
dug med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad ga las shes she na /
lhag pa'i bsam pas shes pa la sogs pa gsungs so /
iti buddhānujñātapariṇāmo 'ṣṭamaḥ de ni sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba ste brgyad pa'o /
punaraparamityādi /
śīlādīti tathāgataḥ śīlādiskandhaḥ /
aparyāpannamanantarbhūtaṃ /
tryadhvatraidhātukāparyāpannatvāditi 		gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
tshul khrims la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po'o /
adhvatraye dhātutraye cānantargatatvādityarthaḥ /
dharmadhātumātratvāt teṣāṃ śīlādīnāmiti bhāvaḥ 		ma gtogs pa ma 'dus pa ste dus gsum dang khams gsum du ma gtogs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
de dag gi tshul khrims la sogs pa la chos kyi dbyings tsam nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so /
pariṇāmopīti pariṇāmanāpi /
yatrāpi dharma iti samyaksambodhau 		yongs su bsngo ba yang zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'o /
chos 'di la zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'o /
avinaṣṭa ityaduṣṭa /
aparyāpannaḥ 		chud ma zos par zhes bya ba ni mnyams pa'o /
buddhānujñātapariṇāmayordharmadhātupariṇāmatvena samatāṃ (RSt_63) darśayitumāha /
tatretyādi 		sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba dang ma gtogs pa yongs su bsngo ba dag gis chos kyi dbyings dang yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
atra dvitīyādiśabdātpareṇa vārtho gamyate /
yoyaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā pariṇāmaḥ /
ayaṃ samyakpariṇāma iti sambandhaḥ 		'di ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnyis pa ni yang gi don du rtogs par bya'o /
gang chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ste /
'di ni yang dag pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no zhes sbyar ro /
katamayetyāha /
anayetyanantaroktayā /
aparyāpannapariṇāmanayetyarthaḥ 		gang zhe na 'dis ni zhes bya ba smos te 'das ma thag tu bstan te /
ma gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
yathā buddhā bhagavanta ityādikayā buddhānujñātapariṇāmanayevetyarthaḥ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
gang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
evaṃ cetyupasaṃhāraḥ /
itya paryāpannapariṇāmo navamaḥ 		de ltar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o /
'di ni khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ste dgu pa'o /
atha khalvityādi /
yo hyayamiti yohyaparyāpannākhyaḥ /
asyāmevetyādinā pariṇāmayatītyetatparyantena buddhānujñātapariṇāmasya nirdeśaḥ 		de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang yin pa zhes bya ba de ni zhes bya ba ni gang ma gtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa'o /
'di la yang zhes bya ba nas yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba bstan pa yin no /
atretyanayordharmadhatupariṇāmanayoḥ /
agrāditvaṃ pramu[di]tādyekādaśabhūmigataprakarṣahetutvāt 		'dir zhes bya ba ni 'dir chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang gnyis kyi'o /
mchog ces bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa bcu gcig gi khyad par du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
yāvatpañcānāmabhijñānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuriti 		lhag ma mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar ni go sla'o /
ihokte mahāpuṇyodaye yacchaddhādikaṃ sa pūrvakādviśeṣaheturiti mṛdurmahāpuṇyodayapariṇāmo daśamaḥ 'dir bstan pa bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa dad pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bas khyad par du gyur pa'i rgyu yin no /
