'di ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba chung ngu ste bcu pa'o /
bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog ces bya ba nas /
tiṣṭhatvityādi subodhaṃ yāvatpratyekabuddhā bhaveyuriti /
ihoktapuṇyātireke śraddhādikaṃ pūrvakādviśeṣaheturiti madhyo mahāpuṇyodayapariṇāma ekādaśaḥ /
tiṣṭhatvityādi 		rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ni rtogs par sla'o /
'di bsten pa'i bsod nams lhag pas dad pa la sogs pa snga ma bas khyad par du gyur pa yin te /
de ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba 'bring ste bcu gcig pa'o /
ye subhūta ityādinā dadyurityetadantenoddeśaḥ yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas sbyin pa byin la zhes bya ba'i bar ni bstan pa'o /
etena paryāyeṇetyādinā dadyurityetadantena nirdeśaḥ /
eteneti vakṣyamāṇena /
glānaṃ glāniḥ /
tatpratyayāni taddhetukāni bhaiṣajyāni /
pariṣkārāḥ pariśrāvaṇādayaḥ /
sukhahetavaḥ sukhāḥ 		rnam grangs de lta bur zhes bya ba nas byin la zhes bya ba'i bar ni bshad pa'o /
de lta bu zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur bas so /
na ba ni nad do /
de'i gso sman ni de'i rkyen no /
yo byad ni chu tshags la sogs pa'o /
bde ba'i rgyu dag ni bde ba'o /
teṣāṃ upadhānaiḥ ḍhokanaiḥ /
sukhasparśaḥ sukhānubhavaḥ /
tena ye vihārāḥ caṃkramādayaḥ 		de dag sbyar ba ni bstabs pa'o /
bde ba la reg pa ni bde ba yongs su myong ba'o /
des gang gnas pa ni 'chags pa la sogs pa'o /
tān sarvasattvānekakaṃ parikalpyeti /
upastheyatvena pṛthagavasthāpya /
tāṃśca sarvabodhisattvāniti /
ekaikaṃ parikalpyeti vartate 		de sems can re re la yang so sor bzhag pa ste rim gro byed par brtag go /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang re rer yongs su brtag ste zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug ste /
upasthāpakatvena pṛthagavasthāpya /
ekaṃko bodhisattva iti 		byang chub sems dpa' re re bsnyen bkur ba nyid du so sor bzhag pa ste de ni nye bar gnas zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
upatiṣṭhaditi sambandhaḥ /
kimupatiṣṭhet? prakṛtatvāttāneva sarvasattvān /
ekaṃkasteṣāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāmiti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī /
teṣāṃ madhye ekaikaḥ dānaṃ dadyāditi /
tebhya eva sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
tāvaccirarātrasañcitamiti /
tāvatā dīrghakālena sañcitam /
tathā mahāvistarasamudānītamiti 		ci'i phyir nye bar gnas she na rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' re res sems can re re la zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'i drug pa'o /
de dag ni nang du re res sems can de dag thams cad nyid la sbyin pa byin pa'o /
yun ring du de tsam du bsams pa zhes bya ba ni dus yun ring po de tsam du bsags pa'o /
de ltar rgya cher yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni rgya cher bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
tāvanmahāvistareṇotpāditam /
tiṣṭhatu khalu punarityādi /
pūrvatra gaṃgānadībālukopamalokadhātuvīryāḥ sarvabodhisattvā upasthāpakāḥ pratyekaṃ gaṃgānadībālukopamalokadhātuvīryānāṃ sattvānām /
tatra yāvanta upastheyāḥ sattvā iha tāvanta upasthāpakā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātuvīryānāṃ sattvānāmiti viśeṣaḥ /
tānsarvasattvān (RSt_64) ekaikaṃ parikalpitāṃśca sarvabodhisattvāniti pūrvavat /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
ityadhimātro mahāpuṇyodayapariṇāmo dvādaśaḥ 		lha'i bu dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsnyen bkur byed pa'o /
'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag re re nas bsnyen bkur byed pa'o /
'dir bsnyen bkur byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de snyed dang /
'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can re re zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o /
sems can thams cad re re yang de snyed dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su brtag pa ni snga ma bzhin no /
lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o /
'di ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba chen po'o /
bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
samāptaśca pariṇāmanāmanaskāraḥ yongs su bsngo ba'i yid la byed pa rdzogs nas /
anumodanāmanaskāro vaktavyaḥ /
tamadhikṛtya śāstram- 		rjes su yi rang ba'i yid la byed pa bshad par bya ste /
de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[54] upāyānupalambhābhyāṃ śubhamūlānumodanā thabs dang mi dmigs pa dag gis /
dge ba'i rtsa ba yi rang ba /
anumode manaskārabhāvaneha vidhīyate rjes su yi rang yid byed pa /
bsgom pa yin par 'dir brjod do /
etadāha /
atha khalvāyuṣmānityādinā /
niravaśeṣyeti niravaśeṣīkṛtya /
agratvādīni caturdaśoktāḥ /
kiyatā agratā bhavatīti praśnaḥ /
iyatā bhavatītyuttaram /
kotrābhiprāyaḥ? agratvameva daśadigmadhyatryadhvakuśalālambanatvāccaturdaśavidhaṃ bhavatīti 		zhes bya ba gsungs te /
'di nyid de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni lus pa med par byed pa'o /
mchog nyid la sogs pa bcu bzhi pa gsungs pa ji tsam gyis ni mchog tu gyur zhes bya ba ni dris pa'o /
de tsam gyis na mchog tu 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lan no /
'dir bsam pa gang yin zhe na /
bsam pa 'di yin te /
phyogs nyid la sogs pa ni phyogs bcu dang dbus dang dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dmigs nas rnam pa bcu bzhir 'gyur ba yin no /
yatra tarhi trayodaśapadāni tatrāpi daśadiktryadhvabhedāt trayodaśavidham de ltar gang du tshig gsum yod pa der yang phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi dbye bas rnam pa bcu gsum du 'gyur ro /
tatra kathaṃ madhyamalokadhātoḥ saṃgrahaḥ? tanmadhye sūkṣmamavadhiṃ kṛtvā diśāṃ grahaṇāt der dbus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji ltar 'dus she na /
dbus de ni tshar bcad pa byas nas 'dus pa'i phyir ro /
lokadhātvekadeśeṣvapi lokadhātuvyapadeśāt /
tadyathā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūteti 		'jig rten gyi khams ni phyogs gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams zhes tha snyad 'dogs te dper na zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
yadā hi triṃśadrātrā māsāstadāṣṭau gang gi tshe zhag sum cu la zla ba yin pa de'i tshe zla ba brgyad pa yin la /
yadā māsaikadeśopi māsastadā nava gang gi tshe phyogs gcig la zla ba yin pa de'i tshe ni dgu yin no /
na gṛṇhīte grāhyatvenāpratibhāsāt /
na manyate vastutvenāpratibhāsāt 		mi 'dzin pa ni gzung ba nyid du so sor mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
rlom sems su mi byed pa ni dngos po nyid du mi snang pa'i phyir ro /
nopalabhate svarūpato apratibhāsāt /
na kalpayati sāmānyalakṣaṇena /
na vikalpayati viśeṣalakṣaṇaiḥ /
na paśyati dṛṣṭyā anabhiniveśāt /
na samanupaśyati santatamanabhiniveśāt 		mi dmigs pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
mi rtog pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis so /
rnam par mi rtog pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dag gis so /
mi mthong ba ni mthong yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro /
yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni rgyun la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro /
kalpanā abhūtaparikalpaḥ /
tathā viṭhapitāḥ saṃdarśitāḥ /
ajātā nirbījatvāt /
anirjātā aniṣpatteḥ /
anāgatikā anāgatādadhvanaḥpūrvalokādvā 		brtags pa ni yang dag pa ma yin par kun tu rtog pa'o /
des rnam par bsgrubs pa ni yang dag par ston pa'o /
ma skyes pa ni sa bon med pa'i phyir ro /
nges par ma skyes pa ni grub pa med pa'o /
'ong ba med pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus sam 'jig rten snga ma nas so /
agatikā atītādhvani paraloke vā /
evaṃ yāvat nāpi nirudhyata iti /
niḥsvabhāvatvātparikalpatatvādveti hetuḥ /
evamiti parikalpitena svabhāvena /
itthaṃ bhūtān etān dharmāniti paratantrarūpān kuśalān 		'gro ba med par ni 'das par ro /
de bzhin du 'gag pa yang med do zhes bya ba la ngo bo nyid med pa dang yongs su brtags pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so /
de bzhin zhes bya ba ni yongs su brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de lta bur gyur pa'o /
chos de dag ces bya ba ni dge ba'i chos gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo'o /
dharmateti bālabuddhigocaraiḥ svabhāvaiḥ śūnyatā chos nyid ni byis pa'i blo'i spyod yul gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid do /
anumodanādhikārepi tathā anumodya tathaiva pariṇāmayatīti vacanamavaśyapariṇāmanīyatvāt rjes su yi rang ba'i skabs yin na yang de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nas de bzhin du yongs su bsngo bar byed ces bya ba'i tshig gis nges par yongs su bsngo bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
śeṣaṃ vyākhyatameva yāvat na kṣamata iti lhag ma rgyur mi bzod do zhes bya ba'i bar ni bshad pa nyid do /
ityanupalambhānumodanā prathamā de ni mi dmigs pa'i rjes su yi rang ba ste dang po'o /
punaraparamityādi /
vimuktirnirvāṇam 		gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par grol ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
tacca dharmadhātoḥ sarvāvaraṇaviśuddhitā paramārthatastathaiva sarvaṃ dānādītyarthaḥ de yang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa don dam pa nyid do /
sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
saṅgastṛṣṇā /
tadabhāvād (RSt_65) asaktānāṃ tṛṣṇāhetukasya janmano 'bhāvād abaddhānām /
tato amuktānām /
apariṇāmanāyoge tasyāpyanupalambhāt /
sa kathamityāha /
asaṃkrāntito avināśata iti /
tathāhyavasthāntarasaṃkrāntiḥ pariṇāmaḥ pūrvavināśāparotpattī vā /
na ca dharmadhātoravasthā 		chags pa ni srid pa'o /
de med pa ni ma chags pa'o /
srid pa'i rgyu can gyi skye ba med pas na ma bcings pa ma grol ba'o /
mi bsngo pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
de ji ltar zhe na /
mi 'pho ba dang mi 'jig pa zhes gsungs so /
de ltar na gnas skabs gzhan du 'pho ba 'am snga ma 'jig cing phyi ma skye ba ni yongs su bsngo ba yin na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas skabs de lta bu yang ma yin te 'pho ba med cing 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro /
na ca saṃkramo nāpi vināśa iti /
samādāyoti gācarataḥ (?) sāvadhikamādāya /
ākruṣṭaḥ śaptaḥ /
abhihatastāḍitaḥ /
paribhāṣito bhūtābhūtadoṣasthānaiḥ /
samān iti sannityarthaḥ /
styānaṃ ca middhaṃ ca tenābhibhūtā iti sambandhaḥ 		yang dag par blangs te zhes bya ba ni bla ma dam pa de las yang dag par blangs pa'o /
spyos pa ni kha zer ba'o /
brdegs pa ni bsnun pa'o /
brgyad pa ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skyon brjod pa'o /
bcas pa ni ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
rmugs pa nyid kyi zil gyis gnon par zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
tatra styānaṃ cittasyākarmaṇyatā staimityam /
staimityalakṣaṇā yā cittasyākarmaṇyatā svālambanapratītaye tat khalu styānam 		de la rmugs pa ni sems las su mi rung zhing zhum pa ste sems las su mi rung zhing gang zhum pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rang gi dmigs pa mi rtogs pa ste rmugs pa'o /
middhamasvatantravṛttiścetaso 'bhisaṃkṣepaḥ gnyid ni 'jug pa rang dbang med par sems sdud pa ste /
cetaso 'bhisaṃkṣepaścakṣurādīndriyadvāreṇāpravṛtiḥ sems sdud pa yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo nas 'jug pa med pa'o /
sa cedasvādhīnā /
cetaso vṛttistanmiddham /
śeṣaṃ subodhamāparivartasamāpteḥ 		sems 'jug pa rang dbang med pa de ni gnyid nyid do /
lhag ma le'u rdzogs pa'i bar ni rtogs par sla'o /
upāyo vimuktisādṛśyam /
teneyaṃ dharmadhātoranumodanānupalambhenetyupāyānumodanā dvitīyā /
anumodanā ca pariṇāmanā ca tasyāḥ 		thabs ni rnam par grol ba dang 'dra'o /
des na chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs pa'i rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni thabs kyi rjes su yi rang ba ste gnyis pa'o /
rjes su yi rang ba dang yongs su bsngo ba ni de dag go /
tayorabhidhāyakaḥ parivarto anumodanāpariṇāmanāparivartaḥ de rjod par byed pa'i le'u ni rjes su yi rang ba dang yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u'o /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākāraśāntiviracitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivartaḥ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u drug pa'o /
7. nirayaparivarto nāma saptamaḥ /
laukiko bhāvanāmārgastrayo manaskārāḥ /
taduktaḥ /
lokottarastu bhāvanāmārgo 'nirhāraḥ śuddhiratyantaṃ' iti pūrvamuddiṣṭaḥ /
tatra nirhāramadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[55] svabhāvaḥ śreṣṭhatā tasya sarvasyānabhisaṃskṛtiḥ /
nopalambhena dharmāṇāmarpaṇā ca mahārthatā /
pañcāṅgāni nirhārasya /
'tasya' iti bhāvanāmārgasya prajñāpāramitāviśeṣasya 'svabhāvaḥ' sarvajñajñānapariniṣpādakatvādidharmacakrapravartakatvaparyantaḥ /
'śreṣṭhatā' ṣaṭ pāramitāsu 		'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa'i lam yid la byed pa rnam pa gsum bshad nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgom pa'i lam bsgrub pa dang shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba sngar yang bstan nas /
de la bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
de yi ngo bo nyid mchog nyid /
kun la mngon du mi byed dang /
chos dbyings dmigs pa med par ni /
gtod par byed pa don chen nyid /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
sgrub pa de'i yan lag ni lnga ste /
bsgom pa'i lam gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khyad par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgrub pa la sogs pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid do /
mchog nyid ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa'o /
abhinirhāraḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ 'anabhisaṃskāraḥ' /
anupalambhena sarvadharmānarpayatīti 'arpaṇā' /
sarvadharmānupalambhenaiva bodheḥ prāpaṇāt 'mahārthatā' iti /
ata āha /
atha khalvityādi /
asya hi bhāvanāmārgasya svabhāvaḥ prajñāpāramitā 		chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa ni kun la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o /
chos thams cad la mi dmigs par gtod par byed pa ni gtod par byed pa'o /
chos thams cad mi dmigs pa nyid kyi byang chub 'thob pa ni don chen po nyid do /
de'i phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'di la bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang gi ngo bo'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /
kīdṛśītyāha /
sarvajñajñānasya (RSt_66) pariniṣpattiḥ yataḥ sā tathoktā 		bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
gang las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
sarvajñatvamiti sarvāvaraṇavāsanānusandhiprahīṇaṃ jñānam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni sgrib pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa'i ye shes te /
prahāṇasampatsahitā jñānasampadityarthaḥ spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
tadapi sarvajñatvameva /
atropapattiravabhāsakaroti /
sarvāvaraṇatamaḥprahāṇamavabhāsaḥ 		de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de de nyid kyi rig pa ni 'dir gsal bar byed pa lags so zhes bya ba yin te /
sgrib ba mun pa thams cad spangs pa ni gsal ba ste de byed pa'o /
tatkareti prahāṇasampat /
sarvadharmaparamārthapratibhāso vā avabhāsaḥ /
tatkareti jñānasampat 		'di spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o /
chos thams cad don par snang ba ni gsal la ba ste /
de byed pa ni ye shes phun dum tshogs pa'o /
ataścaināṃ namaskaromi sāṃpratam /
namaskaraṇīyeti /
āyatyāṃ pratikṣaṇam /
ekena padena dve sampadāvukte /
idānīṃ padadvayena prahāṇamāha /
anupalipteti sarvāvaraṇamalakṣayāt 		des na de la phyag 'tshal lo /
zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dus so /
phyag bgyi bar 'os pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun du ma 'ongs pa'i dus su'o /
tshig gcig po des ni phun sum tshogs pa gnyis bstan to /
da ni tshig gnyis kyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
ma gos pa zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad zad pa'i phyir ro /
sarvalokanirupalepeti triadhātukamalakṣayāt 'jig rten thams cad kyi gos pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i dri ma thams cad zad pa'o /
idānīṃ padatrayeṇa jñānamāha de ni tshig gnyis kyis ye shes phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
sarvadharmaparamārthapratibhāsa ālokaḥ /
tatkarā /
atra dvau hetū padadvayenāha /
timiramajñānam 		chos thams cad don dam par snang ba'i snang ba ste byed pa'o /
tshig 'og ma gnyis ni gtan tshigs gsungs te rab rib ni mi shes pa'o /
tadviparyayo vitimiraṃ jñānamityarthaḥ /
sarva samagraṃ traidhātuka traidhātukaparamārthaḥ /
tasminvitimiram /
tatkarā /
ityālambanavyāptiḥ 		de las bzlog pa ni rab rib dang bral ba ste /
ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to /
thams cad ni ma lus pa'o /
khams gsum gyi don dam pa de la rab rib dang bral bar byed pa de ni dmigs pas khyab pa'o /
kleśāśca dṛṣṭayaśca tā evāndhakārāḥ /
sarve ca te te ca teṣāṃ apanetrīti sarvavipakṣakṣayaḥ 		nyon mongs pa dang lta ba de dag nyid mun pa ste thams cad kyang yin de dag kyang yin pas de dag thams cad do /
de dag sel ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zad pa'o /
iyatā sarveṇa svārthasampattiruktā 'di thams cad kyis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to /
parārthasampattimadhikṛtyāha /
āśrayaṇīyetyādi 		gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
āśrayaṇīyā sarvapadaprepsubhiḥ /
agrāṇi padāni strota āpattiḥ sakṛdāgāmitvaṃ yāvatpratyekabodhiḥ /
tatkarā /
teṣāmupāyaḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyāḥ 		bstan par bgyi ba lags so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob par 'dod pas so /
mchog gi tshig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rang byang chub kyi bar du de byed pa'o /
de dag gi thabs ni byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun no /
teṣāṃ kṣamakarī vighnaharaṇāt de dag bde bar bgyid pa ni bar chad sel pa'i phyir ro /
yāvanna lokottarajñānaṃ tāvad andhāḥ 'ji srid 'jig rten 'das pa'i ye shes ma thob pa de srid du ldongs pa'o /
teṣāṃ tadutpādanād ālokakarī de dag gis de skyed par byed pa'i phyir snang bar bgyid pa'o /
sarvabhayopadravaiḥ prahīṇa āloko lokottara eva bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
tatkarā /
iyatā hīnayānikānāmartha uktaḥ /
bodhisattvārthamadhikṛtyāha /
pañcacakṣurityādi /
te hi parārthapradhānāḥ /
tasya saiva sādhanamālambanabhedena pañcacakṣuḥparivārā 		'jigs pa dang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu spong bar byed pa de ni snang ba ste /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgom pa'i lam nyid do /
'di tsam gyis ni theg pa dman pa'i don bstan to /
byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dbang du byas nas /
bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
gzhan gyi don gyi phyir gtso bo ste de la de nyid sgrub pa ni dmigs pa'i bye brag gi spyan lnga ste 'khor ro /
abhedena saiva cakṣu sarvadharmaparamārthadarśanāt tha mi dad pas ni de nyid spyan te chos thams cad don dam par gzigs pa'i phyir ro /
vyāpino darśanasya trayo vibandhāḥ /
mohatamaritamirāṇi 		khyab par gzigs pa la bar chad gsum ste /
gti mug dang mun pa dang rab rib bo /
tatra moho ajñānam de la gti mug ni mi shes pa'o /
tamondhakāram /
timiraṃ cakṣurogaḥ 		mun pa ni mun nag go /
rab rib ni mig gi nad do /
teṣāṃ vikaraṇī vidhvaṃsanī /
saṃkṣepato vitimirakaraṇī timirasāmānyāt 		de dag rab rib ma mchis par bgyi ba ni rnam par 'jig par byed do /
rab rib dang bral bar bgyid ba ni mdor bsdus pa ste /
thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro /
kimutpādayatītyata āha /
sarvadharmāṇāmakaraṇīti /
sarvadharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni 		ci zhig skyed par byed pa yin zhe na /
de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
chos thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched do /
teṣāṃ trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
kalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaśca 		de dag gi ngo bo nyid gsum ste kun brtags pa dang gzhan dbang dang yongs su grub pa'o /
brtags pa ni mi byed pa ste /
tatra kalpitaṃ na karoti tasya yathālakṣaṇamasattvāt /
paratantro abhūtaparikalpaḥ /
tatra karoti tatpratipakṣatvāt /
pariniṣpanno dharmadhātuḥ /
tamapi na karotyanādinidhanatvāt /
samyagjñānaṃ karotīti cet? na /
anādinidhanacittasantānabhrāntinivṛtyaiva samyagjñānasiddhe 		de ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan dbang ni yang dag pa ma yin pa la kun tu rtog pa ste /
de'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir de mi byed pa'o /
yongs su grub pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid kyi phyir de yang mi byed pa'o /
gal te yang dag pa'i shes pa byed pa yin no zhe na /
ma yin te /
thog ma med pa nas sems kyi rgyud la 'khrul pa ldog pa nyid na yang dag pa'i ye shes grub bo /
kiṃ tarhi karotītyata āha /
utpathetyādi 		'o na ci zhig byed ce na /
bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
utpatho dharmāṇāṃ parikalpanā tena prayātānām lam log par kun tu rtog pa de dag lam rab tu bsgoms pas chos bdag med pa'i ye shes la 'dzud par byed do /
mārge dharmanairātmyajñāne avatāraṇī /
kasya mārge? sarvajñatāyāḥ /
iyatā sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattiriti yaduktaṃ tatparārthepi darśitam /
yaduktaṃ sarvajñatvamiti tatparārthepyāha /
sarvajñataivetyādinā /
yadā hi vāsanānusandhiprahīṇatā tasyāstadāsau sarvajñatetyarthaḥ 		gang gi lam zhe na /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi'o /
'di tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa ste rdzogs so zhes bstan to /
de ni gzhan gyi don du yang bstan to /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba gsungs pa de ni gzhan gyi don du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
gang gis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa de'i tshe de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
sā tarhi prajñāpāramitā utpādikā (RSt_67) nirodhikā utpannā niruddhā ca /
netyāha 		'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni skyed pa dang 'gog par byed cing skye ba dang 'gag pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
anutpādiketyādi /
anutpādikā sarvadharmāṇāmiti vaiyavadānikānām /
anirodhikā sarvadharmāṇāmiti sāṃkleśikānām /
anutpannāniruddheti svayam /
paramārthato yathāpratibhāsaṃ ceti bhāvaḥ /
paramārtho hyeṣāṃ dharmadhātuḥ /
tenaiṣāmanādinidhanatvādvālapratibhāsinā rūpeṇātyanta- /
samatvānnaiṣāmutpādanirodhau 		bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
chos thams cad mi skyed pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa'o /
chos thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dag ste don dam par skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa ni bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du snang ba'o zhes bya bar dgongs so /
de dag don dam par ni chos kyi dbyings te /
de'i phyir byis pa la snang ba'i dngos po de dag ni thog ma med pa nas gtan du med pas skye ba dang 'gag pa de dag ni med de de'i phyir de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste /
ata evāha /
svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāmupādāyeti pratītyasamutpannaṃ punareṣāṃ tṛtīyaṃ svabhāvamupādāyāha /
mātetyādi 		yang de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid sum pa gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
yum ni skyed par byed pa'o /
mātā jananī /
kutaḥ? sarvabuddhadharmā eva ratnāni teṣāṃ dātrītvāt /
tānyeva hi samagrāṇi hetvavasthāni bodhisatvānāṃ śarīram tata iyaṃ taddānātteṣāṃ jananī /
buddhagrahaṇābduddhajananītvamarthādgamyate /
na punastāvatā buddhānāmatiśayo gamyate /
ato viśiṣṭairguṇaiḥ punastadāha daśabaletyādinā /
daśa tathāgatabalāni /
tatkarā /
katamāni daśa? "sthānāsthānajñānabalam /
karmavipākajñānabalam /
nānādhātujñānabalam /
nānādhimuktijñānabalam /
indriyaparāparajñānabalam /
sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalam /
dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisaṃkleśavyavadānavyutthānajñānabalam /
pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalam /
cyutopapādajñānabalam /
āśravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ca" iti /
lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathoktaṃ mahatyo rbhagavatyoḥ /
tatra sambhavāsambhavau sthānāsthāne /
tadyathā duścaritānāmaniṣṭo vipāka [:] sthānamiṣṭo 'sthānamiti /
karma ca vipākaśca /
nānādhātuḥ puṇyāpuṇyādijanako 'dhyāśayaḥ /
nānādhimuktistadyathā rāgadveṣādau sthitānāṃ dveṣarāgādau ruciḥ /
indriyāṇi śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāḥ /
teṣāṃ parāparatvaṃ vimātratā /
ayaṃ mṛdvindriyo 'yaṃ madhyendriya ityādi /
sarvatragāminīpratipat /
rāgasya pratipakṣa iyaṃ pratipat /
iyaṃ dveṣasyetyādi /
caturṇā dhyānānāṃ aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ savitarkasavicārādīnāṃ catasṛṇāmārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ navānāṃ cānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām saṃkleśādikam /
tatra saṃkleśa āsvādanādinā 		gang gi phyir zhe na /
chos rin po chi de dag nyid thams cad sbyin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de nyid rgyu'i gnas skabs ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid de sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bskyed pa'o /
sangs rgyas ma smos pa de ni sangs rgyas skyed par byed pa nyid du don gyis shes te /
yang de tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi yum ni khyad par du rtogs pas so /
de'i phyir yang yon tan gyi khyad par de nyid stobs bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu byed pa'o /
gang zhe na bcu ste /
gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa gsal bar mkhyen pa'i stobs dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang de dag gi mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag las ji skad du gsungs pa lta bu'o /
de la srid pa dang mi srid pa ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa ste dper na nyes par spyod pa dag las rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa ni gnas yin la /
'dod pa ni gnas ma yin pa lta bu'o /
las dang rnam par smin pa ni las dang rnam par smin pa'o /
khams sna tshogs ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i bsam pa'o /
mos pa sna tshogs ni 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa la dga' bar ro /
dbang po ni dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab ste de dag gi mchog dang mchog ma yin pa nyid 'di ni dbang po rnon po'o /
'di ni dbang po 'bring ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam ni 'di ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i lam mo /
'di ni zhe sdang gi gnyen po'i lam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
bsam gtan bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa ste /
de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ro myang ba la sogs pa'o /
vyavadānamanupalambhādinā rnam par byang ba ni mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'o /
vyutthānaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitena vā avaskandakena vā sdong ba ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'am 'dug pa'o /
pūrve nivāsaḥ pūrvajanma /
tasminnanusmṛtiḥ smaraṇam /
cyu[tyu]papādau sattvānāṃ maraṇotpattī 		sngon gyi gnas ni sngon gyi skye ba'am /
de rjes su dran pa ni dran pa'o /
'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba ni sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba dang skye ba'o /
āśravāḥ kleśāsteṣāṃ yaḥ kṣayo yena ca mārgeṇa kṣayastadubhayamāśravakṣayaḥ /
sattvānām 		zag pa ni nyon mongs pa'o /
gang de dag las gang gis zad par byed pa dang de gnyis ka ni zag pa zad pa'o /
eṣāṃ sthānāsthānādīnāṃ sarvathā sarvadā samyagjñānaṃ tadiha sthānāsthānādijñānam sems can 'di dag ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad du yang dag par shes pa ni 'dir gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o /
tadeva balamitarairaghṛṣyatvāt, teṣāṃ vābhibhavanāt /
anavamardanīyetyabhibhavitumaśakyā /
kuta ityāha /
caturvaiśāradyakarītvāditi /
siṃhavadatyantaniḥśaṃko yuktavādī viśāradaḥ /
tasya bhāvo vaiśāradyam /
(RSt_68) catvāri vaiśāradyāni /
abhisaṃbodhivaiśāradyam /
āśravakṣayavaiśāradyam /
āntarāyikadha[rma]vaiśāradyam /
nairyāṇikadharmavaiśāradyaṃ ca /
abhisambodhistathāgatasya jñānasampat 		de nyid stobs te gzhan gyis mi gnod cing zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa gang las she na /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi bgyis pa'i slad du'o zhes gsungs te /
rig pa smra ba las seng ge ltar shin tu 'jigs pa med pa ste /
de'i dngos po ni mi 'jigs pa nyid do /
mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi ste /
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang zag pa zad pa la mi 'jigs pa dang bar du gcod pa la la mi 'jigs pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa'o /
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o /
āśravakṣayaḥ prahāṇasampat /
tadubhayaṃ svārthaḥ 		zag pa zad pa ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste de gnyis ni rang gi don to /
āntarāyikā dharmā nirvāṇasya vibandhakāḥ nairyāṇikā dharmā nirvāṇasya prāpakāḥ /
etadubhayaṃ parārthaḥ /
parebhyastadākhyānāt /
teṣu vaiśāradyam /
tatpratijñāpratiṣṭhāpaneṣvityarthaḥ /
tatkarā 		bar du gcod pa'i chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so /
nges par 'byung ba'i chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa ste /
'di gnyis ni gzhan gyi don te gzhan la de dag ston pa'i phyir ro /
mi 'jigs pa ni de'i dam bcas pa de dag las 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i don te de byed pa'o /
anāthāḥ sattvā anādau duḥkhasāgare bhramatāmeṣāmadyāpi trāturabhāvāt /
teṣāṃ nāthastrātā bhagavān buddhaḥ 		mgon med pa ni sems can thog ma med pa nas sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor 'khyams pa de dag tu yang skye ba med pas de dag gi mgon dang skyabs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te /
tatkarā /
iyatā sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattireṣeti samarthitaḥ 		de mdzad pa'o /
'di tsam ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa 'di sgrub pa yin no /
eṣaiva sarvajñatvamiti samarthayitumāha /
saṃsāretyādi /
saṃsāraḥ sāśravāḥ skandhāḥ 		'di nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'khor ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po rnams so /
tasya pratipakṣā hantrī de'i gnyen po ni 'joms pa'o /
dharmadhātureva tasya hanteti cedāha /
akūṭasthatāmupādāyeti /
dharmadhāturhi kūṭastho anādinidhanaikarūpatvāt /
sa cetpratipakṣaḥ syāt tadā ādita eva saṃsāro na syāt 		chos kyi dbyings nyid de'i bdag nyid chen po ma yin nam zhe na /
thar zug tu gnas pa ma mchis pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gal te chos kyi dbyings gnyen po yin na ni ther zug tu gnas pa thog ma dang tha ma med par ngo bo gcig pa nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe dang po nyid nas 'khor ba med par 'gyur ro /
prajñāpāramitā punarādimatī, uttarottaragāminī ceti saiva tasya pratipakṣaḥ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thog ma yod pa yin te gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gro ba yin yin pas sems de'i gnyen po yin no /
anena prahāṇasampaduktā 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
jñānasampadamāha sarvetyādinā /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ paramārthaḥ /
tasya vidarśanī tatpratibhāsatvāt /
svasya pareṣāñca parārthamadhikṛtyāha /
paripūrṇetyādi /
paripūrṇamekenāpyanūnatvāt /
triparivartadvādaśākāraṃ ca yaddharmacakram /
dharmaḥ śāsanam /
tadeva cakraṃ vineyasantāneṣu caṃkramaṇāt 		ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni don dam pa'o /
de bstan pa ni de snang bar byed pa'i phyir te /
rang dang gzhan gyi don to /
gzhan gyi don gyi dbang du byas nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
gcig gis nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir yongs su rdzogs pa'o /
chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos ni bstan pa'o /
de nyid ni 'khor lo ste gdul bya'i rgyud la 'pho ba'i phyir ro /
tasya pravartano pravartayitrī /
buddhānāṃ tathaiva tasya pravartanāt /
tatra dharmacakraṃ satyacatuṣṭayam 		de bskor ba ni bskor bar byed pa ste /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid der bskor ba'o /
de la chos kyi 'khor lo ni bden pa bzhi'o /
tasya trayaḥ parivartāḥ de lan gsum du bskor ba ste /
idaṃ duḥkham 'di ni sdug bsngal lo /
ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ /
ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ /
iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi 		'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o /
'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o /
'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ste /
satyacatuṣṭayasya svabhāvaparicchedaḥ prathamaḥ parivartaḥ bden pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid yongs su gcod pa ste bskor ba dang po'o; /
tasyaiva yathākramaṃ parijñeyapraheyasākṣātkartavyabhāvayitavyatvaparicchedo dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ de nyid go rims bzhin shes par bya ba dang spang bar bya ba dang mngon sum du bya ba dang bsgom par bya ba yongs su gcod pa ni bskor ba gnyis pa'o /
tasyaivātmanā parijñātaprahīna(ṇa)sākṣātkṛtabhāvitatvaparicchedastṛtīyaḥ /
tasmāt triparivartaṃ tat /
duḥkhasatyasya duḥkhasvabhāvaḥ parijñeyatvaṃ parijñātatvaṃ ceti traya ākārāḥ 		de nyid bdag gis yongs su shes pa nyid dang spangs pa dang mngon sum du byas pa dang bsgoms par yongs su gcod pa ni yongs su bskor ba gsum pa'o /
sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i ngo bo dang sdug bsngal nyid du shes par bya ba dang sdug bsngal nyid du shes pa de ni rnam pa gsum mo /
samudayasatyasya tatsvabhāvaḥ praheyatvaṃ prahīṇatvaṃ cetiṃ traya ākārāḥ /
nirodhasatyasya tat svabhāvaḥ sākṣātkartavyatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtatvaṃ ceti traya ākārāḥ /
mārgasatyasya tat svabhāvo bhāvayitavyatvaṃ bhāvitatvaṃ ceti traya ākārāḥ /
tasmāt dvādaśākāraṃ tat /
nanu pratītyasamutpannenāpi svabhāveneyaṃ [na] nirodhikā śāṃ(sāṃ)kleśikānāṃ vināśahetūnāmakiñcitkaratvāt 		kun 'byung gi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid dang spang bar bya ba nyid dang spangs pa nyid de ni rnam pa gsum mo; /
'gog pa bden pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mngon du bya ba nyid dang mngon sum du byas pa nyid de ni rnam pa gsum mo /
lam gyi bden pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang bsgom par bya ba nyid dang bsgoms pa nyid de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
de'i phyir rnam pa bcu gnyis so /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'gog pa yang ma yin te /
'jig pa'i rgyu rnams kyis cung zad kyang byas pa med pa'i phyir ro /
nāpyutpādikā vaiyavadānikānāṃ mithyājñānanivṛttau cittamātrādeva samyagjñānotpatteḥ /
naitadasti 		rnam par byang ba rnams bskyed pa yang med de log pa'i shes pa log pas sems tsam nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid skye ba ma yin nam zhe na /
bandhyakṣaṇotpādanasyaiva santānanirodhatvāt /
agninā śītanirodhavat /
prajñāpāramitayaiva mithyājñānanirodhe (RSt_69) sati bhagavataḥ prāgabhūtasya samyagjñānasya taddhetukatvāt 		mtha'i skad cig ma skyes pa nyid kyis rgyun 'gog pa nyid kyi phyir te mi 'gag pa bzhin no /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid log pa'i shes pa sngar 'gog pa na yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir /
nirodhasya cāvastuno hetutvāyogāt /
cittasyaiva ca niruddhavipakṣasya samyagjñānatvāt 		'gog pa dngos po med pa la rgyu nyid mi rigs pa'i phyir la sems nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'gag pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyir ro /
anyathā hi sarvabhrāntinivṛttikālepi vyāpi samyagjñānaṃ na syāditi bhāvanāmārgasya svabhāvaḥ gzhan du 'khrul pa thams cad log pa'i dus su yang dag pa'i shes pa med par 'gyur ro /
de ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid do /
kathamityādinā sarvajñatānuprāptaya ityetadantena śreṣṭhatā bcom ldan 'das ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mkhyen pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mchog bstan to /
sthātavyamiti vartitavyam /
pūjābhiḥ manasikartavyā guṇānusmaraṇaiḥ /
namaskartavyā kāyavākcittaiḥ /
nidānaṃ prastāvaḥ pṛcchāyāḥ /
hetustu bhagavatyāḥ śreṣṭhatā /
prajñāpāramitāyā yatkauśalyaparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyamaupalambhikānāṃ pañca pāramitāmayāt puṇyādviśiṣyata itīdaṃ nidānamanantaroktatvāt /
yata iyaṃ tāsāṃ pariṇāyikā tataḥ śreṣṭheti hetuḥ 		gnas par gyi zhes bya ba ni mchod pa dag gis 'jug par bya'o /
yid la bgyi zhes bya ba ni bla mar rjes su dran pa'o /
phyag 'tshal bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis so /
gzhi ni skabs so /
'dri ba ni gtan tshigs so /
bcom ldan 'das ma mchog nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa ni dmigs pa can dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bsod nams las khyad par du gyur pa ni mchog ste /
gzhi de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i phyir ro /
gang gi phyir 'di ni de dag gi yongs su 'dren pa ste de ni mchog nyid kyi rgyu'o /
apariṇāyakamiti pariṇāyakarahitam yongs su 'dren pa med pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dren pa dang bral ba'o /
abhavyamayogyam /
jātyandhabhūtaṃ jātyandhasadṛśam /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti śreṣṭhatā 		skal ba med pa ni mi rung ba'o /
dmus long ni de dang 'dra ba'o /
lhag ma ni rtogs par sla ste de ni mchog nyid do /
atha khalvāyuṣmānityādinā abhinirhāro dvitīyāt evamuktāt prāk de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bka' stsal pa gnyis pa yan chad kyis mngon par sgrub pa bstan te /
prajñāpāramiteti bhāvanāmārgaḥ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsgom pa'i lam mo /
yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ yāvatsarvadharmāṇāmanabhisaṃskāro 'nupalambhaḥ so 'sya abhinirhāraḥ pariniṣpādanam /
avayavārthaḥ subodhaḥ /
ityabhinirhāraḥ 		gang phung po lnga nas chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni mngon par sgrub pa'o /
yan lag gi don ni rtogs par sla'o /
de ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni sgrub pa'o /
evamukta ityādi yāvata saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas grangs su 'gro'o zhes bya ba la /
katamaṃ dharmamityanāśravaḥ chos gang zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'o /
na kaściddharmamiti /
dharmāṇāmarpaṇāyāścānupalambhādityarpaṇā /
atha khalu śakra ityādi śāriputravacanāt prāk /
yadi na kañciddharmamarpayati na tarhi sarvajñatāmapīti matvā śakra āha /
kimiyamityādi /
arpayatyeva kenacitparyāyeṇa /
yathā tu nārpayati tadbhagavānāha na yathetyādi /
upalambho bālagrāheṇa rūpeṇa /
nāma saṃjñā 		chos gang yang thob par byed pa med ces bya ba ni chos rnams mi dmigs pas thob par byed pa ni gtod pa'o /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba nas sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba yan chad kyis ni don chen po bstan te /
gal te chos gang yang thob par mi byed na /
'o na ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob pa ma yin no zhes bsams nas /
bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so /
ji ltar thob par mi byed pa de rnam grangs 'ga' zhig gis thob par byed pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis koo shi ka ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
dmigs pa ni byis pas gzung ba'i dngos po'o /
ming ni 'du shes so /
saṃskāraḥ kalpanā /
yathā tvarpayati tatpṛcchati /
kathaṃ tarhītyādinā /
uttaraṃ yathetyādinā /
yathā nārpayatīti dharmāṇāmarpaṇāyāścāvikalpanāt /
tatheti /
avikalpanayā /
na kañcidityādi /
dharmāṇāmutpādādīnāṃ cāvikalpanāditi bhāvaḥ /
anutpādāyānirodhāyeti notpādāya na nirodhāyetyarthaḥ 		'du byed ni rtag pa'o /
ji ltar thob par byed pa de zhus pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
lan ni koo shi ka ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o; /
ji ltar thob par mi byed pa de ltar chos rnams thob pa ste /
gang yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog par ro /
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
chos rnams skye ba la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i phyir zhes bya bar dgongs so /
mi skye ba dang mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
asamarthasamāsattvāt /
ataśca anupasthitetyakiñcitkaratvāt /
evamapīti sarvajñatārpakatvenāpi /
dūrīkariṣyatītyasaṃmukhībhāvāt /
riktīkariṣyatīti saṃmukhībhūtasya jñānasya tallakṣaṇābhāvāt /
tucchīkariṣyatīti tat phalābhāvāt /
na kariṣyatīti notpādayiṣyati /
astyeṣa paryāya iti yathā tvayoktaḥ 		des na gnas pa yang ma lags pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang byed pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de lta bur yang zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa nyid du ma 'tshal bar bgyid pa'o /
ring du bgyid ces bya ba ni yang dag par mngon sum du mi byed pa'i phyir ro /
gsog tu bgyid ces bya ba ni mngon sum du gyur kyang ye shes de'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro /
gsob tu bgyid ces bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro /
mi bgyid ces bya ba ni skyed par mi byed pa'o /
rnam grangs 'di yod do zhes bya ba ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa ltar ro /
tatkasya hetoriti taddūrīkaraṇādikaṃ kutaḥ? paridīpitāyāmiti nirdiṣṭāyām /
na rūpaṃ yāvanna buddhatvamiti na kiñciddharma (RSt_70) ityarthaḥ /
tasmāt kañciddharma paśyan dūrīkariṣyatīti 		de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de ring du byed pa la sogs pa ga las zhes bya ba'o /
yongs su gsal bar zhes bya ba ni bstan pa ste /
gzugs nas sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du gsal bar byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs nas sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du ma yin zhes bya ba ni chos gang yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to /
de bas na chos cung zad mthong na ni ring du byed par 'gyur te /
yāvanna kariṣyatīmām /
katamena paryāyeṇeti /
kiṃ mahārthatayeti bhāvaḥ 		mi bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
rnam grangs gang gis zhes bya ba ni chen po nyid gang lags zhes bya bar bsams pa'o /
subhūtirāha netyādi /
niḥsvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu dvayābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ 		rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhus pa ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o /
asaṃkṣiptā vikṣipteti /
advayatvāt /
evamapīti mahārthatayāpi 		ma gyengs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni don chen po nyid yin na yang ngo /
kimpunaḥ śabdādatiśayārthaḥ /
evamityuktvā /
tadevāha /
evamahamityādinā /
niḥṣyanda iti tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī niścayaḥ 		yang gi sgra ni lhag pa'i bsam pa'i don to /
'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes las skyes pa'i nges pa'i shes pa ste /
yaḥ sattvopalambha iti sambandhaḥ /
sattvaḥ pudgaladravyaṃ tadvad asvabhāvajātikāsvabhāvalakṣaṇam 		gang sems can la dmigs pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro /
sems can dang gang zag dang rdzas de dang 'dra bar ngo bo nyid med pa'i rang bzhin can te /
jātirutpattiḥ /
tābhyāṃ rahitā /
asyaiva nirdeśaḥ sattvāsvabhāvatayetyādinā /
pariśeṣādgamyate sattvājātikatayā ajātikateti /
viviktatā śūnyatā /
acintyatā cittānālambanatā /
abhisaṃbodhanaṃ sākṣātkriyā /
tadabhāvād anabhisaṃbodhanatā /
yathābha /
sadbhuto arthaḥ /
tasyānabhisaṃbodhanamagrahaṇaṃ sattvaḥ 		ngo bo nyid ni mtshan nyid do /
rang bzhin ni skye ba ste de dag med pa'o /
sems can ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyi bshad pa'o /
sems can gyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa des na lhag ma gzhan yang rtogs par sla'o /
dben pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa'o /
bsam pa ni dmigs pa'o /
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni mngon sum du'o /
de med pa ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba nyid do /
don ji lta ba ni yang dag par yod pa'i don to /
de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba ni mi 'dzin pa'o /
tadvatprajñāpāramitā de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
yathā sattvasya balasamudāgamanaṃ balaniṣpādanaṃ na kiñcit tathā tathāgatasya prajñāpāramitayeti mahārthatā ji ltar sems can stobs yang dag par sgrub pa ni stobs rdzogs pa cung zad kyang med de /
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo /
abhinirhārasya pañcāṅgānyuktāni /
ṣaṣṭhasaptamepi staḥ /
adhimokṣahetuḥ pratipakṣahetuśca 		mngon par sgrub pa'i yan lag lnga bstan nas /
drug pa mos pa'i rgyu dang bdun pa spong pa'i rgyu yang bstan te de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
te 'dhikṛtya śāstram- /
[56] buddhasevā ca dānādirupāye yacca kauśalam /
hetavo 'trādhimokṣasya dharmavyasanahetavaḥ 		sangs rgyas bstan dang sbyin sogs dang /
thabs la mkhas pa gang yin pa /
'di la mos pa'i rgyu dag yin /
chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu dag ni /
[57] mārādhiṣṭhānagambhīradharmatānadhimuktate /
skandhādyabhiniveśaśca pāpamitraparigrahaḥ /
atrādhimuktihetavastraya uktāḥ pādatrayeṇa /
dharmavyasanaṃ pratikṣepaḥ /
tasya catvāro hetava itaraiḥ pañcabhiḥ pādaiḥ /
'anadhimuktatā' anadhimuktiḥ /
tatrādhimokṣo 'sminneva bhāvanāmārge 'dhimuktiḥ /
tamāha /
atha khalvityādinā na dhandhayiṣyatītyetadantena /
adhimokṣayiṣyatīti niścite vastunyevameva nānyathetyavadhāraṇamadhimokṣaḥ /
taṃ kariṣyatītyarthaḥ /
tatkarotīti curādau pāṭhāṇṇic /
tasyādhimokṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ tribhiḥ padairgatyantarapratiṣedhāyāha /
tatra kāṃkṣā bādhā /
abādhyabādhanasya kāṃkṣāmātratvāt /
vicikitsā saṃśaya eva /
dhandhāyanamapratipattiriti trīṇi gatyantarāṇi /
dhandho 'pratipattau /
dhandho bhaviṣyatīti dhandhāyiṣyati /
lohitāderākṛtigaṇatvāt kyaṣ /
ityadhimokṣaḥ /
adhimokṣasya trayo hetavaḥ /
tatra dvau pṛcchati /
kutaścyutvehopannaḥ kiyacciracaritāvī ceti /
sa iti yo 'dhimoktā /
adhimukto 'dhimuktikāritreṇa (RSt_71) lakṣyate /
atastadāha /
ya ityādinā /
arthata ityaṣṭābhirabhisamayaiḥ 		bdud kyis thibs kyis non pa dang /
zab mo'i chos la ma mos dang /
phung po la sogs mngon zhen dang /
sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pa'o /
zhes gsungs te /
tshig gsum gyis ni mos pa'i rgyu gsum bstan to /
tshig gzhan lnga ni spong ba ste chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu bzhi bstan to /
ma mos pa ni mos pa'o /
'di la mos pa ni bsgom pa'i lam 'di nyid la mos pa'o /
de nyid de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rmongs par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /
mos pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i dngos po nyid la de bzhin du yin gyi /
gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mos pa ste de byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
tshig gsum gyis rnam pa gzhan bkag pas de la mos pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
de la nem nur ni gnod pa ste gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir nem nur med pa'o /
the tshom ni yid gnyis so /
rmongs pa ni mi shes pa'o /
de ni rnam pa gzhan gsum ste de ni mos pa'o /
mos pa'i rgyu ni gsum ste /
de la dran pa gnyis ni gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes ba dang yun ji srid cig tu spyad pa'o /
de zhes bya ba ni gang mos par byed pa dang mos pa dang mos par bya ba'i mtshon pa'o; /
de'i phyir de bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
don nyid ces bya ba ni mngon par rtogs pa brgyad po dag go /
arthanayata iti yathāsvaṃ teṣāmeva vastubhiḥ /
dharmata ityebhireva nāmapadavyañjanaiḥ 		don gyi tshul zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de dag gi rang nyid kyi dngos po rnams so /
chos nyid ces bya ba ni ming dang tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis so /
dharmanayata iti samāsavyāsādibhiḥ chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa dang rgyas pa la sogs pa rnams kyis so /
anugamiṣyaṃtyanusaraṇāt /
anubhotsyate tathā jñānāt 		rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'o /
de bzhin du shes pa'i phyir rjes su 'tshal ba'o /
anubodhayiṣyati tathaiva parān /
tatkasya hetoriti kuto liṅgāt /
yaḥ kaścidityādinā liṅgamāha /
me dṛṣṭa iti mayā dṛṣṭaḥ 		rdzogs par bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na bzhin du gzhan rnams la'o /
de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni rtags gang gi phyir ro /
sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rtags gsungs te /
bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni bdag gis mthong ba'o /
sambandhavivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī brjod par 'dod pa dag la 'brel pa'i drug pa yin te /
tadyathā subhāṣitasya śikṣate, nāgnistṛpyati kāṣṭhānāmiti dper na legs par bshad pa'i slob pa dang me rnams kyis shing gi mi cog ces bya ba lta bu'o; /
avadadhāti sāvadhānaṃ karoti /
satkṛtyeti bhaktito rucito vā 		rna blags pa zhes bya ba ni rtse gcig pa dang ldan par byed pa'o /
gus par bya ste zhes bya ba la gus pa 'am 'dod pa nyid do /
nopacchinatti vicchedākaraṇāt /
ciretyādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
ciracaritāḥ pāramitā avituṃ śīlamasyeti ciracaritāvī 		rnam par bcad par mi byed pa'i phyir bar chad mi byed pa'o /
sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mjug sdud pa'o /
'di la bsrung ba'i ngang tshul yod pas na yun ring por spyad pa can no /
bahavo buddhāḥ paryupāsitā yena sa tathoktaḥ gang gis sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
iti buddhasevādānādicaryā /
tṛtīyo 'dhimokṣaheturupāyakauśalyam 		de ni sangs rgyas la brten pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyad pa dag go /
mos pa'i rgyu gsum thabs la mkhas pa ni /
tadāha /
atha khalvityādinā sthaviraḥ subhūtirityataḥ prāk /
śakyā punariti kāṃkṣā praśnaḥ 		de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
gnas brtan rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /
nus sam zhes bya ba ni zur gyis dris pa'o /
śrotuṃ śabdataḥ /
upalakṣayitumarthataḥ /
samanvāhartuṃ kālāntare smartum /
upapādayituṃ cintākāle 		mnyan pa ni tshig las so /
rtogs pa ni don las so /
bsam pa ni dus phyi mar dran pa'o /
bskyed pa ni bsam pa'i dus so /
upadhārayituṃ bhāvanākāle cetasi sthirīkaraṇāt sgom dus su sems la brtan par byed pa'i phyir nye bar gzung ba'o /
iyamiti pratibhāsamānā /
ihāmutra veti pratibhāsamānā dhārā 		'di'i zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba'o /
de 'di na zhe 'am zhes bya ba ni snang ba na'o /
aneneti pratibhāsamānena /
ākāreṇeti lakṣaṇena /
tadyathā gauḥ sāsnādimatvena 		'dis ni zhes bya ba ni so sor snang bas so /
rnam pa ni mtshon pas so /
dper na ba lang gi lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pas so /
liṅgeneti kṛtrimeṇa cinhena /
tadyathā gaurghaṇṭādinā 		rtags ni bcos pa'i mtshon pa ste /
dper na ba lang bum pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas so /
nimitteneti svābhāvikena cinhena /
tadyathā gauḥśuklatvādinā 		mtshan ma ni ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa ste /
dper na ba lang dkar po nyid la sogs pa'o /
nirdeṣṭuṃ parasmaiḥ /
śrotuṃ parasmāt 		bstan pa ni gzhan dag la'o /
mnyan pa ni gzhan dag las so /
bhagavānāha /
uttaraṃ no hītyādi /
skandhādiśa iti skandhādibhiḥ /
rūpaskandha iti vā yāvaddharmāyatanamiti vetyarthaḥ /
kuta ityāha /
sarvadharmaistaireva viviktatvādasyāḥ 		bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba; rab 'byor de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs so /
phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phung po la sogs pa rnams kyis so /
yang na gzugs kyi phung po nas /
chos kyi skye mched kyi bar zhes bya ba'i don to /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
chos thams cad dben pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so /
tadapi kutaḥ? niḥsvabhāvatvātteṣām /
parikalpitena dharmasvabhāveneti bhāvaḥ /
na cānyatreti /
na cānyā tatparamārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
ata eva tadityādinā praśnaḥ /
skandhetyādinottaram 		de yang ga las she na /
de dag rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir kun brtags pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya bar dgongs so /
gzhan yang med pa zhes bya ba la gzhan na med pa de ni don dam pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so /
de nyid kyi phyir de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni dris pa'o /
phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no /
vijñaptirūpaṃ skandhādikameva /
śūnyaṃ parikalpitena skandhādisvabhāvena 		phung po la sogs pa nyid rnam par rig pa'i ngo bo ste phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par kun tu brtags pa ni stong pa'o /
sā tasya tena śūnyatā vijñaptimātratā prajñāpāramitā de la des stong pa nyid rnam par rig pa tsam ste de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do /
tasmādadvayametaddvaṃvīkāram /
nanu śūnyatāyā idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na prajñāpāramitāyā ityata āha /
śūnyatvādityādi /
nopalabhyate skandhādi yathālakṣaṇam 		de bas na 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do /
de la stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhe na /
stong zhing dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
dmigs su med pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du'o; /
yonupalambhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmiti tadviviktaprakāśamātropalambhalakṣaṇaḥ gang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la bya ba gsal ba tsam ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid do /
na tūpalambhanivṛttimātram de la log pa tsam ni mi dmigs pa'o /
"nābhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā" iti vacanāt gang yang rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so /
yo 'nupalambhaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā prakṛṣṭajñānatvāt pāragatvācca gang mi dmigs pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste phul du byung ba'i shes pa nyid kyi phyir dang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
tathāpi nāsau prajñāpāramitā /
syādyadi skandhādiśūnyatāmanubhūya (RSt_72) skandhādyavasīyeta 		'on kyang de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin na ni gal te phung po la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid nyams su myong yang phung po la sogs pa shes par 'gyur te /
rajatādyavasāye śuktidarśanavat nya phyis mthong na dngul la sogs pa shes pa bzhin no /
etaddarśayitumāha /
yadetyādi 		'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
yadā tu yathānubhūtaniścayaṃ janayati na skandhā na dhāturnāyatanamiti tadā prajñāpāramitaiva gang gi tshe phung po dang khams dang skye mched mi dmigs pa ji ltar nyams su myong zhing nges pa skyes pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de /
tannisyandatvāt skandhādyabhāvaniścayasya tshad mas grub pa yin pa'i phyir de grub pas phung po la sogs pa med par nges so /
śuktiniścaye śuktidarśanavat /
prāmāṇyāt /
tadyevaṃ yadyathāsti yathā ca nāsti yathā ca prajñāpāramitā syānna syādvā tasya sarvasya samyagbodha upāyakauśalaṃ tṛtīyo 'dhimokṣahetuḥ /
dharmavyasanaṃ vaktavyam 		nya phyis mthong nas nya phyis la nges pa the tshom skyes pa bzhin te /
de nyid gang ji ltar yod pa dang med pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ji ltar yod pa dang mos pa de thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ste /
mos pa'i rgyu gsum pa'o /
chos kyis phongs pa brjod par bya ste /
sa ca saddharmapratikṣayaḥ /
kutaḥ? dharmavyasanahetutvāt 		de yang yang dag pa'i chos spong ba'o /
ga las she na /
chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro /
dharmasya vyasanaṃ vipat /
dīrghadurgativāsena tasya śravaṇādyabhāvaḥ 		chos kyis phongs pa ni rgud pa ste /
ngan song du yun ring por gnas pas de thos pa med de /
durgaticiravāsahetutvāddharmavyasanahetutvam yun ring por ngan song du gnas pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu nyid do /
tasmāddharmavyasanam /
tadeva dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma 		de'i phyir chos kyis phongs pa'o /
de nyid ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba las so /
tatsaṃvartate 'smāditi kṛtvā /
tadeva prastauti sthavira ityādinā /
prajñāpāramitā /
eṣa eva bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
tasyāṃ yogāpattiḥ samādhānaprāptiḥ /
vibhajyeti /
kathaṃ vibhajya? keṣāñci[cci]racaritāvinā(tā) bhavati keṣāñcinneti 		der 'gyur ba ni des byas pa'o /
skabs de nyid ni gnas brtan rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni bsgom pa'i lam mo /
de la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ni mnyam par gzhan pa thob pa'o /
rnam par phye ste zhes bya ba la ji ltar rnam par dbye zhe na /
gang dag yun ring po ji srid cig nas spyod pa dang gang dag mi spyod pa'o /
tatkutaḥ? indriyāṇāṃ śraddhādīnāṃ vimātratayā nānātvena ga las shes she na dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po'i rim pa sna tshogs pas so /
tāmāha syādityādinā /
asyāmagauravatā teṣāmabhūditi sambandhaḥ /
buddhānāmantikāditi /
antike dūrāntikārthebhya iti pañcamī 		de nyid rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'di la ma dad pa de dag 'byung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du zhes bya ba de ni nye ba na zhes bya ba'i don to /
tatsannidhāvityarthaḥ /
agauravatā aśu(su)śūṣaṇatā aśraddadhānatā ca /
bhagavatyāṃ aparyupāsanatā aparipṛcchanatā ca buddheṣu /
tata iti śraddhāviyogāt 		ma dad pa zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa nyid do /
ma dad pas ni bcom ldan 'das ma la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa'o /
mi 'dri ba nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams la'o /
de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dad pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma saddharmapratikṣepaḥ /
kṛtaṃ sakṛtkaraṇāt 		chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa ni dam pa'i chos spong ba ste lan cig byas pa'o /
sañcitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ karaṇāt /
ācitaṃ paripūrṇam /
upacitaṃ vipākadanaśaktilābhāt 		bsags pa ni yang nas yang du byed pa'i phyir ro /
kun nas bsags pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o /
nye bar bsams pa ni rnam par smin pa 'byin pa'i nus pa thob pa'o /
kāyena sāmagrī śrotumāgamanam lus kyis nyan du 'gro ba ni mthun par mi byed pa'o /
cittena nirvikṣepatā sems kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par gyengs pa'o /
vācā aprastutānabhidhānam /
evaṃ sāmagrimadadānā iti samyagaśṛṇvantaḥ 		ngag gis ni skabs ma yin pa'i tshig brjod pa'o; /
de ltar mthun pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par nyan pa'o /
na jānanti granthataḥ /
na paśyanti arthataḥ /
na budhyante svabhāvatrayabhedena /
tato na vedayante viparītabodhāt 		mi mthong ba ni don no /
khong du mi chud pa ni ngo bo nyid gsum gyi dbye ba'o /
des ni mi rig go zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log tu rtogs pa'o /
aśraddadhānā ityādi tūktam /
tasyopasaṃhāra evaṃ ta ityādinā 		ma dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa de dag gi mjug sdud pa ni de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
pratyākhyānaṃ manasā parityāgaḥ spangs par 'gyur zhes pa ni yid kyis yongs su dor ba'o /
pratikṣepo vācā /
pratikrośanaṃ nindā /
upahatyeti dūṣayitvā /
dagdheti kuśalamūladāhāt 		dbang gzas pa ni tshig gis so /
mi snyan par brjod pa ni smod pa'o /
ma rungs par byas pa ni sun par byas pa'o /
bsregs pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsregs pa'i phyir ro /
chando vaśībhāvaḥ /
viparyayādvicchandaḥ śithilaḥ /
ato vicchandayiṣyantīti śithilīkaraṇāt 		mos pa na dbang du byed pa'o /
de zlog pa ni lhod pa'o /
de'i phyir mos pa zlog pa ni lhod par byed pa'i phyir ro /
vivecayiṣyantīti manasā tyājanāt 'bral bar byed ces bya ba ni yid kyis gtong bar byed pa'o /
vivartayiṣyantīti punaragrahaṇāt /
iyatā pratyākhyānamuktam /
pratikṣepamāha nātretyādinā /
pratikroṣaṇamāha naitadityādinā /
apakrāntāḥ parimuktāḥ paribāhyā ityeko 'rthaḥ 		ldog par byed pa ni yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
'di yan chad kyis ni spangs par 'gyur ba bstan to /
dbang gzas par 'gyur ba ni 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur ba ni 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
'byor bar 'gyur ba dang yongs su 'phangs par 'gyur ba dang phyi rol du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni don gcig go /
sarva yathā bhavanti tathā sarveṇa aṅgena /
sarva yathā bhavati tathā sarvaḥ prakāraḥ /
karmābhisaṃskāraḥ karma kriyā /
upasthāpiteneti kṛtena /
samutthāpitenetyupacitena /
saṃvartanī (RSt_73) pralayaḥ /
āavīcitalādā ca brahmalokādyasyāmagninā kṣīyate sā tejaḥsaṃvartanī /
kṣepsyante antarābhavaśarīreṇa /
upapatsyante upapattibhavaśarīreṇa /
samānā santaḥ /
bahu vata duḥkhaṃ ca tadvedanīyaṃ yasmāttathoktam /
prativarṇikādipadatrayaṃ samānārtham 		thams cad ji lta ba dang de bzhin du thams cad kyi yan lag dang thams cad ji lta ba yin pa dang de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad do /
nye bar gnas pa ni byas pa'o /
kun nas bslang ba ni nye bar bsags pa'o /
sdud pa ni rab tu 'jig pa ste /
'og gi mnar med pa nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mes zad pa'o /
'dor ba ni de mes 'jig pa na srid pa bar ma do'i lus kyis so /
skye ba ni bar ma do'i lus kyis so /
lhan cig tu zhes bya ba ni yod pa'o /
gang la sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba la de skad ces bya'o /
gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i tshig gsum ni don mthun no /
'lābhasatkāraṃ tebhya eva /
yadartha te dṛśyeraṇ (dūṣyeran) /
tatkasya hetoriti /
tatteṣāmadarśanādikaṃ kuta ityarthaḥ /
kasambakaṃ pūtipūrṇam /
tadatyaktamanyānyapi parṇāni nāśayati 		de dag las gang gi don du rnyed pa dang bkur sti byin pa'o /
de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni de dag la mi lta ba de gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to /
lo 'dab sham pa ka zhes bya ba yongs su smin pa na /
des rig pa'i lo ma rnams kyang nyams par byed do /
jātirjātam /
kasambakavajjātameṣāmiti kasambakajātāḥ /
kṛṣṇā tṛṇaviśeṣaḥ 		rang bzhin ni skye ba'o /
gang la sham pa ka lta bu'i rang bzhin yod pa ni sham pa ka lta bu'i rang bzhin can no /
nag po ni rtsva'i khyad par ro /
prākṛtabhāṣayā kaṇḍā tha mal pa'i skad du ni kana na zhes bya'o /
sāpi kṣetrādanapanītā kṣetraṃ nāśayati de yang zhing las ma bsal na ni zhing rlag par byed do /
nirjātirniṣpattiḥ /
kṛṣṇāvannirjātireṣāmiti kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ 		rang bzhin can ni grub pa'o /
de dag la nag po dang 'dra ba yod pas na nag po'i rang bzhin can no /
kṛṣṇo hi kṛṣṇasarpaḥ saviṣaḥ saṃśrṛ(sṛ)ṣṭān daṣṭo saviṣīkaroti /
anayeneti tebhyaḥ śrutaśraddhādināmārgeṇa 		sbrul nag po ni sbrul nag po ste dug dang bcas pa'o /
des reg pa dang bltas pa tsam gyis gsod pa'o /
tshul ma yin pas zhes bya ba ni dad pa dang mnyan pa la sogs pa'i lam ma yin pas so /
vyasanaṃ nirayādiduḥkham brlag pa ni dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal lo /
āgāḍhamābādhamiti mahatīṃ pīḍām mi bzad pa dang nad ces bya ba ni chen po dang nad do /
nigacchet spṛśediti prāpnuyādityarthaḥ /
ālokaḥ prakṛtasya karmaṇo vipākajñānam 		'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni reg pa'o /
reg pa ni thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
snang ba ni skabs kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa'o /
śuklāṃśaḥ kuśalabhāgaḥ dkar po'i skal ba can ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cha'o /
tadyogāt śuklāṃśikaḥ de dang ldan pa ni dkar po'i skal ba can no /
samavadhānaṃ yogaḥ /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti dharmavyasanam 		phrad pa ni ldan pa'o /
lhag ma ni rtogs par sla ste de ni chos kyis phongs pa'o /
evamukta ityādi /
atra mārādhiṣṭhita ityādinā mārādhiṣṭhānamuktam 		de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de'i phyir bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gsungs so /
gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvanadhimuktisteṣu śraddhāprasādābhāvenoktā /
punaraparamityādinā caturo hetūnāha /
ātmotkarṣī parapaṃsako doṣāntaraprekṣītyeko rāśiḥ /
ata evāha /
ebhirapi caturbhirityādi /
tadatra dharmavyasanahetavaḥ ṣaḍuktāḥ /
śāstre tu saṃkṣepataścatvāraḥ /
śeṣāṇāṃ skandhādyabhiniveśe 'ntarbhāvāt /
ātmotkarṣaṇādināṃ skandhādyabhiniveśe 		chos zab mo dag la ma mos pa ni de dag la dad pa med par bstan to /
gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyu rnam pa bzhi gsungs te /
bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la smod pa dang nyes ba'i klan ka tshol ba tshogs gcig tu byas te /
de nyed kyi phyir rnam pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de la phongs pa'i rgyu ni drug tu gsungs pa las bstan bcos las ni mdor bsdus nas bzhir bstan te /
lhag ma ni phung po la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro /
nirhāraparivarto 'yaṃ saptāṅgasya nirhārasya dyotanāt 'di ni sgrub pa'i le'u yin te sgrub pa'i yan lag bdun ston par byed pa'i phyir ro /
tathāpi nirayagranthasya bahutvānnirayaparivarta ityucyate de lta mod kyi dmyal ba'i gzhung shas che ba'i phyir dmyal ba'i le'u zhes brjod do /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ saptamaḥ parivartaḥ /
(RSt_74) 		'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u bdun pa'o /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi sgrub pa'i le'u bdun pa bstan nas /
8. viśuddhiparivarto nāmāṣṭamaḥ /
lokottarasya bhāvanāmārgasya nirhāraḥ saptamaparivartenoktaḥ /
śuddhiraṣṭamasyādau vaktavyā /
tasyāḥ śuddherduradhimocatāṃ tāvadāha /
atha khalvityādinā /
anarthikeneti mandacchandena /
upastabdho vismitaḥ /
aśuśrūṣaṇā-aparipacchakajātīyeneti kalyāṇamitreṣu subhūteḥ praśnaḥ /
kiyadagambhīretyādi /
kiyatā gambhīrā yato duradhimocetyarthaḥ 		brgyad pa dag la bshad par bya ste /
de'i dag pa ni re zhig de'i dag pa shin tu mos par dka' ba de ni /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mos pa dman pa'o /
nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba ni gegs byas pa'o /
srid zhu chung ba dang mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la'o /
rab 'byor gyis zhus pa ni bcom ldan 'das ae ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
ji tsam du zab pa /
zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir mos par dka' pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
bhagavata uttaraṃ rūpaṃ subhūta ityādinā rab 'byor gzugs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan /
rūpādayo rūpādīnāṃ ca pūrvāparamadhyāntā abaddhā amuktāḥ svabhāvenādhvatrayeṇa ca niḥsvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ rab 'byor gzugs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon dang phyi ma dang da ltar byung ba'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
yang na rang bzhin gyis dus gsum du ngo bo nyid med ces bya ba'i don to /
paramaduradhimoceti paramagambhīratvāditi bhāvaḥ /
prākpravṛtto hi bandhaḥ prāgaśuddhiḥ paścāttannivṛttilakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ śuddhiriti prasiddham 		shin tu mos par dka'o zhes bya ba ni shin tu zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so /
sngar 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir 'ching pa ste /
snga ma dag go /
phyis de log pa'i mtshan nyid ni thar pa'o; /
dag pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu grags pa'o /
iha tu bandhamokṣayoratyantābhāvaḥ śuddhiriti paramagambhīraṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ śāstre- 'dir ni 'ching ba dang grol ba dag gtan du med de /
dag pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu zab pa'o /
shin tu rnam par dag pa ni bstan bcos las /
[58] phalaśuddhiśca rūpādiśuddhireva tayordvayoḥ 'bras bu dag pa gzugs la sogs /
dag pa nyid de gang gi phyir /
de gnyis tha dad ma yin zhing; /
abhinnācchinnatā yasmāditi śuddhirudiritā /
'phalaśuddhiḥ' sādhyā /
sā ca 'rūpādiśuddhireva' 		gcad du med pas dag par brjod /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
'bras bu rnam par dag pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ste /
de yang gzugs la sogs pa'i dag pa nyid do /
yasmāt 'tayoḥ' 'abhinnācchinnatā' 'iti śuddhirudīritā' gang gi phyir de gnyis tha mi dad cing gcad du med pa ni dag pa zhes brjod do /
dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mdo las gsungs te /
śuddherlakṣaṇamuktaṃ sutre /
katamasyāḥ śuddheḥ? yasyāduradhimocatvamuktam /
tatkasya hetorityādi /
tadasyā duradhimocatvaṃ kuta ityarthaḥ /
uttaraṃ yetyādinā /
yata idaṃ tasyā lakṣaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
advayaṃ tādātmyāt /
advaidhīkāramavyabhicārāt /
anayoreva nirdeśo abhinnamacchinnamiti /
yetyanuvādaḥ seti vidhiḥ 		dag pa yang gang zhe na /
gang la mos par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid mdo las gsungs pa la /
de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
de la 'di'i mos par dka' ba nyid ga las shes zhes bya ba'i don to /
rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan te /
'di lta ste /
'di ni de'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar dgongs so /
de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med pa'o /
'khrul pa med pa'i phyir gnyis su byar med pa'o /
'di nyid kyis ni tha dad pa ma yin zhing gcad du med pa bstan to /
gang zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o /
anūdyamānaśca dharmo vidhīyamāne niyata iti khyāpitaḥ /
ataḥ sāmānyādhikaraṇādabhinnamubhayam /
anyonyaniyamādanyonyāvyabhicāraḥ /
tasmādacchinnamubhayam /
tadevaṃ yaiva skandhānāmekaśo viśuddhiḥ saiva phalaviśuddhiḥ 		de zhes bya ba ni bya ba'o /
brjod pa ni chos yin la bya ba ni nges ba yin no zhes brjod do /
des na gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir de gnyis tha mi dad pa'o /
gcig la gcig nges pa'i phyir phan tshun 'khrul pa med de de'i phyir de gnyis mchod pa'o /
de'i phyir de ltar gang phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa de nyid 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o /
yaiva phalaviśuddhiḥ saivetarā 'bras bu rnam par dag pa de nyid phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o /
anyonyāvyabhicārāt /
anyonyaliṅgatā /
sa cāvyabhicārastādātmyāt /
ata āha 		phan tshun 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir gcig la gcig rtags su gyur pa yin no /
'khrul pa med pa de yang de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir rab 'byor de ltar zes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
phalaviśuddhita ityādi punaraparamityataḥ prāk iti viśuddhilakṣaṇam gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba yan chad kyis rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs so /
viśuddhibhedāśvatvāro mahatyorbhagavatyoruktāḥ sarvasaṃgrahārtham /
asyāṃ tu noktā bodhisattvamārgādhikārāt 		bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo las thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir /
rnam par dag pa bzhi'i dbye ba gsungs la byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir 'dir ni ma gsungs so /
mārgasya viśuddhirucyate lam gyi rnam par dag pa brjod par bya ste /
sa ca bhūmau bhūmau navavidho mṛdumṛdvādibhedādadhimātrādhimātrādibhedāt /
navavidhasyaiva doṣasya pratipakṣeṇa (RSt_75) bhūmayastu śuddhestāścaiva nava /
kāmadhāturaṣṭau ca rūpārūpyāḥ /
ataḥ śāstram- 		de yang sa dang sa nas nyes pa chen po'i chen po la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dgu dang gnyen po chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dgu nyid kyis sa rnam par dag par byed pa ste de yang dgu nyid de /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa brgyad dang 'dod pa'i khams so /
de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
[59] mṛdumṛdvādiko mārgaḥ śuddhirnavasu bhūmiṣu /
abhimātrādhimātradermalasya pratipakṣataḥ /
ato navavidhaṃ mārgamāha /
punaraparamityādinā atyantānupapattirityataḥ prāk /
sarvajñateti sarvākārajñatā /
tasyā viśuddhirdvividhā /
yā skandhānāmekaśo viśuddhiḥ pāramitānāṃ ca sā sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ /
yā ca tasyāḥ sā teṣāmityekā sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ /
adhyātmaśūnyatādīnāṃ skandhādīnāṃ ca yāvadāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇamekaśo yā viśuddhiryā ca prajñāpāramitāyā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sarvametadabhinnamacchinnamiti dvitīyā sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ /
tadasyāṃ na paṭhyate upalakṣaṇatvāttadgrāhyam /
iti mṛdumṛdumārgo mṛdumadhyaśca 		sa dgu pa ni chen po yi /
chen po la sogs dri ma yi /
gnyen po'i sgo nas chung ngu yi /
chung ngu la sogs lam yin no /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de'i lam rnam pa dgu pa gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
shin tu skye ba ma mchis pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do /
de'i rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
phung po la sogs pa so sor rnam par dag pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ste /
de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o /
gang yang de ni de dag gi ste gcig go /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa dang phung po la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang so sor rnam par dag pa dang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di thams cad ni tha mi dad de ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o /
gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'dir ma bstan kyang nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir de ni gzung bar bya'o /
de ni lam chung ngu'i chung ngu dang chung ngu'i 'bring ngo /
atha khalvityādi /
itaḥ prabhṛti prajñāpāramiteti prajñāpāramitāviśuddhirityarthaḥ 		de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
de nas bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ji snyed smos pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
sā gambhīrā duravagāhā sarvadharmāṇāṃ viśuddhatvādatyantaśūnyatvāditi mṛdvadhimārgaḥ de zab pa ni rtogs par dka' ba ste chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir dang shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ni lam chung ngu'i chen po'o /
sāvabhāsakarī tamopahā viśuddhatvātsarvadharmāṇāmiti madhyamṛdumārgaḥ bsal bar bgyid pa ni mun pa sel ba ste chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro /
de ni lam 'bring gi chung ngu'o /
sā āloko darśanaṃ viśuddhatvāditi madhyamadhyo mārgaḥ de snang ba ni mthong ba ste rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ni lam 'bring gi 'bring ngo /
sā apratisandhirasaṃkrāntirbhavāntare viśuddhatvāditi madhyādhimātro mārgaḥ de mtshams sbyar ba ma mchis pa ni srid pa bar ma dor 'pho ba med pa ste /
rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de dag ni lam 'bring gi chen po'o /
sā asaṃkleśo viśuddhitvāt prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvātsarvadharmāṇāmityadhimātramṛdumārgaḥ de kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro /
chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o /
de ni lam chen po'i chung ngu'o /
sā aprāptiranabhisamayo viśuddhatvāt sarvadharmāṇāmaprāpteranabhisamayāccetyadhimātramadhyo mārgaḥ de thob pha ma mchis pa dang mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir /
chos thams cad thob pa med pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med pa nyid do /
sā anabhinirvṛttirviśuddhatvāt anabhinirvṛttatvāt sarvadharmāṇāmityadhimātrādhimātro mārgaḥ /
āha /
atyantānupapattirityādikamāmārgajñatāparisamāpteḥ /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[61] tridhātupratipakṣatvaṃ samatā mānameyayoḥ /
mārgaḥ sa ceṣyate tasya codyasya parihārataḥ /
(RSt_76) /
tasyāṃ 'tridhātupratipakṣatvaṃ' yadāha /
atyantānupapattiḥ prajñāpāramitā /
kāmadhātvādiṣu viśuddhatvāt /
kāmadhātvādiṣvabhāvānupapatteḥ iti tridhātupratipakṣatvam 		'di ni lam chen po'i 'bring ngo; /
de mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ni rnam par dag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir /
chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa nyid do /
de ni lam chen po'i chen po'o /
sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa zhes bya ba nas shin tu skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ni lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ston te /
'dir bstan bcos las /
khams gsum pa yi gnyen po nyid /
gzhal dang gzhal bya mnyam nyid dang /
klan ka yongs su spangs pa yis /
lam ni de yi gnyen por 'dod /
des bya ba gsungs te /
de ni khams gsum gyi gnyen po nyid de /
gang shin tu skye ba ma mchis pa'o zhes gsungs pa la /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la sogs par rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod khams pa ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med de khams gsum pa'i gnyen po'o /
atra ca 'samatā mānameyayoḥ' /
yadāha /
āhetyādi /
na jāna tīti na gṛṇhāti /
na saṃjānīta iti na vikalpayati /
sphuṭīkartu praśnaḥ kiṃ punarityādi /
uttaraṃ rūpamityādi /
viśuddhatyādityatyantasamatvāt /
tadevaṃ yathā syājjñeyaṃ grāhyaṃ na bhavati tathaiṣāpi tasya grāhikā na bhavatīti jñeyamānasamatā /
yoyaṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇo bhāvanāmārga ukto na sa yuktaḥ 		'dir yang sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
ma 'tshal zhes bya ba ni mi 'dzin pa'o /
yang dag par ma 'tshal zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o /
de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhus so /
gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni lan no /
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shin tu med pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar shes par bya ba de nyid 'dzin pa po ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di yang de'i 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te de bas na shes bya dang shes pa mnyam pa nyid do /
gang rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid 'di na bsgom pa'i lam du rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
yato 'sminnaṣṭau doṣā ityata āha /
'mārgaḥ sa ceṣyate tasya codyasya parihārataḥ /
' cakāro 'vadhāraṇe /
bhinnakramaśca /
codyasyeti jātāvekavacanam /
bhāvanāmārga eva sa iṣyate tadīyacodyānāmita ūrdhvaṃ parihārādityarthaḥ 		gang gi phyir 'di la skyon brgyad du rtogs pa de'i phyir /
klan ka yongs su spangs pa yis /
lam ni de yi gnyen por 'dod /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
de ni zhes bya ba kyis dgos pa di ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs la ltos ka zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi dbang du byas nas gcig gi tshig go /
bsgom pa'i lam kho na de'i gnyen por 'dod de /
'di man chad ni rgol ba ni rnams kyi lan zhes bya ba'i don to /
atra ca siddhānta eva kākvā kuta etaditi hetusāpekṣāścodyasūcanādyāni /
siddhāntahetavaḥ parihārāḥ /
tatra dve codye śāriputrasya ṣaṭ subhūteḥ /
nāpakāraṃ karoti na copakāramiti siddhāntaḥ 		'dir yang grub pa'i mtha' pa nyid kyis dgos pa di ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs la ltos pa dang bcas pas rgol ba ston pa ni klan ka'o /
grub pa'i mtha' pa'i gtan tshigs ni lan no /
de la gnyis ni sh'a ri'i bu'i dri ba'o /
drug pa ni rab 'byor gyi'o /
lan brgyad ni bcom ldan 'das kyi'o /
gnod par yang mi bgyid phan par yang mi bgyid ces bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o /
sa kutaḥ? yadi hyakiṃcitkarī kathaṃ sā mārga iti codyam /
viśuddhitvāditi parihāraḥ 		de ci'i phyir zhe na /
gal te ci yang mi byed na ji ltar lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lan no /
sarvajñatā hi dharmadhātuviśuddhiḥ sa ca viśuddhaḥ prakṛtiśuddhaḥ /
tataḥ sā asyākiñcitkarī /
kevalamāgantukāvaraṇakṣayaṃ [prati] vyāpriyate 		thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par dag pa ste /
de rnam par dag pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o /
de'i phyir 'di la cung zad kyang mi byed pa ste /
glo bur gyi sgrib pa zad par byed pa kho na'o /
na gṛṇhāti na tyajatīti siddhāntaḥ /
sa kutaḥ? yadi hyasau gṛṇhāti vikalpaḥ syāt 		yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang yongs su mi gtong ba grub pa'i mtha'o /
de ga las shes she na /
gal te yongs su 'dzin na ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
atha na gṝṇhāti prajñaiva na syāditi codyam ji ltar mi 'dzin na ni shes rab nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dri ba'o /
viśuddhatvādi parihāraḥ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lan no /
yathā hi yata evāsau dharmān dharmalakṣaṇairna paśyatyata eva dharmatayā paśyati /
ata eva viśuddhaḥ /
viśuddhatvāt na gṛṇhāti na ca tyajatīti /
skandhaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhiścoktā /
sā ca teṣāṃ viśuddhirātmaviśuddhyā 		de ltar na gang gi phyir chos de nyid chos kyi mtshan nyid du mi mthong ba des na de nyid chos nyid mthong ba yin no /
de nyid rnam par dag pa ste rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'dzin mi gtong ba yin te de bas na phung po rnam par dag pa dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa zhes gsungs so; /
de dag gi rnam par dag pa de yang bdag rnam par dag pa ste /
yathā hyātmano viśuddhiratyantamasattā tathā teṣāmapīti siddhāntaḥ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa ni gtan du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ltar de rnams kyi yod pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
de ga las shes she na /
sa kutaḥ? yadi hi skandhaphalasarvajñatānāmatyantamasattā tadaitā(te)na kiñciditi codyam gal te phung po dang 'bras bu dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnams shin tu med na ni de bas 'di cung zad med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
atyantaviśuddhitvāditi parihāraḥ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lan te /
atyantamasanta eva dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaiḥ /
ata eva tacchūnyatālakṣaṇayā dharmatayā santītyarthaḥ 		rang gi mtshan nyid shin tu med pa kho na'i chos stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid 'di kho na yod do zhes bya ba'i don to /
bdag rnam par dag pas thob pa yang ma mchis /
ātmaviśuddhito na prāptirnābhisamaya iti siddhāntaḥ mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o /
codyaṃ purvavat /
atyantaviśuddhatvāditi parihāraḥ /
yata eva dharmalakṣaṇairdharmā atyantamasantaḥ tata eva dharmatayā santaḥ 		dris pa ni snga ma bzhin no /
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lan no /
gang gi phyir chos kho na'i mtshan nyid kyi chos ni med de de nyid kyi chos nyid ni yod do /
sā ca prakṛtyaiva śuddhā tacchuddhireva ca sarvajñateti na tasyāḥ prāptirnābhisamaya ityarthaḥ de yang rang bzhin kho nas rnam par dag pa ste /
de rnam par dag pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do /
de'i phyir thob pa yang med /
ātmāparyantatayā rūpavedanā dīnāmaparyantateti siddhāntaḥ /
sa kutaḥ 		mngon par rtogs pa yang med ces bya ba'i don to /
bdag mu ma mchis pas gzugs la sogs pa mu ma mchis par zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o /
dṛśyate (RSt_77) hi skandhādīnāṃ paryantastatkathamaparyantā iti codyam /
atyantaviśuddhatvāditi parihāraḥ 		de ga las shes shing mthong ste phung po ji ltar yod /
gal te chos nyid du yod do zhe na /
de ni shin tu rgol ba'o /
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lan te /
yathā hyātmano 'tyantamasattā tathā rūpādīnāmapi svalakṣaṇaiḥ /
tato 'satāṃ teṣāṃ kaḥ paryantaḥ? dharmatayā santīti cet .............paryantaḥ 		ji ltar bdag shin tu med pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med na de rnams kyi mu ji ltar yod /
gal te chos nyid du yod do zhe na /
sarvadharmasāmānyalakṣaṇatvāt rūpādikasya /
na, bhedasyāparamārthatvāt /
tasmādyaiva rūpādiviśuddhiḥ saiva phalaviśuddhiḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiścetyarthaḥ 		de ni shin tu yang mu med de chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro /
gzugs la sogs pa'i bye brag ni don dam pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa de nyid 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
ya evamatyantāsattayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ avabodhaḥ sa prajñāpāramiteti siddhāntaḥ /
sa kutaḥ?....................bodho na tarhi sātyantaviśuddhiriti codyam /
atyantaviśuddhitvāditi parihāraḥ /
evaṃ samāptā aṣṭāvatyantabhāvanāmārgamārgajñatādhikārāḥ /
prathamaparivartena sarvākārajñatoktā /
ito 'rdhasaptamaiḥ parivartairmārjñatā /
aṣṭamanavamayoḥ parivartayorardhābhyāṃ sarvajñatā vaktavyā /
tasya aṣṭau vastūni /
yathoktaṃ prāk /
[61] prajñayā na bhave sthānaṃ kṛpayā na śame sthitiḥ /
anupāyena dūratvamupāyenāvidūratā /
[62] vipakṣapratipakṣau ca prayogaḥ samatāsya ca /
dṛṅmārgaḥ śrāvakādīnāmiti sarvajñateṣyate /
iti /
atra śāstram- /
[63] nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā /
adhvanāṃ samatāyogātprajñāpāramitā matā /
'prajñāpāramitā' iti sarvajñatā /
'nāpare tīre ' iti saṃsāre /
'na pare tīre ' iti nirvāṇe /
nāpi tayorantarāle sthitā' /
trayaṃ nopalabhyata ityarthaḥ /
kuta ityāha /
'adhvānāṃ samatāyogād' iti /
dharmatayāpyadhvasamatvāt /
dharmāṇāṃ ca yathālakṣaṇamanupalambhat /
etadāha /
āyuṣmān ityādinā /
seti samādhānaṃ pūrvamuktatvāt /
iyamiti sarvajñatākhyena viśeṣeṇa vaktavyatvāt /
ata evāha /
viprakṛteti /
viśeṣeṇa prakṛtatvāt vartamānatvādvā /
athavā kuto na sthitā? yato viprakṛtā trayānupalambhena bādhitā /
bhagavān hetumāha /
atyantaviśuddhatvāditi /
svairlakṣaṇairasatāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatālakṣaṇena nityaviśuddhatvādityarthaḥ /
śrāvakāstu (RSt_78) svaduḥkhakṣayamātraiṣiṇaḥ saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tenātyantamudvignā nirvāṇaṃ parikalpya tasminnatīvotkaṇṭhitā laghu ladhveva parinirvānti /
naivaṃ bodhisatvāḥ, sarvasattvārthaṃ niruttarabodhikāmā iti saṃsāranirvāṇāpratiṣṭhatā /
śāstram- /
[64] anupāyena dūraṃ sā sanimittopalambhataḥ /
'sanimittaṃ upalambho 'nupāyaḥ' /
tena sā dūrībhavati /
tadāha /
āyuṣmānityādi /
evamapīti nāmatopi nimittatopi /
riñciṣyati tyakṣyati nāmataḥ /
dūrīkariṣyati nimittataḥ /
iti dūrībhāvaḥ /
upāyakauśalenāsyāḥ samyagāsannatoditā /
niḥsaṅgā vṛttiḥ samyagupāyakauśalam /
tenāsannībhavati /
tadāha /
evamukta ityādinā /
saṅgaḥ saktirabhūtaparikalpaḥ /
sā nāmato syānnimittatopi /
tayorapi bhūte 'rthe 'bhāvāt /
ākhyātā ṣoḍaśabhirdṛṣṭimārgalakṣaṇaiḥ /
sunirdiṣṭā dvādaśabhiḥ prayogaiḥ /
supariniṣṭhitā saṃsāranirvāṇayorapratiṣṭhānāt /
supariśuddhā saṅgakoṭīnāṃ vivarjanāt /
yatra hīti vākyālaṅkāre /
nāmetyāścarye /
imepi saṅgā iti saṅgāpi vakṣyamāṇāḥ /
ataḥ saṅgavarjanamupāyakauśalamityā sannībhāvatā /
te punaḥ saṅgāḥ sāmānyenoktāḥ /
viśeṣato vaktavyāḥ /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[65] rūpādiskandhaśūnyatve dharmeṣu tryadhvageṣu ca /
dānādau bodhipakṣeṣu caryā saṃjñā vipakṣatā /
rūpādīnāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ skandho rāśiḥ /
tasya śūnyatāyāṃ traiyadhvike paradharmesu pāramitā bodhipakṣyaviṣayāyāṃ ca caryāyāṃ yā 'saṃjñā' nāmato nimittato vā sā 'vipakṣatā' /
svārthe tal devatāvat /
sa vipakṣaḥ sa saṅga ityarthaḥ /
etadāha /
atha khalvityādinā /
asyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ 'caryāsaṃjñā' na paṭhyate /
sā paṭhitānāmupalakṣaṇatvānnocyate /
dānapāramitāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni yāvadāryāṣṭaṅgamārga carāmīti sañjānīte saṅga iti /
asyāmadhikasaṅgamāha /
iyantamityādinā /
ye saṅgāsta uktāḥ /
yathā te saṅgāstannoktam /
tataḥ śakrasya praśno 'tha khalvityādinā /
paryāyeṇeti prakāreṇa /
idaṃ tu prathamaṃ bodhicittamiti /
eṣa vikalpaḥ prathamaḥ saṅgaḥ /
bodhau pariṇāmayāmīti /
(RSt_79) evaṃ vikalpya pariṇāmanā dvitīyaḥ /
kathamimau saṅgau? tasya cittasyātītatvenāsattvāt /
bodheścānāgatatvena /
cittaprakṛtiḥ sadāstīti cedāha /
na cetyādi /
na śakyā iti nityasya pariṇāmāyogāt /
tasmādubhau vikalpau /
abhūtakalpanāt /
śeṣāstu yathā saṅgāstathā purvamevoktam /
saṅgāḥ teṣāṃ varjanamarvāguktaṃ bhavati /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[66] dānādiṣvanahaṅkāraḥ pareṣāṃ tanniyojanam /
saṅgaḥ koṭī niṣedho 'yaṃ /
