kāmacchando vyāpādastyānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti /
ebhirasaṃvāso 'samanvāgamaḥ /
tamāha /
alpastyānamiddhaśca bhavatītyupalakṣaṇatvāt /
iti pañcabhirnivaraṇaisaṃvāso 'ṣṭamaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
sarva yathā bhavati tathānuśayasya dveṣānubandhasya hānaṃ 'sarvānuśayahāanam' /
tadāha niranuśayaśca bhavatīti /
navamaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
'smṛtisaṃprajñatā' itismṛtisahitaṃ saṃprajanyam /
tadāha sobhikrāmanvetyādinā /
abhikramo gamanam /
apratikrama āgamanam /
bhrāntaṃ vikṣiptam /
na vilambitamiti vilambe vikṣepāt /
sahaseti asamīkṣya bhūmim /
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitaccaṃkramasthānaniṣadyāśayaneṣu vikṣepasyeti smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ daśamaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
(RSt_111) /
tasya khalvityādi yānītyataḥ prāk /
yūkāyogād yūkilaḥ /
picchāditvādilac /
caukṣaḥ śuciḥ /
ābādhaḥ pīḍā /
ādīnava upadrava iti 'śucicīvarāditā' ekādaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
yānītyādi subhūtirāhetyataḥ prāk /
sambhavanti jāyante kāyasya bhakṣaṇāya /
abhyudgatānīti prativiśiṣṭāni /
iti 'śarīre kri(kṛ)mīṇāmasamubhdavo ' dvādaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
subhūtirāhetyādi punaraparāt prāk /
cittālpakṛtyatā alpatvādavikṣepācca /
cittasya kauṭilyaṃ kuṭilatā /
yattu svadoṣapracchādanopāyastacchāṭhyam yatparavañcanāya sa vaṅkaḥ /
paravañcanārthamabhūtasvaguṇasaṃdarśanaṃ māyā /
ebhirvirahādyathākramaṃ cittākauṭilyaṃ cittāśāṭhyatā cittāvaṅkatā cittāmāyāvitā ca /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti 'cittakauṭilyaṃ' trayodaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
punaraparamityādi /
atra lābhādigurūkatāpratiṣedhena dhutagrahotpyupalabhyate /
iti 'dhutaguṇasamādanaṃ' caturdaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
nerṣyāmātmasaryabahulo bhavatīti mātsaryagrahaṇena ṣaṭpāramitāvipakṣā upalakṣyante /
iti 'amatsarāditā' pañcadaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
na ca gambhīreṣvityādi punaraparāt prāk /
saṃsyandanaṃ saṃyojanam /
dharmatayā yuktaṃ sarvamavagacchatīti 'dharmatāyuktagāmitvaṃ' ṣoḍaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
punaraparamityādi dhārayitavyāntaram /
pratideśayetyeayamatyayato deśaya /
pratiniḥsajeti pratiniyamenātyantikatvena parityaja /
evamiti bodhicittatyāge sati /
evamapīti /
īdṛśepi māyeṇoktai /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti lokānāmartho 'smāditi 'lokārthaṃ narakaiṣaṇā' narakasvīkāraḥ /
saptadaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
punaraparādi dhārayitavyāntam /
yacchrutaṃ prajñāpāramitādi tatpratideśaya pratyācakṣva /
yad gṛhītaṃ badhicittapāramitācaryādi tatparityaja /
abhūtavicitravādī kaviḥ /
tasya karma kāvyam /
avinivartanīyasya dhātuḥ prakṛtiḥ /
apratyudāvartanīyadharmeti pareṇa sambadhyate /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti 'parairaneyatā' 'ṣṭādaśaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
punaraparādi dhārayitavyāntam /
saṃsāre cāriketyādinā bodhisattvamārgaṃ dūṣayati /
ihaiva tvamityādinā śrāvakādimārgaṃ grāhayati /
abhinirvṛtta iti kṣīṇāyuḥ /
vāśabdo vikalpe /
ihaivetyādikaṃ vā vakṣyati /
(RSt_112) aho vatetyādikaṃ vā /
cittaṃ na kupyati na calatīti mārabhāṣitasya hīnamārgasya mārabhāṣitatvena jñānāt /
ata idaṃ mārasyānyamārgopadeśino 'māra ityavabodhaḥ' ūnaviṃśatitamaṃ teṣu talliṅgam /
sā cedityādi dhārayitavyāntam /
viveko mahāyānatyāgaḥ /
tadarthāni vacanāni vivekapadāni /
tāni parato mārāditaḥ śrutvā cittaṃ na parihīyate iti sambandhaḥ /
na calatītyarthaḥ /
kuta ityāha /
dharmatāyā iti dharma eva dharmatā mahāyānacaryā tataḥ /
na pratyudāvartata iti na vimukhībhavati /
nānyathābhāva iti na viparyayaḥ /
na hīnayāne bahumāna ityarthaḥ /
tānīti vivekapadāni /
caśabdo hetau /
yasmānmārakarmāṇi jānāti /
asthānamiti pareṇa sambadhyate /
tatheti yathā buddhānuvarṇitam /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti 'caryābuddhānumoditā' viṃśatitama teṣu talliṅgam /
ūṣmāmūrdhasu sa kṣāntiṣvagradharmeṣvavasthitaḥ /
liṅgairamībhirviśatyā sambodherna vivartate /
ayamupasaṃhāraḥ /
ūṣmādiṣu nirvedhabhāgīyeṣu sthite ya ebhirviśatyā liṅgairlakṣitaḥ sa sambodherna nivartate /
so 'vinivartanīya ityarthaḥ /
darśanamārge sthitamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[105] kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ ṣaṭ ca pañca pañca ca dṛkpathe /
bodhisattvasya vijñeyamavaivartikalakṣaṇam /
darśanamārge sthitasya bodhisattvasyāvaivartikaṃ liṅgaṃ veditavyam /
kiṃ tat? 'kṣāntijñānalakṣaṇāḥ' kṣāntikṣaṇāḥ jñānakṣaṇāśca /
'ṣaṭ ca pañca pañca ca' iti ṣoḍaśetyarthaḥ /
katame ṣoḍaśa? /
[106] rūpādisaṃjñāvyāvattirdāḍhrya cittasya hīnayoḥ /
yānayorvinivṛttiśca dhyānādyaṅgaparikṣayaḥ /
[107] kāyacetolaghutvaṃ ca kāmasevābhyupāyikī /
sadaiva brahmacāritvamājīvasya viśuddhatā /
[108] skandhādāvantarāyeṣu sambhāre sendriyādike /
samare matsarādau ca neti yogānuyogayoḥ /
[109] vihāre pratiṣedhaśca dharmasyāṇoralabdhatā /
niścitattvaṃ svabhūmau ca bhūmitritayasaṃsthitiḥ /
(RSt_113) /
[110] dharmārthaṃ jīvitatyāga ityamī ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇāḥ /
avaivartikaliṅgāni dṛṅmārgasthasya dhīmataḥ /
tatrādyamāha /
punaraparamityādinā dhārayitavyāntena /
abhisaṃskarotīti utpādayatītyarthaḥ /
tamapi dharmamiti rūpādikaṃ nopalabhata ityādi /
atra upalambha evābhisaṃskāraḥ /
sa evotpādanam /
anutpādajñāne kṣāntirasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
iti 'rūpādisaṃjñāvyāvṛttiḥ' duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge prathamaṃ talliṅgam /
punaraparamityādi dhārayitavyāntam /
vicchankyisyatīti vigatacchandaṃ kariṣyati /
ājñāsyati lokottareṇa jñānena /
vihanyase kliṣyase /
vivecanatā bodhicittatyājanam /
tatreti samyaksambodhau /
dṛḍhacittena iti samyaksambodhau 'cittadārḍhyaya' duḥkhe dharmajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge dvitīyaṃ talliṅgam /
punaraparādi bhavatyantam /
iti 'hīnayānavinivṛttiḥ' duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣānti /
sā dṛṅmārge tṛtīyaṃ liṅgam /
sa ākāṅkṣannityādi veditavyāntam /
iti 'dhyānādīnāmaṅgaparikṣayaḥ' kāmotpattivibandhe daurbalyaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge caturthaṃ talliṅgam /
punaraparādi sa cedityataḥ prāk /
atra na nāmaguruka ityādikaṃ 'cetolaghutvam' /
so 'bhikrāmanvetyādikaṃ 'kāyalaghutvam' /
tadubhayaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge pañcamaṃ talliṅgam /
sa cedityādi prāganarthikāt /
yathoktaiva saṃjñābhyupāyaḥ tena nirvṛttā 'kāmasevābhyupāyikī' /
sā samudaye dharmajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge ṣaṣṭhaṃ tallīṅgam /
anarthikā eva cetyādi dhārayitavyāntam /
atyarthaṃ saumanasyajananāt priyarūpaiḥ /
atyarthaṃ sukhajananāt sātarūpaiḥ /
praśaṃsāyāṃ rūpap vā /
anarthikā eveti nityamanarthikāḥ /
na samaviṣameṇeti na yuktāyuktena /
kathamityāha /
dharmeṇaivetyādi /
apamardanaṃ pīḍā /
pañcabhirmokṣabhāgīyaiścaturbhirnirvedhabhāgīyaiḥ saptabhiśca darśanakṣaṇairyogāt satpuruṣairityādini ṣoḍaśapadāni /
iti 'sadaiva brahmacāritvaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge saptamaṃ talliṅgam /
punaraparādi dhārayitavyāntam /
mantrajātirmantrāviśeṣaḥ grahadevatāyāḥ /
auṣadhiḥ pā(pha)lapākāntā /
strīdevatāyā mantro vidyā /
(RSt_114) bhaiṣajyamauṣadham /
ādiśabdena yantramantrādiparigrahaḥ /
vigrahaḥ kāyena kalaho vivādastu vācā /
iti 'ājīvapariśuddhiḥ' samudaye 'nvayajñānam /
dṛṅmārge 'ṣṭamaṃ tāliṅgam /
navamāt prabhṛti pañcakṣaṇānadhikṛtya śāstram- /
'skandhādāvantarāyeṣu sambhāre sendriyādike /
samare matsarādau ca neti yogānuyogayoḥ /
vihāre pratiṣedhaśca' /
iti /
'yogaḥ' sābhiniveśā vṛttiḥ /
'anuyogo ' nirabhiniveśā vṛttiḥ /
tābhyāṃ vihārastayorvihārastadvānsamādhiḥ /
tasya 'pratiṣedhaḥ' /
'neti' iti naño sambandhādityarthaḥ /
sa punarvihāraḥ 'skandhādau' prathamaḥ /
'antarāyeṣu' dvitīyaḥ /
'sambhāre ' tṛtīyaḥ /
'sendriyādike samare ' caturthaḥ /
'matsarādau' pañcamaḥ /
tatra caturaṃ tāvadāha punaraparamityādinā na ca te kalahetyataḥ prāk /
na te skandhāyatanetyādi /
yogāścānuyogaśca yogānuyogaṃ tadanuiyuktāstena saha yuktāḥ /
sahārthe 'nuśabdaḥ /
na viharantīti sambandhaḥ /
atropapattirmahatyobhaṃgavatyoruktā- "tathā hi sa śūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyaciddharmasya hīnatvaṃ vā utkṛṣṭatvaṃ vā samanupaśyati" iti /
enāmasyāṃ vākyadvayenāha /
saṃkleśapakṣo niḥsāratvena saṅgaṇikārāmatāviṣayatvāt saṅgaṇikārāmatā /
saivāsattvena kathāmātratvāt kathā /
śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
utkṛṣṭatvādrājasaṃkleśanirodhaḥ /
sa eva kathā asākṣātkṛtatvena kathāmātratvāt kathā /
etāveva kathe dve /
yathāyogamuttaratrāpīti skandhādiyogānuyogavihāraviraho nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge navamaṃ talliṅgam /
pañca nivaraṇāni caurāḥ kuśaladravyaharatvāt /
śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
iti nirodhe dharmajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge daśamaṃ talliṅgam /
kuśaladharmasambhāraḥ senā /
śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge ekādaśaṃ talliṅgam /
tayā senayā vipakṣāṇāṃ bādhanaṃ yuddham /
śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
yuddhe sati nirodhaḥ prāpyate /
nirodho nirvāṇaṃ vimuktiḥ /
kaścāsau? dehapratiṣṭhābogapratibhāsānāṃ vijñaptīnāṃ parāvṛttiḥ /
tasmāddehādīnāmavikalpanāt na grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīkathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti /
tatra cakṣurādi pañcakaṃ (RSt_115) dehaḥ /
sa hi grāma indriyagrāmatvāt /
dehānāmādhāratvāt pratiṣṭhā nagaram /
niyatendriyagamyatvāt nigamo bhogaḥ pañcaviṣayāḥ /
janapadādayaḥ pratiṣṭhāviśeṣāḥ /
ātmātmīyavikalpakṣaye sati mokṣaḥ /
tata ātmavikalpānadhikṛtyāha /
nātmakathetyādi /
ātmīyavikalpānadhikṛtyāha /
nāmātyetyādi /
ita urdhvarūpāḥ kathāste yathāyogamātmīyavikalpā bhogavikalpāḥ pratiṣṭhāvikalpā vā veditavyāḥ /
yadi tathā tathā na viharanti kathaṃ tarhi viharantītyāha /
api nvityādi /
prajñāpāramitaiva katha pratyavekṣā /
śeṣaṃ purvavat /
sarvatra dharmatayā samatāyogānuyogamanuyuktā eva viharantītyarthaḥ /
sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairiti bodhicittapratisaṃyuktaiḥ /
yuddhendriyādikathāyogānuyogavihāraviraho nirodhe 'nvayajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge dvādaśaṃ talliṅgam /
'matsarādau ca' iti śāstram /
yadāha mahatyoḥ /
"sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caranna mātsaryakathāyogamanuyukto viharati yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna dauṣṭhulyakathāyogamanuyukto viharati" iti /
tadasyāmāha /
na ca te kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharantīti /
vipakṣatvātkalahā mātsaryādayaḥ /
pratipakṣatvātkalahā mātsaryādayaḥ /
pratipakṣatvābhdaṇḍanādayaḥ /
yadobhayeṣāṃ cetasi cārastulyabalatā ca tadā vigrahaḥ /
yadā tu pratipakṣairvipakṣā durbalīkriyante tadā vivādaḥ /
tāveva vigrahavivādau kathā vikalpatvāt /
tasyāṃ yogānuyogamanuyuktā na viharanti /
abhedaḥ samatājñānam /
bhedo nānātvavikalpaḥ /
mitrakāmāścetyādi dhārayitavyāntaṃ sugamam /
iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge trayodaśaṃ talliṅgam /
punaraparādi sa cedityataḥ prāk /
anetaitadāha /
'dharmasyāṇoralabdhatā /
niścitatvaṃ svabhūmau ca' iti /
so 'ṇumapi dharma na samanupaśyati yo vivarte, bhavān vā vivartena /
tathāpi svasyāmavinivartanīyabhūmau niḥsaṃśayo bhavati /
vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ /
saṃsīdanaṃ mandotsāhatā /
ānantaryacitteneti /
anantaryapaścāttāpena /
prativinodanaṃ sarvathātyāgaḥ /
viṣkambhaṇaṃ mandākaraṇam /
avinivartanīyacittamātmano 'vinivartanīyatvaniścayaḥ /
asaṃhāryamapratyāneyam /
ityavaivartikabhūmau 'sthiraniścayatva' mārge dharmajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge caturdaśaṃ talliṅgam /
'bhūmitritayasaṃsthitiḥ /
' mārakarma tathāgatabhāṣitasyānyathātvaṃ bhāvinī cātmanaḥ samyaksambodhiriti trīṇi sthānāni 'bhūmitritayam' /
tasmin 'saṃsthitiḥ' (RSt_116) ātyantiko niścayaḥ /
tāmāha /
sa cetkhalvityādinā dhārayitavyāntena /
ihaivetyasminneva janmani /
nāyaṃ tathāgata ityasmātpūrva iti śabdaḥ paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
tathā tannānyathetyukte 'rthādgamyate bhaviṣyatyeva me 'nuttarā samyaksambodhiriti /
buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ buddhanirmāṇam /
addheti tattvata ityarthaḥ /
iti bhūmitrayasaṃsthitimārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ /
sā dṛṅmārge pañcadaśaṃ talliṅgam /
punaraparamityādi āparivartāntāt /
ātmanaḥ parityāgo vikrayādi /
jīvitasya parityāgo maraṇam /
buddhairbhagavabhdirdeśito dharmaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti /
tameva mohapuruṣāḥ pratikṣipanti /
tasya svayaṃ paraiśca parigrahāya jīvitamapi tyajati /
sa hi buddheṣu yatpremagauravaṃ taddharme karoti /
dharmakāyāstathāgatā iti jñānāt /
ātmanaśca bhāvibuddhatvadarśanāt /
śrāvakasyāpītyupalakṣaṇam /
bodhisattvasyāpi devāderapi /
śeṣaṃ subodhamiti /
'dharmārthaṃ jīvitatyāgaḥ' mārge 'nvayajñānam /
tad dṛṅmārge ṣoḍaśaṃ talliṅgam /
'ityamī ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇāḥ /
avaivartikaliṅgāni dṛṅmārgasthasya dhīmataḥ' /
ityupasaṃhāraḥ /
avinivartanīyasya yānyākāraliṅganimittāni taddyotakaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ saptadaśaḥ parivartaḥ /
18. śūnyatāparivarto nāmāṣṭādaśaḥ /
nirvedhāṅgadṛṅmārgayoravaivartikaliṅgāni saṃkhyayā viśeṣataścoktani /
bhāvanāmārgastu gambhīraḥ /
tato tānyubhayathāpi vaktumaśakyāni /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[111] gambhīro bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
etadāha /
atha khalvityādinā pratyekabuddhairityetadantena /
āścaryaṃ bhagavannityekaṃ codyam /
kimāścaryamityata āha /
mahāguṇetyādi /
(RSt_117) mahān guṇasambhāraḥ paramagambhīratayā kalpāsaṃkhyeyadvayanirantaraprayatnalabhyatayā ca /
ata eva viśeṣato jñātumaśakyatvādapramāṇāḥ saṃkhyātumaśakyatvādaparimitāḥ /
bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti bhāvanāmārgastho 'vaivartikaḥ /
avinivartanīyeneti bhāvanāmārgasthena /
saṃkhyātikramād anantam /
paramodāratvād aparyantam /
asaṃhārya samyagagrādyaṃ samyagjñātumaśakyaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairapīti bhāvanāmārgasya gāmbhīryam /
subhūtirāhetyādi pratibalaḥ śakto nirdeṣṭum /
kintu sattvā(rvā)rtho na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
tataḥ kimityāha /
ata evetyādi /
evakāro bhinnakramaḥ /
sthānānītyataḥ pareṇa draṣṭavyaḥ /
sarvāṇi gambhīrāṇīti vīpsārthaḥ /
sthānānīti bhāvanāmārgālambanāni /
prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratisaṃyuktāni tadādhāraṇītyarthaḥ /
sūcayitavyānīti sūcyantāmityarthaḥ /
iti subhūteradhyeṣaṇā /
evamukta ityādi /
ārabhyeti /
ādau nirdiśya /
nigamayitukāma iti bhāvanārge yojayitukāmaḥ /
iti bhagavato 'bhyupagamaḥ /
atha śāstram- /
gāmbhīryaṃ śūnyatādikam /
samāropāpavādāntamuktatā sā gabhīratā /
'gambhīro bhāvanāmārgaḥ' ityuktam /
tasya 'gāmbhīryaṃ' gambhīrabhāvaḥ /
yataḥ sa gambhīro bhavati tacca śūnyatānimittādikam /
mārgasya gambhīryamālambanagāmbhīryāditi bhāvaḥ /
taccālambanaṃ 'śūnyatādi' /
śūnyatāderapi kā gāmbhīryatā? yāsya samāropāntenāpavādāntena cārahitatā /
bhagavānabhyupagataṃ sūcayitumāha /
gambhīramitītyādi /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathāpratibhāsabhāvo yathātattvaṃ ca bhāvaḥ śūnyatā /
saivānimittaṃtadvedane nimittanirodhāt /
saivāpraṇihitaṃ tadvidāṃ traidhātuke 'praṇidhānāt /
saivānabhisaṃskārasteṣāṃ punarbhavāya karmākaraṇāt /
saivānutpādasteṣāṃ tena karmaṇānutpādāt /
saivājātisteṣāṃ prakṛtyajātatājñānāt /
saivābhāvo 'dravyatvāt /
saiva virāgaśuddhiḥ kleśānuśayasamudghātāt /
saiva nirodhasteṣāṃ punarbhavavi(ni)rodhāt /
saiva nirvāṇaṃ teṣāṃ vāsanāsamudghātāt /
saiva vigamasteṣāṃ sāśravaskandhoparamāt /
iti śūnyatādikam /
subhūtirāheti kākvā pṛcchatītyarthaḥ /
dharmāṇāmiti śūnyatādinām /
sarvadharmāṇāmiti skandhadhātvādīnām /
bālagrāhyā rūpādayaste kathaṃ gambhīrāḥ? ataḥ svayameva pṛcchati kathaṃ cetyādi /
uttaraṃ yathā tathatetyādi /
(RSt_118) kasya tathateti cedāha tatretyādi /
sphuṭīkartumāha yathetyādi /
yatreti yasyāṃ rūpāditathatāyāṃ vedyamānāyāṃ kalpitaṃ rūpādi na prakhyāti iyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ gambhīratā /
paramārthasatā rūpeṇa teṣāṃ prakhyānāt /
samyagdeśanayā toṣitaḥ subhūtirāha /
āścaryamityādi /
sūkṣmeṇeti nipuna(ṇa)vedyena /
nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam /
bhāvanāmārgasthasyāvaivartikasya sarveṣāṃ parikalpitānāmaprakhyānāt /
rūpādibhyaśca nivāritaḥ /
teṣāṃ paramārthasya prakhyānāt /
tatra nirvāṇena rūpādisamāropāntamutkatā /
iti śūnyatādigambhīratā /
atha śāstram- /
[112] cintātulananidhyānānyabhīkṣṇaṃ bhāvanāpathaḥ /
nirve āṅgeṣu dṛṅmārge bhāvanāmārga eva ca /
'abhīkṣṇaṃ' iti prabandhena /
ataḥ prābandhikāni 'cintātulananidhyānāni' svabhāvo bhāvanāmārgasya alambanaṃ śūnyatādi /
śūnyatāderādhāro nirvedhabhāgīyadṛṅmārgabhāvanāmārgāḥ(rgaḥ) kathaṃ bhāvanāmārgasyā(ścā)syaiva viṣaya iti cedāha- /
[113] prābandhikatvādiṣṭo 'sau /
'prābandhiko ' hi bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
tataḥ prākṛto viṣayaḥ paścāttamo viṣayīti nāsti virodhaḥ /
atra sūtraṃ bhagavānāhetyādi /
imānīti yathoktāni śūnyatādīni /
prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānīti /
vikalpapāramittaiva prajñā prajñāpāramitā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaśca /
nirvedhabhāgīyāni tu tādarthyātprajñāpāramitā /
tasyāṃ trividhāyāṃ pratisaṃyuktāni sambaddhāni tadādhārāṇītyarthaḥ /
ya imānio cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyati upanidhāsyatīti sambandhaḥ /
kathamityata āha /
evaṃ mayetyādi /
sthātavyamiti cintayaikāntaniścayāt /
śikṣitavyamiti tulanena śamathotpādanāt /
pratipattavyamityupanidhyānena vipaśyanotpādanāt /
ājñaptaṃ granthaśravaṇāt /
ākhyātamarthajñāpanāt /
upadiṣṭaṃ rahasyakīrtanāt catasro yuktayaḥ /
apekṣāyuktiḥ sarvahetūnapekṣya kāryotpatteḥ /
kāryakāraṇayuktiḥ tebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ kāryaviśeṣotpatteḥ /
upapattiḥ sādhanayuktiḥ /
yena pramāṇena yo 'rthaḥ sidhyati /
dharmatāyuktiḥ svabhāvaniyamodharmāṇām /
agni eva dahatyāpa eva kledayantītyādi /
ābhiḥ samādhyālambanasya rahasi paryaṅkamāruhya satkṛtya sātatyena nirūpaṇaṃ cintā /
tatraiva navākāreṇa śamathena cetasaḥ samīkaraṇaṃ tulanam /
dharmānvicinoti pravicinoti parivitarkayati parimīmāṃsāmāpadyata iti caturākārā vipaśyanā upanidhyānam /
tatra yathāvabhdāvikatājñānaṃ vicayaḥ /
(RSt_119) pañcaiva skandhā ityādi yathāvabhdāvikatājñānaṃ pravicayaḥ /
sarva ete śūnyā ityādi nirvikalpena manasā prajñāsahagatena nimittīkaraṇaṃ parivitarkaḥ /
santīraṇaṃ parimīmāṃsā /
iti bhāvanāmārgasya svabhāvaḥ /
navadhā ca prakārataḥ /
sa bhāvanāmārgaḥ prakārabhedena navadhā bhavati /
cakārādvipakṣo navadhā /
kathamityāha- /
mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇāṃ punarmṛdvādibhedataḥ /
mṛdumṛduḥ /
mṛdumadhyaḥ /
mṛdvadhimātraḥ /
madhyamṛduḥ /
madhyamadhyaḥ /
madhyadhimātraḥ /
adhimātramṛduḥ /
adhimātramadhyaḥ /
adhimātrādhimātraśceti /
vipakṣāṇāmapyeta eva nava prakārāḥ /
tatraite mārgasya prakārā anulomamutpadyante /
taiḥ pratilomaṃ vipakṣaprakārāḥ kṣīyante /
adhimātrādhimātro 'dhimātramadhyo yāvanmṛdumṛduḥ /
sa ca vipakṣo bhāvanāheyaḥ kleśavikalpā yathāyogām /
audāriko hi malaścelātpurva niṣpīḍyate paścāsūkṣmaḥ /
tadvaccittādapi /
tatrādyaḥ tathetyādinā /
dvitīya evamityādinā /
tataḥ yathā punaraparādibhīḥ prasavatyantaiḥ tataḥ dvāvekena punaraparādinā subhūtirāhetyataḥ prāk /
tathetyādi /
tatheti yathoktena krameṇa sampādayamānaḥ śamathena /
upanidhyāyana vipaśyanayā /
upaparīkṣamāṇa ubhābhyām /
prayujyamānaḥ śamathavīryeṇa /
ghaṭamāno vipaśyanāvīryeṇa /
vyāyacchamāna ubhayavīryeṇa /
svayameva bhagavān pṛcchati kiyatkarma karotīti /
uttaraṃ svayamevāha tadyathāpītyādinā /
prasādā prabhavantīti prāsādikā guṇāḥ /
matvarthīyo 'c /
paraparigṛhīteti parakīyā na vaśayen na śaknuyāt /
saṃsārādityāgāmino janmaprabandhāt /
chorayatīti tyajati /
vipṛṣṭhīkaroti /
āgāmino 'nāgamanāt /
vyantīkarotītyaparāntataḥ pūrvāntanayanāt /
yathājñaptamityādi pūrvavat /
yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathā nirdiṣṭamityuddeśanāt /
tiṣṭhati cintayā saṃśayacchedāt /
śikṣate śamathena /
pratipadyate vipaśyanayā /
upanidhyāyatītyubhābhyām /
evaṃ yogaṃ bhāvanāmāpadyate /
iyatā ekaṃ karmoktam /
dvitīyamāha tāṃścetyādinā samyaksambodherityetadantena /
iti bhāvanāmārgo mṛdumṛduḥ /
evamityādi evamityanantaroktavat /
tāvatkarmeti bahutarakalpavyantīkaraṇam /
samyaksambodhivinivartakadoṣavivarjanaṃ ca /
adhikamāha (RSt_120) yathetyādinā prāk punaraparāt /
tata iti dāyakāt /
ayameva viśiṣyate bahutarapuṇyatayā prakṛṣyate /
ityata āha /
yoyamityādi /
iti bhāvanāmārgo mṛdumadhyaḥ /
punarityādi /
dadyādarpaṇataḥ /
pratiṣṭhāpayedavipratisārataḥ /
iti bhāvanāmārgo mṛddhadhimātraḥ /
punarityādi /
manasikāro vihāraḥ /
iti bhāvanāmārgo madhyamṛduḥ /
punarityādinā bhāvanāmārgo madhyamadhyaḥ /
punarityādi /
vyutthāya dharma deśayet tacca bodhau pariṇāmayediti bhāvanāmārgo madhyādhimātraḥ /
punaraparetyādi /
tacca dharmadānaṃ /
prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena pariṇāmayediti bhāvanāmārgo 'dhimātramṛduḥ /
punarityādi /
taddharmadānaṃ prajñāpāramitoktapariṇāmena pariṇamayya punaḥ pratisaṃlayane yogamāpadyate /
iti bhāvanāmārgo 'dhimātramadhyaḥ /
yaḥ punastat pratisaṃlayanamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā sa tasya bhāvanāmārgo 'dhimātrādhimātraḥ /
subhūtirāhetyādi /
iha bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti bāhulyenoktam /
ataḥ subhūteścodyam /
abhisaṃskāro vikalpaḥ /
tadvatpuṇyābhisaṃskāropi /
tasmādvahutaraṃ puṇyamiti bahutaro vikalpa uktaḥ syāditi /
uttaraṃ bhagavānāha sopītyādinā prasavatyantena /
idānīmiti bhāvanāmārgakāle /
yathālakṣaṇamasattvācchūnyaḥ /
ajñātārthe kapratyayaḥ /
bālairajñātaḥ śūnyaka ityeva /
evameva ākhyāti prakhyātīti ākhyaḥ /
anākhye ākhyā bhavati ākhyāyate lohitāderākṛtigaṇatvāt kyaṣ /
prakhyātītyarthaḥ /
evamuttareṣvapi draṣṭavyam /
asvāmikatvād riktaḥ /
agrāhyatvāt tucchaḥ /
grāhakābhāvatvād asaraḥ /
evamiti śūnyatādibhiḥ /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
iti bahutaraṃpuṇyaṃprasavacodyaparihārau /
subhūtirāhetyādi /
utkarṣopi viśeṣaḥ /
chedopi nānākaraṇam /
tayorvyavacchedārthamubhayorupādānam /
pramāṇānītyaudāryaparicchedāḥ /
saṃkhyayāpīti gaṇanayāpi na kṣapayituṃ kṣayaṃ netum /
syābhdagavannityādi sugamam /
adhikaṃ vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ mukhyaṃ vācakamityarthaḥ /
akṣayā apīti (RSt_121) ākāśavat /
aprameyātāpītyākāśasyeva /
akṣayāprameyaśūnyatānimittādīnāṃ abhilāpāḥ śabdāḥ /
nanu śabdā api vicatrāḥ kathamekārthe vyavacchedyabhedyaleśāditi bhāvaḥ /
ata evāha deśanābhinirhāra eṣa iti /
deśyate 'nayeti deśanā karuṇā tasyābhinirhāro niḥṣyandaḥ sa cāsau nirdeśaśca /
atra śāstram- /
[114] asaṃkhyeyādinirdeśāḥ paramārthena na kṣamāḥ /
kṛpāniṣyandabhūtāste saṃvṛtyābhimatā mune /
'na kṣamā' iti na yuktāḥ /
ityasaṃkhyeyādinirdeśe codyaparihārāḥ /
subhūtihāha /
āścaryamityādyapi tu khalvityataḥ prāk /
avāggocaratvād anabhilāpyāḥ /
pāramitārthasyeti śūnyatālakṣaṇasya /
atra śāstram- /
[115] hānivṛddhī na yujyete nirālāpasya vastunaḥ /
bhāvanākhyena kiṃ hīnaṃ vartmanā kimudāgatam /
ityanabhilāpyasya hānivṛddhyabhāvaḥ /
kathaṃ tarhi bodhirityata āha /
api tu khalvityādyāparivartasamāpteḥ /
sa dānaṃ dadattānmanasikārāṃstāṃścittotpāniti yairdānaṃ dadāti /
tāni ca kuśalamūlānīti yāni taiscittotpādaiḥ saṃprayuktāni /
yathā bodhisthā pariṇāmayatīti /
anyathā na sā pariṇāmanā bodhaye syāt /
evamuttarāsvapi draṣṭavyam /
yathānuttarā samyaksambodhirityuktam /
ataḥ pṛcchati /
atha khalvityādinā /
bhagavānāha tathataiṣā subhūte 'nuttarā samyaksambodhirityādi /
abhīkṣṇamiti punaḥ punaḥ /
bahulamiti prabandhane /
evaṃ khalvityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
atra śāstram- /
[116] yathā bodhistathaivāsāviṣṭasyāthaisya sādhakaḥ /
tathatālakṣaṇā bodhiḥ sopi tallakṣaṇo mataḥ /
'asau' iti 'sopi' iti bhāvanāmārgaḥ /
śūnyatāpradhānaḥ parivartaḥ śūnyatāparivartaḥ /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāmaṣṭādaśaḥ parivartaḥ /
(RSt_122) /
19. gaṅgadevābhaginīparivarto nāmekonaviṃśatitamaḥ /
atha khalvityādi prāgevamuktāt /
na pūrveṇa cittena bodhirna ca paścimena tayorasamavadhānāditi codyam /
evamukta ityādi prāgevamuktāt /
iyatā dīpadṛṣṭāntena parihāraḥ /
atra śāstram- /
[117] pūrveṇa bodhirno yuktā manasā paścimena vā /
iti codyam /
dīpadṛṣṭāntayogena /
bodhiriti vartate /
anena parihāraḥ /
atha śāstram- /
gambhīrā dharmatāṣṭadhā /
yā bodhiriti vartate /
kevalāyā bodhestathataiva lakṣaṇamuktamaṣṭādaśe /
saparicchadāyāstu bodherlakṣaṇamaṣṭavidhaṃ gāmbhīryam /
tatkathamaṣṭadhā? /
[118] utpāde ca nirodhe ca tathatāyāṃ gabhīratā /
jñeye jñāne ca caryāyāmadvayopāyakauśale /
'advayaṃ ca upāyakauśalyaṃ ca; iti samāhāradvandvaḥ /
ata evamukta ityādinā prāgevamuktādgāmbhīrya subhūtiḥ prastauti /
anyatra tebhya iti vinā tebhyaḥ /
evamukte bhagavānityādinā parijayaṃ karotītyetadantenāṣṭavidhaṃ gāmbhīryamāha /
yaccittamiti bhrāntamabhūtaparikalpātmakam /
niruddhamiti santānakṣayāt kṣīṇam /
no hīti naivetyarthaḥ /
bhrāntikāraṇasya dvayābhiniveśasya kṣayāditi bhāvaḥ /
ityutpādagāmbhīryam /
yaccittamutpannamiti abhrāntam /
bhrāntikṣayāccittādhīnatvācca cittotpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
nirodhadharmi bhagavanniti pratikṣaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
nirotsyata iti santānanirodheneti bhāvaḥ /
no hīdamiti svarasata utpatteḥ praṇidhānādibhiśca saviśeṣamakṣayīkṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
(RSt_123) yaccittamanutpannarmityutpādagāmbhīrye yaduktam yanna nirodhadharmītyanantarameva yaduktaṃ yannirodhadharmītyasmiṃsteṣāṃ punaruktatā syāt /
yaccittamiti yaccittasantānaḥ /
anutpādānirodhadharmītyanādinidhanam yo dharma iti nirvāṇākhyaḥ /
nirodhoniruddham /
tatsvabhāvo 'syeti svabhāvaniruddhaḥ /
dharmateti śūnyatā /
iti nirodhagāmbhīryam /
tathaiva sthāsyatīti yāvadākāśam /
mā kuṭasthā bhūditi tathatāvat /
no hīdamiti pravāhanityatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
gambhīrā tathateti samyagjñānādapi sūkṣmatvāditayatāgāmbhīryam /
tathatāyāṃ cittamiti tadveditvāttasyā ādheyam /
no hīdamiti jñānābhdede vedyatvāyogāt /
cittaṃ tathatetyekalakṣaṇāditi bhāvaḥ /
anyattathatāyā ilikṣaṇabhedādeva /
no hīdamiti lakṣaṇabhedepi tādātmyāt /
tadevamagrāhyatvepi vedyā tathateti jñeyagāmbhīryam /
samanupaśyasi tvamiti cittarūpam /
no hītyagrāhyatvāt /
tadeva grāhyamapi cittaṃ vettīti jñānagāmbhīryam /
gambhīre caratīti prajñāpāramitārthe /
samudācārā ālambananimittāni /
pravartante na bhavanti /
na samudācaranti na prakhyāntīti caryāgāmbhīryam /
nimitte caratīti dvayanimitte 'dvayanimitte vā /
no hīti na dvayanimitte nādvayanimitte /
nimittamiti dvayādvayanimittam /
avibhāvitamaprahīṇam /
no hīti nāprahīṇam /
prahīṇamevetyarthaḥ /
ityadvayagāmbhīryam /
api nviti kinnu /
nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavatītyapratipūrṇeṣu sarvabuddhadharmeṣu iti bhāvaḥ /
subhūtiruttaramāha /
na sa bhagavannityadinā /
ihaiveti /
asminneva janmani /
kuta ityāha /
sa cedityādi /
śrāvako bhavaediti na samyaksambuddhaḥ /
etattadityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
yallakṣaṇaṃ yannimittamiti yaddharmanimittaṃ yacca dharmatānimittaṃ tatsarvaṃ jānāti /
parijayamabhyāsamātraṃ karoti /
ityupāyakauśalagāmbhīryam /
tatrāṣṭamaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ viprakṛṣṭam /
bodhe śeṣāṇi sannikṛṣṭānītyuktavidhaṃ gāmbhīryam /
uktaśca 'śaikṣau'vaivartiko gaṇaḥ' /
(RSt_124) /
'samatā bhavaśāntyoḥ' vaktavyā /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[119] svapnopamatvāddharmāṇāṃ bhavaśāntyorakalpanā /
eṣa saṃsāra etannirvāṇamiti bhedakalpanā /
saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ samatājñānaṃ bhāvanāmārge /
svapnopamānsarvadharmān paśyatastayorbhedakānupalambhāt /
nanvabhūtaparikalpaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa ca bhrāntimātraṃ bhrāntikṣayastu nirvāṇam /
kadā tayoḥ samatājñānam? bhāvanāmārge saṃmukhībhūte sarvadharmanairātmyasaṃvedanāditi cet /
darśanamārgepyetadastīti bhāvanāmārgasya ko 'tiśayaḥ? tasmāttato vyutthitasya samatājñānaṃ grāhyam /
taccāyuktam /
vyutthitasya hi jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ svapnopamatvāt svapnaḥ /
bhāvanāmārgastu samyagjñānaṃ divasopamatvāddivasaḥ /
tatra kadā yuktaṃ syāt? yadi daivasikādabhyāsātiśayāt, svapneti prajñāpāramitā vivardheta /
ataḥ sūtre 'tha khalvityādinā vivardhata ityetadantena praśnaḥ /
subhūtirāhetyādinā bhāvitavyontenottaram /
avikalpa iti /
vikalpo viśeṣaḥ /
avikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
prajñāpāramitābhyāsata iti bhāvanāmārgābhyāsataḥ /
iti saṃsāranirvāṇasamatā /
śāriputra āhetyādi /
iha svapnaśabdena svapna evocyate /
kṣayasaṃjñeti kṣayo nirvāṇaṃ tasya saṃjñā udgrahaḥ /
bhutārthakalpanaṃ kalpaḥ /
vitathakalpanaṃ vikalpaḥ /
evameveti /
ākāśavattathāgatavadvā /
cittaṃ cetanā buddhirvikalpaḥ ityeko 'rthaḥ /
viviktānīti niḥsvabhāvāni /
viplutā hi buddhiravidyamānameva nimittīkṛtyārambaṇī karoti /
cetanāpītyādi sugamam /
kāyasākṣīti kāya āśrayaḥ /
tatparāvṛttyā kāyena sākṣātkārī kāyasākṣī enamarthamityetaccodyaṃ visarjayiṣyatīti parihariṣyati /
ajito maitreya iti paryāyau /
yo dharmo visarjayediti maitreyaḥ /
visarjayitavya iti praśnaḥ /
yena dharmeṇeti vācā /
yasya dharmasyeti śāriputrasya /
utpitsuḥ trāsa uttrāsaḥ /
saṃbhūtastrāsaḥ santrāsaḥ /
tasya pravāhaḥ santrāsāpattiḥ /
balādhānaṃ bhāvanā balavāsanā /
atra śāstram- /
karmābhāvādicodyānāṃ parihārā yathoditāḥ /
iti saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāyāṃ codyaparihārāḥ /
'kṛtiśuddhiranuttarā' vaktavyā /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[120] sattvalokasya yāśuddhistasyāḥ śuddhayupahārataḥ /
tathā bhājanalokasya buddhakṣetrasya śuddhatā /
(RSt_125) /
ekadā yatraika eva buddho jāyate tadbuddhakṣetram /
tasya śuddhatā pariśuddhiḥ /
sā kuto bhavati? 'sattvalokasya' dṛśyate 'yāśuddhiḥ' vyāḍakāntārāditā /
tasyāḥ svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhādupasaṃhārāt /
mama buddhakṣetre sarvathaivaṃ mā bhūditi /
eṣā vistareṇa mahatyoruktā /
iha tu saṃkṣepataḥ /
punaraparamityādinā atha khalu tatretyataḥ prāk /
uttrāsādiniṣedha ukto vaktavyaśca tadapekṣayā punaraparaśabdāḥ /
durgatā bhūmiḥ kāntāram /
vyāḍaiḥ kāntāraṃ vyāḍakāntāram pānīyavarjitakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāram /
yadicecchabdo yadyarthe /
divyopabhogetyādi /
samabuddhakṣetrasattvā iti vartate /
rudhirādyāhāravyudāsāya caitaduktam /
sarvasvaparityāga eva kuśalam /
yadeteṣāṃ loka iti bhājanaloke sukhasamaṅgilaḥ /
sukhaṃ samarpitamāhitameṣāmiti sukhasamarpitāḥ /
sarvata iti sarvatra /
vyādhikāntāraṃ rogopasargaḥ /
iyatīti cittakṣaṇaparimāṇā /
apūrveti bhāvinī /
yadutākoṭīriti nahi niraṃśasya kṣaṇasya koṭirasti /
yā setyarthā(tyapūrvā) bhut /
apūrvā koṭīryatrābhisaṃbhotsye /
iti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ /
atha khalvityādyāparivartāntāt /
anena yattasyāṃ deśanāyāṃ saṃvṛttaṃ tadāha /
asaktāni alagnāni /
antarikṣe vihāyasīti kevala evākāśe /
pariniṣpattiriva pariniṣpattirvaśībhāvaḥ /
pramāṇabaddhaḥ pramāṇaniyataḥ /
asātakāntārāṇi duṣkāntārāṇi /
śeṣaṃ subodham /
gaṅgadevābhaginyā lakṣitaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāmekonaviṃśatitamaḥ parivartaḥ /
20. upāyakauśalyamīmāṃsāparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ /
kṣetrapariśuddhiruktā /
upāyakauśalaṃ vaktavyam /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[121] viṣayo 'sya prayogaśca sā(śā)travāṇāmatikramaḥ /
apratiṣṭho yathāvedhamasādhāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ /
[122] aśa(sa)kto 'nupalambhaśca nimittapraṇidhikṛtau /
talliṅgaṃ cāpramāṇaṃ ca daśadhopāyakauśalam /
(RSt_126) /
asya hyupāyakauśalasya 'viṣayaḥ' sūtre prathamaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
tataḥ'prayogaḥ' prathamābhyāsaḥ /
tato daśa prabhedāḥ sā (śā)travātikramādayaḥ /
'nimittapraṇidhikṛtau' tābhyāmiti tathoktau nimittakṛtaḥ praṇidhikṛtaśca /
atha khalvityādi /
atrādau bhūtakoṭimityetadantena viṣaya uktaḥ /
śūnyatāsamādhinaivānimittāpraṇihitayorbodhipakṣādīnāṃ copalakṣaṇāt /
śūnyatāyāmiti śūnyatāsamādhau /
santatiḥ pravāhaḥ /
kathaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇa ityāha rūpaṃ śunyamitīti /
tāmiti śūnyatām /
dharmatāmiti dharmaprakṛtim /
dharmatayeti dharmasāratayā /
bhūtakoṭiriti śūnyataiva kaivalyaṃ gatā bhūtakoṭiḥ /
ityupāyakauśalasya viṣayaḥ /
evamukta ityādi tadyathāpītyataḥ prāk /
asamāhita eveti sākṣātkartavyatayānadhyavasita eva /
atrāntarā iti yāvadbuddhadharmā asya na paripakvāḥ /
evamityuktena krameṇa /
ārūḍha upārjitāḥ /
śeṣa subodham /
ityupāyakauśalasya prayogaḥ /
tadyathāpītyādi tadyathāpītyataḥ prāk /
śūro nirbhīḥ /
vīryamutsāhaḥ /
pratiṣṭhānaṃ sthairyam /
pratibhānamabhyūhaḥ /
pratipattiranuṣṭhānam /
yasminkālādau yadyuktaṃ tajjñānāt kālādijñaḥ /
gatiḥ kāyavākcittakarmaṇyatā /
tāṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ /
praharaṇāvaraṇaṃ kavacādi /
smṛtiḥ smaraṇam /
matirabhyūhaḥ /
gatirjñānam /
dhṛtirdhāraṇam /
nītirnītijñānam /
viśāradaḥ paṇḍitaḥ iti śatrava eva 'śātravā' antarāyāḥ /
teṣāmatikramaścaturbhirapramāṇairiti prathamamupāyakauśalam /
tadyathāpītyādi tadyathāpītyataḥ prāk /
caratīti gacchati /
na ca bhūmau patatīti pātapratiṣedhaḥ sthitiḥ /
na ca kañcinniśrityeti pratiṣṭhāpratiṣedhaḥ /
niśrityetyāspadīkṛtya /
viharatīti tiṣṭhati /
na ca tatrāpīti viharaṇepi niśritaḥ /
patatyaparipūrṇairiti /
atra na patatīti na pratitiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
pratiṣṭhāvirahādapratiṣṭha upāyaḥ /
tadyathāpītyādi prāgevamuktāta /
vārayediti /
ākāśa eva sthāpayet /
patanaṃ na dadyāditi patituṃ na dadyāt /
uddharva kṣiptasya sa(śa)rasyeva śarāntaraiściramapātāya ya āvedhastadvadābuddhadharmaparipākama(kaṃ) sākṣātkaraṇāya cittasya cittāntarairya āvedhaḥ /
tadanatikrameṇa vṛttiryathāvedhamupāyaḥ /
(RSt_127) /
evamukta ityādi prāk punaraparāt /
carati śamathena /
viharati vipaśyanayā /
samādhisamāpattirubhābhyām /
mameti mayā /
abhinirharatīti niṣpādayati /
samādhiścāsau vimokṣaśca muktidvāratvāt /
cittotpādaścittābhinirhāraḥ /
anenāyaṃ duṣkarakārakaḥ /
eṣa ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairasādhāraṇatvādasādhāraṇa upāyaḥ /
punaraparādi prāk punaraparāt /
sattva ātmā puruṣaḥ /
indriyāṇi pañca śraddhādīni /
balānyapi pañcaiva /
bodhyaṅgāni sapta /
mārgo 'ṣṭāṅgaḥ /
sattvadṛṣṭiḥ saktiḥ /
tatprahāṇāya sattvānāmabhisambuddhaḥ /
sattvān deśayiṣyāmīti sañcintya śūnyatādisamāpattirasaktiḥ /
tadyogādasakta upāyaḥ /
punaraparādi prākpunaraparāt /
dharmasaṃjñā skandhadhātvādisaṃjñā /
sa upalambhaḥ /
tatprahāṇāyetyādi pūrvavat /
evaṃ śūnyatādisamāpattiranupalambhaḥ /
tadyogādanupalambha upāyaḥ /
punaraparādi punaraparātprāk /
strī pumān rūpaṃ śabda iti nimittasaṃjñā /
tatprahāṇāyetyādi pūrvavat /
evamanimittasamāpattirānimittam /
tadyogādānimitta upāyaḥ /
punaraparādi yo hītyataḥ prāk /
devaḥ śakraścakravarttī syāmityādirbhavabhogābhilāṣaḥ praṇihitam /
tasya mūlaṃ viparyāsāḥ /
tasmāccaturviparyāsaprahāṇāyetyādi pūrvavat /
evamapraṇihitasamādhirapraṇihitam tadyogādapraṇihita upāyaḥ /
yo hi kaścidityādi naitat sthānaṃ vidyata iti yāvat /
anupalambhādīnāmupāyā vimokṣamukhatrayaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ /
sāṃpratameṣāmanabhisaṃskārādikamadhikaṃ viṣayamamoghatāṃ ca bravīti /
anabhisaṃskāre patediti hīnabodhau /
traidhātukeneti saṃsāreṇa /
evaṃ hītyādi subhūtirāhetyataḥ prāk /
samyaksambodhikāmena bodhisattvena vijño bodhisattvaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ /
samyaksambodhaye kiṃ bhāvayeyaṃ kathaṃ ca bhāvayeyamiti /
sa cedācakṣīta śūnyatādikameva bhāvaya tacca parijayaṃ mātuḥ sākṣātkārṣīḥ /
tatropāyaḥ sarvasattvāparityāgacittādiriti /
etattasyākhyāturavaivartikatve liṅgam /
tasmāttasya liṅgamasminniti talliṅga upāyaḥ /
subhūtirāhetyādi sacetpunarityataḥ prāk /
bahavo bodhāya caranti teṣvalpakāste ya evaṃ visarjayanti /
vyākṛtāste 'vaivarttikatve 'saṃhāryāḥ (RSt_128) sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
yataste 'lpakā ato 'lpapramāṇā ityapramāṇa upāyaḥ /
tadevaṃ navamasya paścārddhāt prabhṛti viṃśatitamasya pūrvārddhaṃ yāvadekādaśaparivartāḥ sarvākārābhisaṃbodhiḥ /
ita ūddharvaṃ mūrddhābhisamayo vaktavyaḥ /
tasyoddeśaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ ślokadvayena ṣaḍakṣarādhikena- /
[123] liṅgaṃ tasya vivṛddhiśca nirūḍhiścittasaṃsthitiḥ /
caturdhā ca vikalpasya pratipakṣaścaturvidhaḥ /
[124] pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani /
ānantaryasamādhiśca saha vipratipattibhiḥ /
[125] mūrdhābhisamayaḥ /
tasyāṣṭau vastūni /
'liṅgavivṛddhiḥ nirūḍhiścittasaṃsthitiḥ' /
dṛṅmārge vipakṣapratipakṣāḥ bhāvanāmārge vipakṣapratipakṣā ānantaryasamādhivipratipattayaśceti /
tatra liṅgamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[126] svapnāntarepi svapnābhā sarvadharmekṣaṇādikam /
mūrddhaprāptasya yogasya liṅgaṃ dvādaśadhā matam /
'mūrdhaprāptasya' iti prakarṣaprāptasya /
'yogasya' iti trisarvajñatāprayogasya /
sa cetpunarityādi veditavyā /
svapnāntaragatopi svapnopamān sarvadharmān paśyati na ca sākṣātkarotīti prathamaṃ liṅgam /
punaraparādi veditavyāntam /
svapnāntaragatopi śrāvakabhūmau pratyekabuddhabhūmau traidhātuke ca spṛhāṃ na karotīti dvitīyam /
punaraparādi veditavyāntam /
svapnāntaragato mahatyāṃ pariṣadyubhayasaṅghaparivṛtaṃ tathāgatamātmānaṃ paśyatīti tṛtīyam /
(RSt_129) /
punaraparādi veditavyāntaram /
svapnāntaragato vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sattvebhyo dharma deśayati vyāmagataṃ cātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
bhikṣūṃśca nirmitīta ye lokadhātvantareṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvantīti caturtham /
punaraparādi veditavyāntam /
svapnāntaragatopyātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ vā vadhabandhanaśiraśchedādīn dṛṣṭvā nottrasyati /
vibuddhasya caivaṃ bhavati svapnopamaṃ sarva traidhātukaṃ mayā cābhisaṃbudhyaivaṃ dharmo deśayitavya iti pañcamam /
punaraparādi veditavyāntam /
svapnāntaragatasya nairayikādīn sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati /
tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'bhisambuddhasya buddhakṣetre trayo 'pāyāḥ sarvathā na bhaviṣyantīti ṣaṣṭham /
punaraparādi punaraparāt prāk /
svapnāntaragato yadi grāmadāhādau vartamāne prativibuddha evaṃ samanvāharet /
yathā mayā svapne 'vaivartikaliṅgānyātmani dṛṣṭāni tena satyenāyaṃ grāmadāhādiḥ śāmyatviti /
sa cecchāmyati tatsaptamaṃ liṅgam 		de la zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la'o /
rlom sems su mi byed ces bya ba ni dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'o /
yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba la'o /
mi shes pa ni gzungs ba la'o /
kun tu mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa la ste /
'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa bzhi'o /
gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi ni chos de dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
med ces bya ba ni yod par rlom sems med pa'o /
yang dag par mi snang zhes bya ba ni mthong la'o /
yang dag par med ces zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa med pa'o /
mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin par rtog pa med pa rnam pa brgyad kyis so /
gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la spyod pa'o /
des cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
rtogs par sla'o /
de ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid do /
'di'i sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi zhar la /
chos ston pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyang bstan te /
mngon par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
le'u rdzogs kyi bar gyis gsungs te /
'jig rten gyi khams na zhes bya ba ni mi mjed 'di nyid na /
sngas rgyas stong zhes bya ba ni gang mi mjed 'di nyid du bskal pa bzang po 'di la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o /
de la dang po log par dad sel dang gser thub dang 'od srung dang sh'akya thub pa bzhi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ston pa la mnyam pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ming 'di dag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
byams pa yang zhes bya ba la /
yang gi sgra ni de'i phyi ma gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa lnga yang bsdus te /
'di nyid bstan pa mnyam pa nyid do /
gtsor rnam par dag pa ston cing brjod pa'i le'u ni rnam par dag pa'i le'u'o /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u brgyad pa'o /
le'u brgyad par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston ston pa'i mnyam pa nyid bstan nas; 'di nyid du bskal pa bzang po'i chos ston pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
le'u 'dir rab 'byor gyis gang bshad pa de /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
ming tsam mo zhes bya ba ni ming yin gyi don ma yin te /
ming dang don ni 'brel ba med pa nyid kyis de dag las don rtogs pa med do /
gzhan du na bdag nyid ni lha yin no zhes smras na /
lha nyid du 'gyur ba thal bar 'gyur ro /
de lta mod kyi ming tsam na yod do zhe na /
de'i phyir ming de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
'di zhes bya ba ni ming tsam nyid kyis so; /
mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni don gyis stong pa'i sgra la mi rigs pa'i ro /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
dag gis dngos po zhes bya ba ni brjod par byed pa brjod par bya ba'i don dang bcas zhes bya ba'i don to /
don dang bcas kyang rung don med kyang rung ste /
ming de nyid mi rigs te med par grub bo /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yod do zhe na /
de yang ma mchis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
mi dmigs zhes bya ba smos te /
gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o /
ji ltar de mi dmigs she na /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang don ni med de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
de la de'i don kyang med de /
don dang 'brel ba med pa'i sgra las ni don rtogs pa med de /
gal te dngos po dang 'grel ba med pa'i phyir don ni med pa yin no zhe na /
de ltar na sgra las dngos po gos par mi 'gyur te /
don gyi dngos po la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ming dang don med pa ste /
don mi dmigs pa ni shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'o /
de'i phyir 'di gnyis mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ming ji lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
ji ltar 'di gnyis mnyam pa nyid yin zhe na /
de'i phyir chos 'di gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du bsgrub te /
ston pa mnyam pa nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
ci'i slad du zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
ming 'di nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur te /
gang gis kyang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don te /
med pa la ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes bya bar dgongs so /
de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsungs te /
ji ltar khyod kyis chos rnams stong pa nyid du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du /
de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don to /
de'i phyir mthong ba'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas /
bstan bcos las /
sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa la /
chos shes rjes su shes bzod dang /
shes pa'i skad cig bdag nyid 'di /
kun shes tshul la mthong ba'i lam /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
'di ni kun shes pa'i tshul la mthong ba'i lam skad cig ma bcu drug gi bdag nyid do /
gang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la /
so sor skad cig ma bzhi'i bdag nyid do /
chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa ni chos dang rjes su bzod pa dang shes pa'o /
de nyid kyi skad cig ma ni de'i bdag nyid de /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'o /
kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la yang de bzhin no /
de nyid ni skad cig ma bcu drug ste /
go rims bzhin du bstan bcos las /
gzugs rtag ma yin mi rtag min /
mtha' las 'das dang rnam dag dang /
ma skyes ma 'gags la sogs dang /
mkha' 'dra chags pa spangs pa dang /
yongs su 'dzin las grol ba dang /
ngo bo nyid kyis brjod med dang /
gang phyir 'di'i don brjod pa yis /
gzhan la sbyin du med pa dang /
dmigs pa med par byed pa dang /
shin tu rnam dag nad mi 'byung /
ngan song chad dang 'bras bu ni; /
mngon du byas la mi rtog nyid /
mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel dang /
dngos dang ming dang gnyis po la /
shes pa skye ba med pa ni /
kun shes nyid kyi skad cig ma /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de la /
rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min /
zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma dang po'o /
mtha' las 'das pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o /
rnam par dag pa ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o /
ma skes pa dang ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o /
nam mkha' dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'o /
chags pa spangs pa zhes bya ba ni drug pa'o /
yongs su 'dzin pa las grol ba zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'o /
ngo bo nyid kyis brjod du med pa zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa'o /
brjod du med pa dang grol ba zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ste /
ga las she na /
gang phyir 'di'i gzhan dag la sbyin du med pa zhes bya ba de ni dgu pa'o /
dmigs pa med par nyed pa ni bcu pa'o /
shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes ba ba ni bcu gcig pa'o /
nad mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis pa'o /
ngan song chad pa dang mi rtog pa zhes bya ba la ngan song chad pa ni bcu gsum pa'o /
mi rtog pa ni bcu bzhi pa'o /
'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba rtogs pa dang mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel ba ni bco lnga pa'o /
dngos po dang ming gnyis la shes pa skye ba med pa ni /
de dag ni kun shes pa nyid kyis bdag nyid mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug go /
de la dang 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skad cig ma gnyis gsungs te; gzugs la sogs pa rtag pa yang ma yin /
mi rtag pa yang ma yin /
bcings pa yang ma yin grol ba yang ma yin te /
rang nyid med pa de la ni rtag pa la sogs pa mi rigs te /
de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
gzugs la sogs pa ni rtag tu shin tu rnam par dag pa de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'o /
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni skad cig ma gsum pa ste /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir te /
de ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i bzod pa'o; /
rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bzhi pa ste /
de yang de dag rnam par dag pas skye ba dang 'gag pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de /
de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'o /
rab 'byor nam mkha' zhes bya ba nas yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni lnga pa ste /
chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar skye ba la sogs pa med de /
nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o /
de ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o; /
rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med pa zhes bya ba nas /
yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'o bar gyis ni drug pa dang bdun pa ste /
chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa ste /
nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o /
de ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'o /
chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ste /
de ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
nam mkha' dang brag ca zhes bya ba nas yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa bstan te /
tshig tu med pa dang brjod du med pa ni ji ltar brag ca ni ri dang ri sul du nam mkha' ltar cung zad kyang brjod pa med pa'o /
de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' ltar brjod du med pa ste /
de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o /
de ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'o /
rtogs par byed pa ni brjod pa ste /
brjod pa gang gis pha rol la don rtogs par byed pa ni brjod pa'o /
brag ca ni nam mkha' ltar cung zad kyang brjod pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' ltar brjod du med pa des na shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o /
de ni 'gogs pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
gang mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs su med pa ste /
'dir brag ca'i sgra ni sgra dang sgra brnyan gnyi ga la 'jug ste /
'di'i dbye ba ston par mi byed pa'i phyir ro /
tshig gi med pa yang yin la brjod du med pa yang yin zhes bsdu'o; /
brag ca yang yin la tshig med pa yang yin brjod du med pa yang yin zhes gsum yang bsdu bar bya'o /
de dag kyang yin la dmigs pa yang yin zhes bsdu bar bya'o /
gang gi phyir nam mkha' yang de dag dang 'dra ste /
de ni mtshon cha sngo bsangs kyi bsdu ba bzhin no /
de dag gi dngos po ni de nyid do /
des yongs su dag pa ste /
de'i phyir ji ltar nam mkha' ni cang zad kyang dmigs su med pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang dmigs su med na /
des nam mkha' ltar dmigs su med pas yongs su dag pa ste /
de ni 'gogs pa la chos shes pa'o /
rab 'byor zhes bya ba nas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcu gcig pa bstan te /
kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyis gos pa ni nye bar gos pa'o /
rnam par byang ba'i chos kyis mgos pa ni gos pa med pa'o /
nye bar gos pa dang gos pa med pa ni nye bar gos pa dang gos pa med pa'o /
de dag kyang yin la chos kyang yin pas na chos de dag go /
chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas chos thams cad do /
de dag gis gos pa med pa ni gos pa med pa'o /
gnyi ga dmigs pa ni mi dmigs pa yin te /
gnyi ga mi dmigs pa ni gnyi ga yongs su dag pa ste /
de dag ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas /
dus mi bgyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcu gnyis pa bstan te /
gang gi phyir rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin zhe na /
rna lam du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
dus zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'o /
de ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'o /
de dag la lha'i bu zhes bya ba nas /
dgra je lji bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcu gsum pa bstan te /
yum chen mo dag la ni rnam par dbye ba bdun par brjod la /
'dir gnyis par byas pa yin te /
de yang shin tu dang ba dang ldan na gnyis pa zhes bya bar kha cig 'dod do /
dus dang dngos po dang las dang 'gro ba na ni las ma yin yang las kyi ming can te /
las ma yin yang las kyi ming du 'gro'o zhes la la dag 'dod do /
de bas kyang zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i rin po che bsrung bas kyang ngo /
rin po che chen po 'di nyid bsrung ba chen po yin gyi /
'di las gzhan pa'i bsrung ba ni med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
de'i phyir yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
gal te yang rin po che chen po de lta yin pa yang gi sgra'i don to /
dgra ni phyir rgol ba'o /
ci tsam du gces pa zhes bya ba ni /
ji ltar khyad par du gyur pa'o /
'dir bsod nams khyad par du gyur pa bstan pas ni ngan song chad par don gyis bstan par 'gyur te /
de ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcu bzhi pa bstan te /
ci'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya zhe na /
phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs par gyur pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
'di nyid kyi rnam par 'grel pa ni chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o /
mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i tshul gyis so /
nye bar gnas pa ni nye bar gnas pa'o /
gal te phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir nye bar gnas na de lta na ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
zhum par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'o /
mi sbyor zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'o /
yongs su mi 'dzin zhes bya ba ni yang dag par mi shes pa ste /
de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum du rnam par mi rtog pa'o /
de ni lam la chos shes pa'o /
'bras bu mngon du bya ba la mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel pa de ni skad cig ma bco lnga pa ste /
de'i dbang du byas nas rab 'byor ma skyes pa zhes bya ba nas ma gos pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te; 'bras bu skyes pa la mi dmigs pa ni ma skyes pa'o /
rgyu des na bcom ldan 'das ma ni 'bras bu skyes pa'i mtshan ma'i dri mas ma gos pa'o /
'di ci zhig gis ma gos pa yin zhe na /
rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so /
gang gi phyir ma gos pa de'i phyir 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
rnam par rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
gal te nye bar gos par gyur na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro /
ji ltar ma gos pa yin zhe na /
de'i phyir rab 'byor 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'bras bu rnams skye ba na yang chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma'i dri ma nub pa'i phyir ma gos pa'o /
de ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
dngos dang ming dang gnyis po la shes pa skye ba med pa de ni skad cig ma bcu drug pa ste /
de'i dbang du byas nas gal te zhes bya ba nas spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /
de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni shin tu phra ba'i dngos po dang ming gnyis la 'du shes pa'o /
de ltar zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'i don ston par byed pa'o /
bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag las ni 'di nyid rgyas par ston to /
de ltar yang mi shes /
de yang rnam par mi rtog /
de ltar yang mi dmigs /
de ltar yang spros par mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas /
thams cad shes pa nyid thob par yang mi byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /
de la de ltar yang mi shes zhes bya ba ni chos nyid tsam snang gi chos thams cad snang ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir te /
de ni dngos po shes pa mi skyed pa'o /
de ltar yang rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba ni brjod pa thams cad snang ba med pas /
ming gi shes pa mi skyed pa'o /
ma 'dres pa dri ma med pa /
nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa chos nyid shes pa la ni rig par bya ba dang; rig par byed pa'i bye brag mi snang ba ste /
gzung ba dang 'dzin par shes pa skye ba med do /
dngos po dang ming dang gnyis su snang ba 'di gsum yang phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ste /
phyin ci log ni spros pa'o /
de'i phyir de dag med pa nyid kyang spros par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
lhag ma ni rtogs par sla ste /
de ni lam la rjes su shes pa'o /
thams cad shes pa nyid 'di yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa nyid la sogs pa'i tshul yod na ni /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin la /
de med na ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa rdzogs so /
de ltar thams cad shes pa nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
mjug bsdu ba'i phyir thob par byed pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid dang thams cad shes pa nyid do /
de zhes bya ba ni de nyid rnam pa gsum mo /
'di dag ni le'u rnam pa dgus rgya cher bstan te /
le'u gcig dang phyed dang bdun dang phyed dang gnyis ni go rims bzhin du bstan to /
chos gang yang zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba mtshungs par ldan pa'o /
'jug par byed pa ni dmigs pa la nye bar 'jog par byed pa'o /
nges par 'jog par byed pa ni de nyid la 'jog cing zhi gnas skyed par byed pa'o /
yang dag par ston par byed pa ni lhag mthong skyed par byed pa'o /
nges par ston par byed pa na mngon sum du byed pas so; /
yongs su thob par byed pa ni 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos thob par byed pa'o /
nges par thob par byed pa ni de nyid mthar phyin par 'dren pa ste /
thams cad kyang med do zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro /
de thams cad ga las she na /
chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
'di ston pa thos nas lha rnams kyis gang byas pa de ni /
de nas lha'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
skye bo mang po'i tshogs dag dga' ba skyes nas ca co ni ku co'o /
de nyid ni ga zha yin te /
skad shin tu mthon por 'byin pa'o /
'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba ma yin te /
gnyi ga yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro /
chos gang la yang med do zhes bya ba ni /
chos kyi 'khor los gzhan pa yang ngo /
gang las chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
gang bla na med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla'o /
chos thams cad ni dmigs pa med de /
gang gi phyir byang chub par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de yang med do zhes ston to /
gang gi phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos gang zhig gang la ston par 'gyur ba ni med do /
mngon par ma grub pa ni ma skyes pa'o /
chos gang yang zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o /
stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ni rnam par byang ba rnams kyi dper brjod pa'o /
bstan pa ni don dam pa bstan pa'o /
sus kyang bstan pa med ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa med do zhes bya ba ga las shes she na /
gang zag gi dngos po 'di nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
sbyor ba bstan par bya ste /
de yang rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa yin la /
de bstan pa'i ched du bstan bcos las /
rnam pa sbyor ba bcas pa dang /
yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas /
thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang /
slob ma phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs /
srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang /
zhing dag bla na med pa ni /
rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste /
'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin /
zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
rnam pa dag dang sbyor ba dag dang yon tan dag dang skyon dag dang mtshan nyid dag dang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang thabs la mkhas pa ste /
dngos po bcu gcig ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'o /
ji ltar bstan pa bshad pa la /
dang po'i rnam pa bshad pa ni bstan bcos las /
gzhi dang ye shes rnam pa yi /
rnam pa shes bya mtshan nyid do /
kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir /
de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
gzhi ni mi dmigs pa ste /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa'o /
de'i ye shes de nyid kyi rnam pa ni rnam pa gang gis de yongs su shes par bya'o /
de dag gi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ming ngo /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rnams zhes bya ba mang po'i tshig yin yang /
rigs kyi dbang du byas nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
de rnam pa gsum ji ltar yin zhe na /
thams cad shes pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do /
de la dang po thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun te /
'dir bstan bcos las /
med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste /
mi gyo ba yi rnam pa'i bar /
bden pa so so la bzhi dang /
lam la de ni bco lngar bshad /
ces gsungs te /
'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba med pa'i rnam pa nas brtsams nas /
mi gyo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni mi gyo ba'i rnam pa'i bar ro /
de dag las sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dag la bzhi bzhi dang lam gyi bden pa la ni lhag ma bco lnga'o /
ma mchis pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pas na; ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang sbyar ro /
de la sdug bsngal gyi gzhi ni med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang dben pa dang mi rdzi ba'o /
nam mkha' ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ma mchis pa bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa med pa ste; ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs can gyi rdzas med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa de bzhin du /
gzugs la sogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid med pa'o /
chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid do /
shin tu stong pa zhes bya ba ni gang zag gi ngo bos stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
gnod par byed pa ni sdug bsngal lo /
gnod par byar rung ba yin pa'i phyir brdzi ba'i bdag nyid do /
mi brdzi ba'i bdag nyid ni bdag med pa ste /
de'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir mi brdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
chos thams cad gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nyid do /
kun 'byung gi gzhi ni /
'di ltar gnas ni rgyu ste /
sngon gyi phung po rnams so /
ngo bo nyid ni bdag nyid kyi dngos po ste /
lus kyi las so /
brjod pa ni ngag gi las so /
ming ni yid kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'o /
'di dag med pa'i go rims bzhin du gnas med pa dang ngo bo nyid med pa dang brjod pa med pa dang ming med pa ste /
de dag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
ming ma mchis shing lus ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la; ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po'o /
lus ni gzugs can gyi phung po ste /
de gnyis med pa ni ming med cing lus med pa'o /
'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni lus kyi las so /
de med pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o /
brjod pa'i rgyu ni rtogs pa'o /
de med pa ni rtogs pa med pa'o /
'gog pa'i gzhi ni 'di ltar 'gro ba'am /
zad pa 'am /
skye ba 'di dag med pa ni go rims bzhin du 'gro ba med pa dang gzung ba med pa dang zad pa med pa dang skye ba med pa ste de'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa ste /
'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
chos thams cad ni gzung du med pa ste /
chos kyis chos mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
zad pa nyid ni chos te rgyu dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro /
de mi ldan pa ni mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
mngon par grub pa ni skyes pa ste /
de med pa ni mngon par ma grub pa'o /
lam gyi bco lnga ni byed pa po dang shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang 'pho ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa dang rmi lam dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa dang gos pa med pa dang spros pa med pa dang; rlom pa med pa dang gyo ba med pa ste byed pa po med pa la sogs pa ni byed pa po med pa'i phyir de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
lam ni byed pa po med pa ste des byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa ste des shes pa po dang mthong ba po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni 'pho ba med pa ste des 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pa mthong ba'i phyir ro /
lam ni 'jig pa med pa ste dus gsum gyi chos rnams rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
rmi lam la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rmi lam la sogs pa'o /
lam ni rmi lam ste mthong bar bya ba med kyang don mthong ba'i phyir ro /
lam ni brag ca ste sgra med kyang sgrar dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni mig yor te gzugs brnyan no /
de ni don med kyang don mthong ba'i phyir ro /
lam ni smig rgyu ste chu'i phung po med kyang /
skom gyis gdungs pa'i 'jig rten rnams la snang ba'i phyir ro /
lam ni sgyu ma ste mtshan ma med kyang snang ba'i phyir ro /
skye ba ma mchis shing rnam par go bar mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir lam ni lnga po dag kyang skye ba med par ston pa ste /
snang ba'i rgyu med par yang de lta de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro /
lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste des 'dod chags la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni rnam par byang ba med pa ste des kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni gos pa med pa ste des nam mkha' ltar chos rnams la gos pa med par mthong ba'i phyir ro /
lam ni spros pa med pa ste spros pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni rlom sems med pa ste rlom sems can thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
lam ni gyo ba med pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid pas rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa'o /
de nas lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug ni gang bstan bcos las /
rgyu dang lam dang sdug bsngal dang /
'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin /
de dag brgyad dang bdun dang ni /
lnga dang bcu drug ces bsgrags so /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
rgyu ni kun 'byung ste /
de bas kun 'byung ba dang lam dag ni dang por bstan te /
'bras bu'i thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa ni phyis bstan te 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
de dag gi rnam pa ni go rims bzhin du brgyad dang bdun dang lnga dang bcu drug tu bsgrags pa ni gsungs pa ste /
mdo las so /
de la kun 'byung gi brgyad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang kun nas ldang ba med pa dang zhi ba dang skyon med pa dang nyon mongs pa med pa dang sems can med pa'o /
ji lta yin zhe na /
skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa gsum yin pa'i phyir ro /
kun 'byung ni sngon gyi phung po lnga rnams so /
yongs su brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams la chags pa ni 'dod chags te /
gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste kun 'byung ngo /
chos thams cad ma log pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi slad du zhes bya ba la /
log pa nyid du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o /
kun nas ldang ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu rnam par rtog pa'o /
de 'di la yod pa ma yin pas kun nas ldang ba med pa ste kun 'byung ngo /
chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
zhi ba ni kun 'byung 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
de ga las she na /
chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni chos thams cad mi snang ba ste don dam par snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang zhe sdang med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang gti mug med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa ste kun 'byung ngo /
yongs su rtog pa ma mchis zhes bya ba ni nyan kun 'byung ngo /
yongs su rtog pa ma mchis zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyis yod par rtogs so /
gzhan yang sems can nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba yin te /
de med pas na sems can med pa'o /
yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni chos dang zang zing gi stong pa nyid do /
lam gyi bdun ni tshad med pa dang mtha' gnyis su mi rtog pa dang tha mi dad pa dang mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang mi rtog pa dang dpag tu med pa dang chags pa med pa'o /
lam ni tshad med pa ste chos thams cad kyi kun nas ldang ba'i kun nas ldang ba med pa ni brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni mtha' gnyis su mi rtog pa ste chos thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba de ni ji ltar snang ba de'i stong pa nyid snang zhing rtogs pa'o /
tha dad pa med pa ni lam mo /
dbyer ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
lam ni mchog tu 'dzin pa ste /
des dman pa'i theg pa la mi reg pa'i phyir ro /
mi rtog pa ni lam mo /
rnam par rtog pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
dpag tu med pa ni lam mo /
chos nyid tshad ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du zhes bya ba ni chos nyid tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
chags pa med pa ni lam mo /
chos thams cad la ma chags pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o /
sdug bsngal gyi lnga ni mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa ste /
sdug bsngal ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga'o /
de la mi rtag pa ni rtag pa ma yin pa'o /
sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal te /
bde ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no /
sdug bsngal ni stong pa nyid de chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
sdug bsngal ni bdag med pa nyid de ji ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro /
'dus byas kyi chos gsum ni skye ba dang; rga ba dang mi rtag pa'o /
de med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste sdug bsngal lo /
mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snang ba dang ji ltar don dam pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro /
'gog pa'i ni bcu drug ste /
de'i phyir 'gog pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa yin te /
stong pa nyid dang tha mi dad cing tha dad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
de bas na nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas mu med pa'o /
dus gsum dang rgya cher yongs su ma chad pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug yin la /
des na go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
de ni 'dir ro gcig pa yin no /
de'i phyir stong pa nyid thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa la /
de ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to /
de bas na 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rnam pa bcu drug yin te /
de ni lam shes pa'i rnam pa'o /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa ni brgya rtsa bcu ste /
gang gi phyir bstan bcos las /
kun mkhyen nyid gsum bye brag gis /
lam gyi bden pa dang mthun par /
dran pa nyer gzhag nas bzung ste /
tha ma sangs rgyas nyid rnam par /
slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang /
sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin te /
sum cu bdun dang sum cu bzhi /
sum cu rtsa dgu dag tu bzhed /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
de'i dbang du byas nas /
bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas le'u rdzogs pa'i bar gyis gsungs so /
'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa sde tshan rnam pa bdun re re nas phye bas /
byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun du 'gyur te /
de dag re re la yang mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o; /
lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi lam la brten pa'o /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun no /
de nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dang po'i rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang gnyis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni de'i phyir bsam gtan dang po la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yin te /
bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang kun 'byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste /
de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas thabs dang smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'o /
stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stobs bcu ste de'i phyir gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'o /
mi brdzi ba'i slad du'o zhes bya ba de ni yang stobs kyi don to /
mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste; mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang zag pa zad pa la mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i shin tu ma zhum pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i don to /
so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
chos thams cad dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa rnams shes shing yang dag par rig pa'o /
de la chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni de la chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med par nus pa'o /
de ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i don to /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la /
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yin la ma 'dres pa yang yin pas na /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o /
gzhan dag dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o /
thams cad kyang yin la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad do /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba'i don to /
de dag gi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
'di lta ste /
'khrul pa med pa dang ca co med pa dang dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba pha rol tu phyin pa gsum dang thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga' ba dang tha dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' ba dang so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum dang 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang; shes rab dang rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba gsum dang dus gsum thams cad la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ste de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
bgrang ba'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa zhes bya ba la 'dra bar sems pa ni bgrang ba'o /
de'i tshul ni ldan pa ste 'dres pa'o /
de las shin tu 'das pa ni 'das pa ste /
de ni ma 'dres pa'i don to /
ji lta ba'i chos de kho na bzhin du gsungs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o /
de'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de de'i ngo bo nyid de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bka'o /
de dag gis ma log pa de bzhin nyid ni bden pa nyid kyi phyir ro; /
rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la byung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'jug pa'i don la 'jug ste /
don gzhan la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i khongs su gtogs pa'i don to /
rang zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid de sems zhes bya ba'i don to /
sems kyi chos thams cad la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir rang 'byung ngo /
de'i ngo bo nyid ni de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
de nyid kyi phyir yum chen mo las chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir zhes gsungs te /
'di'i don bstan pa ni don gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das ma las gtan tshigs 'di gsungs so /
chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du zhes bya ba la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do /
gal te 'di ngo bo nyid yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur na /
gang gi phyir sems phyin ci log pa de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bsgyur ro zhes bsams so /
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ste don gcig go /
de'i phyir yum chen mo dag las sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa zhes tha mar gsungs so /
'dir ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bstan te /
chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang rnam pa thams cad ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad do /
de dag mkhyen pa ni de'i ngo bo ste /
de nyid de de'i slad du'o /
sangs rgyas kyi lam la brten pa sum cu rtsa dgu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa'o /
rnam kun mkhyen nyid rnam pa la /
gcig tu bsdus na brgya dang bcu /
thams cad mkhyen nyid rnam gsum la /
brgya dang bdun cu rtsa gsum mo /
bcom ldan 'das ma la rnam pa 'di rnams kyis bstod de des na bstod pa'i don gyi le'u ni bstod pa'i le'u'o /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u dgu pa'o /
rnam pa bstan nas de dag gi sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
de la bcom ldan 'das ma thos pa yang rnyed par dka' na /
rab tu sbyor bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos las; sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas /
de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun /
dge ba'i bshes kyis mgon bcas pa /
'di mnyan pa yi snod yin no /
sangs rgyas bsten dang kun 'dri dang /
sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod pas /
len dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i /
snod du dam pa rnams bzhed do /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas shing bsod nams bsags pa dang /
tshul khrims dang thos pa la sogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das yum 'di nyan pa la thos pa snang ba'i snod yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no /
gang yang sngon gyi skye ba bdag tu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur dang yongs su 'dris pa dang ldan pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das yum 'dzin pa nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i bar gyi snod du 'gyur ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das yum 'di 'dzin pa nas de bzhin nyid du rna lam du grag cing rtogs pa ni nges par de dag gis lhag par bya ba byas pa la sogs pa yon tan gsum dang ldan pa yin no /
de dag 'dzin pa la sogs pa snang ba dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni lhag par bya ba byas pa la sogs pa yon tan gsum dang ldan pa dang sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa la sogs par nges pa yin te /
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba nas /
de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gang gsungs pa la /
de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyis so /
bsgrub pa dang zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gis so /
rnal 'byor du byed pa zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis so /
dad pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
de kho na nyid ma yin par yang dag par yid ches pa ni dad pa'o /
'dzin par 'dod pa ni bzod pa'o /
spong bar mi 'dod pa ni bzod pa'o /
tshig dang don nyan par 'dod pa ni 'dun pa'o /
brtson 'grus ni spro ba'o /
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du gcod pa chags pa dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang le lo'i gnyen po ni bag yod pa'o /
mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang yid ches pa'i lung gis nges pa'i dngos po la 'di nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes nges par 'dzin pa ni mos pa'o /
mi 'phrogs pa'i rten byed pa'i las can te /
de gtso bor byed pa ni pha rol rgol ba la sogs pas mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir ro /
yongs su dris pa dang yongs su dri bar bgyis pa zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi gnas thams cad yongs su dris pa dang gang gis the tshom gyi lan de byas pas ni yongs su dris par byas pa'o /
de ltar ngo mtshar ci che zhes bya ba ni 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o /
'di la mos par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dang sbyar ro /
de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la de ltar zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa phan tshun rgyu nyid du nges par bstan pa la phyag bya ba'i don te de ni rnyed par dka' ba nyid do /
de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas spobs pa skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sbyor ba'i skabs 'byed do /
sbyor ba'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
gzugs la sogs la mi gnas phyir /
de la gnas pa bkag pa'i phyir /
de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir /
de rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir /
de dag tshad ni med phyir dang /
tshegs chen yun ring rtogs pa'i phyir /
lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang /
nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang /
byang chub nyid dang myur ba dang /
gzhan don 'phel med 'grib med phyir /
chos dang chos min sogs mi mthong; /
gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong /
gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang /
de yi ngo bor rnam mi rtog /
'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang /
de ni dag pa'i mtshams dang bcas /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de ni zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba ste /
rnam pa bstan nas de nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa ni sbyor ba ste /
de la bkag pa gnas pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs la sogs pa la mi sbyor ba ni sbyor ba de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir ro /
de bzhin nyid kyang zab pa'i phyir zab pa'i sbyor ba'o /
de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa la gting dpag dka' ba'i sbyor ba'o /
de bzhin nyid du tshad med pa yin pa'i phyir tshad med pa'i sbyor ba'o /
dang zhes bya ba ni de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang sbyor ro /
de la zhes bya ba ni zab pa'i phyir dang rtogs par dka' pa' phyir dang tshad med pa'i phyir de dag la sbyor ba bkag pa'i sbyor ba gsum ste /
zab pa nyid du mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba dang rtog par dka' ba nyid du mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba dang tshad med pa nyid du mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'o /
gang sbyor ba zab pa la sogs pas spangs pa'i phyir ngan song du yun ring du gnas nas tshegs chen pos yun ring po nas mngon par rtogs pa ni de ni tshegs chen pos yun ring po nas mngon par rtogs pa'i sbyor ba'o /
lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sbyor bas ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te /
de ni lung bstan pa thob pa'i sbyor ba'o /
phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir /
phyir mi ldog pa nyid thob pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba'o /
nges 'byung zhes bya ba ni yun ring por bar du gcod pa'i sa las nges par 'das pa'i sbyor ba ni /
nges par 'byung ba'i sbyor ba'o /
bar chad dang ldan pa ni bar chad dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba'o /
bar chad med par lung bstan pa ni bar chad med pa'i sbyor ba'o /
byang chub nye dang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir nye bar rtogs pa de ni nye bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sbyor ba'o /
myur ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub ces bya bar sbyar te /
gang gi phyir ring po mi thogs par 'dis byang chub 'di rtogs par 'gyur te /
de ni myur bar rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sbyor ba'o /
gzhan gyi don gyi sbyor ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi sbyor ba'o /
gang du phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med par mthong ba de ni 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa'i sbyor ba'o /
chos dang chos min sogs mi mthong /
zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe chos la sogs pa nyid kyis chos rnams mi mthong ba de'i tshe ni chos la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba'o /
gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong /
zhes bya ba ni gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag mi mthong ba ni gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa mi mthong ba'i sbyor ba'o /
gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang /
de yi ngo bor rnam mi rtog /
ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa ma 'ongs pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ni de'i ngo bo'o /
gsum po 'di dag la stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnam par mi rtog pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba'o /
'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang /
zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba'i 'bras bu rin po che de dag sbyin par byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das yum 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba ste /
'bras bu rin po che sbyin pa'i sbyor ba'o; /
dag pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid dag pa'i phung po'i sbyor ba ste /
rnam par dag pa'i sbyor ba'o /
mtshams dang bcas zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba ni dus ji tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das yum bris pa la sogs pa 'grub pa de de tsam gyis 'grub pa'o /
brtson 'grus brtan pa gang gis sbyor ba byed pa ni mtshams dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba'o /
de ltar 'di dag ni sbyor ba nyi shu rtsa gsum mo /
koo shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de dag rim gyis gsungs te /
spyod pa zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa'o /
gzugs la mi gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o /
gzugs mi gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa ste mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
gang gi phyir mi gnas pa de'i phyir rnal 'byor du byed pa ni sbyor ba thob pa'o /
de ni gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa la sbyor ba'o /
koo shi ka gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mi sbyor ba ming dang mtshan ma dag la'o /
de ltar na mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni yang dag par mi shes so zhes bya ba'i don to /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro /
'di ni gzugs la sogs pa la mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'o /
de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas zab mo zhes bya ba yan chad kyis ni zab pa'i sbyor ba gsungs te /
'dir bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo zhes bya ba la /
gzugs la sogs pa zab pa ni de bzhin nyid kyis zab pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so /
'di ni zab pa'i sbyor ba'o /
bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka'o zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nges par rtogs par nus pa ma yin nam /
ci'i phyir rtogs par dka' zhe na /
gzung bar dka'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
gang gi phyir nges pa las ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o /
de las ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
de'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o /
'di ni rtogs par dka' ba'i sbyor ba'o /
bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa tshad med pa'i phyir te /
de bas na tshad med pa'i sbyor ba'o /
