'di ni chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
chos rnams la rab tu rnam par dbye ba byas pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o /
dngos po'i don du spyod pa ma yin te /
gang gi phyir ma byas pa dang rnam par ma byas pa dang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ni chos thams cad de /
'di ni dngos po'i ched du byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
gal te chos thams cad ni ma byas pa rnam par ma byas pa /
mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de lta bu yin mod kyi /
ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas /
gang la la zhig mngon par sprul te /
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang theg pa gsum gyis sems can yongs su grol bar mdzad pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no /
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang ste /
'di ni theg pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa'o /
gal te yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang sprul pa la khyad par med pa de ltar yang yon yongs su dag par 'gyur te /
yathā hi tathāgate pratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā ānirupadhiśeṣānnirvāṇānna kṣīyate tathāḥ nirmitepi 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i yon ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang zad par mi 'gyur te /
de bzhin du sprul ba la yang ngo /
tathā tathāgatāyākāśe puṣpāṇi kṣipatastathā namo buddhāyeti bruvato manasi kurvato vā saṃjñāṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtya yā hi dharmatā tathāgatasya saiva vinirmitasyāpīti dakṣiṇāpariśuddhivikalpaḥ /
caryā pāramitādiḥ 		de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la nam mkha' la me tog gtor ba'am /
de bzhin du sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smra ba'am /
yid la byed pa'am /
mtshan mar byed pa ste /
gang sprul pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos kyis 'dra'o /
'di ni yon yongs su ma dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'o /
tasyā vikopanaṃ bhedanam /
kutaḥ? dharmatātaḥ /
dānapāramitāyā yāvat prajñāpāramitāyā vā /
evaṃ yāvatsarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmateti 		de ni rnam par 'khrug pa ni phye ba'o /
ga las she na /
chos nyid las te /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ces bya ba'i bar du'o /
de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyi chos rnams ji ltar rnam par 'khrug pa yin zhe na /
kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā dharmā vikopitāḥ? nāmanirmitā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭā dharmāṇāṃ sūcanāya /
kathaṃ paro 'vatarediti /
na tu dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopiteti caryāvikopanavikalpaḥ /
caturthaṃ vikalpanavakamadhikṛtya śāstram 		ji ltar gzhan dag 'jug par 'gyur snyam nas /
ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams mtshon te /
chos rnams ston pa yin gyi /
chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par 'khrug pa ni ma yin no /
'di ni chos nyid 'khrug pa la rnam par rtog pa'o /
dgu tshan bzhi pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbang du byas nas /
[157] sattvaprajñaptitaddhetuviṣayo navadhāparaḥ /
bhāvanāmārgasambaddho vipakṣastadvighātataḥ 		bstan bcos las /
sems can btags dang de rgyu yi /
yul can bsgom pa'i lam 'brel pa /
de la gnod pa byed pa yis /
[158] sarvajñatānāṃ tisṛṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ trividhābṛttau /
śāntimārge tathatādisamprayogaviyogayoḥ 		mi mthun phyogs gzhan rnam pa dgu /
thams cad mkhyen nyid gsum dag gi /
bdag nyid ji bzhin sgrib rnam gsum /
zhi lam de bzhin nyid sogs dang /
(RSt_157) /
[159] asamatve ca duḥkhādau kleśānāṃ prakṛtāvapi 		mtshungs par ldan dang mi ldan dang /
mi mnyam sdug bsngal la sogs dang /
dvayābhāve ca sammohe vikalpaḥ paścimo mataḥ nyon mongs rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /
gnyis su med la kun rmongs la /
rnam par rtog pa tha mar bzhed /
yairākārairliṅgairnimittairdharmāḥ sūcyante tāni tathāgatenānubuddhāni ces bya ba gsungs te /
rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma gang gis mtshon pa'i chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen te /
tenocyate tathāgatasya sarvākārajñateti sarvākārajñatāsammohavikalpaḥ /
yau ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgau ye ca bodhimārgāste sarve bodhisattvena paripūrayitavyāḥ /
taiśca mārgakaraṇīyaṃ kartavyam /
na ca bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyāparipūrya praṇidhānamaparimucya sattvānapariśodhya buddhakṣetraṃ tenocyate bodhisattvasya mārgajñateti mārgajñatāsammohavikalpaḥ /
etāvadeva sarvaṃ yadādhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ /
te ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sarvajñateti sarvajñatāsammohavikalpaḥ 		des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces brjod do /
'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
yang gang dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang yang gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i lam de dag /
byang chub sems dpas yongs su rdzogs par byas shing lam gyi bya ba de dag byas te /
smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang sems can yongs su ma smin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma sbyangs par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed de /
des na byang chub sems dpas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa zhes brjod de /
'di ni lam shes pa la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
phyi dang nang gi chos 'di thams cad de yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis shes te /
lam thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad ni ma yin no /
des na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la thams cad shes pa zhes brjod de /
'di ni thams cad shes pa la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ nirvāṇaṃ gatā sarvārthā vā gatānayeti prajñāpāramitā /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ vā pāraṃ paramo 'rtho 'bhinnaṃ tattvaṃ so 'syāṃ tathāgatairduṣṭaḥ /
api cāsyāṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭirdharmadhāturantargatastenocyate prajñāpāramiteti śāntimārgasammohavikalpaḥ /
neyaṃ tathatādibhiḥ saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā /
tathāhīyamarūpānidarśanāpratighā, ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇātvāditi tathatādisaṃyogaviyogavikalpaḥ 		chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu mya ngan las 'das par song ba 'am /
'phags pa thams cad 'dis gshegs pas na /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
yang na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad pha rol don dam pa tha dad pa med pa de kho na nyid 'di gzigs pa'o /
gzhan yang 'di'i khongs su de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod de /
'di ni zhi ba'i lam la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
'di ni de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin /
mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di ni gzugs med pa /
bstan du med pa /
thogs pa med pa ste /
'di lta ste /
mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro /
'di ni de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
neyaṃ kaiścidācchettuṃ(?) śakyate /
tasmādasādhāraṇīkṛtya samatvasammohavikalpaḥ 		gang gis kyang 'di dpyad par mi nus pa de'i phyir /
thun mong ma yin pa ste 'di ni mi mnyam pa la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
asyāṃ caratā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgādyartheṣu caritavyamiti duḥkhādisammohavikalpaḥ 'di la spyod pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi don la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
'di ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
rāgādayo nārtho nānartha iti prakṛtisammohavikalpaḥ 'dod chags la sogs pa don kyang ma yin don med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni rang bzhin la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
yathā na dvayo nādvayo dharma upalabhyate tathā nadvayaṃ nādvayaṃ dharmamanuprāpnotīti dvayābhāvasammohavikalpaḥ 'di ltar gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su byar med pa ma yin pa'i chos dmigs pa de bzhin du /
gnyis kyi chos rjes su thob pa med pa yin te /
'di ni gnyis kyi dngos po la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
ityuktāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśabhdāvanāheyāḥ vikalpāḥ de ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa sum cu rtsa drug bstan to /
evaṃ tāvabhdavatu doṣāṇāṃ kṣayo guṇānāṃ punaḥ kathamudaya ityata āha- de ltar re zhig skyon rnams zad na yang yon tan rnams ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
[160] āsāṃ kṣaye satītīnāṃ cirāyocchvasitā iva yams nad 'di dag zad nas ni /
yun ring lon nas dbugs phyin ltar /
sarvākārajagatsaukhyasādhanā guṇasampadaḥ rnam pa kun du 'gro ba yi /
bde sgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun /
[161] sarvāḥ sarvābhisāreṇa nikāmaphalaśālinam /
bhajante taṃ mahāsattvaṃ mahodadhimivāpagāḥ /
(RSt_158) /
prakṛtisiddhā guṇāḥ kevalamākrāntā [a]guṇairāśān cireṇa 		rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin /
'bras bu mchog gis sba ba yi /
sems dpa' chen po de la ni /
rnam pa kun du ston par byed /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
yon tan ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin te /
skyon gyis zil gyis mi non pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
yun ring po nas skyon zad na /
doṣakṣayāt praśatā (? prakaṭā?) i(e)va taṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhajante sarvadoṣaprahāṇaśālinam bos pa bzhin du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sten par byed do /
skyon thams cad spangs pa ni sba ba'o /
'abhisāraḥ' saṃdohaḥ /
śeṣaṃ gatārtham /
tasyetyādi vivarjayiṣyatīni yāvat /
iti bhāvanāmārgasyānuśaṃsaḥ /
ānantaryasamādhirvaktavyaḥ /
tamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[162] trisāhasrajanaṃ śiṣyakhaḍgādhigasampadi 		rnam pa ni thams cad du'o /
lhag ma ni rtogs sla'o /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba nas /
spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi phan yon no /
bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin brjod par bya ste /
de'i dbang du byas nas /
bstan bcos las /
stong gsum skye bo nyan thos dang /
bodhisattvasya ca nyāme pratiṣṭhāpya śubhopamāḥ bse ru'i rtogs pa phun tshogs dang /
byang chub sems dpa' skyon med la /
bkod pa'i dge rnams dper mdzad nas /
[163] kṛtvā puṇyabahutvena buddhatvāpteranantaraḥ bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni /
sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de /
ānantaryasamādhiḥ sa sarvākārajñatā ca tat bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid /
antarayituṃ śakto 'ntaryaḥ /
na tathā anantaryaḥ svārtha'ṇ /
ānantaryaḥ samādhiḥ sa uktaḥ sūtre /
kathamānantaryaḥ? yathā 'buddhatvāpteranantaraḥ' /
avyavahitau hetuḥ kathamuktaḥ? 'puṇyabahutvena' /
tadapi kathamuktam? śubhaṃ puṇyaṃ tadevopamā /
tāṃ kṛtvā /
kathaṃ tacchubham? trisāhasrajanaṃ trisāhasralokadhātavīryā(yā)n sattvān 'pratiṣṭhāpya' /
kva? 'śiṣyakhaḍgādhigamasampadi bodhisattvaniyāme ca /
' śiṣyāḥ śrāvakāḥ khaḍgāḥ pratyekabuddhāsteṣām /
arthādgamyate bodhisattvasya ca prāṅniyāmāvakrānteradhigamasampattau bodhisattvaniyāme ca 		ces bya ba gsungs te /
bar du gcod par nus pa ni bar chad do /
de med pa ni bar chad med pa'o /
bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mdo las gsungs te /
bar chad med pa dang bar chad kyi rgyu ni ji ltar gsungs she na /
bsod nams mang po nyid kyis so /
de yang ji ltar gsungs she na /
dge ba ni bsod nams te /
de nyid dper mdzad nas dge ba ji lta bu zhe na /
ci stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa gang la bkod pa'o /
nyan thos ni slob ma rnams so /
bse ru ni rang sangs rgyas rnams te /
de dag gi rtogs pa'o /
sngar skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa'o /
kva punarevamuktaṃ puṇyabahutvam? mahatyorbhagavatyo bsod nams mang po nyid kyang gang du gsungs she na /
bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag las so /
'di ji ltar gsungs she na /
asyāṃ kathamuktam? aupalambhikabodhisattvoyāṃ (ttvasya) gaṃgānadīvālukopamakalpakṛtāddānamayātpuṇyādenaṃ samādhimantaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātramapi samāpadyamānasya bahutarapuṇyatvena dmigs pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byas pa'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams de dag pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la se gol gtogs pa srid du snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do /
'di rab tu byed pa 'di las ji ltar gsungs she na /
etatkārikāyāṃ kathamuktam? vināpi tena cārthagateścakārasyānuktasamuccayārthatvāt /
'sarvākārajñatā ca tat' iti /
tacca buddhatvaṃ sarvākārajñatālakṣaṇam /
[164] ālambanamabhāvosyāḥ (sya) smṛtiścādhipatirmataḥ 		yang med kyang yang gi don du 'gro ste /
yang ni ma gsungs pa'i don bsdu ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid /
ces bya ba ni de yang sangs rgyas nyid de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do /
'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de /
bdag po dran pa yin par bzhed /
ākāraḥ śāntatā cā [tra] /
ānantaryasamādheḥ 'ālambanamabhāvaḥ' sarvadharmāṇāṃ smṛtiradhipatipratyayaḥ 		rnam pa bzhi nyid ces bya ba gsungs pa la bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'o /
bdag po'i rkyen ni dran pa'o /
'ākāraḥ śāntatā' sarvadharmākārāstagamaḥ rnam pa ni zhi ba nyid de /
chos thams cad kyi rnam pa nub pa'o /
'atra' sarvākārajñatāyām- /
jalpājalpipravādinām /
vādināṃ jalpaiśca jalpaiśca prahṛtya yuddhaṃ vṛttaṃ 'jalpājalpi' 		rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di la /
rab tu smra ba rnams brgyud mar rgol te /
rgol ba ni smra ba dang smra ba'i mtshon chas 'debs pa'i tshul yod pa de ni brgyud mar rgol ba ste /
yathā daṇḍādaṇḍi /
ataḥ sūtram 		ji ltar dbyig pa dang dbyig pas lta bu'o /
de'i phyir mdo las /
sarvopāyakauśalyāni parigrahītukāmenetyādi /
(RSt_159) upeyata ityupāyaḥ sarvākārajñatā 		rab 'byor thabs la mkhas pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la thob par bya ba ma yin pas thabs te /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do /
tasmiṃ kauśalyāni vipratipattīnāmapohanāni de la mkhas pa ni log par rtog pa rnams sel ba ste /
de dag 'thob par 'dod pa'o /
tāni labdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāmiti /
ānantaryasamādhilakṣaṇāyām 		shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid do /
caritavyaṃ prayogato nirhārataśca /
nirhṛtya bhāvayitavyā /
bhāvitāyāṃ tasyāmanantarameva sarvākārajñatālābhe sarvavipratipattīnāṃ kṣayāditi bhāvaḥ 		spyad par bya ba ni sbyor ba dang sgrub ba dang sgom pa'o /
bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pas na /
log par rtog pa thams cad zad pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so /
abhinirharatīti yathālambanaṃ yathādhipati yathākāraṃ ca saṃmukhīkaroti mngon par grub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa ji lta ba dang bdag po ji lta ba dang rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon du byed pa'o /
abhinirhartavyā iti svarasavāhinaḥ kartavyāḥ /
atyayeneti /
atyayo 'vadhiḥ 		mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis sgrub par byed pa'o /
'das pa zhes bya ba ni mtshams bcad pa'o /
abhavyaścetyādinā tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasyānuśaṃsamāha nantvānantaryasamādhisamāpannasya rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa'i phan yon gzhan gsungs pa yin te /
bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa ni ma yin no /
na hi tasya bhūyo durgatiḥ sugatirvā bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de ni /
yang ngan 'gro 'am /
anantarameva bodhiprāptaiḥ /
śeṣaṃ sugamamāparivartasamāpteḥ /
vipratipattīradhikṛtya śāstram- 		bde 'gror 'gro ba med do /
lhag ma le'u rdzogs pa'i bar du ni rtogs sla'o /
log par rtog pa'i dbang du byas nas /
bstan bcos las /
[165] ālambanopapattau ca tatsvabhāvāvadhāraṇe /
sarvākārajñatājñāne paramārthe sasaṃvṛtau 		dmigs pa 'thad dang de yi ni /
ngo bo nyid nges gzung ba dang /
rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes dang /
dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob dang /
[166] prayoge triṣu ratneṣu sopāye samaye muneḥ sbyor dang dkon mchog gsum pa dang /
thabs bcas thub pa'i rtog pa dang /
viparyāse samārge ca pratipakṣavipakṣayoḥ phyin ci log ni lam bcas dang /
gnyen po mi mthun phyogs dag dang /
[167] lakṣaṇe bhāvanāyāṃ ca matā vipratipattayaḥ mtshan nyid dang ni sgom pa la /
smra ba rnams kyi log rtog pa /
sarvākārajñatādhārāḥ ṣoḍhā daśa ca vādinām rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid rten can /
rnam pa bcu drug dag tu bzhed /
'ṣoḍhā daśa' ceti ṣaṭdaśa ca ṣoḍaśetyarthaḥ /
kutaḥ ṣoḍaśa? yatastāḥ ṣoḍaśasvartheṣu ālambanopapattyādiṣu /
kathaṃ tarhi 'sarvākārajñatādhārāḥ' ālambanādistāsāṃ viṣayaḥ? viṣayasambandhāttu sarvākārajñatāyāṃ viṣayatvopacāraḥ /
tadyathā rājaputre 'parāddho rājanyaparāddho bhavati 		ces bya ba gsungs te /
drug dang bcu ni bcu drug ces bya ba'i don to /
ci'i phyir bcu drug yin zhe na /
gang gi phyir dmigs pa 'thad pa la sogs pa'i don bcu drug po de dag la'o /
de ltar na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten can yin zhe na /
dmigs pa la sogs pa ni de dag gi yul la'o /
yul dang 'brel pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yul du nye bar gdags te /
dper na rgyal po'i bus nyes pa byas na /
rgyal pos nyes pa byas par 'gyur ba lta bu'o /
vipratipattayopi prāyeṇa pratipakṣapāṭhādunnetavyāḥ log par rtog pa rnams ni phal cher gnyen pos gnod par rtog par byas pa'i /
tatrādyā vipratipattiḥ /
yadi sarvākārajñatāyā abhāva ālambanaṃ sa tarhi katamaḥ? yadi dharmāṇāṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvastadevaṃ bhrāntiḥ syādvālavijñānavat /
atha paratantraḥ sa kathamabhāvaḥ? atra parihāraḥ /
yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ /
nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ svayamabhāvāt 		de la log par rtog pa dang po ni gang de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa dngos po med pa de gang yin /
gal te gang gi phyir chos rnams kyi kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo de nyid yin na ni 'khrul par 'gyur te /
kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bzhin no /
ci ste gzhan gyi dbang de ji ltar med ce na /
'dir lan ni gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni med pa ste /
chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba ni med do /
api ca tathatā svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ sā cābhāva ityālambanopapattau vipratipattiḥ /
(RSt_160) 		gzhan yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med de 'di ni dmigs pa 'thad pa la log par rtog pa'o /
gal te chos thams cad dngos po med pa yin na /
yadyabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kenopāyakauśalyenādikarmiko dānādiṣu carati? deyadāyakadānādīnāmabhāvasvabhāvāvadhāraṇameva tasyopāyakauśalyamiti tatsvabhāvāvadhāraṇe vipratipattiḥ las dang po pa thabs la mkhas pa gang gis sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyod ce na /
sbyin par bya ba dang len pa dang sbyin bdag ngo bo nyid med par nges par gzung ba nyid ni de'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no /
'di ni de'i ngo bo nyid med par nges par gzung ba la log par rtog pa'o /
dṛṣṭasatyasya tarhi kimupāyakauśalyam? sa āryeṇa cakṣuṣā dharmān vyavalokayan bhāvamapi paratantraṃ svabhāvaṃ nopalabhate /
saṃyogikena svabhāvena parikalpitena vā tasyāpyabhāvāt /
kiṃ punarabhāvaṃ parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ, tasyātyantamasattvāt 		de lta na bden pa mthong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
des ni chos rnams 'phags pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa yin te /
gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs te /
sbyor ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid dam /
kun du brtags pa de yang med pa'i phyir ro /
dngos po gzhan kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid lta ci smos te /
de ni shin tu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
sa dānādau caran deyadāyakadānādīn pratyekamabhāva iti saṃjānīte de sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyod pa na sbyin par bya ba dang len pa dang sbyin bdag so sor med do zhes yang dag par shes pa yin te /
bhāvābhāvānupalambhe kathamabhāvaṃ saṃjānīte? saṃvṛtyā na tu paramārthena /
iha dānādayaḥ sarve mārgaprakārāḥ sarvākārāḥ /
teṣu jñātā(to) bhāvābhāvānupalambhaḥ /
tato jñānaṃ koṭiṣvabhāvasaṃjñeti sarvākārajñatājñāne vipratipattiḥ /
yā saṃvṛtiḥ sa eva paramārthaḥ 		dngos po dang dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa ni ji ltar med par shes pa yin zhe na /
kun rdzob tu yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no /
'dir sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lam gyi rnam pa ste /
rnam pa thams cad shes pa de ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa'o /
de la mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du 'du shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la log par rtog pa'o /
gang kun rdzob nyid don dam pa ste /
eta ekaiva tayostathatā /
api tu skandheṣu bhāvasaṃjñināṃ tatparihārārthamabhāva iti saṃvṛtyā nirdiśyate 'bhāvasaṃjñināṃ bhāva iti 		gang gi phyir de dag de bzhin nyid du gcig pa nyid do /
'on kyang phung po rnams la mngon par 'du shes pa de dag la lan gdab pa'i don du kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas /
dngos po med pa zhes bya ba dang dngos por 'du shes la dngos po'o zhes bstan te /
paramārthato na bhāva upalabhyate nāpyabhāva iti satyadvaye vipratipattiḥ don dam par ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa yang mi dmigs so /
'di ni bden pa gnyis la log par rtog pa'o /
prayogaścaryā sbyor ba ni spyod pa'o /
kathaṃ caryā? śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
sarvāsu ca śūnyatāsu dānādau ca sarva trakoṭitrayānupalambheneti prayoge vipratipattiḥ /
buddha iti karmaṇi niṣṭhā 		chos thams cad stong pa yin na /
ji ltar spyod ce na /
sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi stong pa nyid yin pa la /
thams cad 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'o /
'di ni sbyor ba la log par rtog pa'o /
tato jñātaḥ sarvo buddhaḥ syāt /
atha buddhavāniti buddhaḥ kena kartari ktaḥ? sarvaśca cetano buddhaḥ syāt 		sangs rgyas zhes bya ba las kyi rkyen dang sbyar na shes bya thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro /
ji ste byed pa'i rkyen dang sbyar nas rtogs pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas yin na ni sems dang ldan pa thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
atrottaram /
bhūtārtha iti buddhaḥ 		'dir lan ni yang dag pa'i don sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin pa'am /
bhūtā nya(ya)sya dharmā abhisaṃbuddhā iti vā yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba yin nam /
bhūto asyārthaḥ pratividdha iti vā /
abhisaṃbuddhā yathāvat sarvadharmā asyeti vā /
caturṣvapi pakṣeṣu bahuvrīhau kṛte nairuktavidhiḥ kartavyaḥ 		yang dag pa'i don rab tu rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba yin pa'am /
'di la chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba yin pa ste /
phyogs bzhi char la yang 'bru mang po par byas nas /
nges par tshig gi byang chub par bya'o /
bhūtārtha ityartho jñeyaḥ /
tatsambandhādvodhaḥ /
samāsārthaḥ- bhūtamevārtho yasya bodhasya sa buddhaḥ 		yang dag pa'i don zhes bya ba la don ni shes bya'o /
de dang 'brel pa'i rtog pa ni bsdu ba'i don to /
gang la yang dag pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa yod pa de ni sangs rgyas so /
anyeṣāmavaśyaṃ kvacidbhrānteḥ /
bhūtārthaḥ kathaṃ buddhaḥ? bhūtasya bubhdāvo arthasya sattvaṃ iti bhāvaḥ /
bhūtā asya dharmā abhisambuddhā iti bhūtāḥ /
bhūtairarthaiḥ puruṣasya sambandho jñānakṛta eva /
iha tu prakarṣagaterabhisambodhaḥ kṛta iti pradarśanārthamabhisambuddhagrahaṇam /
asyeti samāsārthaḥ /
samāsastu dvayoreva padayoḥ /
tatra bhutaśabdasya bubhdāvo dhramasya dvitīyākṣaralopaḥ /
bhūto 'syārthaḥ pratividdha iti /
pratividdhaḥ pratyakṣārthaḥ /
tripado bahuvrīhiḥ 		gzhan dag pa ni nges par kha cig tu 'khrul pa yod do /
ji ltar yang dag pa'i don sangs rgyas yin zhe na /
buddha'i gnas su ni bud bzhag la /
aartha'i gnas su ni dha bzhag la /
sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bsams la /
yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa'i don ma yin pa'i don shes par byed pa nyid ni skyes bu dang 'brel ba pa'o /
'dir ni rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par byas pa yin te /
de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa smos te /
'di'i bsdu ba'i don ni tshig gnyis kho na la yin te /
de la buddha'i sgra la ni bud bya la /
dharm'a'i sgra la ni yi ge gnyis pa'i phyi'o /
yang dag pa'i don rab tu rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi don te /
tshig gsum ni 'bru mang po par bya ba yin te /
ddhaśabdātpūrvasya śabdasya curādeśaḥ dha'i sgra la ni snga ma kun la ni bu bzhag go /
abhisambuddhā yathāvatsarvadharmā asyeti /
matibuddhipūjārthebhyaśceti vartamāne ktaḥ 		'di la chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni blo dang rtogs pa dang mchod pa'i don la de ltar byung ba'i rkyen bya'o /
ktasya ca vartamāna iti (RSt_161) kartari ṣaṣṭhī /
atrādyasya padasya buśabdaḥ /
atha dvitīyasya takāraḥ /
tṛtīyasya dhaśabda iti buddharatne vipratipattiḥ /
atha dharmaratnaṃ katamat? bodhiḥ /
sarvadharmotkṛṣṭatvāt /
tatra yadi dharmatā dharmātpṛthageva gaṇyate, 'dvayamidaṃ dharmadharmatāsaṃgrahāt' iti vacanāt, tadā tāthāgataṃ jñānaṃ bodhiḥ /
iṇajādibhya iti budherbhāva iṇa /
atha dharmatāpi dharmādharmaprakṛtitvāt /
tadāsyaiva dharmaratnaṃ bhūtakoṭitvāt tattvaśikharatvādityarthaḥ /
tadā ca karmaṇi budheriṇa /
ubhayathāpi buddhistāthāgate jñāne pravartate prakarṣagateḥ 		de ltar byung ba'i rkyen byed pa pa yin pas drug par bya ste /
dang po'i tshig la ni bu bya /
gnyis pa la da bya /
gsum pa la ni dha'i sgra'o /
'di ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog la log par rtog pa'o /
de nas chos dkon mchog gang zhe na /
chos thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa nyid do /
de la gal te chos las chos nyid tha dad par bzhag ste /
chos dang chos nyid 'di gnyis ni yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig las te /
de'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la byang chub tu bzhag ste /
byang chub ni ngo bo'i rkyen dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
yang na chos ni chos nyid kyang yin te /
chos kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
de'i tshe ni de nyid chos dkon mchog ste /
yang dag pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir te /
de kho na nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
de'i tshe ni byang chub kyi las kyi rkyen dang ldan pa'o /
byang chub gnyi ka yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la 'jug ste /
khyad par du gyur ba'i phyir ro /
tatra dharmatāpakṣamadhikṛtyāha de la chos nyid kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas /
"bodhiḥ śūnyatā tathatā bhūtakoṭirdharmatā dharmadhātuḥ" iti byang chub ni stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings zhes gsungs te /
tatra śūnyatā lakṣaṇataḥ de la stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro /
tathatā nirvikāratvāt /
bhūtakoṭistattvaśikharatvāt /
dharmatā dharmaprakṛtitvāt /
dharmadhāturāryadharmāṇāṃ hetutvāt /
punarāha /
"nāmadheyamātrametat bodhiriti" iti /
itiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ /
nāmadheyamātrametaditi yo 'rthaḥ so 'rtho bodhirityarthaḥ /
nāmadheyānāmarthaśūnyatā bodhiriti yāvat /
punarāha /
"abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ" iti /
sarvajñajñānatathatāmātraprakhyānāt /
jñānapakṣamadhikṛtyāha /
"bodhistathatāvitathatānanyatathatānanyathābhāvo bodheḥ" iti /
tatra bodhestathateti bodhasya tathatā 		rnam par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid do /
de kho na nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i phyir /
yang dag pa'i mtha'o /
chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos nyid do /
'phags pa rnams kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings so /
yang byang chub ming tsam mo zhes gsungs te /
ming gi don gyis stong pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya ba'i bar du'o /
yang dbyer med pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don du'o zhes gsungs te /
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la de bzhin nyid tsam snang ba'i phyir ro /
ye shes kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas /
byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs te /
de la byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
tathaiva bodharūpeṇaiva bhāvo nālīkena rūpeṇa /
avitathatetyabhrāntatā /
ananyatathateti bodhādanyo 'līkastasya tathatā bodharūpatā 		de kho na bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i dngos po'i ngo bo yin gyi /
brdzun pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no /
ma nor ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul ba'o /
gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba la /
byang chub las gzhan pa ni brdzun pa ste /
de'i de bzhin nyid byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid do /
asatā tena rūpeṇa bodhasyaiva prakhyānāt /
tadviraho 'nanyatathatā 		med pa de ni ngo bo byang chub nyid la snang ba'i phyir te /
de dang bral ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid do /
ananyathībhāva iti /
bodhasya prakṛtiḥ svenātmanā prakāśaḥ 		gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin rang gi bdag nyid kyis gsal ba ste /
tasyānyathībhāvo 'līkenātmanā prakāśaḥ de las gzhan pa'i dngos po ni brdzun pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'o /
tadviraho 'nanyathībhāvaḥ /
sarvavibhramaviveko jñānasya bodhirityarthaḥ /
punarāha 		de dang bral ba ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ste /
de yang 'khrul pas dben pa'i ye shes ni byang chub ces bya ba'i don to /
"nāmanimittamātrametadvodhiriti" iti /
itiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ 		yang ming dang mtshan ma tsam 'di ni byang chub po zhes bya ba gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar te /
nāmanimittamātrametaditi yo bodhaḥ sā bodhirityarthaḥ ming dang mtshan ma tsam 'di zhes bya ba gang rtogs pa de ni byang chub ces bya ba'i don to /
prayoga eṣa bodherbodhiṃ sūcayati sbyor ba nyid byang chub tu mtshon pa yin gyi /
na tvayaṃ bodhiravikalpatvāttasyāḥ 'di byang chub ni ma yin te /
de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro /
tatra nāmetyarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ de la ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po'o /
teṣāmalīko 'rthasadṛśa ākāro nimittam /
punarāha 		de dag ni brdzun pa ste /
don 'dra ba'i rnam pa ni mtshan ma'o /
"buddhānāṃ bodhastasmadvodhiḥ" iti yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yin pa de bas na /
prakarṣagateriti bhāvaḥ /
punarāha "buddhairabhisambuddhā tasmādvodhiḥ" iti /
arthaḥ pradhānamasminvacane na śabdaḥ /
buddhānāmadhigatastasmādvodhirityarthaḥ /
ṣaṣṭhīsamāse kṛte pūrvapadasya bobhāvaḥ /
uttarapadasya dhiśabdaḥ śeṣaḥ /
umāśabdavanniyoga iti dharmaratne vipratipattiḥ /
saṃhatatvāt saṃghaḥ /
abhedyo 'cchedya ityarthaḥ /
kasmādabhedyaḥ /
kena vā /
samyaksambodherabhedyaḥ /
sadevakena samārakena lokena hīnabodherāhārakairdharmairakuśalaiśceti saṃgharatne vipratipattiḥ /
(RSt_162) /
'sopāye samaye muneḥ iti kārikāpāṭhe upāyakauśalamupāya uktaḥ /
viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇo nirdeśāt /
abhisamayaḥ samayaḥ ityuktaḥ 		byang chub ces gsungs te /
khyad par du gyur pa yin no zhes dgongs so /
yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bas na byang chub ces gsungs pa la /
tshig 'di don gtso bo yin gyi /
sgra ni ma yin te /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yin pa de bas na /
byang chub ces bya ba'i don to /
drug pa'i bsdu pa byas nas /
tshig snga ma la ni bo bya la /
tshig 'og ma la ni dhi gzhag go /
'di ni chos dkon mchog la log par rtog pa'o /
tshogs yin pa'i phyir dge 'dun te /
mi phyed pa dang mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
gang las mi phyed pa dang gang gis mi phyed pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi phyed pa dang lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa dang dman pa byang chub sgrub pa'i chos dang mi dge ba'i chos kyis mi phyed pa'o /
'di ni dge 'dun dkon mchog la log par rtog pa'o /
thabs bcas thub pa'i rtogs pa dang /
zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa'i tshig ste /
thabs la mkhas pa ni thabs kyis bstan te /
yul gyis yul can bstan pa'i phyir ro /
rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par rtogs pa bstan te /
ayo bodhaḥ /
sa(saṃ)śabdaḥ saṃmukhārthaḥ /
mithyājñānamajñānameveti bhāvaḥ /
muneriti bhāvapradhānam /
buddhatvasyetyarthaḥ /
upāyakauśalyaṃ bodherabhisamayaṃ ceti samudāyārthaḥ 		yang dag pa'i don mngon sum du rtogs pas na mngon par rtogs pa ste /
log pa'i shes pa dang mi shes pa ma yin no zhes bya bar bsams so /
thub pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po gtso bo'i rgyen byas te /
sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
thabs mkhas pa la byang chub mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i don to /
"avirahitasarvajñatācitto dānādiṣu carati koṭītrayānupalambhena /
na ca dānādīnāṃ vipākamātmani spṛhayati 		'khor gsum mi dmigs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa la re ba mi byed de /
kintu sarvasattvaparimocanāya samyaksambodhau pariṇāmayati" ityādikamupāyakauśalyaṃ vistareṇetyupāyakauśalye vipratipattiḥ 'on kyang sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de /
de la sogs pa thabs la mkhas pa rgya cher gsungs so /
'di thabs la mkhas pa la log par rtog pa'o /
astyabhisamayo niḥprapañcetyatra na bhāvo nābhāva ityabhisamaye vipratipattiḥ /
sūtre prapañcaśabdaḥ paṭhyate /
śāstre viparyāsaśabdaḥ /
ubhayorekārthatvāt /
rūpaṃ nityamanityaṃ rūpaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ rūpamātmānātmetyādayo viparyāsasyātibahavaḥ /
saṃkṣepato yāvānvikalpaḥ sa sarvaḥ prapañcaḥ 		spros pa dang bral ba'i mngon bar rtogs pa ni yod de /
gang la dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa ma yin pa'o /
'di ni mngon par rtogs pa la log par rtog pa'o /
mdo las ni spros pa'i sgra dang bstan bcos las ni phyin ci log gi sgra brjod na gnyi ga yang don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag dang bdag med pa la sogs pa gang yin pa'i phyin ci log ni rab tu mang ste /
mdor bsdus na rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa de thams cad ni spros pa'o /
aprapañcānna prapañcayatīti pratipakṣaḥ /
aprapañco dharmadhāturnirvikalpatvāt 		mi spro 'phro bar mi byed ces bya ba ni gnyen po'o /
mi 'phro ba ni chos kyi dbyings te /
rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
tanna prapañcayatīti na vikalpayatīti viparyāse vipratipattiḥ de 'phro bar mi byed pa ni rnam par rtog par mi byed pa'o /
'di ni phyin ci log gi log par rtog pa'o /
iha bodhisattvena durgatimārgā jñātavyāḥ sahetuphalaistebhyaśca sattvā nivārayitavyāḥ 'dir byang chub sems dpas ngan song gi lam rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas par shes par bya /
de dag las sems can rnams bzlog par bya ba nas /
evaṃ narakinannaragaruḍagandharvādimārgāḥ /
evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānām 		mi dang mi'am ci dang nam mkha' lding dang dri za la sogs pa'i lam dang de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa nas /
'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dang de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam nas /
evaṃ śrotaāpannamārgo yāvadarhanmārgaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgo bodhisattvamārgo buddhamārgaśca jñātavyaḥ sahetuḥ saphalaḥ dgra bcom pa'i lam gyi bar dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang sangs rgyas kyi lam rgyu dang 'bras bu dang bcas par shes par bya'o /
ye ca yasmin pale vyavasthāpanīyāstāṃsteṣu vyavasthāpayati yāvabudddhatve /
svayaṃ tu hīnayānabhūmīḥ sarvā (rva?) jñānena cātikramya bodhisattvayānamavakrāmatīti mārge vipratipattiḥ 		gang yang 'bras bu de la gzhag par 'os pa ni de dag de la rnam par 'jog par byed pas na /
sangs rgyas kyi bar du'o /
bdag nyid theg pa dman pa'i la las 'das te /
thams cad mkhyen pa mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa'o /
'di ni lam la log par rtog pa'o /
iha sarva evāryapudgalāḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātubhirbodhipakṣaiḥ pāramitādibhistatphalaiśca sarvāryadharmerna saṃyuktvā na visaṃyuktvā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ /
ya evaṃ na jānanti tān prati saṃvṛsyā nirdiśyate bodhipakṣā dharmā bodherāhārakā bodhyāvaraṇānāmapahārakā iti vipakṣapratipakṣayorvipratipattiḥ /
vistareṇa bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ deśitaṃ sattvānāmavatāraṇāya saṃvṛtyā paramārthatastena lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ nālakṣaṇe /
yataḥ sthita evaiṣa nityaṃ lakṣaṇadhāturiti lakṣaṇe vipratipattiḥ /
(RSt_163) /
yadyalakṣaṇāḥ pāramitādayo dharmāḥ kathamalakṣaṇānāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati? "nāsti subhūte 'bhāvasvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāviparyāsāt 		'dir 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dang de'i 'bras bu dang 'phags pa'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin /
gzugs med pa bstan du med par 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
gang de ltar mi shes pa de la kun rdzob tu byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub sgrub par byed pa bstan pa yin no /
'di ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po la log par rtog pa'o /
bcom ldan 'das ma las sems can rnams gzung bar bya ba'i don du kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas /
chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rgya cher bstan te /
don dam par ni mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa la bslab par mi bya ste /
gang gi phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa'o /
'di ni mtshan nyid la log par gol te /
pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa yin na /
de ltar mtshan nyid med pa de dag sgom par 'gyur zhe na /
rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni med de /
phyin ci log pa'i phyir ro /
api tu sarvāsāṃ dharmasaṃjñānāṃ bhāvanāvibhāvane prajñāpāramitā /
evaṃ yāvannāsti bhāvasaṃjñino dānapāramitā bhāvanā /
eṣohamasmai idaṃ dadāmītyevaṃ saṃjñinaḥ 		'on kyang dngos po'i 'du shes can gyis chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o /
de bzhin du dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med de /
'di la 'di bdag gis sbyin no zhes bya ba de lta bu ni dngos po'i 'du shes can no /
" evaṃ bodhipakṣādiṣu vaktavyam de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o /
dṛṣṭasatyāstu dharmāṇāṃ kevalamabhāvasvabhāvatāṃ bhāvayanti na bhāvasaṃjñayā nānyabhāvasaṃjñayā bden pa mthong ba rnams ni chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'ba' zhig sgom par byed de /
dngos po'i 'du shes su yang ma yin /
saṃjñā hi prapañcaḥ prajñāpāramitā tu niḥprapañceti bhāvanāyāṃ vipratipattiḥ /
avakīrṇakusumanāmāno bodhisattvā iha parivarte bodhau vyākṛtāḥ 		dngos po med pa'i 'du shes su yang ma yin te /
'du shes ni spros pa yin la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spros pa med pa yin pas so /
'di ni sgom pa la log par rtog pa'o /
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs 'di la me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan te /
atastairupalakṣitaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāmaṣṭaviṃśatitamaḥ parivartaḥ 		des na des mtshon pa'i le'u ni de'i le'u'o /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o /
29. anugamaparivarto nāmaikonatriṃśattamaḥ /
anupūrvābhisamaya idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ /
tamadhikṛtya śāstram- 		da ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya ste /
de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
sbyin pa'i shes rab bar dag dang /
[168] dānena prajñayā yāvadbuddhādau smṛtibhiśca sā sangs rgyas la sogs dran dang chos /
dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis te /
dharmābhāvasvabhāvenetyanupūrvakriyā matā mthar gyis pa yi bya bar bzhed /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
'anupūrvikriyā' anupūrvaśikṣā anupūrvapratipadyā pūrvamuddiṣṭā saṃprati nirdeṣṭavyā /
sā 'matā' iṣṭā /
kathamityāha /
dānenetyādi 		mthar gyis bya ba dang mthar gyis bslab pa dang mthar gyis bsgrub pa ni sngar bstan nas /
da ltar ni de bshad par bya ste /
bzhed pa ni 'dod pa'o /
gang zhe na /
sbyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
'dānena' iti dānapāramitayā sbyin pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
'prajñayā yāvad' iti prajñāpāramitayā /
yāvadgrahaṇācchīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā dhyānapāramitayā ca 		shes rab bar dag ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag go /
bar smos pas ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
'buddhādau smṛtibhiśca' iti buddhādiviṣayābhiranusmṛtibhiḥ sangs rgyas la sogs dran pa dang /
zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i yul la rjes su dran pa'o /
cakāro bhinnakramaḥ /
'dharmābhāvasvabhāvena' ceti bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ 		dang zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du sbyar te /
chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis kyang zhes bya bas ni dngos po gtso bor ston te /
dharmāṇāmabhāvasvabhāvatvena cetyarthaḥ chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis kyang zhes bya ba'i don to /
'iti' evaṃ 'sā matā' /
ataḥ sūtraṃ punaraparamityādi /
evamiti vakṣyamāṇena vākyatrayeṇa 		bar ni de ltar de 'dod pa'o /
de'i phyir mdo las /
gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
'di ltar zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i tshig gsum gyis so /
prajñāpāramitetyunupūrvakriyā shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni mthar gyis pa'i bya ba'o /
anugantavyeti veditavyā /
kathamityāha 		rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o /
ji ltar zhe na /
sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyā /
sarvadharmāsambhedataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyā /
sarvadharmāsambhavataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyeti 		chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
tatrādau sarvadharmāḥ (RSt_164) ṣaṭpāramitāḥ de la dang po'i chos thams cad ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin te /
tāsāmeva bodhimārgatvāt /
dharmaśabdasya ceha mārgavācitvāt 		de dag nyid byang chub kyi lam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
chos kyi sgra yang 'dir lam gyi tshig yin pa'i phyir ro /
sarvadharmāṇāmasaṅgatā niḥsaṅgatā nirvighnatā /
bodhisattvairanukramakaraṇīyeṣu prathamacittotpādādiṣu sattvaparimocanānteṣu tayā(thā?)sānugantavyā /
tadyathā- "prathamacittotpādamupādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ carannātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃśca dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati dānasya ca varṇa bhāṣate /
ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ /
sa tena dānena mahāntaṃ bhogaskandha pratilabhya dānaṃ dadāti vigatamatsareṇa cittena annaṃ pānaṃ vastraṃ vilepanaṃ śayanamupāśrayamanyadvā pariṣkāropakaraṇaṃ dadāti tadarthinām 		chos thams cad chags pa med pa ni ma chags pa ste /
bgegs med pa nyid do /
rim gyis sems can yongs su grol bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' des de rjes su rig par bya'o /
de ji ltar dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa gtong zhing gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jog par byed de /
sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod par byed /
gzhan gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su mthun par byed de /
de sbyin pa des longs spyod kyi phung po chen po thob po /
ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis bza' ba dang btung ba dang gos dang byug pa dang mal cha dang gnas dang gzhan yang bde ba'i yo byad de 'dod pa rnams la sbyin par byed do /
sa tena dānena sattvān śīle samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati de sbyin pa des sems can rnams tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jog par byed do /
sa taireva śīlādiskandhaiḥ samanvāgataḥ śrāvakādibhūmimatikrāmati bodhisattvāniyāmamavakrāmati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvān paripācayati sarvākārajñatāmanuprāpnoti dharmacakraṃ pravartayati /
sattvāṃstriṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārātpratimocayati /
evaṃ khalu dānenānupūrvakriyā /
tāṃ ca sarvānnopalabhate /
tathā hyasyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti /
yasya ca svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāva iti dānapāramitayānupūrvakriyā /
evaṃ śīlādibhirapi" iti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ ṣaḍanupūrvakriyāḥ 		de tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po dang ldan pa de nyid kyis nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa las 'da' bar byed /
byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par byed /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed /
sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed /
chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed /
sems can rnams theg pa gsum la 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed de /
de ltar sbyin pas mthar gyis bya ba byed kyang de dang sems can rnam la mi dmigs so /
de ltar 'di la ngo bo nyid med de gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med do /
'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis pa'i bya ba'o /
de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa drug kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mthar gyis pa'i bya ba'o /
sarvadharmāsambhedataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyeti /
sarvadharmāḥ ṣaḍanusmṛtayaḥ 		chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la chos thams cad ni rjes su dran pa drug go /
de rnams ji ltar chos yin zhe na /
tāḥ kathaṃ dharmāḥ? cittadhāraṇāt /
api ca puṇyamapi loke dharma ucyate /
tāśca bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyam 		sems 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan yang bsod nams kyang 'jig rten na chos su brjod la de yang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams yin no /
sarvadharmāṇāmasaṃbhedato 'bhinnatā samatā /
abhāvasvabhāvatvāt /
tayānugantavyeti pūrvavat 		chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa ni tha mi dad pa'i mnyam pa nyid de /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
des rjes su rig par bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no /
tathāhi- "bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādamupādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairabhāvasvabhāvānsarvadharmānadhimucya ṣaḍanusmṛtīrbhāvayati de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa la brten nas /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams la mos shing rjes su dran pa drug sgom par byed de /
tāḥ svayaṃ ca bhāvayati parāṃśca tāsu pratiṣṭhāpayati tāsāṃ ca varṇa bhāṣate /
ye cānye tāsu caranti teṣāṃ varṇavādi bhavati samanujñaḥ /
sa tāstathā bhāvayannabhāvasvabhāvayogena saptatriṃśataṃ(taḥ) bodhipakṣān yāvatsarvākārajñatāṃ paripurayati /
so 'bhāvasvabhāvenaiva sarvadharmānabhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartya yāvatsarvasattvān parimocayati /
tatra buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ na rūpādiskandhairna lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairna śīlādiskandhairna daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvibhdirna mahākaruṇayā na mahāmaitryā nāṣṭādaśabhirāveṇikairnāpi pratītyasamutpādato mānasikaroti /
tatkutaḥ? abhāvasvabhāvatvātteṣāmityanusmṛtiramanasikāro buddhānusmṛtiḥ /
sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kuśalā[ku]śalān dharmān manasikaroti /
teṣāmabhāvasvabhāvatvādityamanasikāro dharmānusmṛtiḥ /
(RSt_165) /
yosau bhagavataḥ srāvakasaṃghaścatvāraḥ puruṣayugā aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalāḥ svabhāvastasya nāsti 		de dag rang yang sgom par byed cing /
gzhan dag kyang de rnams la 'jog par byed /
gzhan gang dag de la spyod par byed pa de dag gi yang bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su mthun par byed do /
de dag la de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsgoms pa na /
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang nas /
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas /
sems can yongs su smin pa'i bar du byed do /
de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po ma yin /
mtshan dang dpe byad ma yin /
tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po ma yin /
stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin /
snying rje chen po ma yin /
byams pa chen po ma yin /
ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad ma yin /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa yang ma yin par yid la byed do /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o /
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
dge ba'i chos rnams dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yid la mi byed de /
de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
yid la mi byed pa 'di ni chos rjes su dran pa'o /
gang de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun skyes bu gang zag bzhi dang skyes bu gang zag chen po brgyad po ni /
yasya dharmasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāva ityamanasikāro saṃghānusmṛtiḥ ngo bo nyid kyis med de gang ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i chos de ni med de /
yid la mi byed pa 'di ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o /
tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratākhaṇḍe 'cchidre 'kalmāṣe 'parāmṛṣṭe bhujiṣye vijñapraśaste samādhisaṃvartanīye śīle sthitvā tacchīlamabhāvasvabhāvato manasikartavyamityamanasikāro śīlānusmṛtiḥ /
sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carannāmiṣaṃ vā aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā tyajan sarvaṃ tadabhāvasvabhāvato manasikarotītyamanasikāro yo(tyā)gānusmṛtiḥ 		de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyod pa na ma ral ba ma zhig pa ma 'dres pa mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin pa mthu dang ldan pa mkhas pas bsngags pa /
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i tshul khrims la gnas nas /
tshul khrims dngos po med par yid la byed do /
yid la byed pa 'di ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o /
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na zang zing dang chos dang yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad gtong na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la bya'o /
yid la mi byed pa 'di ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o /
ye te devāḥ śrotaāpannāścāturmahārājakāyikeṣu yāvatparanirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapannāste sarve 'bhāvasvabhāvā ityanusmṛtiramanasikāro devatānusmṛtiḥ /
iti ṣaḍbhiranusmṛtibhiḥ ṣaḍanupūrvakriyāḥ /
sarvadharmāsambhavataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyeti /
svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt dharmāḥ /
skandhā dhātava āyatanāni bodhipakṣāḥ pāramitā yāvatsarvākārajñateti sarvadharmāḥ /
teṣāmasaṃbhavata ityasaṃbhavajñānato 'nupūrvakriyā veditavyā /
asaṃbhavo 'bhāvasvabhāvatā /
tathā hi- "teṣāṃ nāsti svabhāvaḥ /
yasya svabhāvo nāsti so 'svabhāvaḥ /
sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādamupādāya sarvadharmāṇāmabhāvasvabhāvatāmadhimucya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni yāvatsarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayati /
so 'bhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmānabhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati 		de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na gang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas /
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du skyes pa'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i lha de dag ni med de /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do /
yid la byed par rjes su dran pa 'di ni lha rjes su dran pa'o /
'di ni rjes su dran pa drug pa ste /
rjes su dran pa drug gi mthar gyis pa'i bya ba'o /
chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar ni chos thams cad do /
de dag 'byung ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba med par shes pa'i phyir ro /
mthar gyis pa'i bya bar rig par bya ste /
'byung ba med pa ni 'byung ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
de ltar na de dag ni med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o /
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
dang po sems bskyed pa la brten nas /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams la mos par byas te /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi nas /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sgom par byed do /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams yang dag par rtogs nas /
chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed cing /
tribhiśca yānaiḥ sattvān saṃsārātparimocayati" iti dharmāṇāmabhāvasvabhāvatayā trayodaśyānupūrvakriyāḥ theg pa gsum gyis 'khor ba las sems can yongs su sgrol bar byed de /
'di ni chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mthar gyis pa'i bya ba ste bcu gsum pa bstan to /
ita ūrdhvaṃ codyāni svayamūhyāni parihārāstu vaktavyāḥ /
yadyabhāvasvabhāvāḥ pāramitā bhāvyante tadā tabhdāvanā niṣphalā turagaviṣāṇabhāvanāvaditi codyam 		de'i 'og tu rgol ba rang gis brtags nas lan brjod par bya ste /
gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sgom par byed na /
de sgom pa ni 'bras bu med de rta'i rva bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
chos thams cad 'gyur ba med pa dang mnyam pa med ces bya ba la sogs pa lan gsungs te /
parihāramāha /
sarvadharmā nirvikārasamā itītyādi 		'gyur ba med pa ni chos dbyings so /
de dang mnyam pa ni chos thams cad de /
nirvikāro dharmadhātustena samāḥ sarvadharmā nābhāvamātreṇa /
dharmadhātuścālambyamāna āryadharmāṇāṃ heturbhavati /
ata eva dharmadhāturitucyate /
tatkuto vaiphalyam? /
nanu pratyātmavedya ātmā vijñaptiśca /
ataḥ sati grāhake grāhyamapyastīti na yuktaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmabhāva iti codyam /
parihāramāha 		ma bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings la dmigs nas /
'phags pa rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur pa yin te /
de nyid chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod na /
de'i phyir 'bras bu med par 'gyur /
so so rang rig pa zhes bya bas bdag dang rnam par rig pa yod pa ma yin nam /
de'i phyir 'dzin pa yod pas gzung ba yang yod de /
des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya ba de mi rigs so zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
sarvadharmāṇāmamanātmavijñaptitaḥ prajñānubodhanata ityādi chos thams cad bdag med pa dang rnam par rig pa med par shes rab kyis rjes su rtogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs te /
anātmavijñaptita ityātmavilakṣaṇatvādanātmākāreṇa grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryādavijñaptyākāreṇa ca bdag med pa dang rnam par rig pa med pa zhes bya ba la /
bdag gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i rnam pa'o /
gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'o /
(RSt_166) prajñānubodhanata iti pramāṇena pratīteḥ shes rab kyis rjes su rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni tshad mas yid ches pa'i phyir ro /
ātmā hi nityaikarūpo jñātā na ca skandhādaya ithambhūtāḥ bdag ni rtag pa gcig pa'i ngo bo shes pa yin la /
gzugs la sogs pa ni de lta bur gyur pa ma yin no /
tasmādanātmatvena siddhāḥ de'i phyir bdag med pa nyid du 'grub po /
grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryācca /
ata eva ca vijñaptyākāreṇāpi siddhāḥ 		gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba de nyid kyis phyir yang rnam par rig pa'i rnam pa yang ma grub ste /
grāhakalakṣaṇatvāttasyāḥ /
grāhakābhāvādgrāhyamapi nāstīti siddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmabhāvaḥ 		de ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
'dzin pa med pa'i phyir gzung ba yang med de /
des na chos thams cad dngos po med par grub po /
rūpādiśabdairyebhilapyante ta eva rūpādayaḥ /
asti ca loke taisteṣāmabhilāpaḥ /
śrotṝṇāṃ vyavahāraḥ saṃvādaśca /
tatkuto 'bhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmiti codyam /
parihāramāha /
nāmamātreṇetyādinā 		gzugs la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba de nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa yin te /
de dag brjod pa 'jig rten na yang yod la nyan pa rnams la yang mi slu ba'i tha snyad yod na chos thams cad dngos po med pa de dag las zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
chos thams cad ming tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs so /
arthaśūnyaṃ nāma nāmamātram don gyis stong pa'i ming ni ming tsam mo /
tena te sarvadharmā abhilapyante /
na hi buddhyākāra eṣāmartho bāhyatvena prati [ya]te, bāhye ca pravṛtteḥ /
nāpi bāhya evārthaḥ, asatyapi bāhye śabdādarthagateḥ 		des chos de dag thams cad brjod pa na blo'i rnam pa de dag la don med do /
phyi rol nyid du rtogs pas phyi rol nyid du 'jug pa'i yang phyir ro /
phyi rol gyi don nyid kyang med de /
phyi rol med kyang sgra las don rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
buddhireva bāhyarūpeṇa śabdārtha iti cet /
na caitasyā artho rūpaṃ, atyantabhedāt /
abhede vā na visaṃvādaḥ syāt /
buddhimantaścārthavantā bhaveyuḥ /
tasmādarthābhāvānnāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante /
vyavahārastāvadastīti cedāha /
vyavahāraścetyādi /
na kvacidityarthābhāvat /
na kutaściditi vācakābhāvāt /
nāpi kaściditi na vāciko na ca kāyiko nāpi mānasaḥ /
vācyavācakayorabhāvāt /
sarvadharmā ityādinopasaṃhāraḥ /
avyavahārā avyāhārā iti teṣu tayorabhāvāt 		gal te blo nyid sgra las phyi rol gyi dngos por rtogs so zhe na /
de dag ni de la don gyi dngos po med de gzhan du tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
tha mi dad na ni blo dang ldan pas kyang don thob pas mi slu bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir don gyi dngos po med pas ming tsam dang tha snyad gdags pa tsam gyis brjod do /
gal te re zhig tha snyad tsam ni yod do zhe na /
tha snyad gdags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te gang du yang med ces bya ba ni don med pa'i phyir lus dang ngag dang yid kyang ma yin te /
brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o /
tha snyad med pa brjod du med pa zhes bya ba ni de rnams la de dag med pa'i phyir ro /
ata eva cāvyāhṛtāḥ /
nanu rūpādīnāṃ pramāṇavattvāt tacchūnyatā api pramāṇavatya iti tadālambanā prajñāpāramitā pramāṇavatī syāt 		de nyid kyi sgras med pa dang tshig med pa'o /
gzugs la sogs pa rnams tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir de'i stong pa nyid la sogs pa yang tshad dang ldan pa yin zhing de'i phyir de la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang tshad dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang /
na ceṣyata iti codyam /
parihāramāha /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ apramāṇata iti /
apramāṇatvāt 		mi 'dod pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
chos thams cad tshad med pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni lan gsungs te /
chos thams cad tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa nyid kyi phyir te /
tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ nāsti pramāṇamabhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
ākāśasyeva rūpābhāvalakṣaṇasya, tatastacchūnyatānāmapi nāsti pramāṇamavacchedakābhāvāt 		ji ltar dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir chos rnams la tshad med do /
nam mkha' la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du stong pa nyid de la yang tshad med de gcod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro /
tataḥ prajñāpāramitāyā apyālambanābhedāt /
yadi tarhi rūpādayo na santi kaitya(kimiti) nīlādayaḥ prakhyānti /
dharmanimittānyetāni na dharmavastūni 		des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang tha mi dad do /
gal te de lta na gzugs la sogs pa'i sngon po la sogs pa 'di dag kyang ji ltar snang zhe na 'di dag ni chos kyi mtshan ma yin gyi chos kyi dngos po ni ma yin no /
ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt, aprakāśātmanaḥ prakāśāyogācca gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i phyir dang mi snang ba bdag nyid snang ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro /
dharmanimittāni tu dharmabhrāntīnāmākārāḥ chos rnams kyi mtshan ma yang chos rnams kyi 'khrul pa'i rnam pa yin te /
tā hi prakāśarūpatvāt prakāśamānāstairasabhdirapi rūpaiḥ prakhyānti /
asatkhyātilakṣaṇatvāda bhrāntīnām /
yadyeva, na siddhayati prajñāpāramitā /
sā khalvabhrāntā sākārā tu buddhirbhrāntaiva /
na ca nirākārā buddhiḥ svapnepyanubhūyata iti codyam 		de yang snang ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir snang ba ni de dag med pa yin yang snang ste /
'khrul ba rnams la ni med pa'i mtshan nyid snang ba yin pa'i phyir /
gal te de lta na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi 'grub ste de ni 'khrul pa yang ma yin la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i blo ni 'khrul pa yin zhing rnam pa med pa'i blo ni rmi lam na yang nyams su myong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs te /
parihāramāha /
sarvadharmānimittata ityādinā /
sarvadharmeṣvānimittaṃ nimittāstamayājjñānasya nirābhāsatā nirākāratā /
tataḥ prajñāpāramitā veditavyā /
ākāraparivarjanādārūpyasamāpattivaditi bhāvaḥ /
nanvayaṃ vikalpanimittānāṃ parivarjanāddharmadhātoḥ samyaṅmanasikāro na punaḥ prajñāpāramiteti codyam /
parihāramāha sarvadharmanirvedhata ityādi /
(RSt_167) nirvedhaśabdenātra prativedha uktaḥ 		chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma nub ste /
shes pa snang ba dang rnam pa med do /
des na rnam pa spangs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya ste /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin no zhes bsams so /
'o na rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di spangs pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings yang dag par yid la byed pa ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni lan gsungs te /
nges par 'byed pa ni 'dir so sor rtog pa gsungs te /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ pariniṣpannena rūpeṇa prativedho jñānasākṣātkriyā sa teṣāṃ nirvedhaḥ chos thams cad yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis mngon sum du byas te /
de ni de dag gi nges par 'byed pa'o /
tata iti tena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā ityarthaḥ /
pūrvatra hetau tṛtīyā 		des na 'di ni de'i mtshan nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
tadantāttam /
tathā hi tasyaiva samyaṅmanasikārasya śrutacintābhāvanānvayādanābhogato 'nabhisaṃskārataḥ sarvadharmatathatāyā niṣprapañcajñānamutpadyate 		de ltar na de nyid legs par yid la byed pa'i thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i rim gyis lhun gyis grub pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa yid la byed cing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la spros pa med pa'i shes pa yang skye ba yin te /
sa tasyāḥ prativedhaḥ /
atha ko 'rthaḥ prajñāpāramitā(ta)yā śuddhiḥ? naitadyuktam /
tathā hi 		de ni de la so sor rtog pa'o /
ji ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang yin /
dag pa yin no zhe na /
kastayā śuddhyati? nātmā tasyāniṣṭeḥ, na cittaṃ pratikṣaṇabhedāt /
atha cittasantānaḥ /
sopyaśuddhaḥ śuddho vā prakṛtyā bhavet /
pūrvasmin pakṣe na tasya śuddhiraṅgārasyeva ghṛṣyamāna(ṇa)sya 		de ni mi rigs te 'di ltar de'i tshe dag pa gang yin /
bdag ni med pas mi 'dod la /
skad cig re re la 'jig pa'i phyir sems ni ma yin no /
ji ste sems kyi rgyun la yin no zhe na /
de yang rang bzhin gyis ma dag pa'am /
dag pa cig yin grang na /
phyogs dang po ltar na de ni dag pa ma yin te /
sol ba bdar ba bzhin no /
dvitīyapakṣe vaiyarthyam phyogs gnyis pa ltar na don med do /
atha cittadharmatā tayā śuddhyati ji ste sems kyi chos nyid dag pa yin no zhe na /
tadapyayuktaṃ nirvikāratvāttasyā iti codyam /
parihāramāha /
sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhita ityādi 		de yang mi rigs te de la ni rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs te /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtistasyāḥ pariśuddhistatastena prayojanena prajñāpāramitānugantavyā chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa de'i phyir dgongs pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rjes su rig par bya /
anuṣṭhātavyetyarthaḥ /
nanūktaṃ tadapyayuktaṃ nirvikāratvāttasyā iti /
uktametatkintu na yuktam /
hetoranaikāntikatvāt /
sā hi prakṛtyaiva pariśuddhā atanmayatvāt, āgantukenāvaraṇamalairmalinīkriyate nabha ivātra tamastuhinādibhiḥ /
paścātprajñāpāramitayaiva teṣāṃ nirāsāddhiśuddhayati pavanādibhirabhrādimocanādiva nabhaḥ 		rjes su gnas par bya'o /
de ni rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir de yang mi rigs so zhes smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
'di ni smras kyang 'on kyang mi rigs te /
gtan tshigs nges pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ni rang bzhin kho nas rnam par dag kyang /
de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir glo bur gyi sgrib pa'i dri mas dri ma can du byas pa yin te /
sprin dang mun pa dang khug rna la sogs pas bsgribs pas nam mkha' bzhin no /
phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de dag bsal bas rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
sprin la sogs pa bsal ba'i nam mkha' bzhin no /
nanu prajñāpāramitāpi bhagavataiva deśitā /
deśanā ca sanimittameva jñānamutpādayati 		shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan la /
bstan pas mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes pa skyed par byed do /
tataḥ prajñāpāramitāpi nirmimittā na yukteti codyam de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
parihāramāha /
sarvadharmāvacanata ityādinā /
sarvadharmāṇāmavacanāt /
vācāsvarūpamaprakāśya kevalaṃ sūcanāt /
paramārthadarśanāya prajñāpāramitānugantavyā /
nanu keyaṃ viśuddhiḥ? klaiśapakṣa (kṣaya) iti cet /
punarbhavaḥ syādeva /
atha hetukṣayājjanmāpi kṣīyate tadā pariśiṣṭā saṃskārā yāvadāyuravasthāya svayameva nirudhyante /
iti śrāvakabodhireva syānnānuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ /
satyāṃ vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti codyam 		chos thams cad tshig med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs te /
chos thams cad ni tshig med pa'i phyir /
tshig gis rang gi ngo bo mi ston te /
mtshon pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don dam pa ston pa'i don du rjes su rig par bya'o /
gal te las zad cing nyon mongs pa zad kyang /
yang srid du 'gyur ba'am /
ji ste zad pas skye ba yang zad de /
de 'du byed lhag ma tshe ji srid kyi bar du gnas nas rang nyid 'gag par 'gyur te /
des na byang chub kho nar 'gyur gyi /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni ma yin te /
de'i khyad par ni brjod par bya ba ma yin nam zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
parihāramāha tribhirvākyaiḥ tshig gsum gyis ni lan gsungs te /
sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhata iti /
anāśravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmakṣayāt prajñāpāramitānugantavyā 		chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zad pa med pa'i chos rnams mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
kathamanirodhaḥ? prahāṇasamatayā /
nirdeśatvena prahāṇādaviśeṣāt 		ji ltar 'gog pa med ce na /
spang ba dang mnyam pa ni nges pa med pas spang ba dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
sarvadharmāṇāmiti sāṃkleśikānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvāṇaprāptitaḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyā chos thams cad ces bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
yathā teṣāṃ tathatā tathaiva ta iti jñānaṃ tathatāsamatā ji ltar de dag gi de bzhin nyid de kho na bzhin du shes pa ni de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'o /
tayā kathaṃ tathatāsamatetyāha /
sarvadharmā ityādi /
nāgacchantyanāgatādadhvanaḥ, na gacchantyatītamadhvānaṃ, yata āgantavyaṃ yatra ca gantavyaṃ tayorasattvāt /
yataśca ajānānāḥ svasaṃvinmātre 'dhvanāmajñānāt 		de ltar de dag de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa yin zhe na /
chos thams cad mi 'ong zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
mi 'ong zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas so /
mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i dus su'o /
gang nas 'ong bar bya ba dang gang du 'gro bar bya ba de dag med pa'i phyir ro /
gang yang mi shes pa ni rang rig pa tsam gyis dus mi shes pa'i phyir ro /
jñānapūrvakatvācca gatyāgamanayoḥ /
tasmāt ajātā atyantājātita iti /
iyatā bodhisattvānāṃ svārthasampat prasādhitā 		mi shes pa'i phyir dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
de bas na mi skye shin tu mi skye zhes bya ba yin no /
'di tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to /
'di rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin na yang /
astu nāmaiṣāṃ svārthasampatsvārthasya loke prakṛtyaiva priyatvāttadartha duṣkarasyāpi vyavasāyāt 'jig rten na rang gi don la rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i phyir de'i don du dka' ba yang 'bad par byed do /
gzhan gyi don ni dka' ste /
(RSt_168) parārthastu duṣkaratvānāmānantyāt paratvādvipratipattiḥ bahulatvāditi codyam sems can rnams mtha' yas pa'i phyir dang gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang log par rtog pa mang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o /
parihāramāha ātmetyādinā /
ātmā para iti yo ca bheda [:] tasyādarśanātsarvasattvānāmātmasamatādarśanādityarthaḥ 		bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba lan gsungs te /
bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba ni dbye ba'o /
de mi mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad dang bdag mnyam pa nyid du lta'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
tathā coktamāryavimalakīrtinirdeśe "sumerusamāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimutpādya bodhicittamutpādyate de ltar yang 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las /
'jig tshogs la lta ba ri rab dang mnyam pa bskyed kyang /
tataḥ sarvadharmā virohanti" iti /
ita ūrdhvaṃ duṣkarasaṃjñāpratipakṣeṇa yathā yathā pravekṣaṇīyaṃ tadāha samudraśabdādarvāk /
tatrādau sattvānāmarhattvadiṣu duṣkara saṃjñānirāsārthamāha /
sarvadharmāḥ sattvavyahāraviṣayāḥ /
āryārhantaḥ yataḥ prakṛtipariśuddha /
dharmatāmātratvāt /
bhārānāropaṇatayeti niḥsvabhāvatvāt bhāvasya 		byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing de las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
de'i 'og tu dka' ba'i 'du shes kyi gnyen po de lta ji ltar so sor brtag par bya ba de ni chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba nas /
khong khro ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so /
de la dang po sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la sogs par dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir /
chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
chos thams cad ni sems can tha snyad du gdags pa'i yul te /
'phags pa dgra bcom pa'o /
gang gi phyir rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid tsam yin pa'i phyir ro /
khur mi khyer ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir khur mi khyer ba'o /
sattvavinayāya daśadigbuddhakṣetragamanena duṣkarasaṃjñānirāsāyāha sems can gdul bar bya ba'i don du phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na /
dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ adeśāpradeśata iti chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
adeśatvācca prakṛtisvabhāvata iti /
rūpādīnāṃ pratistasyāḥ svabhāvataḥ /
na hi tasyādeśo 'patanadharmatvāt /
nāpi pradeśo niraṃśatvādākāśavat 		yul med pa'i phyir dang phyogs med pa'i phyir ro /
rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de ni de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid de /
de ni yul na med de /
gnas pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
phyogs kyang med de /
cha med pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no /
saṃsārasukhe dustyajasaṃjñānirāsāyāha /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ nirodhe prahalādanatvaṃ sukhasaṃjñotpādanatvaṃ tataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyā 		'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bar dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni 'khor ba'i chos thams cad 'gag pa na rab tu sim par byed pa nyid kyis bde ba'i 'du shes skyed pa nyid de /
de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
"anityā vata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇaḥ /
utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhamiti /
itiśabdaḥ śrāvakavinayanasamāptyarthaḥ 		kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin /
skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste /
de dag myur du zhi ba bde /
zhes pa'o /
'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba rdzogs pa'i don to /
bodhisattvavinayanamadhikṛtyāha byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i dbang du byas nas /
aratyaviratita iti /
ratiratyantamutkaṇṭhā nirvāṇe /
tadabhāvo bodhisattvānāṃ aratiḥ /
viratiratyantamudvegaḥ saṃsāre 		dga' ba med cing dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te /
dga' ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la shin tu dga' ba'o /
dga' ba dang bral ba ni shin tu 'khor ba la skyo ba'o /
tadabhāvo bodhisattvānāmarati de med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'o /
tābhyāṃ prajñāpāramitā /
iti saṃsāranirvāṇāpratiṣṭhānāya pratyavekṣā 		de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa ste /
'di ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i so sor rtog pa'o /
araktāviraktatayetyādinā vairāgyāya pratyavekṣā /
sarvadharmā aśa(sa)ktā ityanabhiniviṣṭāḥ 		'dod chags med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la so sor rtog pa'o /
chos thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par ma zhen pa'o /
saṅgāsaṅgā saṅgatatpratipakṣau /
tadvigatāstayoranupalambhāditi vikalpaprahāṇāya pratyavekṣā 		chags pa dang ma chags pa dang de'i gnyen po de dang bral ba dang gsum mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par rtog pa spang ba la so sor rtog pa'o /
sarvadharmāḥ sarvamārgāḥ saptābhisamayāḥ chos thams cad ni lam thams cad de /
mngon par rtogs pa bdun no /
ta eva bodhiḥ /
bodhiprāpakatvāt /
ata evāha /
bodhiḥ /
buddhajñānāvabodhanatayeti /
avabodhana prāpaṇa iti bodhiḥ /
sulabhāvabodhanāya pratyavekṣā 		de nyid byang chub ste /
byang chub thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pa zhes gsungs te /
khong du chud pa ni thob pa ste /
de ni byang chub ste /
legs par rtogs pa thob pa la so sor rtog pa'o /
rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad de /
sarvadharmāsvalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt /
te śūnyānimittāpraṇihitā vijñānamātratvenārthavirahāt sarvanimittāstamayāt /
bhrāntiśarīre traidhātukapraṇidhānābhāvācca yathākramam 		de ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ste /
rnam par rig pa tsam nyid kyi don dang bral ba'i phyir dang mtshan ma thams cad nub pa'i phyir dang 'khrul pa'i ngo bo'i khams gsum pa la smon pa med pa nyid kyi phyir te go rims bzhin no /
iti mārgasaṃkṣepaḥ /
(RSt_169) 		'di ni lam la so sor rtog pa'o /
yadi vimokṣamukhānyapi teṣāṃ mārgastadā tāni bhāvayanto hīnabodhau pateyuḥ gal te de dag rnam par thar ba'i sgo'i lam la'ang sgom pa de'i tshe 'ang dman pa'i byang chub tu ltung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
ityata āha /
sarvatyādi /
sarvadharmāḥ sarvabodhisattvamārgāḥ /
bhaiṣajyamiti hīnayānaspṛhāmahāvyādhiharāḥ 		de'i phyir byams pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad do /
sman zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la dga' ba'i nad chen po sel ba'o /
kuta ityāha /
maitrīpūrvaṅgamatayeti /
yato maitrī teṣāṃ puraḥsarī 		gang gis she na /
byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
gang gi phyir byams pa chen po ni de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o /
api ca /
sarvacaturbhirapramāṇaiḥ saha viharaṇāt matrīvihāriṇaḥ 		gzhan yang de dag tshad med pa bzhi dang lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'o /
brahmabhūtā iti brahmaṇā tulyāḥ tshangs pa lta bur gyur ba zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'o /
tadvadeva doṣānutpādanādityuddeśaḥ /
sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti nirdeśaḥ 		de bzhin du zhe sdang mi len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
zhe sdang thams cad mi len pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o /
sarvadoṣā maitryādīnāṃ vipakṣo yathākramaṃ vyāpādo vihiṃsā aratiḥ pratighānunayau ca zhe sdang thams cad byams pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
go rims bzhin du gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa'o /
apraṇihitata iti nirvānotkaṇṭhāvirahāt smon pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
apratihatita iti saṃsāre atyantānudvegāt /
iti trayodaśavidho 'pūrvābhisamayaḥ sānuṣaṅgaḥ 		khong khro ba med pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro /
'di ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bcu gsum phan yon dang bcas pa'o /
skad cig ma'i gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs par brjod par bya ste /
ekakṣaṇābhisamayo vaktavyāḥ /
ekakṣaṇābhisambodho lakṣaṇena caturvidhaḥ /
iti yaḥ pūrvamuddiṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ caturvidhaḥ? sarvānāśravadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ /
vipākajasarvasāśravānāśravadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ /
alakṣaṇasarvadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ /
advayasarvadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaśceti /
tatra prathamamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[169] anāśravāṇāṃ sarveṣāmekakenāpi saṃgrahāt /
ekakṣaṇāvabodho 'yaṃ jñeyo dānādinā muneḥ /
[170] araghaṭṭaṃ yathaikāpi padikā puruṣeritā /
sakṛtsarva calayati jñānamekakṣaṇe tathā /
prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya 'ekaikenāpi dānādinā' cittakṣaṇena pravṛttena 'sarveṣāṃ' anāśravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ 'saṅgrahāt' ākṣepāt 'ekṣaṇāvabodhaḥ' ekacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ /
'ayaṃ' iti prathamaḥ /
tathā hi 'yathaikāpi pari(da)kā' 'puruṣapreritā sarvamaraghaṭaṃ(ṭṭaṃ) sakṛccalayati' tathaikapadamapi dānādicittaṃ prayuktaṃ sarvamanāśravadharmasandohaṃ sakṛdevākarṣayatītyarthaḥ /
ataḥ sūtraṃ samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti /
atra prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītatvāt, sarvākārajñatā manasikārāvirahitatvācca 		skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub /
mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi /
zhes bya ba la chos thams cad zag pa med pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa dang chos thams cad gnyis su med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'o /
de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
sbyin la sogs pa re res kyang /
zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir /
thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yi /
rtogs par 'di ni shes par bya /
ji ltar skyes bus zo chun rgyud /
rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na /
thams cad cig car 'gul ba ltar /
skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis 'jug pa na sbyin pa la sogs pa re res kyang /
zag pa med pa'i chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir te /
'dren pa'i phyir ro /
skad cig ma gcig pa'i rtogs pa ste /
sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'o /
'di ni zhes bya ba dang po'o /
de ltar na ji ltar skyes bus rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na /
zo chun gyi rgyud thams cad cig car 'gul ba de bzhin du /
sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni /
zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs cig car 'dren par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to /
de'i phyir med las /
rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir dang de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir zab cing rgya che ba ste /
gambhīrodāra ekaiko dānādicittakṣaṇaḥ (RSt_170) prajñāpāramitetyucyate sbyin pa la sogs pa re re'i sems kyi skad cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do /
tasyāparyantatā anāśravadharmākarṣakatvam de'i mu med pa ni mu med pa ste /
zag pa med pa'i chos rnams 'dren pa nyid de /
teṣāmanyonyasambandhasya cirapariśīlitatvāt sānugantavyā veditavyā de dag phan tshun 'brel pa ni yin ring du yongs su 'dren pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de rjes su rig par bya ba ni shes par bya'o /
kathamityāha /
samudrāparyantatayeti 		de ji ltar zhe na /
rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gambhīrodārasya samudrasyāparyantatā sakṛdaparyantanimnagājalākarṣakatvam zab cing rgya che ba'i rgya mtsho ni mu med de /
mu med pa ni cig car chu bo'i chu 'dren pa de nyid de /
tāsāṃ parasparasaṃsargāt /
tayā samudrāparyantatayā upamayā /
tadvadityarthaḥ 		de dag phan tshun 'dren pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
rgya mtsho mu med pa'i dpe des de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to /
iti sarvānāśravadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ 'di ni zag pa med pa'i chos sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste dang po'i /
dvitīyamadhikṛtya śāstram- gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[171] vipākadharmatāvasthā sarvaśuklamayī yadā gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi /
rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin /
prajñāpāramitā jātā jñānamekakṣaṇe tadā rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes /
de yi skad cig gcig ye shes /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
vipākajo dharmo vipākadharmastabhdāvastattāsāṃ 'avasthā' asyā iti yathoktā prajñāpāramitā /
'sarvaśuklamayī' iti sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ sāśravā anāśravāḥ /
ye purvamanena niḥsvabhāvatayā bhāvitāste paścādvipākajāḥ 		rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos ni rnam smin gyi chos so /
de'i dngos po ni de nyid do /
de'i gnas skabs 'del yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
chos dkar thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /
gang dag zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad 'dis sngon ngo bo nyid med par bsgoms pas /
de dag kyang phyis rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'o /
ataḥ prakṛtyaiva teṣāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyasaṃvedinī des na rang bzhin nyid kyis de dag ngo bo nyid med par yang dag par rig ste /
tasmātsarvaśuklamayī de'i phyir dkar po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no /
īdṛśī sā yadā 'jātā' sampannā 'tadā' 'jñānaṃ' cittaṃ 'ekakṣaṇe ' teṣu sarveṣvanābhogena /
anāśraveṣu sarveṣu sābhogaḥ prathamaḥ /
ayaṃ tu dvitīyaḥ sāśravānāśravanirābhogaśca /
ataḥ sūtram /
gaganāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti /
prajñāpāramitāyāḥ vipākadharmatāvasthā sarvaśuklamayī ca 		'di lta bu de gang gi tshe skyes pa ni phun gsum tshogs pa ste /
de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis de dag thams cad la lhun gyis grub par shes so /
zag pa med pa thams cad la 'bad pa dang bcas pa 'di ni dang po'o /
zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa la lhun gyis grub pa ni gnyis pa ste /
de'i phyir mdo las /
nam mkha' mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par smin pa'i chos nyid kyi gnas skabs dang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin no /
ata evāparyantatā /
teṣu sarveṣu bhāvābhāvaikarasā 		de nyid kyi phyir mu med pa ni de dag thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid med par ro gcig pa'o /
nirābhogaśca vipākajatvāt /
tasyā aparyantatā veditavyā /
kathamityāha 		lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir te /
de'i mu med pa nyid du rig par bya'o /
ji ltar zhe na /
gaganāparyantatayā dṛṣṭānteneti /
gaganamākāśam 		nam mkha' mu med pa nyid kyi dpes gsungs so /
nam mkha' ni nam mkha' ste /
tacca rūpidravyābhāvaikarasamaparyantaṃ nirābhogaṃ ca parispandābhāvāt de'i gzugs kyi rdzas kyi dngos po med par gcig pa'o /
mu med pa ni lhun gyis grub pa ste /
g yo ba med pa'o /
ata ubhayorapi aparyantatā sadṛśīti vipākajasarvaśukladharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayo dvitīyaḥ de'i phyir gnyi ga mu med pa ji lta bu 'di ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dkar po'i chos thams cad sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni gnyis pa'o /
tṛtīyamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[172] svapnopameṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dānādivaryavā 		gsungs pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
sbyin la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis /
chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas /
alakṣaṇatvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇenaikena vindati chas rnams mtshan nyid med pa nyid /
skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
'svapnopameṣu dhāvadgandharvanagaropameṣu" iti mahatyorbhagavatyoḥ paṭhyate rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba nas /
dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i bar ni yum chen mo /
las gsungs pa /
śāstre tvekameva padaṃ sarveṣāmekārthatvāt bstan bcos las /
tshig gcig smos pa ni thams cad gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
sa punarartho vicitrairapi lakṣaṇaiḥ pratibhāsamānānāmeṣāṃ yathālakṣaṇamasattvādalakṣaṇatā de yang don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so /
'di dag so sor snang ba ni ji lta bu'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'o /
tato māyopamatvādalakṣaṇeṣu sarvadharmeṣu 'sthitvā' ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayan 'sarvadharmāṇāmalakṣaṇatvamekakakṣaṇenaiva 'vindati' jānāti des na sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa la gnas nas /
pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs shing shes te /
dhātūnāmekārthatvena vindaterjñānavṛtteḥ /
etadāha /
meruvicitrayā prajñāpāramitāvicitratānugantavyeti 		khams kyi don ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyis na rtogs pa'i don ni shes pa la 'jug go /
'di ltar ri rab sna tshogs pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid du rjes su rig par bya'o /
