māyopameṣu (RSt_171) sarvadharmeṣvalakṣaṇatvena yadekarasaṃ jñānaṃ seha prajñāpāramitā sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par gang ro gcig par shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
atastasyā ekarasatvepi māyopamaiḥ sarvadharmapratibhāsairyā vicitratā sā meruvicitratayā dṛṣṭāntena veditavyā de'i phyir ro gcig pa yin yang gang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba 'di ni ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid kyi dpes rig par bya'o /
yathā hyākāśasya nīrūpatvādasatī meruṇā vicitratāvabhāti ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin yang /
ri rab kyi rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan te /
merupārśvānāṃ caturvarṇānāṃ dikṣu tatsarvavarṇatayā prakhyānāt ri rab kyi logs bzhi'i kha dog gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra ba'i kha dog tu snang ste /
de ni de bzhin no /
tathā tasyā ityalakṣaṇasarvadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayastṛtīyaḥ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni gsum pa'o /
caturthamadhikṛtya śāstram- bzhi pa'i dbang du byas nas /
[173] svapnaṃ taddarśinaṃ caiva dvayayogādanīkṣakaḥ /
dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvaṃ kṣaṇenakena paśyati /
'snanaṃ taddarśinaṃ caiva' iti kudyoge kathaṃ dvitīyā? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ /
athavā /
anīkṣiteti tṛn paṭhitavyaḥ /
tṛtīye sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnamāyopamairākārairvicitraḥ pratibhāsaḥ /
caturthe tu teṣāmastamayāccharanmadhyānhagaganasamo vigatasamastaviplavaḥ /
tatra svapnadṛśyaṃ narakacittaraṅgādisvapnaḥ /
taddarśī ātmaiva tayorastamayāt /
yastau vikṛte(tau) 'yogena' [a]bhedena so 'dvayaṃ' grāhyagrāhakaśūnyaṃ 'dharmāṇāṃ tattva' paramārthaṃ 'ekakṣaṇenaiva paśyati' /
enamāha /
rūpāparyantatayetyādinā /
iha caturtha ekakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ /
prajñāpāramitā tasyā aparyantatā /
sarvadharmaparamārthasya kevalasya kevalavimalanabhonibhasya tena saṃvedanāt /
sā veditavyā /
kathamityāha /
rūpādīnāmaparyantayeti /
kathaṃ teṣāmaparyantatā? dvayapratibhāsāstamayāt 		bstan bcos las /
rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid /
gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar /
chos rnams gnyis su med pa yi /
de nyid skad cig gcig gis mthong /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gsum pa la ni chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par so sor snang ba'o /
bzhi pa la ni de dag nub pa'i phyir /
ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bslad pa thams cad dang bral ba'o /
de la rmi lam du mthong ba ni mi dang glang po dang rta la sogs pa ste /
rmi lam mo /
de mthong ba ni bdag nyid kyis so /
de dag nub pa'i phyir gang de dag mi mthong ba ni gnyis kyi tshul du tha dad pa med pa'o /
de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis med pa'i stong pa ste /
chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid don dam pa skad cig ma gcig gis mthong ba'o /
de nyid gzugs mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa bzhi pa'o /
de'i mu med pa nyid ni chos thams cad don dam pa dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' kho na ltar des yang dag par rig pas na /
de rig par bya'o /
ji ltar zhe na /
gzugs la sogs pa mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so /
ji ltar de dag mu med pa yin zhe na /
gnyis su snang ba nub pa'i phyir te /
yāvatkhalu dvayaṃ tāvatparyantaḥ parimitatvāt /
nanu rūpatadgrāhakayorastamayenāpi paryantatā? ka āha rūpasyaiveti? kintarhi? rūpasya yāvadvijñānasya 		ji srid du 'di mu yod pa de srid du ni gzhan gyi mtshan ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs dang de'i 'dzin pa dag nub kyang mu med pa ma yin te /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
gzugs nyid ces gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gsungs pas so /
nanu tathāpi grāhakasyāstamayo nokta iti cet /
na tasyāpi skandhaireva saṃgrahāt 		de lta mod kyi 'dzin pa zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
ma yin te der yang phung po nyid bsdus pa'i phyir te /
aprakāśātmano grāhakatvāyogāditi sarvadharmādvayatattvaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaścaturthaḥ snang ba med par 'dzin pa'i bdag mi rigs pa'i phyir ro /
chos thams cad gnyis su med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni bzhi pa'o /
ekakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ saptamo 'bhisamayaḥ skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste bdun pa'o /
aṣṭamo 'bhisamayo dharmakāyaḥ /
tasya catvāri vastūni 		mngon par rtogs pa brgyad pa ni chos kyi sku'o /
de'i dngos po yang bzhi ste /
trayaḥ kāyāḥ kāritraṃ ca /
tathāhi pūrvamuddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ- 		sku gsum dang mdzad pa'o /
de ltar sngar /
ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang /
(RSt_172) /
[174] sdābhāvikaḥ sasāṃbhogo nairmāṇika iti tridhā /
dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraścaturdhā samudīritaḥ /
iti 		de bzhin gzhan ni sprul ba dang /
chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste /
rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod /
ces gang gsungs pa'o /
dharmo mārgaḥ chos ni lam ste /
sa ceha prakarṣagateḥ prakaraṇācca saptābhisamayalakṣaṇo gṛhyate de yang 'dir khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir /
skabs kyi mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi mtshan nyid do /
dharmalabhyaḥ kāyo 'dharmakāyaḥ' /
kāyaḥ śarīram /
trīṇi śarīrāṇi buddhānāṃ trayaḥ kāyāḥ 		de na chos kyis thob pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku ste /
sku ni lus so /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi lus gsum ni sku gsum mo /
bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo las rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa /
uktaṃ hi mahatyorbhagavatyoḥ- "sarvākārapariśuddhānāmanāśravāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā prakṛtiḥ sa tathāgato 'rhansamyaksambuddho veditavyaḥ /
punaraparaṃ teṣāmeva dharmāṇāmadhigamādanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya dvātriṃśatā lakṣaṇairaśītyānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtakāyastathāgato 'rhansamyaksambuddho bodhisattvānāṃ paramaṃ mahāyānadharmamanuttararatiprītiprāmodyasukhopabhogāya deśayati /
punaraparaṃ teṣāmeva sarvadharmāṇāmadhigamādanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya tathāgato 'rhansamyaksambuddho daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvakālaṃ nānānirmāṇameghena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ karoti" iti /
uktaṃ ca sūtrālaṃkāre- /
"tribhiḥ kāyaiśca vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṅgrahaḥ 		zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su rig par bya'o /
gzhan yang chos de dag nyid rtogs pas /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir /
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sku /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa'i mchog gi chos bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i bde ba la longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to /
gzhan yang chos de dag nyid rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dus thams cad du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do zhes gsungs so /
mdo sde rgyan las /
sku gsum dag gis sangs rgyas kyi /
sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste /
sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho 'yaṃ tribhiḥ kāyairnidarśitaḥ" sku gsung dag gis rang gzhan gyi /
don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan /
iti /
tasmāt tribhireva kāyaiḥ kāritreṇa ca paricchedena caturdhā dharmakāya uktaḥ /
tatra svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ /
svabhāva eva 'svābhāvikaḥ' /
vinayādibhyaṣṭhagiti svārthe ṭhak /
athavā tasminneva svabhāve bhavo viśuddhaḥ paraḥ prakarṣaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ /
sambhogāya prabhavatīti 'sāmbhogikaḥ' /
nirmāṇa nirmitiḥ /
tena nirvṛttaḥ kāyo 'nairmāṇikaḥ' /
tatra svābhāvikamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[175] sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye prāptā dharmā nirāśravāḥ /
svābhāviko mataḥ kāyasteṣāṃ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ /
teṣāṃ prakṛtidharmatā dharmadhātuḥ /
nanu na dharmadhātustathāgato 'tiprasaṅgāt /
kiṃ tarhi? dharmadhātuviśuddhiḥ /
tathā coktamārya buddhabhūmisūtre- "pañcabhirākāraiḥ susamuditabuddhabhūmeḥ saṅgraho veditavyaḥ /
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? dharmadhātuviśuddhayā ādarśajñānena samatājñānena pratyavekṣaṇājñānena kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānena ca" iti /
(RSt_173) /
dharmadhātuviśuddhiḥ suviśuddho dharmadhātuḥ 		zhes gsungs so /
de bas na sku gsum dang mdzad pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ni chos kyi sku bstan te /
de la ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid kho na ngo bo nyid do /
yang na de nyid la ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i rnam par dag pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o /
longs spyod rdzogs pa'i don du 'gyur ba yin pas /
longs spyod rdzogs bcas so /
sprul pa ni sprul pa'o /
der grub pa'i sku ni sprul pa nyid do /
de la ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du byas nas /
bstan bcos las /
thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni /
zag pa med pa'i chos skun du /
rnam par dag gyur gang dag yin /
de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de dag gi rang bzhin ni chos nyid de /
chos kyi dbyings so /
chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te /
shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'on kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yin te /
de ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das sangs rgyas kyis ni rnam pa lngas bsdus te /
lnga gang zhe na /
chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang me long lta bu'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes yin no zhes gsungs so zhe na /
chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa ste /
suviśuddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti nārthabhedaḥ kaścit chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang chos nyid tha dad pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro /
ataḥ sūtram /
sūryaraśmimaṇḍalāparyantāvabhāsanatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantāvabhāsanatānugantavyeti 		de'i phyir mdo las nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
sarva eva trāsādidoṣarahitāḥ sphāṭikāḥ śuddhāḥ skrag pa nyid la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs pa ni shel dag pa lta bu'o /
tatra candrasūryābhyāmanye śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vimuktikāyasyopamāḥ de la zla ba dang nyi ma dag las gzhan pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i dpe'o /
sūryācandramasāvapi śuddhasphāṭikau /
tayoretadadhikaṃ yattau daśadigvyāpiraśmijālaṃ janayataḥ /
tatastāvanantajñeyaviṣayamanantaṃ jñānamutpādayato buddhānāṃ vimuktikāyasyopamāne 		zla ba dang nyi ma shel sgong dag pa lta bu de dag pas 'di lhag pa yin te /
gang gi phyir phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba spros pa des shes bya'i yul mtha' yas pa dag la shes pa mtha' yas pa skyed pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i dpe'o /
ata evāsau dharmakāya ityabhidhīyate /
anantadharmāśrayatvāt /
tadiha dharmadhātuviśuddhijamanantaṃ jñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā 		de nyid kyi phyir de ni chos kyi sku zhes kyang brjod de /
gang gi phyir chos mtha' yas pa brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ni 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa las skyes ba'i ye shes mtha' yas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
tasyā aparyantajñeyāvabhāsanatā veditavyā sūryaraśmimaṇḍalāparyantāvabhāsanatayā dṛṣṭāntena /
tathā hi buddhadharmāṇāṃ suviśuddho dharmadhātuḥ sūryavat /
tajjā prajñā prajñapāramitā sūryaraśmiṇḍalavat /
tayā yadaparyantāvabhāsanaṃ tadraviraśmimaṇḍalenāparyantāvabhāsanavat 		nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpes de ni shes bya mu med pa la snang bar rig par bya'o /
de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
nyi ma dang 'dra'o /
de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o /
gang des mu med par snang ba de la 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba dang 'dra'o /
tadanena buddhānāṃ suviśuddho dharmadhātuḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyastasya ca sarvatra jñeye jñānavaśitā darśitā /
tasyaiva sattvārthavaśitāṃ vyāpinityatvaṃ cādhikṛtya śāstram- /
[176] paripākaṃ gate hetau yasya yasya yadā yadā /
hitaṃ bhavati kartavyaṃ prathate tasya tasya saḥ 		de la 'dis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o /
de yang shes bya thams cad la shes pa dbang du bya ba dang de nyid sems can gyi don dbang du byed pa dang khyab par byed pa dang rtag pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /
bstan bcos las /
rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas /
gang dang gang la gang dang ni /
gang tshe bya ba phan 'gyur ba /
de dang de la de snang de /
[177] varṣatyapi hi parjanye naivābījaṃ prarohati lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang /
sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar /
samutpādepi buddhānāṃ nābhavyo bhadramaśnute sangs rgyas rnams ni byon gyur kyang /
skal ba med pas bzang mi myong /
[178] iti kāritravaipulyādbuddho vyāpī nirucyate de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir /
sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod /
akṣayatvācca tasyaiva nitya ityapi kathyate /
'saḥ' iti svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ /
'prathate ' nirmāṇaprathanāt /
tadā tadeti gamyate 'yadā yadā' iti vacanāt /
tasya hitasya karaṇāyetyarthādgamyate /
tasmāttadā tadaivetyata āha /
'varṣatyapi' ityādi /
'iti' ityādi /
'kāritravaipulyaṃ' sarvabhavyeṣu kāritram /
tasyaiva' iti kāritrasya /
iti svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ /
sāmbhogikasya kāyasya bahuvaktavyam /
tatra sambhogamadhikṛtyāha 		de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir /
rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o /
snang ngo zhes bya ba ni sprul pa ste bsod nams las so /
gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni de dang de dag ces bya bar rtogs par bya ba'o /
de dang de zhes bya bas ni phan par byed pa zhes don gyis rtogs par bya'o /
ci'i phyir de dang de la zhes gsungs she na /
lha'i rgyal pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
mdzad pa rgya che ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa thams cad la mdzad pa'o /
de nyid kyi mdzad pa ste /
'di nyid ni nyid kyi sku'o /
longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la ni brjod par bya ba mang du yod de de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
sarvaśabdāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāpayantatānugantavyeti /
śāsturdeśayataḥ śrṛṇvatāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ yaḥ paramamahāyānadharmasaṃbodhaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā 		sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
ston pas bstan nas /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnyan te /
theg pa mchog gi chos yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa ste /
sa eva sambhogaḥ sambhogakāraṇatvāt /
yaḥ punastajjānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrasaumanasyalakṣaṇānāṃ ratiprītiprāmodyānāṃ sukhasya cānubhavaḥ sa mukhyaḥ sambhogaḥ /
tasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā aparyantatā veditavyā /
kathamityāha 		longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
gang yang mkhas pa rnams kyi yid bde ba'i mtshan nyid chung du dang 'bring dang chen po ste /
dga' ba dang bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa de ni dngos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'o /
de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o /
ji ltar zhe na /
sarvaśabdāpayantatayeti /
(RSt_174) hetau tṛtīyā 		sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gsum pa'o /
yatastayoḥ sambodhayoryathākramamaparyantā deśanāḥ śabdajanyā janakāśca te kathaṃ sarve? nānā vineyānurūpaiḥ sarvairākāraiḥ prathanāt gang gi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa de gnyis dang go rims bzhin du mu med par ston pa'i sgra dang bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed par sbyar ro /
thams cad ces ci'i phyir smes she na gdul bya rnams sna tshogs pa thams cad la snang ba'i phyir ro /
kathamaparyantāḥ? anidhanena tena kāyena deśanāyā niravadhikatvāt ji ltar mu med pa yin zhe na /
mtha' ma med par sku des ston pa la dus tshad med pa'i phyir ro /
tāthāgatasyāpi sambodhasyāparyantatā /
kuta ityāha /
savabuddhadharmasamudāgamāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā 		de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub kyang mu med pa nyid do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
yathoktaḥ śāstureva mahāyānadharmasambodha iha prajñāpāramitā /
tasyā aparyantatā 		ji skad du ston pa nyid kyis theg pa chen po'i mchog yang dag par rtags pa ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs so /
de'i mu med pa ni de'i rgyu ste /
tatkāraṇasya sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ samudāgamasyāparyantatayetyarthaḥ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
te punardharmā mahatyobhagavatyoḥ paṭhyante chos de yang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo las gsungs te /
saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ /
navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ /
daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni /
aṣṭavabhibhvāyatanāni /
araṇā samādhiḥ /
praṇidhijñānam /
catasraḥ pratisamvidaḥ /
sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ /
daśa vaśitāḥ /
daśa balāni /
catvāri vaiśāradyāni /
trīṇyarakṣyāṇi /
trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni /
asaṃmoṣadharmatā /
vāsanāsamudghātaḥ /
mahākaruṇā /
aṣṭādaśāveṇikāḥ buddhadharmāḥ /
sarvākārajñatā ceti /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[179] bodhipakṣāpramāṇāni vimokṣāścānupūrveśaḥ /
navātmikā samāpattiḥ kṛtsna daśavidhātmakam /
[180] abhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭaprakārāṇi prabhedataḥ /
araṇāpraṇidhijñānamabhijñāḥ pratisamvidaḥ /
[181] sarvākārāścatasro 'tha śuddhayo vaśitā daśa /
balāni daśa catvāri vaiśāradyānyarakṣaṇam /
[182] trividhaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ tridhāsaṃmoṣadharmatā /
vāsanāyāḥ samudghāto mahatī karuṇā jane /
[183] āveṇikā munereva dharmā ye 'ṣṭādaśeritāḥ /
sarvākārajñatā ceti dharmakāyo 'bhidhīyate /
bodhipakṣyāścāpramāṇānīti dvandvaḥ /
'anupūrvaśa' iti /
anupūrva pareṇa saṃbadhyate /
'arakṣaṇa' ityakaraṇīyarakṣaṇam /
arakṣyamityarthaḥ /
tat trividham /
'dharmakāya' iti /
anāśravo buddhānāṃ dharmarāśiḥ /
yathāvasaramasmābhirbahavo vyākhyātāḥ /
śeṣāniha vyācakṣīmahi /
'aṣṭau vimokṣā' iti /
rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati suvarṇadurvarṇāni nīlapītalohitāvadātānīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī rūpāṇi paśyati pūrvavaditi (RSt_175) dvitīyaḥ /
śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ /
ākāśānantyāyatanādivimokṣāścatvāraḥ /
saṃjñāveditanirodho 'ṣṭamaḥ /
āvaraṇādvimucyanta ebhiriti vimokṣāḥ 		byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang dbang bcu dang stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang bsrung ba med pa gsum dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang thugs rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do /
de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang /
rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni /
snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang /
zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang /
zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni /
rab tu dbye ba rnam brgyad dang /
nyon mongs med par smon mkhyen dang /
mngon shes so sor yang dag rig /
rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang /
dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang /
bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang /
dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang /
bsnyel ba mi mnga' chos nyid dang /
bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang /
skye la thugs rje chen po dang /
thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos /
bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang /
chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin /
zhes gsungs so /
byang chub kyi phyogs dang tshad med pa zhes zlas dbye bar bya'o /
mthar gyis zhes bya ba ni 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o /
bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba ma yin pa las bsrung ba'i phyir /
bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don te rnam pa gsum mo /
chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i chos kyi tshogs so /
skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gis mang du bshad de lhag ma yang bdag gis bshad par bya'o /
rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni kha dog bzang ba dang kha dog ngan pa dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o /
nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni snga ma bzhin te 'di ni gnyis pa'o /
sdug pa'i rnam par thar ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni gsum pa'o /
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi dang 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa zhes bya ba dang brgyad de /
'di dag gis sgrib pa las rnam par grol bas na rnam par thar pa'o /
tatra trayo nirmāṇāvaraṇavimokṣāḥ de la gsum ni mya ngan las 'das pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'o /
śeṣāḥ śāntavihārasamāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣāḥ /
trayo rūpiṇaḥ 		lhag ma ni zhi bar gnas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'o /
pañcārūpiṇaḥ /
paramapraśānto 'ṣṭamaḥ /
rūpīti ātmani rūpasaṃjñī /
paśyatīti adhimokṣanirmitāni manasā paśyati /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī /
ātmani nāmasaṃjñī /
śubho vimokṣaḥ /
śubhāśubhāni rūpāṇi nirmāya teṣvekatarasaṃjñālābhāt /
yathākramamābhogaprātikūlyaprahāṇāya /
saṃjñāveditānirodho 'sthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ kliṣṭamanaḥsaṃgṛhītānāṃ ca nirodhaḥ prāg vyutthānāt /
aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni /
ālambanābhibhavanādabhibhūtāni āyatanāni cittasthitayo 'bhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭau /
tatra prathamādvimokṣāt dve abhinirhriyete /
dvitāyādapi dve /
tṛtīyāccatvāri 		yang gsum ni gzugs can no /
lnga ni gzugs can ma yin pa'o /
brgyad pa ni sgrib pa rab tu zhi pa'o /
gzugs can ni bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa'o /
lta ba ni yid kyis mos shing sprul nas lta ba'o /
sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i gzugs de dag sprul nas mi byed pa'i 'du shes thob pas go rims bzhin du mthun pa dang mi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir ro /
'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni brgyad pa ste /
sems dang sems las 'byung ba nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyis bsdus pa sngar kun nas ldang ba las de 'gog pa'o /
dmigs pa'i sgom pa zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched sems la gnas pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de /
de dag ni brgyad do /
de la dang po'i rnam par thar pa las ni gnyis sgrub po /
gnyis pa las kyang gnyis so /
gsum pa las ni bzhi'o /
adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni hīnapraṇītāni nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu la kha dog ngan pa dang kha dog bzang po dang dman pa dang gya nom par lta ba'o /
tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānāti, abhibhūya paśyati, tathā saṃjñī ca bhavatīti prathamam /
adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇāni yāvattathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatīti dvitīyam 		gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes shing /
de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni dang po'o /
nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen po la kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan par lta zhing de bzhin du shes par 'gyur pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī ca bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānītyādi tṛtīyam nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu la sogs par lta ba ni gsum pa'o /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇītyādi caturtham nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la chen po la sogs par lta bu ni bzhi pa'o /
tṛtīyādvimokṣāccatvāryabhinirhriyante rnam par thar pa gsum pa las ni bzhi mngon par sgrub po /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇī paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni sngon po /
kha dog sngon po /
sngon por ston pa /
sngon pa snang ba /
dper na zar ma'i me tog gam /
tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ sampannaṃ vārāṇaseyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nilanirbhāsam /
tāni ca rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānāti, abhibhūya paśyati, tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatīti pañcamam /
evaṃ pītānītyādi /
tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpamityadikaṃ ṣaṣṭham /
evaṃ lohitānityādi /
tadyathā bandhujīvapuṣpamityādi saptamam 		yul b'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po /
kha dog sngon po /
sngon por ston pa /
sngon por snang ba de bzhin du /
gzugs de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas /
de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur zhing lta ba 'di ni lnga pa'o /
de bzhin du ser po la sogs pa ni dper na dong ka'i mi tog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni drug pa'o /
de bzhin du dmar po la sogs pa ni dper na pan du dzi ba ka'i me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bdun pa'o /
evamavadātānītyādi de bzhin du dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
tadyathā uṣasi tārakārūpamityādi cāṣṭamam dper na skar ma pa ba sangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgyad pa'o /
tatra parīttāni sattvasakhyātāni svalpapramāṇatvāt de la chung du zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi grangs su ston pa yin te /
tshad chung ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
suvarṇadurvarṇāni śubhāśubhatvāt /
hīnapraṇītāni bhaumadivyatvāt 		kha dog bzang po dang ngan pa ni sdug ba dang mi sdug pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
dman pa dang gya nom pa ni lha la yod pa dang mi la yod pa'o /
tāni vimokṣairadhimucyābhibhvāyatanairabhibhavati /
punaḥ punarantarddhāpya darśanāt /
abhibhūya jānāti śamathena paśyati vipaśyanayā tathāsaṃjñī bhavati nirabhimānatvāt 		rnam par thar pa de dag la mos par byas nas /
zil gyis mnan pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis gnon par byed do /
yang dang yang du mi mthong zhing mi snang bar byas pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'o /
shes pa ni zhi gnas kyis so /
adhimātrāṇīti /
asattvasaṃkhyātāni gṛhavimānaparvatādīni mahāpramāṇatvāt /
nīlānīti uddeśaḥ /
śeṣairnirdeśaḥ /
nīlavarṇānīti svābhāvikena varṇena /
nīlanidarśanānīti sāṃyogikena varṇena 		mthong ba ni lhag mthong gis so /
de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
chen po ni sems can ma yin par ston pa ste /
de dag ni khyim dang gzhal med khang dang ri la sogs pa ste /
tshad chen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
sngon po zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
lhag ma ni bshad pa'o /
kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i kha dog go /
sngon por ston pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i kha dog go /
nīlanirbhāsānīti /
ubhayathāpi bhāsvaratvāt 		sngon por snang ba ni gnyi ga'i kha dog tu snang ba'o /
umakātaśī(sī?) /
karṇikāraḥ prasiddhaḥ /
bandhujīvo bandhūkaḥ /
uṣā rātrerantaḥ /
(RSt_176) /
'kṛtsnaṃ' daśavidhātmakaṃ' iti /
abhibhvāyatanairabhibhūya pṛthivyādīnāṃ kṛtsnaṃ samantādibhiḥ sapharaṇātkṛtsnānyucyante 		aom ma ka ni zar ma'o /
kar ma ka ni dong ka'o /
ban du dzi ba ka ni pan du ka'o /
pa ba sangs ni thor sa shar ba'i skar ma'o /
zad par bcu'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis mnan nas /
sa la sogs pa thams cad kun du khyab bar byas pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ces brjod do /
kadācittānyevāyatanānīti kṛtsnāyatanānyucyante /
kadācittu pṛthivyādibhirviśiṣya nirdiśyante /
pṛthivīkṛtsnaṃ apkṛtsnaṃ tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyuḥkṛtsnaṃ nīlakṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnaṃ avadātakṛtsnaṃ ākāśānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ ceti 		kha cig ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de ni zad par gyi skye mched du brjod do /
kha cig ni sa la sogs pa dag gis khyad par du ston te /
zad par sa dang zad par sa dang zad par me dang zad par rlung dang zad par sngon po dang zad par ser po dang zad par dmar po dang zad par dkar po dang zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do /
'sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhaya' iti /
āśrayapariśuddhirālambanapariśuddhiścittapariśuddhirjñānapariśuddhiśca 		rnam pa thams cad dag pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni rten yongs su dag pa dang dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang thugs yongs su dag pa dang ye shes yongs su dag pa'o /
tatra savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣāṇāṃ daurbalyānāmāśrayādatyantoparamaḥ svasyacātmabhāvasya yathecchamādānasthānacyavaneṣu vaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayapariśuddhiḥ de la bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams kyi gnas ngan len rten las gtan du bral zhing rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang gnag du gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho la dbang bsgyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i rten yongs su dag pa'o /
sarvālambanānāṃ nirmāṇapariṇāmasaṃprakhyāneṣu vaśavartitā sarvākārā ālambanapariśuddhiḥ sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang dmigs pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du dbang bsgyur ba ni dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o /
pūrvavatsarvacittadauṣṭhulyāpagamaścitte ca sarvākārakuśalamūlopacayaḥ sarvākārāṃ cittapariśuddhiḥ snga ma bzhin du sems kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas /
sems la rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba ni /
rnam pa thams cad du thugs yongs su dag pa'o /
pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣadauṣṭhulyāpagamaḥ sarvajñeyajñāne ca vaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānapariśuddhiḥ snga ma bzhin du ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral pas shes pa dang shes bya thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi ye shes yongs su dag pa'o /
'vaśitā daśa' iti /
daśa vaśitāḥ /
ayurvaśitā yathecchamāyuṣasthāpanāt tyajanācca 		dbang bcu ni bcu la dbang ba ste /
tshe la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par tshe la gnas pa dang spang ba la'o /
cittavaśitā yathecchadhyānādisamāpatteḥ sems la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
pariṣkāravaśitā yathecchamupakaraṇapratyupasthānāt /
karmavaśitā yathecchaṃ kāyavākkarmasiddheḥ 		yo byad la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod bar 'tshog chas nye bar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro /
las la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par lus dang ngag gi las grub pa'o /
upapattivaśitā sarvopapattyāyataneṣu yathecchamupapatteḥ /
ṛddhivaśitā yathecchamabhijñāḥ 		skye ba la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa rnams su skye par byed pa'o /
rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i mngon par shes pa'o /
praṇidhānavaśitā sarvapraṇidhānasamṛddheḥ smon lam la dbang ba ni smon lam thams cad yang dag par 'byor pa'o /
adhimuktivaśitā yadyathādhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati /
jñānavaśitā yadeva jñātumicchati tadeva jānāti /
dharmavaśitā sūtrādidharmavyavasthāneṣu kauśalam 		mos pa la dbang ba ni gang ji ltar mos pa de bzhin du 'gyur ba'o /
ye shes la dbang ba ni gang kho na shes par 'dod pa de nyid shes pa'o /
chos la dbang ba ni mdo la sogs pa chos rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa'o /
bsrung ba med pa gsum na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
'trīṇyarakṣyāṇi' iti /
pariśuddhakāyasamudācārastathāgato nāsti tasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ praticchādayitavyāṃ manyeta kaccitpare na jānīyurityetatprathamamarakṣyam evaṃ vākkarma dvitīyam /
evaṃ manaḥkarma tṛtīyam /
'trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni' yathāpāṭham- "tathāgatasya dharma deśayata ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante /
śrotramavadadhati /
ājñācittamupasthāpayanti pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
na tena tathāgatasya nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam /
apare na śuśrūṣante /
na śrotramavadadhatītyādi /
na tena tathāgatasyāghāto nākṣāntirnāpratyayaḥ na cetaso 'nabhirāddhiḥ /
ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante /
ekatyā na suśrūṣante /
na tena tathāgatasya dvayaṃ bhavati nandī āghātaśca /
sarvatropekṣako viharati smṛtimāna samprajānan" iti /
(RSt_177) /
'asammoṣadharmatā' sattvārthakriyākālānatikramādbuddhānām /
ata evaiṣā lakṣaṇavidhānatopapannā bhavati /
'vāsanāsamuddhāta' iti /
prahīṇakleśasyāpi yadaprahīṇakleśasyeva ceṣṭitaṃ sā kleśavāsanā /
sāpi tathāgatasyāstaṅgateti samudghātakleśavāsanaḥ sa bhagavānucyate 		de la yongs su ma dag pa ni sku'i spyod pa mi mnga' bas /
gzhan la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes bcas pa'i dgongs pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o /
de bzhin du gsung gi phrin las ni gnyis pa'o /
de bzhin du thugs kyi phrin las ni gsum pa'o /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni ji ltar mdo las gsungs pa bzhin te /
de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa na /
gcig tu gus par nyan cing brtun te /
bka' sems la nye bar 'jog cing /
chos kyi rjes su chos nye bar sgrub pa na /
des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur thugs yeng yeng por mi 'gyur ba dang gzhan dag gus par mi nyen cing /
rna ba'i 'dud pa la sogs pa la des de bzhin gshegs pa thugs khong khro bar mi 'gyur /
mi bzod par mi 'gyur /
thugs mi mnyes par mi 'gyur ba dang gcig tu gus par nyan pa dang gcig tu gus par mi nyan pa de dag la des de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dgyes pa'am /
khong khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur bar thams cad du dran pa dang shes bzhin du ldan pas btang snyoms su bzhugs pa'o /
bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste /
de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bya ba'i mdzad pa gzhan mi mnga' bar rig pa yin no /
bag chags yang dag par bcom pa ni gang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang ma spangs pa ltar spyod pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags so /
de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste /
de bas na bcom ldan 'das ni bag chags yang dag par bcom pa zhes bya'o /
'mahākaruṇā' hitāśayatā /
yayā bhagavānsarvakālaṃ ṣaṭkṛtvo lokaṃ vyavalokayati "ko hīyata ko varddhata" ityādi 		thugs rje chen po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dus thams cad du phan pa'i dgongs pas 'jig rten la lan drug tu gzigs pa ste su ni nyams /
su ni 'phel zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
'sarvākārajñatā' iti sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprabhedaparyantajñānamityarthaḥ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi dbye ba mtha' yas pa mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
raṇaṃ vivādakalahādi nyon mongs pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa la sogs pa'o /
iha tu raṇahetuḥ kleśo raṇaḥ /
tamālambya raṇamutpādayatīti /
yaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate, yato vyutthāya grāmādau praviṣṭaṃ tamālambya tatratyānāṃ raṇaṃ notpadyate sā 'araṇā' /
sā śrāvakasyāpi bhavati buddhasyāpi /
tayoḥ kāritraviśeṣaḥ 		'dir ni rtsod pa'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa la nyon mongs pa 'di dag gis bdag la dmigs nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar /
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste /
gang gi phyir gzhan dag gi grong la sogs par 'jug pa na bdag la dmigs nas de dag gi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba ni nyan thos la yang yod /
sangs rgyas la yang yod /
de ni thun mong yin no /
de dag gi mdzad pa'i khyad par de'i ting nge 'dzin de dbang du byas nas /
tamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[184] śrāvakasyāraṇādṛṣṭerna kleśaparihāritā 		bstan bcos las /
nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lha /
mi yi nyon mongs spong nyid dang /
tatkleśastrotaucchittyai grāmādiṣu jināraṇā rgyal ba'i grong sogs de dag gi /
nyon mongs rgyun gcod nyon mongs med /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
śrāvakīyāraṇā kleśahetordarśanasya parihāritā nyan thos kyi nyon mongs pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mthong ba spong bar byed de /
na sākṣātkleśasya /
saugatī tu parakīyakleśasrotasa ucchedāya na darśanasyetyarthaḥ 		nyon mongs pa mngon sum du spong ba ni ma yin no /
bde bar gshegs pas ni sngar bshad pa'i nyon mongs pas rgyun bcad pa'i phyir yin gyi mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
idaṃ jānīyāmiti praṇidhāya dhyānaṃ samāpannasya lokavṛttāntādau yajjñānamutpadyate tat 'praṇidhijñānaṃ' śrāvakāṇām /
tathāgatamadhikṛtya śāstram- /
[185] anābhogamānāsaṅgamavyāghātaṃ sadā sthitam /
sarvapraśnāpanuddhauddhaṃ praṇidhijñānamiṣyate 		'jig rten gyi spyod pa la sogs pa 'di shes par bya'o zhes smos pa byas nas snyoms par zhugs te shes pa bskyed pa de ni nyan thos kyi smon nas shes pa'o /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
sangs rgyas smon nas mkhyen pa ni /
lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang /
thogs pa med dang rtag gnas dang /
'dri ba kun len 'debs par bzhed /
'anābhogaṃ' nirvikalpatvāt /
'anāsaṅgaṃ' nirapekṣatvāt /
'avyāghātaṃ' sarvatrāpratihatatvāt 		ces bya ba gsungs te /
lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro /
thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
'sadā sthitaṃ' ityasamāhite cetasi sthitatvāt rtag gnas ni rtag tu sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i phyir ro /
sarvapraśnān chedayatīti 'sarvapraśnāpanut' 'dri ba kun lan 'debs pa zhes bya ba ni dris pa thams cad sel ba'o /
sa ca sambhogakāyaḥ pariśuddhe svabuddhakṣetre jāyate yāvadākāśasthitiravatiṣṭhate de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rang gi zhing yongs su dag par skyes te /
ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du bzhugs so /
tatkuto buddhakṣetram? prādhānyena tasyaiva tatropapatteḥ /
(RSt_178) /
lujyate pralujyateti lokaḥ /
prajātaṃ bhājanaṃ ca 		de ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya zhe na /
gtsor ni de nyid der skyes pa'i phyir ro /
'jig pa dang rab tu 'jig pas na 'jig rten te /
skye dgu dang de'i snod do /
tasmāt dvidhā lokadhātuḥ sattvaloko bhājanalokaśca de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams ni gnyis te /
sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten no /
tatra sattvalokapariśuddhimadhikṛtyāha de la sems can gyi 'jig rten yongs su dag pa'i dbang du byas nas /
sarvasattvadhātupuṇyajñānasambhārāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāpayantatānugatavyeti sems can gyi khams thams cad bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
yayā bhagavataḥ prajñayā paripācitāḥ sattvāstatra yāvadākāśamutpadyante bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du der skye bar 'gyur te /
utpannāśca yayā bodhaye pariprācyante /
seha prajñāpāramitā 		skyes nas kyang gang gi phyir byang chub kyi don du yongs su smin par byed pa 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
tasyā aparyantatānugantavyā /
kathamityāha 		de mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o /
ji ltar zhe na /
sarvetyādi /
ye kecittatra sattvā utpadyante /
sarve te labdhāryabhūmayo bodhisattvāḥ 		sems can gyi khams thams cad ces bya gsungs te /
gang su dag der skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams thob ba dag go /
te sarve /
sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ sattvarāśiḥ /
tasya puṇyajñānasambhāraḥ /
tayoraparyantatayā 		de thams cad ni sems can gyi khams te sems can gyi tshogs so /
de'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag ni mu med pas so /
pṛthivīdhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyā sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o /
evamabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātvākāśadhātuvijñānadhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
tathā hi bhājanalokastatra karatalasamaṃ bhūtalam /
prāsādodyānavāpīkalpadrumādiparikaraśca sattvāvāsaḥ paramojjvalasaptaratnamayo 'nekalokadhātvantarasphuraṇamahāraśmipramokṣa upariṣṭhācca gaganamanurūpasanirbhāsaṃ ṣaḍdhātukāśca sattvāḥ /
"ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣaḥ" iti vacanāt 		de bzhin du snod kyi 'jig rten ni sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa /
khang bzangs dang skyed mos tshal dang dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa yo byad dang gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma dag tu yang 'od zer chen po rab tu 'phro bar byed la /
steng gi nam mkha' la yang rjes su mthun par snang ba yin no /
sems can yang khams drug pa ste /
dge slong dag skyes bu 'di dag ni khams drug pa can no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so /
atasteṣāmapi kāyaḥ kāntimān prabhāmaṇḍalībhūmyanurūpavarṇasaṃskāraḥ /
tatrābhogaparibhogāśca sattvānāṃ sarvadevalokaprativiśiṣṭāḥ /
yeṣāmupabhoga ekāntasukha ekāntānavadya ekāntavaśavartī ca /
īdṛśī ṣaḍdhātupariśuddhiraparyantā niravadhikatvādativiśālatvācca /
atastasyā aparyantayā tatkāraṇabhūtāyā bhagavataḥ prajñāyā aparyantatānugantavyā 		de'i phyir de dag gi lus kyang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sa gzhi dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa yang lta thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te gang dag gi longs spyod gcig tu bzang ba dang gcig tu bde ba dang gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang gcig tu dbang bsgyur ba'o /
'di lta bu'i khams drug yongs su dag pa mu med pa ni mtshams chad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang mngon par spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de bas na de mu med pas de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
tatra cotpannā bodhisattvā anantān lokadhātūn gatvā tatratyānāṃ sattvānāmakuśalaṃ(la)sañcayān hantadhyā(vyā?)na(n) tatpratipakṣāṃśca kuśalasañcayān prajānanti der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par song nas /
de na gnas pa'i sems can gyi mi dge ba bsags pa dang de'i gnyen po dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes te /
teṣāmapramāṇatayā tatparicchedikāyāsteṣāṃ prajñāyā apramāṇatā veditavyetyetadāha /
kuśalākuśaladhamasañcayāpramāṇatayā prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā veditavyeti 		de dag tshad med pas de dag yongs su gcod par byed pa'i shes rab kyang tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so /
yāvantaśca te bodhisattvāsteṣāṃ kuśaladharmotpādanāya dharma deśayanti sa sarvaḥ sarvadharmasañcayaḥ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la dge ba'i chos ji snyed pa'i phyir chos ston par byed de /
de ni chos thams cad bsags pa ste /
tasyāpramāṇatayā tadvyavasthāpikāyāsteṣāṃ prajñāyā apramāṇatā veditavyetyetadāha /
sarvadharmasañcayāpramāṇatayā prajñapāramitāpramāṇatā veditavyeti 		de tshad med pas de dag 'jog par byed pa'i shes rab de dag kyang tshad med par rig par bya ste /
'di ni chos thams cad bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
sarvadharmasamādhyaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti chos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mu med pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
chos ni gzungs rnams so /
dharmā dhāraṇyaḥ samādhayaścittasthitayaḥ /
dharmāśca samādhayaśca sarve ca te dharmasamādhayaśca /
teṣāmaparyantatā /
tatpratilambhitā tallābhitā yā tatra bodhisattvānāṃ tayā tajjanikāyā bhagavataḥ prajñayā aparyantatā veditavyetyarthaḥ /
sarvabuddharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti 		ting nge 'dzin ni sems gnas pa'o /
chos dang ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
de dag mu med pa'o /
de thob pa ni de rnyed pa'o /
gang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob bas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
tatra buddhaḥ sambhogakāyaḥ de la sangs rgyas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o /
tasya sarve dharmāḥ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ de'i chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyaśīti (RSt_179) cānuvyañjanāni /
teṣāmaparyantatā aparicchedyatā 		skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o /
de dag mu med pa ni yongs su bcad du med pa'o /
kenāparicchedyatā? tulayā gang gis yongs su bcad du med ce na mnyam pa ste /
tathāgatādanyasya tādṛśānāmabhāvāt de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro /
tayā bhagavataḥ prajñāyāstādṛśyevāparyantatā veditavyā des na bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu nyid kyang mu med par rig par bya ste /
katamasyāḥ prajñāyāḥ? yayā teṣāṃ samagrāṇi kāraṇāni samyak parijñāya samyaganuṣṭhitāni /
ataḥ śāstram- /
[186] dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītivyañjanātmā munerayam 		gang gis de dag gi rgyu thams cad yang dag par shes pa dang yang dag par grub pa'o /
de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
mtshan ni sum cu tsa gnyis dang /
dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di /
theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir /
sambhogiko mataḥ kāyo mahāyānopabhogataḥ thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
caturthena pādena sambhogikatve kāraṇamāha /
tatrādau pañcabhirindravajrābhirlakṣaṇānyāha /
[187] cakrāṅkahastakramakūrmapādo jālāvanadvāṅgulipāṇipādaḥ /
karau sapādau taruṇau mṛdū ca samucchrayaiḥ saptabhirāśrayo 'sya 		theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir /
zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni /
longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsungs so /
de la dang po'i lnga ni dbang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do /
phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs /
phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel ba dang /
phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha can /
'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang /
[188] dīrghāṅgulitvāyatapārṣṇigātram prājyamṛjūcchaṅkhapadordhvaromā sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang /
zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs /
eṇeyajaṅghaśca paṭūrubāhuḥ kośāvadhānottamavastiguhyaḥ byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes /
mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog /
[189] suvarṇavarṇaḥ pratanucchaviśca pradakṣiṇaikaikasujātaromā pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang /
spu ni re re nas gyas legs 'khrungs dang /
ūrṇāṅkitāsyo haripūrvakāyaḥ skandhau vṛtāvasya citāntarāṃsaḥ /
[190] hino rasaḥ khyāti rasottamo 'sya nyagrodhavanmaṇḍalatulyamūrtiḥ /
uṣṇīṣamūrdhā pṛthucārujivho brahmasvaraḥ siṃhahanuḥ suśuklāḥ 		zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra /
'di yi dpung ba'i mgo zlum thal gong rgyas /
'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang /
sku ni nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab /
gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang /
tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems /
[191] tulyāḥ pramāṇe 'viralāśca dantā anyūnasaṃkhyādaśikāścatasraḥ shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang /
grangs ni bzhi bcu tham par tshang ba dang /
nīlekṣaṇo govṛṣapakṣmanetro dvātriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /
'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan /
(RSt_180) /
kramaḥ pādaḥ cakrāṅkau hastau cāsyeti 'cakrāṅkahastakramaḥ' /
supratiṣṭhitatvāt kūrmāviva pādāvasyeti 'kūrmāpādaḥ' 		zhes bya ba gsungs te /
zhabs ni rkang pa'o /
'di la 'khor los mtshan pa'i phyag dang zhabs yo pas na phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan no /
'di zhabs ru sbal ltar shin tu gnas pa yod pa'i phyir rus sbal zhabs so /
sa cāsau sa ceti samāsaḥ /
jālāvanaddhāṅgalī pāṇī ca pādau cāsyeti 'jālāvanaddhāṅgalipāṇipādaḥ' 		de dag ni las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'o /
'di la phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel ba yod pas na /
phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba'o /
'karau sapādau taruṇau mṛdū ca' asyeti pareṇa sambandhaḥ phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha can /
'di zhes bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar ro /
'samucchrayaiḥ saptabhirāśrayo 'sya' /
lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā 		'de yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang /
zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa'i gsum pa'o /
āśrayaḥ kāyaḥ saptabhirucchayairlakṣitaḥ kāyo 'syetyarthaḥ sku ni rten no /
bdun mtho bas mtshon pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to /
etena pañcalakṣaṇānyuktāni /
cakrāṅkitapāṇipādatā supratiṣṭhitapādatā jālapāṇipādatā mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā saptocchrayatā ceti 		'di dag gis ni mtshan lnga bstan te phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang bdun mtho ba'o /
'dīrghāṅgulitvāyatapārṣṇigātram prājyamṛjūcchaṅkhapadordhvaromā sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang /
zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs /
eṇeyajaṅghaśca paṭūrūbāhuḥ koṣā(śā)vadhānottamavastiguhyaḥ /
dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ ca āyatapārṣṇiśceti samāhāradvandvaḥ 		byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes /
mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog /
ces bya ba la sor mo ring ba dang rting pa yangs pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye'o /
'gātraṃ prājyaṃ ṛju' iti bṛhadṛjugātram /
ucchaṅkhapādaścāsau 'ūrdhvaromā' ca /
uccaiḥ sunigūḍhajānugulphatvāducchaṅkhapāda iti sūtram /
ataśca utkarṣanigūḍhārtha ucchabdaḥ /
jānugulphāsthivācī śaṅkhaśabdaḥ /
urū mūlādadhaśca sarva pāda iti gamyate /
vastau guhyaṃ vastuguhyam /
kośāvadhānamuttama vastiguhyamasyeti tathoktaḥ /
anenāṣṭau lakṣaṇāni /
dīrghāṅgulitā /
āyatapārṣṇitā /
bṛhadujugātratā /
ucchaṅkhapādatā /
ūrdhvāṅgaromatā /
aiṇeyajaṅghatā /
paṭūrubāhutā /
kośāvahitavastiguhyatā ceti /
'suvarṇavarṇaḥ pratanucchaviśca pradakṣiṇaikaikasujātaromā /
ūrṇāṅkitāsyo haripūrvakāyaḥ skandhau vṛtāvasya citāntarāṃsaḥ /
hareriva pūrvakāyo 'syeti 'haripūrvakāyaḥ' /
'vṛttau' iti susaṃvṛttau /
suśliṣṭaparimaṇḍalagrīvatvāt /
asaṃyoraṃtaraṃ uttarāṃsamuraḥ /
tadupacitamasyeti 'citāntarāṃsaḥ' /
anena saptalakṣaṇāni /
suvarṇavarṇatā /
ślakṣaṇacchavitā /
ekaikapradakṣiṇāvartaromatā /
ūrṇāṅkitamukhatā /
siṃhapūrvakāyatā /
susaṃvṛtaskandhatā /
citāntarāṃsatā ceti /
'hīno rasaḥ khyāti rasottamo 'sya nyagrodhavanmaṇḍalatulyamūrtiḥ /
(RSt_181) /
uṣṇīṣamūrdhā pṛthucārujivho brahmasvaraḥ siṃhahanuḥ suśuklāḥ /
tulyāḥ pramāṇe viralāśca dantā anyūnasaṃkhyādaśikāścatasraḥ /
nīlekṣaṇo govṛṣapakṣmanetro dvātriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni /
anena ślokadvayena dvādaśalakṣaṇānyuktāni /
rasarasajñatā /
nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā /
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā /
pṛthutanujivhatā /
brahmasvaratā /
siṃhahanutā /
suśukladantatā /
samadantatā /
aviraladantatā /
samacatvāriṃśaddantatā abhinīlanetratā /
gopakṣmanetratā ceti /
daśaparimāṇamasyāḥ saṃhateriti 'daśikā' /
tāścatasraḥ /
catvāriṃśadityarthaḥ /
govṛṣau gobalīvardau 		sku drang zhes bya ba ni sku che ba dang drang ba'o /
zhabs long bu mi mngon pa yang yin la /
spu gyen du phyogs pa yin pas /
zhabs long mi mngon gyen du phyogs pa ste /
long bu dang pus mo'i lha nga mdzes par mi mngon pa ni mi mngon pa'o /
de'i phyir aung gi sgra ni khyad par dang mi mngon pa'i don to /
dung gi sgra ni pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu'i rus pa'i don te /
brla'i rtsa ba man chad kun la zhabs zhes rtogs par bya'o /
'di la mdoms kyi sba ba mchog tu nub pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
'dis mtshan brgyad bstan te /
sor mo ring ba dang rting ba yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba dang zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa dang sbu gyen du phyogs pa dang /
byin pa ri dags ae na ya'i lta bu dang phyag dang brla zhing grims pa dang mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'o /
pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang /
spu ni re re nas gyas legs 'khrungs dang /
zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra /
'di la dpung pa mgo zlum thal gong rgyas /
'di la ro stod seng ge 'dra ba ni ro stod seng ge dang 'dra ba'o /
mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba ni mi zlum pa ma yin te /
mgur ma byang zhing kun nas zlum pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
thal gong dag gi bar ni dbus te brang ngo /
de rgyas pa 'di la yod pas thal gong rgyas pa'o /
'dir ni mtshan sum cu bstan te /
pags pa mdog gser lta bu dang pags pa srab pa dang spu re re nas gyas su legs par 'khrungs pa dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang dpung mgo zlum pa dang thal gong rgyas pa'o /
'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang /
sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab /
gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang /
tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems /
shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang /
grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang ba dang /
spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /
'dra ba 'di mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan /
zhes bya ba la /
tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'dis ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan te /
ro bro ba'i mchog nyid dang n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang gtsug tor gyen du 'phags pa nyid dang ljags ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang thems shin tu dkar ba nyid dang tshems mnyam pa nyid dang tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang spyan mthon mthong nyid dang spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid dang ba mchog ni be'u gzhon nu'o /
athavā 'govṛṣaḥ' puṅgavaḥ /
sarvaikatvena 'dvāṃtriśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni' /
eṣāṃ vyākhyānaṃ ca hetuśca pūrvanimittatā ca dharmadāna (?) sūtre /
[192] yasya yasyātra yo heturlakṣaṇasya prasādhakaḥ /
tasya tasya prapūryāyaṃ samudāgamalakṣaṇaḥ 		yang na ba mchog ni khyu mchog go /
'di thams cad gcig tu byas pas ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to /
'di dag gis bshad pa dang rgyu dang snga ltas dang chos kyi sbyin pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin te /
'di la mtshan nyid gang gang gi /
sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin /
de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas /
atra /
'yasya yasya lakṣaṇasya yo yo hetuḥ prasādhakaḥ /
tasya tasya prapūryāyaṃ samudāgamalakṣaṇaḥ' /
ayaṃ sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ /
kasya punaḥ ko heturityāha /
[193] gurūṇāmanuyānādi dṛḍhatā saṃvaraṃ prati 		mtshan ni 'di dag yang dag 'grub /
'dir gang gi mtshan gang gi rgyu gang sgrub par byed pa de dang de ni rab tu rdzogs pas thob pa'i mtshan nyid de /
'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o /
yang gang gi rgyu gang yin zhe na /
bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang /
yang dag blangs la brtan pa dang /
saṃgrahāsevanaṃ dānaṃ praṇītasya ca vastunaḥ bsdu brten dang gya nom pa'i /
dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba /
[194] vadhyamokṣāḥ samādānaṃ vivṛddhiḥ kuśalasya ca thar bar byed dang dge ba ni /
yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs /
ityādiko yathāsūtraṃ heturlakṣaṇasādhakaḥ sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de /
mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin /
tatra gurūṇāmanugamanapratyudgamānābhyāṃ dharmaśravaṇamālyopahāracaityānupānaprabhṛtiṣu ca paricāradānāccakrāṅkahastapādatā zhes bya ba la bla ma la bskyal ba dang bsu ba dag dang chos mnyan pa dang mchod rten la me tog gis mchod pa dang bskor ba la sogs pa dang gyog 'khor phul bas ni phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no /
dṛḍhasamādānatvāt supratiṣṭhitapādatā /
saṃgrahavastūnāmāsevanājjālahastapādatā /
praṇītānnapānādidānānmṛdutaruṇahastapādatā (RSt_182) saptocchadatā ca 		bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kun tu bsten pas ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba yin no /
bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa gya nom pa byin pas ni phyag dang zhabs gzhon sha can dang bdun mtho ba nyid do /
'vadhyamokṣāḥ' iti bahuvacanāmādyartham gsad par bya ba thar byed dang /
zhes bya ba'i tshig ni sogs pa'i don to /
vadhyamokṣaṇājjīvitānugrahakaraṇāt /
prāṇātipātavirateścāsevanāddīrghāṅgulitā āyatapārṣṇitā bṛhadṛjugātratā ca 		gsad pa thar bar byas pa dang srog rjes su gzung ba byas pa dang srog gcod pa las ldog pa kun du bsten pas /
song mo ring ba nyid dang rting pa yangs pa nyid dang sku che zhing drang ba nyid do /
kuśaladharmasamādānasya vivardhanāducchaṃkhapādatā /
ūrdhvāṅgiromatā ca 		dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang rnam par spel bas na zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid do /
'ityādika' evamādikaḥ /
'yathāsūtraṃ' iti yathā paṭhiṣyati dharmadāne 		sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de la sogs pa'o /
mdo las 'di skad 'byung ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o /
mahāpuruṣakāratvāt mahāpuruṣāstathāgatā mahābodhisattvāśca /
teṣāṃ dyotakāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni dvātriṃśat 		de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu chen po'i byed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir skyes bu chen po ste /
de dag gsal bar byed pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan te sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
teṣāmeva śobhākaraṇādaśītyanuvyañjanāni de dag mdzes par byed pa'i phyir dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste /
tānyadhikṛtya dvādaśaślokāḥ- /
[195] tāmrāḥ snigdhāśca tuṅgāśca nakhā aṅgulayo muneḥ 		de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas tshigs su bcad pa ni bcu gnyis te /
thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang /
mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams /
vṛttāścitānupurvāśca gūḍhā nirgranthayaḥ śirāḥ /
anenāṣṭāvanuvyañjanānyuktāni /
tāmranakhatā snigdhanakhatā tuṅganakhatā ca /
vṛttāṅgulitā citāṅgulitā anupūrvāṅgulitā ca gūḍhaśiratā nirgranthiśiratā ceti /
[196] gūḍhau gulphau samau pādo siṃhebhadvijagopateḥ /
vikrāntaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cāru gamanamṛjuvṛttate (tā) /
[197] muṣṭānupūrvate /
iti ṣaḍakṣarādhikena ślokena dvādaśa /
gūḍhagulphatā /
aviṣamapādatā /
siṃhavikrāntagāmitā /
haṃsavikrāntagāmitā /
vṛṣabhavikrāntagāmitā /
pradakṣiṇāvataṃgāmitā /
cārūgāmitā /
avakragātratā /
vṛttagātratā /
mṛṣṭagātratā anupūrvagātratā ceti /
medhyamṛdutve śuddhagātratā /
pūrṇavyañjanatā cārūpṛthumaṇḍalagātratā /
iti ṣaḍiṃvaśatyākṣaraiḥ pañcānuvyañjanāni /
śucigātratā mṛdugātratā viśuddhagātratā paripūrṇavyañjanatā cārupṛthumaṇḍalagātratā ceti /
[198] samakramatvaṃ śuddhatvaṃ netrayoḥ sukumāratā /
adīnocchadagātratvaṃ susaṃhatanagātratā /
(RSt_183) /
anena ṣaṭ /
samakramatā viśuddhanetratā sukumāragātratā utsadagātratā susaṃhatanagātratā ceti /
[199] suvibhaktāṅgatā dhvāntapradhvastālokaśuddhatā 		zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang /
rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med /
ces bya ba 'dis ni dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu bstan te /
sen mo zangs kyi mdog nyid dang sen mo snum pa nyid dang sen mo mtho ba nyid dang sor mo zlum pa nyid dang sor mo rgyas pa nyid dang sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang rtsa mi mngon pa nyid dang mdud pa med pa nyid do /
long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang /
seng ge glang chen bya dang ni /
khyu mchog stabs gshegs gyas phyogs dang /
mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags /
byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham /
zhes bya ba ni tshig rkang gcig lhag pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni bcu gnyis te /
long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid dang seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang gyas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang sku drang ba nyid dang sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang sku byi dor byas pa nyid dang sku rim par 'tshams par nyid dang gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku /
mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang /
zhes bya ba'i tshig rkang gsum gyis ni dpe byad bzang po lnga nyid de /
sku gtsang ba nyid dang sku 'jam pa nyid dang sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang tshan rdzogs pa nyid dang sku kho lag yangs shing mdzes pa nyid do /
gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang /
shin tu gzhon mdog can nyid dang /
sku zhum med de rgyas pa dang /
shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang /
zhes bya ba 'di ni drug ste /
gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang sku gzhon sha can nyid dang sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang sku rgyas pa nyid dang sku shin tu grims pa nyid do /
yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang /
gzigs pa rab rib dag pa dang /
vṛttamṛṣṭākṣatākṣāmakukṣitāśca gabhīratā /
[200] dakṣiṇāvartatā nābheḥ samantāddarśanīyatā 		dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang /
phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni /
zab dang gyas phyogs 'khyil ba dang kun nas blta na sdug pa dang /
anena sārdhaślokena nava /
suvibhaktāṅgapratyaṅgatā vitimiraśuddhālokatā mṛṣṭakukṣitā abhagnakukṣitā akṣāmakukṣitā gambhīranābhitā dakṣiṇāvartanābhitā samantaprāsādikatā ceti /
samācāraḥ śuciḥ kālatilakāpagatā tanuḥ /
[201] karau tūlamṛdusnigdhagambhīrāyatalekhatā 		zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni dgu ste /
yan lag dang nying lag rnam par shin tu 'byes pa nyid dang gzigs pa rab rib med cing dag pa nyid dang dku zlum pa nyid dang dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang phyal phyang nge ba nyid dang lte ba zab pa nyid dang lte ba gyas phyogs su 'khyil pa nyid dang kun nas mdzes pa nyid do /
kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni /
sme ba gnag bag med pa dang /
phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang /
phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang /
zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang /
nātyāyataṃ vaco bimbapratibimbodayāsyatā /
bimbānāṃ pratibimbodayo 'sminniti tathoktamāsyaṃ mukhamasyeti 'bimbapratibimbodayāsyaḥ' /
anena sārdhaślokenāṣṭau 		zhal gzugs gzugs brnyan 'byung ba dang /
zhes bya ba la /
zhal 'di la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba yod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
zhal ni zhal gdong ste /
zhal gdong la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'o /
tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis pa 'dis ni brgyad de /
śucisamācāratā vyapagatatilakagātratā tūlasadṛśasukumārapāṇitā snigdhapāṇilekhatā gambhīrapāṇilekhatā āyatapāṇilekhatā nātyāyatavadanatā bimbapratibimbadarśanavadanatā ceti /
[202] mṛdvī tanvī ca raktā ca jivhā jīmūtaghoṣatā /
cārumañjusvaro daṃṣṭrā vṛttāstīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ samāḥ 		kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyad dang sku la sme ba gnag bag med pa nyid dang phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang phyag gi ser mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang zhal gdong la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba nyid do /
ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang /
gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum /
rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang /
[203]anupūrvodagatāstuṅgā nāsikā paramaṃ śuciḥ /
'paramaṃ' atyantam /
anena sārdhaślokena dvādaśa /
mṛdujivhatā tanujivhatā raktajivhatā ca /
gajagarjitajīmutaghoṣatā /
madhuracārumañjusvaratā vṛttadaṃṣṭratā tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭratā śukladaṃṣṭratā samadaṃṣṭratā anupūrvadaṃṣṭratā tuṅganāsikatā śucināsikatā ceti /
viśāle nayane pakṣma cittaṃ padmadalākṣitā /
[204] āyataślakṣṇasusnigdhasamarome bhruvau bhujau 		byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang /
mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni /
zhes bya ba la /
mchog ni dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni bcu gnyis te /
ljags mnyel pa nyid dang ljags srab pa nyid dang ljags dmar ba nyid dang glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid dang gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang mche ba zlum pa nyid dang mche ba rno ba nyid dang mche ba dkar ba nyid dang mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang shangs mtho ba nyid dang shangs gtsang ba nyid do /
spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug /
padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang /
snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang /
pīnāyatau samau karṇāvupaghātavivarjitau /
[205] lalāṭamaparimlānaṃ pṛthu pūrnottamāṅgatā /
(RSt_184) 		phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam dang /
nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang 'phral ba legs par 'byes pa dang /
samarome iti striyāṃ ḍāp /
anena ślokadvayena trayodaśa /
viśālanayanatā citapakṣmatā sitasitakamaladalanayanatā āyatabhrūtā ślakṣṇabhrūtā snigdhabhrūtā samaromabhrūtā pīnāyatabhujatā samakarṇatā anupahatakarṇatā supariṇāmitalalāṭatā pṛthulalāṭatā paripūrṇottamāṅgatā ceti /
bhramarābhrāścitāḥ ślakṣṇā asaṃluḍitamūrtayaḥ /
[206] keśā aparuṣāḥ puṃsāṃ saurabhyādapahāriṇaḥ 		dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang /
zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gnyis po 'dis ni bcu gsum mo /
spyan yangs pa nyid dang rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang spyan dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma lta bu nyid dang smin tshugs ring ba nyid dang smin ma snum pa nyid dang smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang snyan mnyam pa nyid dang 'phral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang 'phral ba dbyes che ba nyid dang dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid dang dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang /
stug 'jam ma 'dzings ngo bo dang /
dbu skra mi gshor nyid dang ni /
dbu skra skyes bu yid 'phrog dang /
dpal gyi be'u dang bkri shis ni /
śrīvatsaḥ svastikaṃ ceti buddhānuvyañjanaṃ matam g yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste /
sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed /
anena sārdhaślaukena sapta /
bhramarasadṛśakeśatā citakeśatā ślakṣṇakeśatā asaṃluḍitakeśatā aparuṣakeśatā śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartalalitapāṇipādatā ceti /
sarvaikatvena buddhānāmaśītiranuvyañjanāni 		ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni bdun te /
dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid dang dbu skra stug pa nyid dang dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang dbu skra mi gshor ba nyid dang dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil bkra shis dang gyung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa nyid do /
thams cad gcig tu byas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o /
iti sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ /
nairmāṇikaṃ kāyamadhikṛtya śāstram- 		'di ni long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o /
sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[207] karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam /
ā bhavātso 'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ /
[208] tathā karmāpyanucchinnamasyā saṃsāramiṣyate /
ataḥ sūtram /
sarvadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti /
yāvantaḥ sthalajalāntarikṣacarāṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāyavāksaṃgṛhītā dharmāḥ sattvānāṃ vinayanāya bhagavatā ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu nirmitāḥ te sarvadharmāsteṣāmaparyantatayā bhagavataḥ prajñāyā aparyantatā veditavyā /
katamasyāḥ te nirmitāḥ? śūnyatāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti /
yathā tathāgatena nirmitāḥ kāyā anantāstathā teṣāṃ śūnyatāpyanantā 		gang gi srid pa mi srid par /
'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag /
mnyam pa mdzad pa'i sku de ni /
thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad /
de bzhin de las 'khor ba'i bar /
rgyun mi 'chad bar bzhed pa yin /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de'i phyir mdo las /
chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la ji srid sa la spyod pa dang bar snang la spyod pa'i 'gro ba dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang rag gi bsdus pa ni chos te /
sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu sprul pa de dag ni chos thams cad de /
de dag mu med par rig par bya'o /
de gang zhe na /
gang gi sprul pa de dag go /
stong pa nyid mu med pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la ji ltar sprul pa'i sku de dag mu med pa de bzhin du de dag gi stong pa nyid kyang mu med do /
gang gis stong zhe na /
kena śūnyatā? svādhīnaiścicaitasikairmāyāpuruṣavat /
atastasyāpi aparyantatayāparyantateti pūrvavat 		sems dang sems las byung nga la rag las pa ste /
sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin no /
de'i phyir de yang mu med pas mu med pa ste /
snga ma bzhin no /
yathā teṣāṃ kāyavācau nirmite tathā cittacaitasikā api kinna nirmīyante? tadupādānābhāvāt, apūrvasattvāprādurbhāvācca /
nanu cittacaitasikanirmāṇamapīṣyate buddhānāṃ 		ji ltar yang de dag lus dang ngag gi sprul pa de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba yang ci'i phyir mi sprul zhe na /
de la nye bar len pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang sngon med pa'i sems can mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa ni /
sems dang sems las byung ba la yang 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
"kāyavākcittanirmāṇaprayogopāyakarmakaḥ /
(RSt_185) 		sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa ni /
sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can yin /
iti vacanāt /
satyamiṣyate /
kintu satyupādāne devatādhiṣṭhānena svapnadarśanavat 		zhes bya ba'i tshig las so /
'on kyang nye bar len pa yod na yod par 'gyur te /
lhas byin gyis brlabs nas rmi lam du bstan pa lta bu 'am /
tshig las tshig gi don go ba bzhin no /
vācā vāgarthanni(rthani)vedanavacca /
ata āha /
cittacaritāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti /
teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ yathā deśitaṃ dharmamālambya prātipakṣikāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante /
taiśca teṣāṃ vikṣepakā akuśalā dharmāḥ prahīyante /
ata āha /
kuśalākuśaladharmāparimāṇatayā prajñāpāramitāparimāṇatānugantavyeti 		de'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa dag tu sems can gyi khams mu med pa'i spyod pa mu med pa la rnam par gzigs nas /
bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa yin te /
de'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
sems can de dag gis kyang ji ltar bstan pa'i chos la dmigs nas gnyen po'i dge ba'i chos skye bar 'gyur te /
des kyang de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong bar 'gyur te /
de'i phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos gzhal du med pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
atha ye nirmitāste kathaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyāḥ? bhagavatā nirmitatvāditi cet ji ste gang sprul pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yin /
gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
māyākāranirmitā gajādayastarhi māyākārasya kāyāḥ syuḥ, svakāyatvenādhiṣṭhāya tena nirmāṇāt /
svakāyavacca gamanavyāhārādiṣu duṣkareṣu vyāpa[ā]raṇāttepi kāyā ityayaṃ bhagavato nairmāṇikaḥ kāyaḥ /
uktāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ 		de ltar na ni sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po la sogs pa yang sgyu ma mkhan gyi lus su 'gyur ro zhe na /
rang gi skur byin gyis brlabs pa der sprul pa'i phyir nyid kyi sku bzhin du gshegs pa dang dka' ba spyod pa dang bya ba la sogs pa mdzad pa de yang de'i sku yin no /
de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i sku bstan te /
de dag ni sku gsum mo /
kāritramidānīṃ vaktavyam /
tatsamāsata āha /
siṃhanādanadanatayā prajñāpāramitānugantavyeti /
mṛgāṇāmuttamaḥ siṃhaḥ 		da ni mdzad pa mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste /
de yang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
ri dags rnams kyi mchog ni seng ge'o /
tatsādharmyāt puruṣottamāḥ puruṣasiṃhā ityucyante de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir skyes bu dam pa ni skyes bu seng ge zhes brjod do /
'di ni khyad par du gyur pa ste /
iha tu prakarṣagaterdevamanuṣyādisarvapuruṣottamastathāgataḥ siṃha ityucyate lha dang mi rnams la sogs pa skyes bu thams cad kyi dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
de la seng ge zhes brjod do /
tasya dharmaḥ sarvāśāparipūraṇatayā sarvaparapravādimṛgabhīṣaṇatayā ca siṃhanāda ityucyate de'i chos ni bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang gzhan pha rol rgol ba'i ri dags thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas seng ge'i sgra zhes brjod do /
siṃhadhvajavat seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bzhin no /
tasya nadano deśakaḥ /
tabhdāvastattā /
tayā bhagavataḥ prajñā gantavyā pāragamanāt pāramitā veditavyetyarthaḥ 		de sgrog pa ni ston pa'o /
de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab ni /
bgrod par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
sa punaḥ siṃhanādanadanaḥ saptaviṃśatividhasya kāritradeśanā /
sā vistareṇa mahatyorbhagavatyordraṣṭavyā 		de yang seng ge'i sgra ste /
mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun ston pa ste /
de ni rgyas par yum chen mo dag las blta bar bya'o /
tāmadhikṛtya śāstram- de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni /
bsdu rnams bzhi la dgod pa dang /
[209] niveśanaṃ sasaṃkleśe vyavadānāvabodhane kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi /
rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang /
sattvānāmarthayāthātmye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu ca /
[210] buddhamārge prakṛtyaiva śūnyatāyāṃ dvayakṣaye 		sems can rnams don ji bzhin gyi /
don dang pha rol phyin drug dang /
sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis /
stong pa nyid gnyis mi zad dang /
saṃkete 'nupalambhe ca paripāke ca dehinām brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang /
lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang /
[211] bodhisattvasya mārge 'bhiniveśasya ca vāraṇe /
bodhiprāptau jinakṣetraviśuddho niyatiṃ prati 		byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni /
mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang /
byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing /
[212] aprameye ca sattvārthe buddhasevādike guṇe /
bodheraṅgeṣvanāśe ca karmaṇāṃ satyadarśane 		rnam par dag dang nges pa dang /
sems can don ni tshad med dang /
sangs rgyas rten sogs yon tan dang /
byang chub yan lag las rnams ni /
(RSt_186) /
[213] viparyāsaprahāṇe ca tadavastukatānaye /
vyavadāne ca sambhāre saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛte prati /
[214] vyatibhedāparijñāne nirvāṇe ca niveśanam 		chud mi za dang bden mthong dang /
phyin ci log ni spang pa dang /
de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni /
rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni /
'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa la /
tha dad yongs su mi shes dang /
mya ngan 'das la dgod pa ste /
dharmakāyasya karmedaṃ saptaviṃśatidhā matam chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di /
rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed /
bhagavāṃstānvigrahānnirmimīte ye nārakāṇāṃ narakāgninirvāpaṇena dharmadeśanayā ca tathā tiraścāṃ svamāṃsarudhirādidānena tathā pretānāmannapānādidānena dharmadeśanayā ca cittamabhipra sādya tena cābhiprasādena svagatibhyaścyutānāṃ devamanuṣyeṣūpapādayanti /
devānapi hīnayānādhimuktikān dharmadeśanayābhiprasādya manuṣyeṣūpapannān yāvacchrāvakabodhau pratyekabodhau ca pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyantīti gatipraśamanakarma /
ye ca manuṣyān bāhyādhyātmikeṣvāmiṣadāneṣu laukikalokotareṣu ca dharmadāneṣu, arthacaryāyāṃ samānārthatāyāṃ ca śikṣayantīti saṅgrahavastuniveśanakarma /
saṃkleśaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca /
vyavadānaṃ tayorastamayaḥ /
sa ca pudgaladharmanairātmyajñānāditi saṃvṛtiḥ 		ces bya ba gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku gang gis dmyal ba rnams kyi dmyal ba'i me zhi bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar chos ston pa dang de bzhin du dud 'gro dag la yang rang gi khrag la sogs pa'i sbyin pa dang de bzhin du yi dags rnams la yang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byin nas chos bstan te /
sems dad par 'dzin pa dang mngon par dad pa des rang gi 'gro ba las shi 'phos te /
lha dang mi rnams su skye bar mdzad de /
lha rnams la yang theg pa dman pa la mos shing dang bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te /
mi rnams su skye bar byas nas nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar la gnas par byed pa 'di ni 'gro ba rnams zhi ba'i phrin las so /
yang gang dag mi rnams kyi phyi nang gi zang zing gi sbyin pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang don spyod pa dang don mthun pa la slob par byed pa 'di ni bsdu pa'i dngos po la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
kun nas nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o /
de gnyis nub pa ni rnam par byang ba'o /
de yang gang zag dang chos la bdag med par shes pa'i phyir 'di ni kun rdzob bo /
paramārthastu [na] dharmadhātoranyadastīti saṃkleśavyavadānajñānaniveśanakarma don dam par chos kyi dbyings las gzhan med de /
'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
yathā hi māyākāro vicitrāṇi vastūni yāvabhdakṣyabhojyāni nirmāya lokaṃ toṣayati ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i bar gyi dngos po sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed de /
sa ca loko na jānāti sarvametadadravyakamiti /
yaśca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na sa dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ kiñcitpaśyati na sattvaṃ nāpi sattvaprajñaptiṃ dharmāṇāmapi nairātmyāditi sattvārthayāthātmyaniveśanakarma 		de yang 'jig rten gyi dngos po 'di thams cad med par shes pa ni ma yin no /
gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs par cung zad kyang mthong ba med de /
sems can yang ma yin /
sems can du btags pa yang ma yin no /
chos rnams kyang bdag med pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃśca dāne niyojayati dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate /
ye cānye dānaṃ dadati teṣā ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ /
evamātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣatītyādi vācyamiti ṣaṭpāramitāniveśanakarma 		'di ni sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin gyi bdag nyid la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
de bdag nyid kyang sbyin par byed /
gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed /
sbyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed /
gang gzhan dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing mthun par byed do /
de bzhin du bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate /
ātmanā ca pañcaśikṣāpadāni yāvadātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayatīti vācyamiti buddhamārganiveśanakarma /
iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pāramitādīn sarvadharmān deśayati 		bdag nyid kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par byed pa dang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga nas /
skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis te /
'di ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa la rdzogs pa'i chos ston pa na /
teṣāṃ koṭitrayasya phalasya ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ deśayati de dag gi 'khor gsum dag pa'i 'bras bu yang rang bzhin gyis stong par ston par byed de /
te tathā bhāvayanto viśeṣamadhigacchanti de dag de bzhin du bsgoms pas lhag par khyad par du 'gro ste /
(RSt_187) tataste bhūyasyā mātrayā prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimadhigacchantīti prakṛtiśūnyatāniveśanakarma des na de dag stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la lan mang du sgom par byed pas /
bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du khyad par 'gro bar byed de /
'di ni stong pa nyid la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na cānyā prakṛtiśūnyatā anye dharmāḥ /
kiṃ tarhi? prakṛtiśūnyataiva dharmāḥ 		rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad de /
rang bzhin gyis stong pa yang gzhan ma yin no /
chos thams cad kyang gzhan ma yin te /
'on kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid chos so /
ta eva prakṛtiśūnyatetyadvayadharmaniveśanakarma /
na samyaksambodhau bhagavatā kaściddharma upalabdhaḥ /
yatpunarabhisambudhya dharmā deśitāḥ skandhadhātvādayo vā yāvatsarvākārajñatā vā tatsarvaṃ lokavyavahāreṇeti sāṅketikajñānaniveśanakarma /
yadi pāramitādiṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate tathāpi samyaksambodhaye na śaknoti /
yadi punasteṣveva carati teṣāṃ ca koṭitrayaṃ phalaṃ ca nopalabhate 		de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i chos ni gang yang med de /
gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
phung po dang khams la sogs pa nas /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos ston pa de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin te /
'di ni brdar btags pa shes pas dgod pa'i phrin las so /
gal te pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa de lta na yang /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi nus la gal te yang de dag la yang spyod cing /
'khor gsum gyi 'bras bu de dag la yang mi dmigs pa de'i tshe ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nus te /
tadā samyaksambodhaye śaknotītyupalambhaniveśanakarma /
yadyapi bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvaṃ sattvaprajñaptiṃ ca nopalabhate tathāpi saṃvṛtyā paśyati sattvān vastūpalambhena saṃkliṣyamānān /
sa tāṃstatprahāṇāya triṣu yāneṣu paripācayatīti sattvaparipākaniveśanakarma /
sa evamupaparīkṣate /
śūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāmabhiniviśate /
tasmātsarvadharmeṣvanabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam /
dānādiṣu caritavyam 		'di ni dmigs pa med pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
gal te byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
sems can dang sems can du brtags pa yang mi dmigs te /
'on kyang de kun rdzob mthong nas sems can rnams dngos por dmigs pas /
kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa na /
des de dag gi de rnams spang pa'i phyir /
theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed de /
'di ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
de pha rol tu phyin pa re re la sogs pa la spyod pa ni /
sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob par byed de /
'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
de de ltar nye bar rtog pa na /
chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
stong pa nyid la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do /
de bas na chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bsgom par bya zhing /
sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyad par bya ste /
na ca teṣu tatphaleṣu vā gantavyamiti sarvābhiniveśaprahāṇaniveśanakarma 'khor gsum po de dag la yang rlom sems su mi bya'o /
'di ni mngon par zhen pa thams cad spangs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
na mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate nāmārgeṇa lam gyis byang chub thob pa la yang ma yin /
lam ma yin pas kyang ma yin te /
yato bodhi eva mārgaḥ mārga eva bodhiḥ gang gi phyir byang chub nyid lam mo /
lam nyid byang chub bo /
bodhisattva eva tarhi buddhaḥ syāditi cet gal te de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyid sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
yadā sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamasamādhau sthitvā bodhisattva ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā samyaksambodhimadhigacchati tadā sa eva tathāgataḥ sarvadarśī sarvajña iti nirdiśyata iti bodhiprāptiniveśanakarma /
sa ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca daśākuśalasaṃgṛhītāni dauḥśīlyāni ṣaṭpāramitāvipakṣāṃśca hīnayānaphalānāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sākṣātkriyāspṛhayoravakāśaṃ, skandhadhātvādisāśravānāśravasarvadharmasaṃjñādauṣṭhulyāni ca nivārya svayaṃ ca pāramitādiṣu sarvakuśaladharmeṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati parānapi pratiṣṭhāpayati /
tacca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇakṛtvā ātmanaḥ samyaksambodhau ca sarvākārāyāṃ ca svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhau pariṇāmayati 		gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de'i tshe /
de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'o zhes ston te /
'di ni byang chub thob pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
de bdag dang gzhan dag gi tshul khrims 'chal pa la mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis yang dag par bsdus pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang theg pa dman pa'i 'bras bu lnga mngon sum du byed cing reg pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed cing phung po dang khams la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi gnas ngan len bsal nas /
rang yang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par byed la /
gzhan yang de dag la 'god par byed cing /
bdag gi dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yongs su sngo bar byed cing /
praṇidhānāni ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye yathā sūtraṃ karotīti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiniveśanakarma sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang mdo ji lta ba bzhin du 'debs par byed de /
'di ni sang rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
prathamacittotpādika eva bodhisattvaḥ samyaksambodhau niyato bhavati gal te byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa nyid nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur pa yin zhing /
niyatasya kathamapāyeṣūpapattiriti cet nges pa ji ltar na ngan song du skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
