yathaiva samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatāsmābhirvyākhyātā tathaiva sattvānāmānantyāt vedanāparyantatayāpi saṃskāraparyantatayāpi vijñānāparyantatayāpi pṛthivīdhātvaparyantatayāpi apdhātvaparyantatayāpi tejodhātvaparyantatayāpi vāyudhātvaparyantatayāpi ākāśadhātvaparyantatayāpi vijñānadhātvaparyantatayāpi vyākhyātavyā /
atha yā vijñānaskandhāparyantatayā yā ca vijñānadhātvaparyantatayā tayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ? skandhadhātuśabdābhyāṃ prayogakṛtaḥ 		ji ltar bdag gis rgya mtsho mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par bshad pa de bzhin du gzhan sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba mu med pa nyid dang 'du shes mu med pa nyid dang 'du byed mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid dang sa'i khams mu med pa nyid dang chu'i khams mu med pa nyid dang me'i khams mu med pa nyid dang rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid dang nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa nyid kyang bshad par bya'o /
ji ste gang rnam par shes pa'i phung po mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa de dag la khyad par ci yod ci na /
phung po dang khams kyi sgra dag gis bye brag tu byas pa yin no /
vajropamadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamateti rdo rje sta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
cittadhāraṇāddharmaḥ samādhiḥ sems 'dzin pas na chos te ting nge 'dzin to /
tasya yā sarvadharmeṣu samatā tayomānena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ samatā sarvadharmeṣu sarvadharmāsambhedanatayā prajñāpāramitāsambhedanateti sarvadharmāṇāmasambhedo abhedaḥ /
bhedakānāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmabhāvāt /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāyā api na bhedaḥ /
samvedyamānenaiva rūpeṇa teṣāṃ tasyāmabhāvāt /
sarvadharmānupalabdhitayā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhiteti /
sarvadharmā na kiñcidupalabhante /
rūpasya jaḍatvāt /
śeṣāṇāmapyātmani paratra vā grāhakatvāyogāt /
nāpyupalabhyante grāhakābhāvāt /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi nopalabhate nāpyupalabhyate /
tasmātteṣāṃ tasyāścānupalabdhitā /
sarvadharmāvibhāvanāsamatayā prajñāpāramitāvibhāvanāsamateti /
vibhāvanāṃ parebhyo (RSt_202) vācā deśanā /
sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmādavibhāvanayā samatā teṣām /
tadvatsarvālambaneṣu prajñāpāramitāyā avibhāvanāsamatā /
sarvadharmaniśceṣṭatayā prajñāpāramitāniśceṣṭateti /
ceṣṭā īhāvyāpāraḥ /
avyāpāraḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
kathaṃ tarhi kaścitkutaścidutpadyate? idaṃpratyayamātreṇa /
asmin satīdaṃ bhavati, asati na bhavatītyetāvatā hetuphalabhāvaḥ /
tasmādamī niśceṣṭāḥ tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi 		rdo rje lta bu'i chos ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to /
de chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do /
chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
chos thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa nyid ni ma 'dres pa ste /
'byed par byed pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams med pa'i phyir ro /
de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma mu med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po yang ngo /
gang yang gzugs las gzhan med pa de la nges par snang ba dang mun pa yang med do /
de bzhin du de'i de bzhin nyid snang ba na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do /
ji ltar bdag gis rgya mtsho mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par bshad pa de bzhin du gzhan sems shing 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par byed pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir de dag dang de mi dmigs so /
chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la rnam par 'jig pa ni gzhan dag la tshig gis ston pa de chos thams cad la med de /
de'i phyir rnam par 'jig pa med pas de dag mnyam pa nyid do /
de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'jig pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid do /
chos thams cad byed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do zhes bya ba la byed pa med pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa ni 'dir bya ba ste /
chos thams cad bya ba med pa'o /
de ltar gang zhig ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
'di yod pa'i rkyen gyis 'di yod na ni 'di 'byung la 'di med na ni 'di mi 'byung zhes bya ba 'di tsam gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o /
de'i phyir 'di rnams ni byed pa med pa ste /
de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo /
sarvadharmācintyatayāpi prajñāpāramitācintyateti chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
yathā hi dharmāḥ parebhyo na deśyante nirviṣayatvādvācaḥ ji ltar chos ni gzhan dag la bstan du med de /
tshig gi yul med pa'i phyir ro /
tathā svayamapi na cintyante na nirūpyante vāgvikalpayorekārthatvāt de bzhin du rang gis kyang bsam du med cing brtag tu med pa ste /
de dag dang rnam par rtog pa dang don gcig pa'i phyir ro /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpyacintyā de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o /
veditavyetyante yat paṭhyate tatsarvadharmasamatādivākyeṣu sarveṣu sambadhyate 'ntardīpakatvāt /
atha khalvityādi 		rigs par bya'o zhes gang mthar brjod pa de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i tshig dag la sbyar te /
med na mi 'byung pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba las sogs pa gsungs pa la /
atheti deśanāparisamāptau de nas zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o /
tathā niṣaṇṇasvaṃveti śrutāsanādanutthitasya /
athetyuddeśaḥ /
kṛtaḥ /
tasyaiva nirdeśaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmiti /
yenaiva krameṇa yairevākāraiḥ prajñāpāramitā deśitā tenaiva krameṇa tairevākāraistriṃśatsamādhaya utpannā iti samudāyārthaḥ 		de ltar 'dug bzhin du zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i stan las ma langs pa ro /
de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o /
de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o /
de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rim pa gang dang rnam pa gang nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i rim pa de nyid dang rnam pa de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin su cu skyes so zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to /
tatra sarvadharmasamatādyākāratvātsamādhayastathā vyapadiśyante de la chos thams cad mnyams pa nyid kyi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin du yang bstan na /
kathamamī ākārāḥ? ebhi prakārairvastujñānāt /
yathoktam- /
vastujñānaprakārāṇāmākāra iti lakṣaṇam /
iti /
kiṃ tarhyālambanam? tadeva vastu yathāsvam /
athavā sarvadharmasamatādirevālambanam 		ji ltar 'di dag rnam pa yin zhe na /
rnam pa 'di dag gis te /
bzhi dang ye shes rnam pa yi /
rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
de lta mod kyi rang rang gi dmigs pa ni de nyid kyi gzhi ji lta ba bzhin no /
yang na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa nyid dmigs pa ste /
tadālambanatvātsamādhayastathoktāḥ /
vastūnyadhiṣṭhāni /
ākāro yathāsvaṃ nirnimittatādiḥ 		de'i dmigs pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir de skad ces brjod do /
gzhi la gnas pa mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa ni rang rang gi ji lta ba'i rnam pa'o /
evaṃ pramukhānīti triṃśatsamādhipramukhāni de dag la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin sum cu la sogs pa'o /
kathameṣāṃ pramukhatvam? ebhiravaśeṣāṇāmākṣepāt /
śatasahasrāṇīti lakṣāṇi 		ji ltar de dag la sogs pa yin zhe na /
'di dag nyid kyis lhag ma bsdus pa'i phyir te /
brgya phrag stong zhes bya ba ni 'dum mo /
dharmodgatena lakṣitaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāmekatriṃśattamaḥ parivartaḥ /
32. parīnandanāparivarto nāma dvātriṃśattamaḥ /
sahapratilabdhānāmityādi /
anena labdhānāṃ samādhīnāṃ tatkālajamanuśaṃsamāha /
ata eva sahaśabdaḥ samānakālatārthaḥ /
pratilabdhānāmiti (RSt_203) pratilabdheṣu satsu /
ebhireva nayeriti yathoktavastubhiraṣṭābhirabhisamayaiḥ /
ebhireva nāmabhiriti sarvākārajñatādibhiḥ /
sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūdityuddeśaḥ /
asya nirdeśa uttaro granthaḥ svapnāntaragatopīti yāvat 		chos 'phags kyis mtshon pa'i le'u ni de'i le'u'o /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /
thob ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dis thos pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi phan yon de'i dus su skyes pa ni de nyid kyi phyir de ma thag pa'i sgras ni dus mnyam du thob po zhes brjod de /
thob pa yod na'o /
tshul 'di lta bu nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi dngos pos so /
ming 'di nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pas so /
gar skyes pa thams cad du sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
'di ni 'og tu bstan pa'i gzhung las 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ni bshad pa'o /
tatra khalvityādirupodghātaḥ parīndanāyāḥ /
tadanenāpi paryāyeṇaiti sadāpraruditavṛttāntenāpi 		des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yongs su gtad pa'i gleng bslang ba'o /
des rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag tu ngu'i ji ltar byung pas kyang ngo /
tasmāttarhītyādinā anuśāsanīśabdaparyantena prathamā parīndanā /
atra ca tathāgatādhiṣṭhāneneti vacanaṃ kimartham? mahārthatvābhdagavatī bavhantarāyā ca vinā buddhādhiṣṭhānena likhitumapi [na] śakyeti pradarśanārtham /
iyamasmākamanuśāsanītīyamasmākaṃ parīndanā /
yathā asyāḥ śravaṇādikaṃ na vicchidyate tathā tvayā kartavyamityarthaḥ 		kun dga' bo de lta bas na zhes bya ba nas /
'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go zhes bya ba'i bar ni gtad pa dang po'o /
'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i tshig ci'i phyir zhe na /
don chen po yin pa'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das yum la bar du gcod pa ni mang du yod pas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs med par bri bar yang mi nus so zhes bstan to /
'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go zhes bya ba la 'di ni nga'i gtad pa ste /
ji ltar 'di nyan pa la sogs pas rgyun mi 'chad par de ltar khyod kyis bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
tatkasya hetoriti /
tatparīndanaṃ kena prayojanenetyarthaḥ /
ata āha /
atra hītyādi /
tatkathamityādinā dvītīyaparīndanāyā upodghātaḥ /
asmin mama samucchaya iti mama śarīre /
tathataditi /
etatpremādikam 		de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de yongs su gtad pa la dgos pa ci yod ces bya ba'i don to /
de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtad pa gnyis pa'i gleng ba'o /
gnas pa 'di la zhes bya ba ni sku 'di la'o /
de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa 'di dag go /
etenopādghātena dve parīndane /
yata āha dvirapi trirapīti /
parīndāmīti samarpayāmi 		gleng bslang ba 'di dag byas nas yongs su gtad pa'i phyir kun dga' po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
lan gnyis lan gsum du zhes bya ba la yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba ni yang dag par gtad pa'o /
anuparīndamītyānukūlyaṃ samarpayāmi rjes su yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba ni mthun par yongs su gtad pa'o /
kathaṃ parīndanetyata āha yatheyamityādi /
anyaḥ puruṣa ityabhaktaḥ /
kasmādasyāmetāvadgauravamityata āha /
yāvadityādi bahuvidhāśca pūjābhiriti yāvat /
bhagavatyāḥ parisamāptimudyotayan saṅgītikāra āha /
idamavocadityādi /
idamiti prajñāpāramitāsūtram 		ji ltar yongs su gtad pa yin zhe na /
de'i phyir ci nas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
skyes bu tha ma zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa'o /
gang gi phyir 'di la dga' ba dang gus par bya zhe na /
de'i phyir du dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung ni spyod par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so /
bcom ldan 'das yum yongs su rdzogs par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sdud pa pos bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
de skad ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'o /
avocaditi bhāṣitavān bka' stsal ba dang zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o /
bhagavāniti śāstā /
parārtharasikāstathāgatāḥ 		bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa'o /
gzhan gyi don la dgyes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o /
parārtha ca parārthakriyā bhagavatyā deśanā gzan gyi don mchog tu mdzad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'o /
tata āha /
āttamanā iti /
niruttaradharmadeśanayā prītaḥ sannityarthaḥ 		de'i phyir yi rangs te zhes gsungs te /
bla na med pa'i chos bstan pas dga' par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
śrotāraḥ kimukurvannityāha /
bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
abhipūrvo nandiḥ sakarmakaḥ /
sa kadācidabhilāṣe vartate /
kadācitprītau /
yadā prītau tadā tadālambanamevāsya karma bhavati /
tatpunaḥ karma bhagavato bhāṣitam 		nyan pa pos ci zhig byas pa yin zhe na /
de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes gsungs so /
bstod pa'i sngon rol du mngon par 'brel pa ni las dang bcas pa yin te /
de ni la lar ni 'dod pa la 'jug la /
la lar ni dga' ba la 'jug pa ste /
de la dmigs pa nyid ni 'dir las yin te las de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i bstan pa 'di nyid do /
eṣaiva deśanā /
ke punaste śrotāra ityāha /
te cetyādi /
lokaḥ sattvasamūhaḥ /
sa ca śrotṝṇāṃ rājagṛhasya ca prakṛtatvānmanuṣyasamūha eva kevalo gamyeta /
tathā mā bhūditi viśeṣaṇaṃ kriyate /
sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśceti /
te ca bodhisattvādayaḥ sadevādiśca loka iti samuccayaḥ 		nyan pa po dag kyang gang zhe na /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
'jig rten ni sems can gyi tshogs so /
nyan pa po dag kyang rgyal po'i khab kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir mi'i tshogs so /
'di 'ba' zhig gis rtog pa rnam par bcad pa'i phyir khyad par du byas pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa zhes gsungs te /
byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dang lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten zhes bsdus so /
parīndanābhidhāyī parivartaḥ parīndanāparivartaḥ /
nānāvibhramalāñchanavyapagamādagrāhyamagrāhakam 		yongs su gtad pa brjod pa'i le'u ni yongs su gtad pa'i le'u'o /
'khrul pa'i dri ma sna tshogs rnam bral gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs /
bhātyetattathatātmanā samarasaṃ yasyāmaśeṣaṃ jagat /
prajñāpāramitā vikalpataraṇī sā bodhisattvasya dhīḥ 		'gro ba gang dag de bzhin nyid du ro gcig de ni rnam par mdzes /
rnam rtog las sgrol shes rab pa rol phyin de byang chub sems dpa'i blo /
dhīraiḥ saiva viśuddhipāragamane tāthāgatī kathyate /
(RSt_204) /
sa(śa)satyaṣṭau yadabhisamayān yatsahasrāṇi cāṣṭau 		de nyid rnam par dag pa'i thar phyin dpa' po de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod /
gang zhig mngon rtogs brgyad dang stong phrag brgyad du bstan pa yi /
sūtraṃ tatte bhagavati mayā yaśca labdho vibhajya rgyu dang mdo ni bdag gis rnam phyes thob pa'i bsod nams kyi /
puṇyaskandhaḥ phalatu sa yathā yuktimuktiṃ prajānām /
niḥsīmānāṃ mama ca vaśitāṃ viśvakāryakriyāsu 		phung po'i 'bras bu des ni skyed ci rigs grol gyur cig /
bdag kyang sna tshogs bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dbang thob shog /
anupamaguṇamṛṣṭā nirmalāśeṣavarṇā /
harati bhavaratiṃ vo bhāratī gautamasya /
bhavati mahati(?) vartiryā dayā snehapūrṇe /
janamanasi tadantarjjyotiṣaḥ saṃkramāya /
prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramitāyā daśaśatībhiraṣṭābhiḥ /
sāratametyabhisamaye sphuṭā ghanā pañjikeyaṃ me /
ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ /
?(?) samvat ā to rājñaḥ śrīharṣadevarājye śrīgaṇḍigulmaviṣaye 		ji srid 'dir ni mar me'i snying po chen po rdzogs yod gyur /
skye kho rnams kyi yid kyi nang der snang ba 'byung 'gyur te /
yon tan dpe med ston cing ma lus dri med bsngags pa yin /
goo ta ma'i gsung des srid pa'i mun pa sel gyur cig /
shes rab pha rol phyin bsdus pa /
brgya phrag bcu pa brgyad dag gi /
dka' 'grel snying po mchog ces pa /
tshig gsal 'di ni bdag gis byas /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel la snying po mchog ces bya ba rgyal po'i slob dbon mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
